354//The one and only uistate instance
355uistatedata uistate;
356
357bool is_valid_in_w_terrain( const point &p )
358{
359 return p.x >= 0 && p.x < TERRAIN_WINDOW_WIDTH && p.y >= 0 && p.y < TERRAIN_WINDOW_HEIGHT;
360}
361
362static void achievement_attained( const achievement *a, bool achievements_enabled )
363{
364 if( achievements_enabled ) {
365 add_msg( m_good, _( "You completed the achievement \"%s\"." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You completed the achievement \"%s\"."
) ) ),
366 a->name() );
367 std::string popup_option = get_option<std::string>( "ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETED_POPUP" );
368 bool show_popup;
369 if( test_mode || popup_option == "never" ) {
370 show_popup = false;
371 } else if( popup_option == "always" ) {
372 show_popup = true;
373 } else if( popup_option == "first" ) {
374 show_popup = !get_past_achievements().is_completed( a->id );
375 } else {
376 debugmsg( "Unexpected ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETED_POPUP option value %s", popup_option )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "376", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Unexpected ACHIEVEMENT_COMPLETED_POPUP option value %s"
, popup_option);
377 show_popup = false;
378 }
379
380 if( show_popup ) {
381 std::string message = colorize( _( "Achievement completed!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Achievement completed!" ) ) ), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) );
382 message += "\n\n";
383 message += get_achievements().ui_text_for( a );
384 message += "\n";
385 message += colorize( _( "Achievement completion popups can be\nconfigured via the "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Achievement completion popups can be\nconfigured via the "
"Interface options" ) ) )
386 "Interface options" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Achievement completion popups can be\nconfigured via the "
"Interface options" ) ) ), c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray) );
387 popup( message );
388 }
389 }
390 get_event_bus().send<event_type::player_gets_achievement>( a->id, achievements_enabled );
391}
392
393static void achievement_failed( const achievement *a, bool achievements_enabled )
394{
395 if( !a->is_conduct() ) {
396 return;
397 }
398 if( achievements_enabled ) {
399 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You lost the conduct \"%s\"." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You lost the conduct \"%s\"."
) ) ), a->name() );
400 }
401 get_event_bus().send<event_type::player_fails_conduct>( a->id, achievements_enabled );
402}
403
404// This is the main game set-up process.
405game::game() :
406 liveview( *liveview_ptr ),
407 scent_ptr( *this ),
408 achievements_tracker_ptr( *stats_tracker_ptr, achievement_attained, achievement_failed, true ),
409 m( *map_ptr ),
410 u( *u_ptr ),
411 scent( *scent_ptr ),
412 timed_events( *timed_event_manager_ptr ),
413 uquit( QUIT_NO ),
414 safe_mode( SAFE_MODE_ON ),
415 u_shared_ptr( &u, null_deleter{} ),
416 next_npc_id( 1 ),
417 next_mission_id( 1 ),
418 remoteveh_cache_time( calendar::before_time_starts ),
419 tileset_zoom( DEFAULT_TILESET_ZOOM ),
420 last_mouse_edge_scroll( std::chrono::steady_clock::now() )
421{
422 first_redraw_since_waiting_started = true;
423 reset_light_level();
424 events().subscribe( &*stats_tracker_ptr );
425 events().subscribe( &*kill_tracker_ptr );
426 events().subscribe( &*memorial_logger_ptr );
427 events().subscribe( &*achievements_tracker_ptr );
428 events().subscribe( &*spell_events_ptr );
429 events().subscribe( &*eoc_events_ptr );
430 world_generator = std::make_unique<worldfactory>();
431 // do nothing, everything that was in here is moved to init_data() which is called immediately after g = new game; in main.cpp
432 // The reason for this move is so that g is not uninitialized when it gets to installing the parts into vehicles.
433}
434
435game::~game() = default;
436
437// Load everything that will not depend on any mods
438void game::load_static_data()
439{
440 // UI stuff, not mod-specific per definition
441 inp_mngr.init(); // Load input config JSON
442 // Init mappings for loading the json stuff
443 DynamicDataLoader::get_instance();
444 fullscreen = false;
445 was_fullscreen = false;
446 show_panel_adm = false;
447
448 // These functions do not load stuff from json.
449 // The content they load/initialize is hardcoded into the program.
450 // Therefore they can be loaded here.
451 // If this changes (if they load data from json), they have to
452 // be moved to game::load_mod or game::load_core_data
453
454 get_auto_pickup().load_global();
455 get_auto_notes_settings().load( false );
456 get_safemode().load_global();
457}
458
459bool game::check_mod_data( const std::vector<mod_id> &opts, loading_ui &ui )
460{
461 dependency_tree &tree = world_generator->get_mod_manager().get_tree();
462
463 // deduplicated list of mods to check
464 std::set<mod_id> check( opts.begin(), opts.end() );
465
466 // if no specific mods specified check all non-obsolete mods
467 if( check.empty() ) {
468 for( const mod_id &e : world_generator->get_mod_manager().all_mods() ) {
469 if( !e->obsolete ) {
470 check.emplace( e );
471 }
472 }
473 }
474
475 if( check.empty() ) {
476 world_generator->set_active_world( nullptr );
477 world_generator->init();
478 const std::vector<mod_id> mods_empty;
479 WORLD *test_world = world_generator->make_new_world( mods_empty );
480 world_generator->set_active_world( test_world );
481
482 // if no loadable mods then test core data only
483 try {
484 load_core_data( ui );
485 DynamicDataLoader::get_instance().finalize_loaded_data( ui );
486 } catch( const std::exception &err ) {
487 std::cerr << "Error loading data from json: " << err.what() << std::endl;
488 }
489
490 std::string world_name = world_generator->active_world->world_name;
491 world_generator->delete_world( world_name, true );
492
493 MAPBUFFER.clear();
494 overmap_buffer.clear();
495 }
496
497 for( const auto &e : check ) {
498 world_generator->set_active_world( nullptr );
499 world_generator->init();
500 const std::vector<mod_id> mods_empty;
501 WORLD *test_world = world_generator->make_new_world( mods_empty );
502 world_generator->set_active_world( test_world );
503
504 if( !e.is_valid() ) {
505 std::cerr << "Unknown mod: " << e.str() << std::endl;
506 return false;
507 }
508
509 const MOD_INFORMATION &mod = *e;
510
511 if( !tree.is_available( mod.ident ) ) {
512 std::cerr << "Missing dependencies: " << mod.name() << "\n"
513 << tree.get_node( mod.ident )->s_errors() << std::endl;
514 return false;
515 }
516
517 std::cout << "Checking mod " << mod.name() << " [" << mod.ident.str() << "]" << std::endl;
518
519 try {
520 load_core_data( ui );
521
522 // Load any dependencies and de-duplicate them
523 std::vector<mod_id> dep_vector = tree.get_dependencies_of_X_as_strings( mod.ident );
524 std::set<mod_id> dep_set( dep_vector.begin(), dep_vector.end() );
525 for( const auto &dep : dep_set ) {
526 load_data_from_dir( dep->path, dep->ident.str(), ui );
527 }
528
529 // Load mod itself
530 load_data_from_dir( mod.path, mod.ident.str(), ui );
531 DynamicDataLoader::get_instance().finalize_loaded_data( ui );
532 } catch( const std::exception &err ) {
533 std::cerr << "Error loading data: " << err.what() << std::endl;
534 }
535
536 std::string world_name = world_generator->active_world->world_name;
537 world_generator->delete_world( world_name, true );
538
539 MAPBUFFER.clear();
540 overmap_buffer.clear();
541 }
542 return true;
543}
544
545bool game::is_core_data_loaded() const
546{
547 return DynamicDataLoader::get_instance().is_data_finalized();
548}
549
550void game::load_core_data( loading_ui &ui )
551{
552 // core data can be loaded only once and must be first
553 // anyway.
554 DynamicDataLoader::get_instance().unload_data();
555
556 load_data_from_dir( PATH_INFO::jsondir(), "core", ui );
557}
558
559void game::load_data_from_dir( const cata_path &path, const std::string &src, loading_ui &ui )
560{
561 DynamicDataLoader::get_instance().load_data_from_path( path, src, ui );
562}
563
564#if !(defined(_WIN32) || defined(TILES))
565// in ncurses_def.cpp
566extern void check_encoding(); // NOLINT
567extern void ensure_term_size(); // NOLINT
568#endif
569
570void game_ui::init_ui()
571{
572 // clear the screen
573 static bool first_init = true;
574
575 if( first_init ) {
576#if !(defined(_WIN32) || defined(TILES))
577 check_encoding();
578#endif
579
580 first_init = false;
581
582#if defined(TILES)
583 //class variable to track the option being active
584 //only set once, toggle action is used to change during game
585 pixel_minimap_option = get_option<bool>( "PIXEL_MINIMAP" );
586 if( get_option<std::string>( "PIXEL_MINIMAP_BG" ) == "theme" ) {
587 SDL_Color pixel_minimap_color = curses_color_to_SDL( c_blackget_all_colors().get(def_c_black) );
588 pixel_minimap_r = pixel_minimap_color.r;
589 pixel_minimap_g = pixel_minimap_color.g;
590 pixel_minimap_b = pixel_minimap_color.b;
591 pixel_minimap_a = pixel_minimap_color.a;
592 } else {
593 pixel_minimap_r = 0x00;
594 pixel_minimap_g = 0x00;
595 pixel_minimap_b = 0x00;
596 pixel_minimap_a = 0xFF;
597 }
598#endif // TILES
599 }
600
601 // First get TERMX, TERMY
602#if defined(TILES) || defined(_WIN32)
603 TERMX = get_terminal_width();
604 TERMY = get_terminal_height();
605
606 get_options().get_option( "TERMINAL_X" ).setValue( TERMX * get_scaling_factor() );
607 get_options().get_option( "TERMINAL_Y" ).setValue( TERMY * get_scaling_factor() );
608 get_options().save();
609#else
610 TERMY = getmaxy( catacurses::stdscr );
611 TERMX = getmaxx( catacurses::stdscr );
612
613 ensure_term_size();
614
615 // try to make FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT symmetric according to TERMY
616 if( TERMY % 2 ) {
617 FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT = EVEN_MINIMUM_TERM_HEIGHT + 1;
618 } else {
619 FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT = EVEN_MINIMUM_TERM_HEIGHT;
620 }
621#endif
622}
623
624void game::toggle_fullscreen()
625{
626#if !defined(TILES)
627 fullscreen = !fullscreen;
628 mark_main_ui_adaptor_resize();
629#else
630 toggle_fullscreen_window();
631#endif
632}
633
634void game::toggle_pixel_minimap() const
635{
636#if defined(TILES)
637 if( pixel_minimap_option ) {
638 clear_window_area( w_pixel_minimap );
639 }
640 pixel_minimap_option = !pixel_minimap_option;
641 mark_main_ui_adaptor_resize();
642#endif // TILES
643}
644
645void game::toggle_language_to_en()
646{
647 // No-op if we aren't complied with localization
648#if defined(LOCALIZE1)
649 const std::string english = "en" ;
650 static std::string secondary_lang = english;
651 std::string current_lang = TranslationManager::GetInstance().GetCurrentLanguage();
652 secondary_lang = current_lang != english ? current_lang : secondary_lang;
653 std::string new_lang = current_lang != english ? english : secondary_lang;
654 set_language( new_lang );
655#endif
656}
657
658bool game::is_tileset_isometric() const
659{
660#if defined(TILES)
661 return use_tiles && tilecontext && tilecontext->is_isometric();
662#else
663 return false;
664#endif
665}
666
667void game::reload_tileset()
668{
669#if defined(TILES)
670 // Disable UIs below to avoid accessing the tile context during loading.
671 ui_adaptor ui( ui_adaptor::disable_uis_below {} );
672 try {
673 closetilecontext->reinit();
674 closetilecontext->load_tileset( get_option<std::string>( "TILES" ),
675 /*precheck=*/false, /*force=*/true,
676 /*pump_events=*/true );
677 closetilecontext->do_tile_loading_report();
678
679 tilecontext = closetilecontext;
680 } catch( const std::exception &err ) {
681 popup( _( "Loading the tileset failed: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Loading the tileset failed: %s"
) ) ), err.what() );
682 }
683 if( use_far_tiles ) {
684 try {
685 if( fartilecontext->is_valid() ) {
686 fartilecontext->reinit();
687 }
688 fartilecontext->load_tileset( get_option<std::string>( "DISTANT_TILES" ),
689 /*precheck=*/false, /*force=*/true,
690 /*pump_events=*/true );
691 fartilecontext->do_tile_loading_report();
692 } catch( const std::exception &err ) {
693 popup( _( "Loading the zoomed out tileset failed: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Loading the zoomed out tileset failed: %s"
) ) ), err.what() );
694 }
695 }
696 try {
697 overmap_tilecontext->reinit();
698 overmap_tilecontext->load_tileset( get_option<std::string>( "OVERMAP_TILES" ),
699 /*precheck=*/false, /*force=*/true,
700 /*pump_events=*/true );
701 overmap_tilecontext->do_tile_loading_report();
702 } catch( const std::exception &err ) {
703 popup( _( "Loading the overmap tileset failed: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Loading the overmap tileset failed: %s"
) ) ), err.what() );
704 }
705 g->reset_zoom();
706 g->mark_main_ui_adaptor_resize();
707#endif // TILES
708}
709
710// temporarily switch out of fullscreen for functions that rely
711// on displaying some part of the sidebar
712void game::temp_exit_fullscreen()
713{
714 if( fullscreen ) {
715 was_fullscreen = true;
716 toggle_fullscreen();
717 } else {
718 was_fullscreen = false;
719 }
720}
721
722void game::reenter_fullscreen()
723{
724 if( was_fullscreen ) {
725 if( !fullscreen ) {
726 toggle_fullscreen();
727 }
728 }
729}
730
731/*
732 * Initialize more stuff after mapbuffer is loaded.
733 */
734void game::setup()
735{
736 loading_ui ui( true );
737 new_game = true;
738 {
739 background_pane background;
740 static_popup popup;
741 popup.message( "%s", _( "Please wait while the world data loads…\nLoading core data" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Please wait while the world data loads…\nLoading core data"
) ) ) );
742 ui_manager::redraw();
743 refresh_display();
744
745 load_core_data( ui );
746 }
747 load_world_modfiles( ui );
748 // Panel manager needs JSON data to be loaded before init
749 panel_manager::get_manager().init();
750
751 m = map();
752
753 next_npc_id = character_id( 1 );
754 next_mission_id = 1;
755 uquit = QUIT_NO; // We haven't quit the game
756 bVMonsterLookFire = true;
757
758 // invalidate calendar caches in case we were previously playing
759 // a different world
760 calendar::set_eternal_season( ::get_option<bool>( "ETERNAL_SEASON" ) );
761 calendar::set_season_length( ::get_option<int>( "SEASON_LENGTH" ) );
762
763 calendar::set_eternal_night( ::get_option<std::string>( "ETERNAL_TIME_OF_DAY" ) == "night" );
764 calendar::set_eternal_day( ::get_option<std::string>( "ETERNAL_TIME_OF_DAY" ) == "day" );
765
766 calendar::set_location( ::get_option<float>( "LATITUDE" ), ::get_option<float>( "LONGITUDE" ) );
767
768 weather.weather_id = WEATHER_CLEAR;
769 // Weather shift in 30
770 weather.nextweather = calendar::start_of_game + 30_minutes;
771
772 turnssincelastmon = 0_turns; //Auto safe mode init
773
774 sounds::reset_sounds();
775 clear_zombies();
776 critter_tracker->clear_npcs();
777 faction_manager_ptr->clear();
778 mission::clear_all();
779 Messages::clear_messages();
780 timed_events = timed_event_manager();
781
782 SCT.vSCT.clear(); //Delete pending messages
783
784 stats().clear();
785 // reset kill counts
786 kill_tracker_ptr->clear();
787 achievements_tracker_ptr->clear();
788 eoc_events_ptr->clear();
789 // reset follower list
790 follower_ids.clear();
791 scent.reset();
792 effect_on_conditions::clear( u );
793 u.character_mood_face( true );
794 remoteveh_cache_time = calendar::before_time_starts;
795 remoteveh_cache = nullptr;
796 global_variables &globvars = get_globals();
797 globvars.clear_global_values();
798 unique_npcs.clear();
799 get_weather().weather_override = WEATHER_NULL;
800 // back to menu for save loading, new game etc
801}
802
803bool game::has_gametype() const
804{
805 return gamemode && gamemode->id() != special_game_type::NONE;
806}
807
808special_game_type game::gametype() const
809{
810 return gamemode ? gamemode->id() : special_game_type::NONE;
811}
812
813void game::load_map( const tripoint_abs_sm &pos_sm,
814 const bool pump_events )
815{
816 m.load( pos_sm, true, pump_events );
817}
818
819// Set up all default values for a new game
820bool game::start_game()
821{
822 if( !gamemode ) {
823 gamemode = std::make_unique<special_game>();
824 }
825
826 seed = rng_bits();
827 new_game = true;
828 start_calendar();
829 weather.nextweather = calendar::turn;
830 safe_mode = ( get_option<bool>( "SAFEMODE" ) ? SAFE_MODE_ON : SAFE_MODE_OFF );
831 mostseen = 0; // ...and mostseen is 0, we haven't seen any monsters yet.
832 get_safemode().load_global();
833
834 init_autosave();
835
836 background_pane background;
837 static_popup popup;
838 popup.message( "%s", _( "Please wait as we build your world" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Please wait as we build your world"
) ) ) );
839 ui_manager::redraw();
840 refresh_display();
841
842 load_master();
843 u.setID( assign_npc_id() ); // should be as soon as possible, but *after* load_master
844
845 // Make sure the items are added after the calendar is started
846 u.add_profession_items();
847 // Move items from the inventory. eventually the inventory should not contain items at all.
848 u.migrate_items_to_storage( true );
849
850 const start_location &start_loc = u.random_start_location ? scen->random_start_location().obj() :
851 u.start_location.obj();
852 tripoint_abs_omt omtstart = overmap::invalid_tripoint;
853 const bool select_starting_city = get_option<bool>( "SELECT_STARTING_CITY" );
854 do {
855 if( select_starting_city ) {
856 if( !u.starting_city.has_value() ) {
857 u.starting_city = random_entry( city::get_all() );
858 u.world_origin = u.starting_city->pos_om;
859 }
860 omtstart = start_loc.find_player_initial_location( u.starting_city.value() );
861 } else {
862 omtstart = start_loc.find_player_initial_location( u.world_origin.value_or( point_abs_om() ) );
863 }
864 if( omtstart == overmap::invalid_tripoint ) {
865
866 MAPBUFFER.clear();
867 overmap_buffer.clear();
868
869 if( !query_yn(
870 _( "Try again?\n\nIt may require several attempts until the game finds a valid starting location." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Try again?\n\nIt may require several attempts until the game finds a valid starting location."
) ) ) ) ) {
871 return false;
872 }
873 }
874 } while( omtstart == overmap::invalid_tripoint );
875
876 start_loc.prepare_map( omtstart );
877
878 if( scen->has_map_extra() ) {
879 // Map extras can add monster spawn points and similar and should be done before the main
880 // map is loaded.
881 start_loc.add_map_extra( omtstart, scen->get_map_extra() );
882 }
883
884 tripoint_abs_sm lev = project_to<coords::sm>( omtstart );
885 // The player is centered in the map, but lev[xyz] refers to the top left point of the map
886 lev -= point( HALF_MAPSIZE, HALF_MAPSIZE );
887 load_map( lev, /*pump_events=*/true );
888
889 int level = m.get_abs_sub().z();
890 u.setpos( m.getlocal( project_to<coords::ms>( omtstart ) ) );
891 m.invalidate_map_cache( level );
892 m.build_map_cache( level );
893 // Do this after the map cache has been built!
894 start_loc.place_player( u, omtstart );
895 // ...but then rebuild it, because we want visibility cache to avoid spawning monsters in sight
896 m.invalidate_map_cache( level );
897 m.build_map_cache( level );
898 // Start the overmap with out immediate neighborhood visible, this needs to be after place_player
899 overmap_buffer.reveal( u.global_omt_location().xy(),
900 get_option<int>( "DISTANCE_INITIAL_VISIBILITY" ), 0 );
901
902 const int city_size = get_option<int>( "CITY_SIZE" );
903 if( get_scenario()->get_reveal_locale() && city_size > 0 ) {
904 city_reference nearest_city = overmap_buffer.closest_city( m.get_abs_sub() );
905 const tripoint_abs_omt city_center_omt = project_to<coords::omt>( nearest_city.abs_sm_pos );
906 // Very necessary little hack: We look for roads around our start, and path from the closest. Because the most common start(evac shelter) cannot be pathed through...
907 const tripoint_abs_omt nearest_road = overmap_buffer.find_closest( omtstart, "road", 3, false );
908 // Reveal route to closest city and a 3 tile radius around the route
909 overmap_buffer.reveal_route( nearest_road, city_center_omt, 3 );
910 // Reveal destination city (scaling with city size setting)
911 overmap_buffer.reveal( city_center_omt, city_size );
912 }
913
914 u.moves = 0;
915 u.process_turn(); // process_turn adds the initial move points
916 u.set_stamina( u.get_stamina_max() );
917 weather.temperature = SPRING_TEMPERATURE;
918 weather.update_weather();
919 u.next_climate_control_check = calendar::before_time_starts; // Force recheck at startup
920 u.last_climate_control_ret = false;
921
922 //Reset character safe mode/pickup rules
923 get_auto_pickup().clear_character_rules();
924 get_safemode().clear_character_rules();
925 get_auto_notes_settings().clear();
926 get_auto_notes_settings().default_initialize();
927
928 // spawn the starting NPC, assuming it's not disallowed by the scenario
929 if( !get_scenario()->has_flag( "LONE_START" ) ) {
930 create_starting_npcs();
931 }
932 //Load NPCs. Set nearby npcs to active.
933 load_npcs();
934 // Spawn the monsters
935 // Surrounded start ones
936 std::vector<std::pair<mongroup_id, float>> surround_groups = get_scenario()->surround_groups();
937 const bool surrounded_start_scenario = !surround_groups.empty();
938 const bool surrounded_start_options = get_option<bool>( "BLACK_ROAD" );
939 if( surrounded_start_options && !surrounded_start_scenario ) {
940 surround_groups.emplace_back( GROUP_BLACK_ROAD, 70.0f );
941 }
942 const bool spawn_near = surrounded_start_options || surrounded_start_scenario;
943 if( spawn_near ) {
944 for( const std::pair<mongroup_id, float> &sg : surround_groups ) {
945 start_loc.surround_with_monsters( omtstart, sg.first, sg.second );
946 }
947 }
948
949 m.spawn_monsters( !spawn_near ); // Static monsters
950
951 // Make sure that no monsters are near the player
952 // This can happen in lab starts
953 if( !spawn_near ) {
954 for( monster &critter : all_monsters() ) {
955 if( rl_dist( critter.pos(), u.pos() ) <= 5 ||
956 m.clear_path( critter.pos(), u.pos(), 40, 1, 100 ) ) {
957 remove_zombie( critter );
958 }
959 }
960 }
961
962 //Create mutation_category_level
963 u.calc_mutation_levels();
964 //Calculate mutation drench protection stats
965 u.drench_mut_calc();
966 if( scen->has_flag( "FIRE_START" ) ) {
967 start_loc.burn( omtstart, 3, 3 );
968 }
969 if( scen->has_flag( "HELI_CRASH" ) ) {
970 start_loc.handle_heli_crash( u );
971 bool success = false;
972 for( wrapped_vehicle v : m.get_vehicles() ) {
973 std::string name = v.v->type.str();
974 std::string search = std::string( "helicopter" );
975 if( name.find( search ) != std::string::npos ) {
976 for( const vpart_reference &vp : v.v->get_any_parts( VPFLAG_CONTROLS ) ) {
977 const tripoint pos = vp.pos();
978 u.setpos( pos );
979
980 // Delete the items that would have spawned here from a "corpse"
981 for( const int sp : v.v->parts_at_relative( vp.mount(), true ) ) {
982 vpart_reference( *v.v, sp ).items().clear();
983 }
984
985 auto mons = critter_tracker->find( u.get_location() );
986 if( mons != nullptr ) {
987 critter_tracker->remove( *mons );
988 }
989
990 success = true;
991 break;
992 }
993 if( success ) {
994 v.v->name = "Bird Wreckage";
995 break;
996 }
997 }
998 }
999 }
1000 if( scen->has_flag( "BORDERED" ) ) {
1001 const point_abs_omt p_player = get_player_character().global_omt_location().xy();
1002 point_abs_om om;
1003 point_om_omt omt;
1004 std::tie( om, omt ) = project_remain<coords::om>( p_player );
1005
1006 // The Wall is supposed to be a 100x100 rectangle centered on player,
1007 // but if player is spawned next to edges of the overmap we need to make it smaller so it doesn't overlap the overmap's borders
1008 int left_x = omt.x() < 50 ? 1 : omt.x() - 50;
1009 int right_x = omt.x() > 129 ? 179 : omt.x() + 50;
1010 int up_y = omt.y() < 50 ? 1 : omt.y() - 50;
1011 int down_y = omt.y() > 129 ? 179 : omt.y() + 50;
1012
1013 overmap &starting_om = get_cur_om();
1014
1015 for( int x = left_x; x <= right_x; x++ ) {
1016 for( int z = -OVERMAP_DEPTH; z <= OVERMAP_HEIGHT; z++ ) {
1017 starting_om.place_special_forced( overmap_special_world, { x, up_y, z },
1018 om_direction::type::north );
1019 }
1020 }
1021
1022 for( int x = left_x; x <= right_x; x++ ) {
1023 for( int z = -OVERMAP_DEPTH; z <= OVERMAP_HEIGHT; z++ ) {
1024 starting_om.place_special_forced( overmap_special_world, { x, down_y, z },
1025 om_direction::type::north );
1026 }
1027 }
1028
1029 for( int y = up_y; y <= down_y; y++ ) {
1030 for( int z = -OVERMAP_DEPTH; z <= OVERMAP_HEIGHT; z++ ) {
1031 starting_om.place_special_forced( overmap_special_world, { left_x, y, z },
1032 om_direction::type::north );
1033 }
1034 }
1035
1036 for( int y = up_y; y <= down_y; y++ ) {
1037 for( int z = -OVERMAP_DEPTH; z <= OVERMAP_HEIGHT; z++ ) {
1038 starting_om.place_special_forced( overmap_special_world, { right_x, y, z },
1039 om_direction::type::north );
1040 }
1041 }
1042 }
1043 for( item *&e : u.inv_dump() ) {
1044 e->set_owner( get_player_character() );
1045 }
1046 // Now that we're done handling coordinates, ensure the player's submap is in the center of the map
1047 update_map( u );
1048 // Profession pets
1049 for( const mtype_id &elem : u.starting_pets ) {
1050 if( monster *const mon = place_critter_around( elem, u.pos(), 5 ) ) {
1051 mon->friendly = -1;
1052 mon->add_effect( effect_pet, 1_turns, true );
1053 } else {
1054 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_GAME, "cannot place starting pet, no space!" )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "cannot place starting pet, no space!"
) ) ); } } while( false );
1055 }
1056 }
1057 if( u.starting_vehicle &&
1058 !place_vehicle_nearby( u.starting_vehicle, u.global_omt_location().xy(), 1, 30,
1059 std::vector<std::string> {} ) ) {
1060 debugmsg( "could not place starting vehicle" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "1060", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "could not place starting vehicle"
);
1061 }
1062 // Assign all of this scenario's missions to the player.
1063 for( const mission_type_id &m : scen->missions() ) {
1064 mission *new_mission = mission::reserve_new( m, character_id() );
1065 new_mission->assign( u );
1066 }
1067
1068 // Same for profession missions
1069 if( !!u.prof ) {
1070 for( const mission_type_id &m : u.prof->missions() ) {
1071 mission *new_mission = mission::reserve_new( m, character_id() );
1072 new_mission->assign( u );
1073 }
1074 }
1075 // ... and for hobbies
1076 for( const profession *hby : u.hobbies ) {
1077 if( !!hby ) {
1078 for( const mission_type_id &m : hby->missions() ) {
1079 mission *new_mission = mission::reserve_new( m, character_id() );
1080 new_mission->assign( u );
1081 }
1082 }
1083 }
1084
1085 get_event_bus().send<event_type::game_start>( getVersionString() );
1086 get_event_bus().send<event_type::game_avatar_new>( /*is_new_game=*/true, /*is_debug=*/false,
1087 u.getID(), u.name, u.male, u.prof->ident(), u.custom_profession );
1088 time_played_at_last_load = std::chrono::seconds( 0 );
1089 time_of_last_load = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
1090 tripoint_abs_omt abs_omt = u.global_omt_location();
1091 const oter_id &cur_ter = overmap_buffer.ter( abs_omt );
1092 get_event_bus().send<event_type::avatar_enters_omt>( abs_omt.raw(), cur_ter );
1093
1094 effect_on_conditions::load_new_character( u );
1095 return true;
1096}
1097
1098vehicle *game::place_vehicle_nearby(
1099 const vproto_id &id, const point_abs_omt &origin, int min_distance,
1100 int max_distance, const std::vector<std::string> &omt_search_types )
1101{
1102 std::vector<std::string> search_types = omt_search_types;
1103 if( search_types.empty() ) {
1104 const vehicle &veh = *id->blueprint;
1105 if( veh.max_ground_velocity() == 0 && veh.can_float() ) {
1106 search_types.emplace_back( "river" );
1107 search_types.emplace_back( "lake" );
1108 search_types.emplace_back( "ocean" );
1109 } else {
1110 search_types.emplace_back( "road" );
1111 search_types.emplace_back( "field" );
1112 }
1113 }
1114 for( const std::string &search_type : search_types ) {
1115 omt_find_params find_params;
1116 find_params.types.emplace_back( search_type, ot_match_type::type );
1117 // find nearest road
1118 find_params.min_distance = min_distance;
1119 find_params.search_range = max_distance;
1120 // if player spawns underground, park their car on the surface.
1121 const tripoint_abs_omt omt_origin( origin, 0 );
1122 for( const tripoint_abs_omt &goal : overmap_buffer.find_all( omt_origin, find_params ) ) {
1123 // try place vehicle there.
1124 tinymap target_map;
1125 target_map.load( project_to<coords::sm>( goal ), false );
1126 const tripoint tinymap_center( SEEX, SEEY, goal.z() );
1127 static constexpr std::array<units::angle, 4> angles = {{
1128 0_degrees, 90_degrees, 180_degrees, 270_degrees
1129 }
1130 };
1131 vehicle *veh = target_map.add_vehicle( id, tinymap_center, random_entry( angles ),
1132 rng( 50, 80 ), 0, false );
1133 if( veh ) {
1134 tripoint abs_local = m.getlocal( target_map.getabs( tinymap_center ) );
1135 veh->sm_pos = ms_to_sm_remain( abs_local );
1136 veh->pos = abs_local.xy();
1137
1138 veh->unlock(); // always spawn unlocked
1139 veh->toggle_tracking(); // always spawn tracked
1140
1141 target_map.save();
1142 return veh;
1143 }
1144 }
1145 }
1146 return nullptr;
1147}
1148
1149//Make any nearby overmap npcs active, and put them in the right location.
1150void game::load_npcs()
1151{
1152 const int radius = HALF_MAPSIZE - 1;
1153 const tripoint_abs_sm abs_sub( get_map().get_abs_sub() );
1154 const half_open_rectangle<point_abs_sm> map_bounds( abs_sub.xy(), abs_sub.xy() + point( MAPSIZE,
1155 MAPSIZE ) );
1156 // uses submap coordinates
1157 std::vector<shared_ptr_fast<npc>> just_added;
1158 for( const auto &temp : overmap_buffer.get_npcs_near_player( radius ) ) {
1159 const character_id &id = temp->getID();
1160 const auto found = std::find_if( critter_tracker->active_npc.begin(),
1161 critter_tracker->active_npc.end(),
1162 [id]( const shared_ptr_fast<npc> &n ) {
1163 return n->getID() == id;
1164 } );
1165 if( found != critter_tracker->active_npc.end() ) {
1166 continue;
1167 }
1168 if( temp->is_active() ) {
1169 continue;
1170 }
1171 if( temp->has_companion_mission() ) {
1172 continue;
1173 }
1174
1175 const tripoint_abs_sm sm_loc = temp->global_sm_location();
1176 // NPCs who are out of bounds before placement would be pushed into bounds
1177 // This can cause NPCs to teleport around, so we don't want that
1178 if( !map_bounds.contains( sm_loc.xy() ) ) {
1179 continue;
1180 }
1181
1182 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_NPC, "game::load_npcs: Spawning static NPC, %s %s",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_NPC ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "game::load_npcs: Spawning static NPC, %s %s"
, abs_sub.to_string_writable(), sm_loc.to_string_writable() )
) ); } } while( false )
1183 abs_sub.to_string_writable(), sm_loc.to_string_writable() )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_NPC ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "game::load_npcs: Spawning static NPC, %s %s"
, abs_sub.to_string_writable(), sm_loc.to_string_writable() )
) ); } } while( false );
1184 temp->place_on_map();
1185 if( !m.inbounds( temp->pos() ) ) {
1186 continue;
1187 }
1188 // In the rare case the npc was marked for death while
1189 // it was on the overmap. Kill it.
1190 if( temp->marked_for_death ) {
1191 temp->die( nullptr );
1192 } else {
1193 critter_tracker->active_npc.push_back( temp );
1194 just_added.push_back( temp );
1195 }
1196 }
1197
1198 for( const auto &npc : just_added ) {
1199 npc->on_load();
1200 }
1201
1202 npcs_dirty = false;
1203}
1204
1205void game::unload_npcs()
1206{
1207 for( const auto &npc : critter_tracker->active_npc ) {
1208 npc->on_unload();
1209 }
1210
1211 critter_tracker->clear_npcs();
1212}
1213
1214void game::remove_npc( character_id const &id )
1215{
1216 std::list<shared_ptr_fast<npc>> &active_npc = critter_tracker->active_npc;
1217 auto const it = std::find_if( active_npc.begin(), active_npc.end(),
1218 [id]( shared_ptr_fast<npc> const & n ) {
1219 return n->getID() == id;
1220 } );
1221 if( it != active_npc.end() ) {
1222 active_npc.erase( it );
1223 }
1224}
1225
1226void game::reload_npcs()
1227{
1228 // TODO: Make it not invoke the "on_unload" command for the NPCs that will be loaded anyway
1229 // and not invoke "on_load" for those NPCs that avoided unloading this way.
1230 unload_npcs();
1231 load_npcs();
1232}
1233
1234const kill_tracker &game::get_kill_tracker() const
1235{
1236 return *kill_tracker_ptr;
1237}
1238
1239void game::create_starting_npcs()
1240{
1241 //We don't want more than one starting npc per starting location
1242 const int radius = 1;
1243 if( !overmap_buffer.get_npcs_near_player( radius ).empty() ) {
1244 return; //There is already an NPC in this starting location
1245 }
1246
1247 shared_ptr_fast<npc> tmp = make_shared_fast<npc>();
1248 tmp->normalize();
1249 tmp->randomize( one_in( 2 ) ? NC_DOCTOR : NC_NONE );
1250 // hardcoded, consistent NPC position
1251 // start_loc::place_player relies on this and must be updated if this is changed
1252 tmp->spawn_at_precise( u.get_location() + point_north_west );
1253 overmap_buffer.insert_npc( tmp );
1254 tmp->form_opinion( u );
1255 tmp->set_attitude( NPCATT_NULL );
1256 //This sets the NPC mission. This NPC remains in the starting location.
1257 tmp->mission = NPC_MISSION_SHELTER;
1258 tmp->chatbin.first_topic = "TALK_SHELTER";
1259 tmp->toggle_trait( trait_NPC_STARTING_NPC );
1260 tmp->set_fac( faction_no_faction );
1261 //One random starting NPC mission
1262 tmp->add_new_mission( mission::reserve_random( ORIGIN_OPENER_NPC, tmp->global_omt_location(),
1263 tmp->getID() ) );
1264}
1265
1266static int veh_lumi( vehicle &veh )
1267{
1268 float veh_luminance = 0.0f;
1269 float iteration = 1.0f;
1270 auto lights = veh.lights();
1271
1272 for( const vehicle_part *pt : lights ) {
1273 const vpart_info &vp = pt->info();
1274 if( vp.has_flag( VPFLAG_CONE_LIGHT ) ||
1275 vp.has_flag( VPFLAG_WIDE_CONE_LIGHT ) ) {
1276 veh_luminance += vp.bonus / iteration;
1277 iteration = iteration * 1.1f;
1278 }
1279 }
1280 // Calculation: see lightmap.cpp
1281 return LIGHT_RANGE( ( veh_luminance * 3 ) );
1282}
1283
1284void game::calc_driving_offset( vehicle *veh )
1285{
1286 if( veh == nullptr || !get_option<bool>( "DRIVING_VIEW_OFFSET" ) ) {
1287 set_driving_view_offset( point_zero );
1288 return;
1289 }
1290 const int g_light_level = static_cast<int>( light_level( u.posz() ) );
1291 const int light_sight_range = u.sight_range( g_light_level );
1292 int sight = std::max( veh_lumi( *veh ), light_sight_range );
1293
1294 // The maximal offset will leave at least this many tiles
1295 // between the PC and the edge of the main window.
1296 static const int border_range = 2;
1297 point max_offset( ( getmaxx( w_terrain ) + 1 ) / 2 - border_range - 1,
1298 ( getmaxy( w_terrain ) + 1 ) / 2 - border_range - 1 );
1299
1300 // velocity at or below this results in no offset at all
1301 static const float min_offset_vel = 1 * vehicles::vmiph_per_tile;
1302 // velocity at or above this results in maximal offset
1303 const float max_offset_vel = std::min( max_offset.y, max_offset.x ) *
1304 vehicles::vmiph_per_tile;
1305 float velocity = veh->velocity;
1306 rl_vec2d offset = veh->move_vec();
1307 if( !veh->skidding && veh->player_in_control( u ) &&
1308 std::abs( veh->cruise_velocity - veh->velocity ) < 7 * vehicles::vmiph_per_tile ) {
1309 // Use cruise_velocity, but only if
1310 // it is not too different from the actual velocity.
1311 // The actual velocity changes too often (see above slowdown).
1312 // Using it makes would make the offset change far too often.
1313 offset = veh->face_vec();
1314 velocity = veh->cruise_velocity;
1315 }
1316 const float rel_offset = inverse_lerp( min_offset_vel, max_offset_vel, velocity );
1317 // Squeeze into the corners, by making the offset vector longer,
1318 // the PC is still in view as long as both offset.x and
1319 // offset.y are <= 1
1320 if( std::fabs( offset.x ) > std::fabs( offset.y ) && std::fabs( offset.x ) > 0.2 ) {
1321 offset.y /= std::fabs( offset.x );
1322 offset.x = ( offset.x > 0 ) ? +1 : -1;
1323 } else if( std::fabs( offset.y ) > 0.2 ) {
1324 offset.x /= std::fabs( offset.y );
1325 offset.y = offset.y > 0 ? +1 : -1;
1326 }
1327 offset.x *= rel_offset;
1328 offset.y *= rel_offset;
1329 offset.x *= max_offset.x;
1330 offset.y *= max_offset.y;
1331 // [ ----@---- ] sight=6
1332 // [ --@------ ] offset=2
1333 // [ -@------# ] offset=3
1334 // can see sights square in every direction, total visible area is
1335 // (2*sight+1)x(2*sight+1), but the window is only
1336 // getmaxx(w_terrain) x getmaxy(w_terrain)
1337 // The area outside of the window is maxoff (sight-getmax/2).
1338 // If that value is <= 0, the whole visible area fits the window.
1339 // don't apply the view offset at all.
1340 // If the offset is > maxoff, only apply at most maxoff, everything
1341 // above leads to invisible area in front of the car.
1342 // It will display (getmax/2+offset) squares in one direction and
1343 // (getmax/2-offset) in the opposite direction (centered on the PC).
1344 const point maxoff( ( sight * 2 + 1 - getmaxx( w_terrain ) ) / 2,
1345 ( sight * 2 + 1 - getmaxy( w_terrain ) ) / 2 );
1346 if( maxoff.x <= 0 ) {
1347 offset.x = 0;
1348 } else if( offset.x > 0 && offset.x > maxoff.x ) {
1349 offset.x = maxoff.x;
1350 } else if( offset.x < 0 && -offset.x > maxoff.x ) {
1351 offset.x = -maxoff.x;
1352 }
1353 if( maxoff.y <= 0 ) {
1354 offset.y = 0;
1355 } else if( offset.y > 0 && offset.y > maxoff.y ) {
1356 offset.y = maxoff.y;
1357 } else if( offset.y < 0 && -offset.y > maxoff.y ) {
1358 offset.y = -maxoff.y;
1359 }
1360
1361 // Turn the offset into a vector that increments the offset toward the desired position
1362 // instead of setting it there instantly, should smooth out jerkiness.
1363 const point offset_difference( -driving_view_offset + point( offset.x, offset.y ) );
1364
1365 const point offset_sign( ( offset_difference.x < 0 ) ? -1 : 1,
1366 ( offset_difference.y < 0 ) ? -1 : 1 );
1367 // Shift the current offset in the direction of the calculated offset by one tile
1368 // per draw event, but snap to calculated offset if we're close enough to avoid jitter.
1369 offset.x = ( std::abs( offset_difference.x ) > 1 ) ?
1370 ( driving_view_offset.x + offset_sign.x ) : offset.x;
1371 offset.y = ( std::abs( offset_difference.y ) > 1 ) ?
1372 ( driving_view_offset.y + offset_sign.y ) : offset.y;
1373
1374 set_driving_view_offset( point( offset.x, offset.y ) );
1375}
1376
1377void game::set_driving_view_offset( const point &p )
1378{
1379 // remove the previous driving offset,
1380 // store the new offset and apply the new offset.
1381 u.view_offset.x -= driving_view_offset.x;
1382 u.view_offset.y -= driving_view_offset.y;
1383 driving_view_offset.x = p.x;
1384 driving_view_offset.y = p.y;
1385 u.view_offset.x += driving_view_offset.x;
1386 u.view_offset.y += driving_view_offset.y;
1387}
1388
1389void game::catch_a_monster( monster *fish, const tripoint &pos, Character *p,
1390 const time_duration &catch_duration ) // catching function
1391{
1392 //spawn the corpse, rotten by a part of the duration
1393 m.add_item_or_charges( pos, item::make_corpse( fish->type->id, calendar::turn + rng( 0_turns,
1394 catch_duration ) ) );
1395 if( u.sees( pos ) ) {
1396 u.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You caught a %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You caught a %s." ) ) ), fish->type->nname() );
1397 }
1398 //quietly kill the caught
1399 fish->no_corpse_quiet = true;
1400 fish->die( p );
1401}
1402
1403static bool cancel_auto_move( Character &you, const std::string &text )
1404{
1405 if( !you.has_destination() ) {
1406 return false;
1407 }
1408 g->invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
1409 if( query_yn( _( "%s Cancel auto move?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s Cancel auto move?" ) ) ), text ) ) {
1410 add_msg( m_warning, _( "%s Auto move canceled." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s Auto move canceled." ) ) ), text );
1411 you.clear_destination();
1412 return true;
1413 }
1414 return false;
1415}
1416
1417bool game::cancel_activity_or_ignore_query( const distraction_type type, const std::string &text )
1418{
1419 if( u.has_distant_destination() ) {
1420 if( cancel_auto_move( u, text ) ) {
1421 return true;
1422 } else {
1423 u.set_destination( u.get_auto_move_route(), player_activity( ACT_TRAVELLING ) );
1424 return false;
1425 }
1426 }
1427 if( !u.activity || u.activity.is_distraction_ignored( type ) ) {
1428 return false;
1429 }
1430 const bool force_uc = get_option<bool>( "FORCE_CAPITAL_YN" );
1431 const auto &allow_key = force_uc ? input_context::disallow_lower_case_or_non_modified_letters
1432 : input_context::allow_all_keys;
1433
1434 const std::string &action = query_popup()
1435 .preferred_keyboard_mode( keyboard_mode::keycode )
1436 .context( "CANCEL_ACTIVITY_OR_IGNORE_QUERY" )
1437 .message( force_uc && !is_keycode_mode_supported() ?
1438 pgettext( "cancel_activity_or_ignore_query",
1439 "<color_light_red>%s %s (Case Sensitive)</color>" ) :
1440 pgettext( "cancel_activity_or_ignore_query",
1441 "<color_light_red>%s %s</color>" ),
1442 text, u.activity.get_stop_phrase() )
1443 .option( "YES", allow_key )
1444 .option( "NO", allow_key )
1445 .option( "MANAGER", allow_key )
1446 .option( "IGNORE", allow_key )
1447 .query()
1448 .action;
1449
1450 if( action == "YES" ) {
1451 u.cancel_activity();
1452 return true;
1453 }
1454 if( action == "IGNORE" ) {
1455 u.activity.ignore_distraction( type );
1456 for( player_activity &activity : u.backlog ) {
1457 activity.ignore_distraction( type );
1458 }
1459 }
1460 if( action == "MANAGER" ) {
1461 u.cancel_activity();
1462 get_distraction_manager().show();
1463 return true;
1464 }
1465
1466 ui_manager::redraw();
1467 refresh_display();
1468
1469 return false;
1470}
1471
1472bool game::portal_storm_query( const distraction_type type, const std::string &text )
1473{
1474 if( u.has_distant_destination() ) {
1475 if( cancel_auto_move( u, text ) ) {
1476 return true;
1477 } else {
1478 u.set_destination( u.get_auto_move_route(), player_activity( ACT_TRAVELLING ) );
1479 return false;
1480 }
1481 }
1482 if( !u.activity || u.activity.is_distraction_ignored( type ) ) {
1483 return false;
1484 }
1485
1486 static const std::vector<nc_color> color_list = {
1487 c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red), c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red), c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green),
1488 c_blueget_all_colors().get(def_c_blue), c_light_blueget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_blue), c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow)
1489 };
1490 const nc_color color = random_entry( color_list );
1491
1492 query_popup()
1493 .context( "YES_QUERY" )
1494 .message( "%s", text )
1495 .option( "YES0" )
1496 .option( "YES1" )
1497 .option( "YES2" )
1498 .default_color( color )
1499 .query();
1500
1501 // ensure it never happens again during this activity - shouldn't be an issue anyway
1502 u.activity.ignore_distraction( type );
1503 for( player_activity &activity : u.backlog ) {
1504 activity.ignore_distraction( type );
1505 }
1506
1507 ui_manager::redraw();
1508 refresh_display();
1509
1510 return false;
1511}
1512
1513bool game::cancel_activity_query( const std::string &text )
1514{
1515 if( u.has_destination() ) {
1516 if( cancel_auto_move( u, text ) ) {
1517 return true;
1518 } else if( u.has_distant_destination() ) {
1519 u.set_destination( u.get_auto_move_route(), player_activity( ACT_TRAVELLING ) );
1520 return false;
1521 }
1522 }
1523 if( !u.activity ) {
1524 return false;
1525 }
1526 g->invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
1527 if( query_yn( "%s %s", text, u.activity.get_stop_phrase() ) ) {
1528 if( u.activity.id() == ACT_TRAIN_TEACHER ) {
1529 for( npc &n : all_npcs() ) {
1530 // Also cancel activities for students
1531 for( const int st_id : u.activity.values ) {
1532 if( n.getID().get_value() == st_id ) {
1533 n.cancel_activity();
1534 }
1535 }
1536 }
1537 u.remove_effect( effect_asked_to_train );
1538 } else if( u.activity.id() == ACT_TRAIN ) {
1539 for( npc &n : all_npcs() ) {
1540 // If the player is the only student, cancel the teacher's activity
1541 if( n.getID().get_value() == u.activity.index && n.activity.values.size() == 1 ) {
1542 n.cancel_activity();
1543 }
1544 }
1545 }
1546 u.cancel_activity();
1547 u.clear_destination();
1548 u.resume_backlog_activity();
1549 return true;
1550 }
1551 return false;
1552}
1553
1554unsigned int game::get_seed() const
1555{
1556 return seed;
1557}
1558
1559void game::set_npcs_dirty()
1560{
1561 npcs_dirty = true;
1562}
1563
1564void game::set_critter_died()
1565{
1566 critter_died = true;
1567}
1568
1569static int maptile_field_intensity( maptile &mt, field_type_id fld )
1570{
1571 const field_entry *field_ptr = mt.find_field( fld );
1572
1573 return field_ptr == nullptr ? 0 : field_ptr->get_field_intensity();
1574}
1575
1576units::temperature_delta get_heat_radiation( const tripoint &location )
1577{
1578 units::temperature_delta temp_mod = units::from_kelvin_delta( 0 );
1579 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1580 map &here = get_map();
1581 // Convert it to an int id once, instead of 139 times per turn
1582 const field_type_id fd_fire_int = fd_fire.id();
1583 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( location, 6 ) ) {
1584 int heat_intensity = 0;
1585
1586 maptile mt = here.maptile_at( dest );
1587
1588 int ffire = maptile_field_intensity( mt, fd_fire_int );
1589 if( ffire > 0 ) {
1590 heat_intensity = ffire;
1591 } else {
1592 heat_intensity = mt.get_ter()->heat_radiation;
1593 }
1594 if( heat_intensity == 0 ) {
1595 // No heat source here
1596 continue;
1597 }
1598 if( player_character.pos() == location ) {
1599 if( !here.clear_path( dest, location, -1, 1, 100 ) ) {
1600 continue;
1601 }
1602 } else if( !here.sees( location, dest, -1 ) ) {
1603 continue;
1604 }
1605 // Ensure fire_dist >= 1 to avoid divide-by-zero errors.
1606 const int fire_dist = std::max( 1, square_dist( dest, location ) );
1607 temp_mod += units::from_fahrenheit_delta( 6.f * heat_intensity * heat_intensity / fire_dist );
1608 }
1609 return temp_mod;
1610}
1611
1612int get_best_fire( const tripoint &location )
1613{
1614 int best_fire = 0;
1615 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1616 map &here = get_map();
1617 // Convert it to an int id once, instead of 139 times per turn
1618 const field_type_id fd_fire_int = fd_fire.id();
1619 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( location, 6 ) ) {
1620 int heat_intensity = 0;
1621
1622 maptile mt = here.maptile_at( dest );
1623
1624 int ffire = maptile_field_intensity( mt, fd_fire_int );
1625 if( ffire > 0 ) {
1626 heat_intensity = ffire;
1627 } else {
1628 heat_intensity = mt.get_ter()->heat_radiation;
1629 }
1630 if( heat_intensity == 0 ) {
1631 // No heat source here
1632 continue;
1633 }
1634 if( player_character.pos() == location ) {
1635 if( !here.clear_path( dest, location, -1, 1, 100 ) ) {
1636 continue;
1637 }
1638 } else if( !here.sees( location, dest, -1 ) ) {
1639 continue;
1640 }
1641 if( square_dist( dest, location ) <= 1 ) {
1642 // Extend limbs/lean over a single adjacent fire to warm up
1643 best_fire = std::max( best_fire, heat_intensity );
1644 }
1645 }
1646 return best_fire;
1647}
1648
1649units::temperature_delta get_convection_temperature( const tripoint &location )
1650{
1651 units::temperature_delta temp_mod = units::from_kelvin_delta( 0 );
1652 map &here = get_map();
1653 // Directly on lava tiles
1654 units::temperature_delta lava_mod = here.tr_at( location ).has_flag(
1655 json_flag_CONVECTS_TEMPERATURE ) ?
1656 units::from_fahrenheit_delta( fd_fire->get_intensity_level().convection_temperature_mod ) :
1657 units::from_kelvin_delta( 0 );
1658 // Modifier from fields
1659 for( auto fd : here.field_at( location ) ) {
1660 // Nullify lava modifier when there is open fire
1661 if( fd.first.obj().has_fire ) {
1662 lava_mod = units::from_kelvin_delta( 0 );
1663 }
1664 temp_mod += units::from_fahrenheit_delta(
1665 fd.second.get_intensity_level().convection_temperature_mod );
1666 }
1667 return temp_mod + lava_mod;
1668}
1669
1670int game::assign_mission_id()
1671{
1672 int ret = next_mission_id;
1673 next_mission_id++;
1674 return ret;
1675}
1676
1677npc *game::find_npc( character_id id )
1678{
1679 return overmap_buffer.find_npc( id ).get();
1680}
1681
1682npc *game::find_npc_by_unique_id( const std::string &unique_id )
1683{
1684 return overmap_buffer.find_npc_by_unique_id( unique_id ).get();
1685}
1686
1687void game::add_npc_follower( const character_id &id )
1688{
1689 follower_ids.insert( id );
1690 u.follower_ids.insert( id );
1691}
1692
1693void game::remove_npc_follower( const character_id &id )
1694{
1695 follower_ids.erase( id );
1696 u.follower_ids.erase( id );
1697}
1698
1699static void update_faction_api( npc *guy )
1700{
1701 if( guy->get_faction_ver() < 2 ) {
1702 guy->set_fac( faction_your_followers );
1703 guy->set_faction_ver( 2 );
1704 }
1705}
1706
1707void game::validate_linked_vehicles()
1708{
1709 for( wrapped_vehicle &veh : m.get_vehicles() ) {
1710 vehicle *v = veh.v;
1711 if( v->tow_data.other_towing_point != tripoint_zero ) {
1712 vehicle *other_v = veh_pointer_or_null( m.veh_at( v->tow_data.other_towing_point ) );
1713 if( other_v ) {
1714 // the other vehicle is towing us.
1715 v->tow_data.set_towing( other_v, v );
1716 v->tow_data.other_towing_point = tripoint_zero;
1717 }
1718 }
1719 }
1720}
1721
1722void game::validate_mounted_npcs()
1723{
1724 for( monster &m : all_monsters() ) {
1725 if( m.has_effect( effect_ridden ) && m.mounted_player_id.is_valid() ) {
1726 Character *mounted_pl = g->critter_by_id<Character>( m.mounted_player_id );
1727 if( !mounted_pl ) {
1728 // Target no longer valid.
1729 m.mounted_player_id = character_id();
1730 m.remove_effect( effect_ridden );
1731 continue;
1732 }
1733 mounted_pl->mounted_creature = shared_from( m );
1734 mounted_pl->setpos( m.pos() );
1735 mounted_pl->add_effect( effect_riding, 1_turns, true );
1736 m.mounted_player = mounted_pl;
1737 }
1738 }
1739}
1740
1741void game::validate_npc_followers()
1742{
1743 // Make sure visible followers are in the list.
1744 const std::vector<npc *> visible_followers = get_npcs_if( [&]( const npc & guy ) {
1745 return guy.is_player_ally();
1746 } );
1747 for( npc *guy : visible_followers ) {
1748 update_faction_api( guy );
1749 add_npc_follower( guy->getID() );
1750 }
1751 // Make sure overmapbuffered NPC followers are in the list.
1752 for( const auto &temp_guy : overmap_buffer.get_npcs_near_player( 300 ) ) {
1753 npc *guy = temp_guy.get();
1754 if( guy->is_player_ally() ) {
1755 update_faction_api( guy );
1756 add_npc_follower( guy->getID() );
1757 }
1758 }
1759 // Make sure that serialized player followers sync up with game list
1760 for( const character_id &temp_id : u.follower_ids ) {
1761 add_npc_follower( temp_id );
1762 }
1763}
1764
1765void game::validate_camps()
1766{
1767 basecamp camp = m.hoist_submap_camp( u.pos() );
1768 if( camp.is_valid() ) {
1769 overmap_buffer.add_camp( camp );
1770 m.remove_submap_camp( u.pos() );
1771 } else if( camp.camp_omt_pos() != tripoint_abs_omt() ) {
1772 std::string camp_name = _( "Faction Camp" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Faction Camp" ) ) );
1773 camp.set_name( camp_name );
1774 overmap_buffer.add_camp( camp );
1775 m.remove_submap_camp( u.pos() );
1776 }
1777}
1778
1779std::set<character_id> game::get_follower_list()
1780{
1781 return follower_ids;
1782}
1783
1784static hint_rating rate_action_change_side( const avatar &you, const item &it )
1785{
1786 if( !it.is_sided() ) {
1787 return hint_rating::cant;
1788 }
1789
1790 return you.is_worn( it ) ? hint_rating::good : hint_rating::iffy;
1791}
1792
1793static hint_rating rate_action_disassemble( avatar &you, const item &it )
1794{
1795 if( you.can_disassemble( it, you.crafting_inventory() ).success() ) {
1796 // Possible right now
1797 return hint_rating::good;
1798 } else if( it.is_disassemblable() ) {
1799 // Potentially possible, but we currently lack requirements
1800 return hint_rating::iffy;
1801 } else {
1802 // Never possible
1803 return hint_rating::cant;
1804 }
1805}
1806
1807static hint_rating rate_action_view_recipe( avatar &you, const item &it )
1808{
1809 const inventory &inven = you.crafting_inventory();
1810 const std::vector<Character *> helpers = you.get_crafting_group();
1811 if( it.is_craft() ) {
1812 const recipe &craft_recipe = it.get_making();
1813 if( craft_recipe.is_null() || !craft_recipe.ident().is_valid() ) {
1814 return hint_rating::cant;
1815 } else if( you.get_available_recipes( inven, &helpers ).contains( &craft_recipe ) ) {
1816 return hint_rating::good;
1817 }
1818 } else {
1819 itype_id item = it.typeId();
1820 bool is_byproduct = false; // product or byproduct
1821 bool can_craft = false;
1822 // Does a recipe for the item exist?
1823 for( const auto& [_, r] : recipe_dict ) {
1824 if( !r.obsolete && ( item == r.result() || r.in_byproducts( item ) ) ) {
1825 is_byproduct = true;
1826 // If if exists, do I know it?
1827 if( you.get_available_recipes( inven, &helpers ).contains( &r ) ) {
1828 can_craft = true;
1829 break;
1830 }
1831 }
1832 }
1833 if( !is_byproduct ) {
1834 return hint_rating::cant;
1835 } else if( can_craft ) {
1836 return hint_rating::good;
1837 }
1838 }
1839 return hint_rating::iffy;
1840}
1841
1842static hint_rating rate_action_eat( const avatar &you, const item &it )
1843{
1844 if( it.is_container() ) {
1845 hint_rating best_rate = hint_rating::cant;
1846 it.visit_items( [&you, &best_rate]( item * node, item * ) {
1847 if( you.can_consume_as_is( *node ) ) {
1848 ret_val<edible_rating> rate = you.will_eat( *node );
1849 if( rate.success() ) {
1850 best_rate = hint_rating::good;
1851 return VisitResponse::ABORT;
1852 } else if( rate.value() != INEDIBLE || rate.value() != INEDIBLE_MUTATION ) {
1853 best_rate = hint_rating::iffy;
1854 }
1855 }
1856 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
1857 } );
1858 return best_rate;
1859 }
1860
1861 if( !you.can_consume_as_is( it ) ) {
1862 return hint_rating::cant;
1863 }
1864
1865 const auto rating = you.will_eat( it );
1866 if( rating.success() ) {
1867 return hint_rating::good;
1868 } else if( rating.value() == INEDIBLE || rating.value() == INEDIBLE_MUTATION ) {
1869 return hint_rating::cant;
1870 }
1871
1872 return hint_rating::iffy;
1873}
1874
1875static hint_rating rate_action_collapse( const item &it )
1876{
1877 for( const item_pocket *pocket : it.get_all_standard_pockets() ) {
1878 if( !pocket->settings.is_collapsed() ) {
1879 return hint_rating::good;
1880 }
1881 }
1882 return hint_rating::cant;
1883}
1884
1885static hint_rating rate_action_expand( const item &it )
1886{
1887 for( const item_pocket *pocket : it.get_all_standard_pockets() ) {
1888 if( pocket->settings.is_collapsed() ) {
1889 return hint_rating::good;
1890 }
1891 }
1892 return hint_rating::cant;
1893}
1894
1895static hint_rating rate_action_mend( const avatar &, const item &it )
1896{
1897 // TODO: check also if item damage could be repaired via a tool
1898 if( !it.faults.empty() ) {
1899 return hint_rating::good;
1900 }
1901 return it.faults_potential().empty() ? hint_rating::cant : hint_rating::iffy;
1902}
1903
1904static hint_rating rate_action_read( const avatar &you, const item &it )
1905{
1906 if( !it.is_book() ) {
1907 return hint_rating::cant;
1908 }
1909
1910 std::vector<std::string> dummy;
1911 return you.get_book_reader( it, dummy ) ? hint_rating::good : hint_rating::iffy;
1912}
1913
1914static hint_rating rate_action_take_off( const avatar &you, const item &it )
1915{
1916 if( !it.is_armor() || it.has_flag( flag_NO_TAKEOFF ) || it.has_flag( flag_INTEGRATED ) ) {
1917 return hint_rating::cant;
1918 }
1919
1920 if( you.is_worn( it ) ) {
1921 return hint_rating::good;
1922 }
1923
1924 return hint_rating::iffy;
1925}
1926
1927static hint_rating rate_action_use( const avatar &you, const item &it )
1928{
1929 if( it.is_container() && it.item_has_uses_recursive() ) {
1930 return hint_rating::good;
1931 }
1932 if( it.is_broken() ) {
1933 return hint_rating::iffy;
1934 } else if( it.is_tool() ) {
1935 return it.ammo_sufficient( &you ) ? hint_rating::good : hint_rating::iffy;
1936 } else if( it.is_gunmod() ) {
1937 /** @EFFECT_GUN >0 allows rating estimates for gun modifications */
1938 if( static_cast<int>( you.get_skill_level( skill_gun ) ) == 0 ) {
1939 return hint_rating::iffy;
1940 } else {
1941 return hint_rating::good;
1942 }
1943 } else if( it.is_food() || it.is_medication() || it.is_book() || it.is_armor() ) {
1944 if( it.is_medication() && !you.can_use_heal_item( it ) ) {
1945 return hint_rating::cant;
1946 }
1947 if( it.is_comestible() && it.is_frozen_liquid() ) {
1948 return hint_rating::cant;
1949 }
1950 // The rating is subjective, could be argued as hint_rating::cant or hint_rating::good as well
1951 return hint_rating::iffy;
1952 } else if( it.type->has_use() ) {
1953 return hint_rating::good;
1954 }
1955
1956 return hint_rating::cant;
1957}
1958
1959static hint_rating rate_action_wear( const avatar &you, const item &it )
1960{
1961 if( !it.is_armor() ) {
1962 return hint_rating::cant;
1963 }
1964
1965 if( you.is_worn( it ) ) {
1966 return hint_rating::iffy;
1967 }
1968
1969 return you.can_wear( it ).success() ? hint_rating::good : hint_rating::iffy;
1970}
1971
1972static hint_rating rate_action_wield( const avatar &you, const item &it )
1973{
1974 return you.can_wield( it ).success() ? hint_rating::good : hint_rating::iffy;
1975}
1976
1977static hint_rating rate_action_insert( const avatar &you, const item_location &loc )
1978{
1979 if( loc->will_spill_if_unsealed()
1980 && loc.where() != item_location::type::map
1981 && !you.is_wielding( *loc ) ) {
1982
1983 return hint_rating::cant;
1984 }
1985 return hint_rating::good;
1986}
1987
1988/* item submenu for 'i' and '/'
1989* It use draw_item_info to draw item info and action menu
1990*
1991* @param locThisItem the item
1992* @param iStartX Left coordinate of the item info window
1993* @param iWidth width of the item info window (height = height of terminal)
1994* @return getch
1995*/
1996int game::inventory_item_menu( item_location locThisItem,
1997 const std::function<int()> &iStartX,
1998 const std::function<int()> &iWidth,
1999 const inventory_item_menu_position position )
2000{
2001 int cMenu = static_cast<int>( '+' );
2002
2003 item &oThisItem = *locThisItem;
2004 if( u.has_item( oThisItem ) ) {
2005#if defined(__ANDROID__)
2006 if( get_option<bool>( "ANDROID_INVENTORY_AUTOADD" ) ) {
2007 add_key_to_quick_shortcuts( oThisItem.invlet, "INVENTORY", false );
2008 }
2009#endif
2010 const bool bHPR = get_auto_pickup().has_rule( &oThisItem );
2011 std::vector<iteminfo> vThisItem;
2012 std::vector<iteminfo> vDummy;
2013 item_info_data data;
2014 int iScrollPos = 0;
2015 int iScrollHeight = 0;
2016 uilist action_menu;
2017 std::unique_ptr<ui_adaptor> ui;
2018
2019 bool exit = false;
2020 bool first_execution = true;
2021 static int lang_version = detail::get_current_language_version();
2022 catacurses::window w_info;
2023 do {
2024 //lang check here is needed to redraw the menu when using "Toggle language to English" option
2025 if( first_execution || lang_version != detail::get_current_language_version() ) {
2026
2027 const hint_rating rate_drop_item = u.get_wielded_item() &&
2028 u.get_wielded_item()->has_flag( flag_NO_UNWIELD ) ?
2029 hint_rating::cant : hint_rating::good;
2030 action_menu.reset();
2031 action_menu.allow_anykey = true;
2032 const auto addentry = [&]( const char key, const std::string & text, const hint_rating hint ) {
2033 // The char is used as retval from the uilist *and* as hotkey.
2034 action_menu.addentry( key, true, key, text );
2035 auto &entry = action_menu.entries.back();
2036 switch( hint ) {
2037 case hint_rating::cant:
2038 entry.text_color = c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray);
2039 break;
2040 case hint_rating::iffy:
2041 entry.text_color = c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red);
2042 break;
2043 case hint_rating::good:
2044 entry.text_color = c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green);
2045 break;
2046 }
2047 };
2048 addentry( 'a', pgettext( "action", "activate" ), rate_action_use( u, oThisItem ) );
2049 addentry( 'R', pgettext( "action", "read" ), rate_action_read( u, oThisItem ) );
2050 addentry( 'E', pgettext( "action", "eat" ), rate_action_eat( u, oThisItem ) );
2051 addentry( 'W', pgettext( "action", "wear" ), rate_action_wear( u, oThisItem ) );
2052 addentry( 'w', pgettext( "action", "wield" ), rate_action_wield( u, oThisItem ) );
2053 addentry( 't', pgettext( "action", "throw" ), rate_action_wield( u, oThisItem ) );
2054 addentry( 'c', pgettext( "action", "change side" ), rate_action_change_side( u, oThisItem ) );
2055 addentry( 'T', pgettext( "action", "take off" ), rate_action_take_off( u, oThisItem ) );
2056 addentry( 'd', pgettext( "action", "drop" ), rate_drop_item );
2057 addentry( 'U', pgettext( "action", "unload" ), u.rate_action_unload( oThisItem ) );
2058 addentry( 'r', pgettext( "action", "reload" ), u.rate_action_reload( oThisItem ) );
2059 addentry( 'p', pgettext( "action", "part reload" ), u.rate_action_reload( oThisItem ) );
2060 addentry( 'm', pgettext( "action", "mend" ), rate_action_mend( u, oThisItem ) );
2061 addentry( 'D', pgettext( "action", "disassemble" ), rate_action_disassemble( u, oThisItem ) );
2062 if( oThisItem.is_container() && !oThisItem.is_corpse() ) {
2063 addentry( 'i', pgettext( "action", "insert" ), rate_action_insert( u, locThisItem ) );
2064 if( oThisItem.num_item_stacks() > 0 ) {
2065 addentry( 'o', pgettext( "action", "open" ), hint_rating::good );
2066 }
2067 addentry( 'v', pgettext( "action", "pocket settings" ), hint_rating::good );
2068 }
2069
2070 if( oThisItem.is_favorite ) {
2071 addentry( 'f', pgettext( "action", "unfavorite" ), hint_rating::good );
2072 } else {
2073 addentry( 'f', pgettext( "action", "favorite" ), hint_rating::good );
2074 }
2075
2076 addentry( 'V', pgettext( "action", "view recipe" ), rate_action_view_recipe( u, oThisItem ) );
2077 addentry( '>', pgettext( "action", "hide contents" ), rate_action_collapse( oThisItem ) );
2078 addentry( '<', pgettext( "action", "show contents" ), rate_action_expand( oThisItem ) );
2079 addentry( '=', pgettext( "action", "reassign" ), hint_rating::good );
2080
2081 if( bHPR ) {
2082 addentry( '-', _( "Auto pickup" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Auto pickup" ) ) ), hint_rating::iffy );
2083 } else {
2084 addentry( '+', _( "Auto pickup" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Auto pickup" ) ) ), hint_rating::good );
2085 }
2086
2087 oThisItem.info( true, vThisItem );
2088
2089 action_menu.w_y_setup = 0;
2090 action_menu.w_x_setup = [&]( const int popup_width ) -> int {
2091 switch( position )
2092 {
2093 default:
2094 case RIGHT_TERMINAL_EDGE:
2095 return 0;
2096 case LEFT_OF_INFO:
2097 return iStartX() - popup_width;
2098 case RIGHT_OF_INFO:
2099 return iStartX() + iWidth();
2100 case LEFT_TERMINAL_EDGE:
2101 return TERMX - popup_width;
2102 }
2103 };
2104 // Filtering isn't needed, the number of entries is manageable.
2105 action_menu.filtering = false;
2106 // Default menu border color is different, this matches the border of the item info window.
2107 action_menu.border_color = BORDER_COLORget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray);
2108
2109 data = item_info_data( oThisItem.tname(), oThisItem.type_name(), vThisItem, vDummy, iScrollPos );
2110 data.without_getch = true;
2111
2112 ui = std::make_unique<ui_adaptor>();
2113 ui->on_screen_resize( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
2114 w_info = catacurses::newwin( TERMY, iWidth(), point( iStartX(), 0 ) );
2115 iScrollHeight = TERMY - 2;
2116 ui.position_from_window( w_info );
2117 } );
2118 ui->mark_resize();
2119
2120 ui->on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
2121 draw_item_info( w_info, data );
2122 } );
2123
2124 action_menu.additional_actions = {
2125 { "RIGHT", translation() }
2126 };
2127
2128 lang_version = detail::get_current_language_version();
2129 first_execution = false;
2130 }
2131
2132 const int prev_selected = action_menu.selected;
2133 action_menu.query( false );
2134 if( action_menu.ret >= 0 ) {
2135 cMenu = action_menu.ret; /* Remember: hotkey == retval, see addentry above. */
2136 } else if( action_menu.ret == UILIST_UNBOUND && action_menu.ret_act == "RIGHT" ) {
2137 // Simulate KEY_RIGHT == '\n' (confirm currently selected entry) for compatibility with old version.
2138 // TODO: ideally this should be done in the uilist, maybe via a callback.
2139 cMenu = action_menu.ret = action_menu.entries[action_menu.selected].retval;
2140 } else if( action_menu.ret_act == "PAGE_UP" || action_menu.ret_act == "PAGE_DOWN" ) {
2141 cMenu = action_menu.ret_act == "PAGE_UP" ? KEY_PPAGE : KEY_NPAGE;
2142 // Prevent the menu from scrolling with this key. TODO: Ideally the menu
2143 // could be instructed to ignore these two keys instead of scrolling.
2144 action_menu.selected = prev_selected;
2145 action_menu.fselected = prev_selected;
2146 action_menu.vshift = 0;
2147 } else {
2148 cMenu = 0;
2149 }
2150
2151 if( action_menu.ret != UILIST_WAIT_INPUT && action_menu.ret != UILIST_UNBOUND ) {
2152 exit = true;
2153 ui = nullptr;
2154 }
2155
2156 switch( cMenu ) {
2157 case 'a': {
2158 contents_change_handler handler;
2159 handler.unseal_pocket_containing( locThisItem );
2160 if( locThisItem.get_item()->type->has_use() &&
2161 !locThisItem.get_item()->item_has_uses_recursive( true ) ) { // NOLINT(bugprone-branch-clone)
2162 // Item has uses and none of its contents (if any) has uses.
2163 avatar_action::use_item( u, locThisItem );
2164 } else if( locThisItem.get_item()->item_has_uses_recursive() ) {
2165 game::item_action_menu( locThisItem );
2166 } else if( locThisItem.get_item()->has_relic_activation() ) {
2167 avatar_action::use_item( u, locThisItem );
2168 } else {
2169 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't use a %s there." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't use a %s there." )
) ), locThisItem->tname() );
2170 break;
2171 }
2172 handler.handle_by( u );
2173 break;
2174 }
2175 case 'E':
2176 if( !locThisItem.get_item()->is_container() ) {
2177 avatar_action::eat( u, locThisItem );
2178 } else {
2179 avatar_action::eat_or_use( u, game_menus::inv::consume( u, locThisItem ) );
2180 }
2181 break;
2182 case 'W': {
2183 contents_change_handler handler;
2184 handler.unseal_pocket_containing( locThisItem );
2185 u.wear( locThisItem );
2186 handler.handle_by( u );
2187 break;
2188 }
2189 case 'w':
2190 if( u.can_wield( *locThisItem ).success() ) {
2191 contents_change_handler handler;
2192 handler.unseal_pocket_containing( locThisItem );
2193 wield( locThisItem );
2194 handler.handle_by( u );
2195 } else {
2196 add_msg( m_info, "%s", u.can_wield( *locThisItem ).c_str() );
2197 }
2198 break;
2199 case 't': {
2200 contents_change_handler handler;
2201 handler.unseal_pocket_containing( locThisItem );
2202 avatar_action::plthrow( u, locThisItem );
2203 handler.handle_by( u );
2204 break;
2205 }
2206 case 'c':
2207 u.change_side( locThisItem );
2208 break;
2209 case 'T':
2210 u.takeoff( locThisItem );
2211 break;
2212 case 'd':
2213 u.drop( locThisItem, u.pos() );
2214 break;
2215 case 'U':
2216 u.unload( locThisItem );
2217 break;
2218 case 'r':
2219 reload( locThisItem );
2220 break;
2221 case 'p':
2222 reload( locThisItem, true );
2223 break;
2224 case 'm':
2225 avatar_action::mend( u, locThisItem );
2226 break;
2227 case 'R':
2228 u.read( locThisItem );
2229 break;
2230 case 'D':
2231 u.disassemble( locThisItem, false );
2232 break;
2233 case 'f':
2234 oThisItem.is_favorite = !oThisItem.is_favorite;
2235 if( locThisItem.has_parent() ) {
2236 item_location parent = locThisItem.parent_item();
2237 item_pocket *const pocket = locThisItem.parent_pocket();
2238 if( pocket ) {
2239 pocket->restack();
2240 } else {
2241 debugmsg( "parent container does not contain item" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "2241", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "parent container does not contain item"
);
2242 }
2243 }
2244 break;
2245 case 'v':
2246 if( oThisItem.is_container() ) {
2247 oThisItem.favorite_settings_menu();
2248 }
2249 break;
2250 case 'V': {
2251 int is_recipe = 0;
2252 std::string this_itype = oThisItem.typeId().str();
2253 if( oThisItem.is_craft() ) {
2254 this_itype = oThisItem.get_making().ident().str();
2255 is_recipe = 1;
2256 }
2257 player_activity recipe_act = player_activity( ACT_VIEW_RECIPE, 0, is_recipe, 0, this_itype );
2258 u.assign_activity( recipe_act );
2259 break;
2260 }
2261 case 'i':
2262 if( oThisItem.is_container() ) {
2263 game_menus::inv::insert_items( u, locThisItem );
2264 }
2265 break;
2266 case 'o':
2267 if( oThisItem.is_container() && oThisItem.num_item_stacks() > 0 ) {
2268 game_menus::inv::common( locThisItem, u );
2269 }
2270 break;
2271 case '=':
2272 game_menus::inv::reassign_letter( u, oThisItem );
2273 break;
2274 case KEY_PPAGE:
2275 iScrollPos -= iScrollHeight;
2276 if( ui ) {
2277 ui->invalidate_ui();
2278 }
2279 break;
2280 case KEY_NPAGE:
2281 iScrollPos += iScrollHeight;
2282 if( ui ) {
2283 ui->invalidate_ui();
2284 }
2285 break;
2286 case '+':
2287 if( !bHPR ) {
2288 get_auto_pickup().add_rule( &oThisItem, true );
2289 add_msg( m_info, _( "'%s' added to character pickup rules." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "'%s' added to character pickup rules."
) ) ), oThisItem.tname( 1,
2290 false ) );
2291 }
2292 break;
2293 case '-':
2294 if( bHPR ) {
2295 get_auto_pickup().remove_rule( &oThisItem );
2296 add_msg( m_info, _( "'%s' removed from character pickup rules." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "'%s' removed from character pickup rules."
) ) ), oThisItem.tname( 1,
2297 false ) );
2298 }
2299 break;
2300 case '<':
2301 case '>':
2302 for( item_pocket *pocket : oThisItem.get_all_standard_pockets() ) {
2303 pocket->settings.set_collapse( cMenu == '>' );
2304 }
2305 break;
2306 default:
2307 break;
2308 }
2309 } while( !exit );
2310 }
2311 return cMenu;
2312}
2313
2314// Checks input to see if mouse was moved and handles the mouse view box accordingly.
2315// Returns true if input requires breaking out into a game action.
2316bool game::handle_mouseview( input_context &ctxt, std::string &action )
2317{
2318 std::optional<tripoint> liveview_pos;
2319
2320 do {
2321 action = ctxt.handle_input();
2322 if( action == "MOUSE_MOVE" ) {
2323 const std::optional<tripoint> mouse_pos = ctxt.get_coordinates( w_terrain, ter_view_p.xy(), true );
2324 if( mouse_pos && ( !liveview_pos || *mouse_pos != *liveview_pos ) ) {
2325 liveview_pos = mouse_pos;
2326 liveview.show( *liveview_pos );
2327 } else if( !mouse_pos ) {
2328 liveview_pos.reset();
2329 liveview.hide();
2330 }
2331 ui_manager::redraw();
2332 }
2333 } while( action == "MOUSE_MOVE" ); // Freeze animation when moving the mouse
2334
2335 if( action != "TIMEOUT" ) {
2336 // Keyboard event, break out of animation loop
2337 liveview.hide();
2338 return false;
2339 }
2340
2341 // Mouse movement or un-handled key
2342 return true;
2343}
2344
2345std::pair<tripoint, tripoint> game::mouse_edge_scrolling( input_context &ctxt, const int speed,
2346 const tripoint &last, bool iso )
2347{
2348 const int rate = get_option<int>( "EDGE_SCROLL" );
2349 auto ret = std::make_pair( tripoint_zero, last );
2350 if( rate == -1 ) {
2351 // Fast return when the option is disabled.
2352 return ret;
2353 }
2354 // Ensure the parameters are used even if the #if below is false
2355 ( void ) ctxt;
2356 ( void ) speed;
2357 ( void ) iso;
2358#if (defined TILES || defined _WIN32 || defined WINDOWS)
2359 std::chrono::steady_clock::time_point now = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
2360 if( now < last_mouse_edge_scroll + std::chrono::milliseconds( rate ) ) {
2361 return ret;
2362 } else {
2363 last_mouse_edge_scroll = now;
2364 }
2365 const input_event event = ctxt.get_raw_input();
2366 if( event.type == input_event_t::mouse ) {
2367 const point threshold( projected_window_width() / 100, projected_window_height() / 100 );
2368 if( event.mouse_pos.x <= threshold.x ) {
2369 ret.first.x -= speed;
2370 if( iso ) {
2371 ret.first.y -= speed;
2372 }
2373 } else if( event.mouse_pos.x >= projected_window_width() - threshold.x ) {
2374 ret.first.x += speed;
2375 if( iso ) {
2376 ret.first.y += speed;
2377 }
2378 }
2379 if( event.mouse_pos.y <= threshold.y ) {
2380 ret.first.y -= speed;
2381 if( iso ) {
2382 ret.first.x += speed;
2383 }
2384 } else if( event.mouse_pos.y >= projected_window_height() - threshold.y ) {
2385 ret.first.y += speed;
2386 if( iso ) {
2387 ret.first.x -= speed;
2388 }
2389 }
2390 ret.second = ret.first;
2391 } else if( event.type == input_event_t::timeout ) {
2392 ret.first = ret.second;
2393 }
2394#endif
2395 return ret;
2396}
2397
2398tripoint game::mouse_edge_scrolling_terrain( input_context &ctxt )
2399{
2400 auto ret = mouse_edge_scrolling( ctxt, std::max( DEFAULT_TILESET_ZOOM / tileset_zoom, 1 ),
2401 last_mouse_edge_scroll_vector_terrain, g->is_tileset_isometric() );
2402 last_mouse_edge_scroll_vector_terrain = ret.second;
2403 last_mouse_edge_scroll_vector_overmap = tripoint_zero;
2404 return ret.first;
2405}
2406
2407tripoint game::mouse_edge_scrolling_overmap( input_context &ctxt )
2408{
2409 // overmap has no iso mode
2410 auto ret = mouse_edge_scrolling( ctxt, 2, last_mouse_edge_scroll_vector_overmap, false );
2411 last_mouse_edge_scroll_vector_overmap = ret.second;
2412 last_mouse_edge_scroll_vector_terrain = tripoint_zero;
2413 return ret.first;
2414}
2415
2416input_context get_default_mode_input_context()
2417{
2418 input_context ctxt( "DEFAULTMODE", keyboard_mode::keycode );
2419 // Because those keys move the character, they don't pan, as their original name says
2420 ctxt.set_iso( true );
2421 ctxt.register_action( "UP", to_translation( "Move north" ) );
2422 ctxt.register_action( "RIGHTUP", to_translation( "Move northeast" ) );
2423 ctxt.register_action( "RIGHT", to_translation( "Move east" ) );
2424 ctxt.register_action( "RIGHTDOWN", to_translation( "Move southeast" ) );
2425 ctxt.register_action( "DOWN", to_translation( "Move south" ) );
2426 ctxt.register_action( "LEFTDOWN", to_translation( "Move southwest" ) );
2427 ctxt.register_action( "LEFT", to_translation( "Move west" ) );
2428 ctxt.register_action( "LEFTUP", to_translation( "Move northwest" ) );
2429 ctxt.register_action( "pause" );
