2570
2571vehicle *game::remoteveh()
2572{
2573 if( calendar::turn == remoteveh_cache_time ) {
2574 return remoteveh_cache;
2575 }
2576 remoteveh_cache_time = calendar::turn;
2577 std::stringstream remote_veh_string( u.get_value( "remote_controlling_vehicle" ) );
2578 if( remote_veh_string.str().empty() ||
2579 ( !u.has_active_bionic( bio_remote ) && !u.has_active_item( itype_remotevehcontrol ) ) ) {
2580 remoteveh_cache = nullptr;
2581 } else {
2582 tripoint vp;
2583 remote_veh_string >> vp.x >> vp.y >> vp.z;
2584 vehicle *veh = veh_pointer_or_null( m.veh_at( vp ) );
2585 if( veh && veh->fuel_left( itype_battery ) > 0 ) {
2586 remoteveh_cache = veh;
2587 } else {
2588 remoteveh_cache = nullptr;
2589 }
2590 }
2591 return remoteveh_cache;
2592}
2593
2594void game::setremoteveh( vehicle *veh )
2595{
2596 remoteveh_cache_time = calendar::turn;
2597 remoteveh_cache = veh;
2598 if( veh != nullptr && !u.has_active_bionic( bio_remote ) &&
2599 !u.has_active_item( itype_remotevehcontrol ) ) {
2600 debugmsg( "Tried to set remote vehicle without bio_remote or remotevehcontrol" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "2600", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to set remote vehicle without bio_remote or remotevehcontrol"
);
2601 veh = nullptr;
2602 }
2603
2604 if( veh == nullptr ) {
2605 u.remove_value( "remote_controlling_vehicle" );
2606 return;
2607 }
2608
2609 std::stringstream remote_veh_string;
2610 const tripoint vehpos = veh->global_pos3();
2611 remote_veh_string << vehpos.x << ' ' << vehpos.y << ' ' << vehpos.z;
2612 u.set_value( "remote_controlling_vehicle", remote_veh_string.str() );
2613}
2614
2615bool game::try_get_left_click_action( action_id &act, const tripoint_bub_ms &mouse_target )
2616{
2617 bool new_destination = true;
2618 if( !destination_preview.empty() ) {
2619 auto &final_destination = destination_preview.back();
2620 if( final_destination.xy() == mouse_target.xy() ) {
2621 // Second click
2622 new_destination = false;
2623 u.set_destination( destination_preview );
2624 destination_preview.clear();
2625 act = u.get_next_auto_move_direction();
2626 if( act == ACTION_NULL ) {
2627 // Something went wrong
2628 u.clear_destination();
2629 return false;
2630 }
2631 }
2632 }
2633
2634 if( new_destination ) {
2635 const std::optional<std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms>> try_route =
2636 safe_route_to( u, mouse_target, 0, []( const std::string & msg ) {
2637 add_msg( msg );
2638 } );
2639 if( try_route.has_value() ) {
2640 destination_preview = *try_route;
2641 return true;
2642 }
2643 return false;
2644 }
2645
2646 return true;
2647}
2648
2649bool game::try_get_right_click_action( action_id &act, const tripoint_bub_ms &mouse_target )
2650{
2651 const bool cleared_destination = !destination_preview.empty();
2652 u.clear_destination();
2653 destination_preview.clear();
2654
2655 if( cleared_destination ) {
2656 // Produce no-op if auto move had just been cleared on this action
2657 // e.g. from a previous single left mouse click. This has the effect
2658 // of right-click canceling an auto move before it is initiated.
2659 return false;
2660 }
2661
2662 const bool is_adjacent = square_dist( mouse_target.xy(), u.pos_bub().xy() ) <= 1;
2663 const bool is_self = square_dist( mouse_target.xy(), u.pos_bub().xy() ) <= 0;
2664 if( const monster *const mon = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( mouse_target ) ) {
2665 if( !u.sees( *mon ) ) {
2666 add_msg( _( "Nothing relevant here." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Nothing relevant here." ) ) ) );
2667 return false;
2668 }
2669
2670 if( !u.get_wielded_item() || !u.get_wielded_item()->is_gun() ) {
2671 add_msg( m_info, _( "You are not wielding a ranged weapon." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are not wielding a ranged weapon."
) ) ) );
2672 return false;
2673 }
2674
2675 // TODO: Add weapon range check. This requires weapon to be reloaded.
2676
2677 act = ACTION_FIRE;
2678 } else if( is_adjacent &&
2679 m.close_door( tripoint_bub_ms( mouse_target.xy(), u.posz() ),
2680 !m.is_outside( u.pos() ), true ) ) {
2681 act = ACTION_CLOSE;
2682 } else if( is_self ) {
2683 act = ACTION_PICKUP;
2684 } else if( is_adjacent ) {
2685 act = ACTION_EXAMINE;
2686 } else {
2687 add_msg( _( "Nothing relevant here." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Nothing relevant here." ) ) ) );
2688 return false;
2689 }
2690
2691 return true;
2692}
2693
2694bool game::is_game_over()
2695{
2696 if( uquit == QUIT_DIED || uquit == QUIT_WATCH ) {
2697 events().send<event_type::avatar_dies>();
2698 }
2699 if( uquit == QUIT_WATCH ) {
2700 // deny player movement and dodging
2701 u.moves = 0;
2702 // prevent pain from updating
2703 u.set_pain( 0 );
2704 // prevent dodging
2705 u.set_dodges_left( 0 );
2706 return false;
2707 }
2708 if( uquit == QUIT_DIED ) {
2709 if( u.in_vehicle ) {
2710 m.unboard_vehicle( u.pos() );
2711 }
2712 u.place_corpse();
2713 return true;
2714 }
2715 if( uquit == QUIT_SUICIDE ) {
2716 bury_screen();
2717 if( u.in_vehicle ) {
2718 m.unboard_vehicle( u.pos() );
2719 }
2720 return true;
2721 }
2722 if( uquit != QUIT_NO ) {
2723 return true;
2724 }
2725 // is_dead_state() already checks hp_torso && hp_head, no need to for loop it
2726 if( u.is_dead_state() ) {
2727 effect_on_conditions::prevent_death();
2728 if( !u.is_dead_state() ) {
2729 return false;
2730 }
2731 bury_screen();
2732 effect_on_conditions::avatar_death();
2733 if( !u.is_dead_state() ) {
2734 return false;
2735 }
2736 Messages::deactivate();
2737 if( get_option<std::string>( "DEATHCAM" ) == "always" ) {
2738 uquit = QUIT_WATCH;
2739 } else if( get_option<std::string>( "DEATHCAM" ) == "ask" ) {
2740 uquit = query_yn( _( "Watch the last moments of your life…?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Watch the last moments of your life…?"
) ) ) ) ?
2741 QUIT_WATCH : QUIT_DIED;
2742 } else if( get_option<std::string>( "DEATHCAM" ) == "never" ) {
2743 uquit = QUIT_DIED;
2744 } else {
2745 // Something funky happened here, just die.
2746 dbg( D_ERROR )DebugLog((D_ERROR),D_GAME) << "/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
<< ":" << 2746 << ": " << "no deathcam option given to options, defaulting to QUIT_DIED";
2747 uquit = QUIT_DIED;
2748 }
2749 return is_game_over();
2750 }
2751 return false;
2752}
2753
2754void game::bury_screen() const
2755{
2756 avatar &u = get_avatar();
2757
2758 std::vector<std::string> vRip;
2759
2760 int iMaxWidth = 0;
2761 int iNameLine = 0;
2762 int iInfoLine = 0;
2763
2764 if( u.has_amount( itype_holybook_bible1, 1 ) || u.has_amount( itype_holybook_bible2, 1 ) ||
2765 u.has_amount( itype_holybook_bible3, 1 ) ) {
2766 if( !( u.has_trait( trait_CANNIBAL ) || u.has_trait( trait_PSYCHOPATH ) ) ) {
2767 vRip.emplace_back( " _______ ___" );
2768 vRip.emplace_back( " < `/ |" );
2769 vRip.emplace_back( " > _ _ (" );
2770 vRip.emplace_back( " | |_) | |_) |" );
2771 vRip.emplace_back( " | | \\ | | |" );
2772 vRip.emplace_back( " ______.__%_| |_________ __" );
2773 vRip.emplace_back( " _/ \\| |" );
2774 iNameLine = vRip.size();
2775 vRip.emplace_back( "| <" );
2776 vRip.emplace_back( "| |" );
2777 iMaxWidth = utf8_width( vRip.back() );
2778 vRip.emplace_back( "| |" );
2779 vRip.emplace_back( "|_____.-._____ __/|_________|" );
2780 vRip.emplace_back( " | |" );
2781 iInfoLine = vRip.size();
2782 vRip.emplace_back( " | |" );
2783 vRip.emplace_back( " | <" );
2784 vRip.emplace_back( " | |" );
2785 vRip.emplace_back( " | _ |" );
2786 vRip.emplace_back( " |__/ |" );
2787 vRip.emplace_back( " % / `--. |%" );
2788 vRip.emplace_back( " * .%%| -< @%%%" ); // NOLINT(cata-text-style)
2789 vRip.emplace_back( " `\\%`@| |@@%@%%" );
2790 vRip.emplace_back( " .%%%@@@|% ` % @@@%%@%%%%" );
2791 vRip.emplace_back( " _.%%%%%%@@@@@@%%%__/\\%@@%%@@@@@@@%%%%%%" );
2792
2793 } else {
2794 vRip.emplace_back( " _______ ___" );
2795 vRip.emplace_back( " | \\/ |" );
2796 vRip.emplace_back( " | |" );
2797 vRip.emplace_back( " | |" );
2798 iInfoLine = vRip.size();
2799 vRip.emplace_back( " | |" );
2800 vRip.emplace_back( " | |" );
2801 vRip.emplace_back( " | |" );
2802 vRip.emplace_back( " | |" );
2803 vRip.emplace_back( " | <" );
2804 vRip.emplace_back( " | _ |" );
2805 vRip.emplace_back( " |__/ |" );
2806 vRip.emplace_back( " ______.__%_| |__________ _" );
2807 vRip.emplace_back( " _/ \\| \\" );
2808 iNameLine = vRip.size();
2809 vRip.emplace_back( "| <" );
2810 vRip.emplace_back( "| |" );
2811 iMaxWidth = utf8_width( vRip.back() );
2812 vRip.emplace_back( "| |" );
2813 vRip.emplace_back( "|_____.-._______ __/|__________|" );
2814 vRip.emplace_back( " % / `_-. _ |%" );
2815 vRip.emplace_back( " * .%%| |_) | |_)< @%%%" ); // NOLINT(cata-text-style)
2816 vRip.emplace_back( " `\\%`@| | \\ | | |@@%@%%" );
2817 vRip.emplace_back( " .%%%@@@|% ` % @@@%%@%%%%" );
2818 vRip.emplace_back( " _.%%%%%%@@@@@@%%%__/\\%@@%%@@@@@@@%%%%%%" );
2819 }
2820 } else {
2821 vRip.emplace_back( R"( _________ ____ )" );
2822 vRip.emplace_back( R"( _/ `/ \_ )" );
2823 vRip.emplace_back( R"( _/ _ _ \_. )" );
2824 vRip.emplace_back( R"( _%\ |_) | |_) \_ )" );
2825 vRip.emplace_back( R"( _/ \/ | \ | | \_ )" );
2826 vRip.emplace_back( R"( _/ \_ )" );
2827 vRip.emplace_back( R"(| |)" );
2828 iNameLine = vRip.size();
2829 vRip.emplace_back( R"( ) < )" );
2830 vRip.emplace_back( R"(| |)" );
2831 vRip.emplace_back( R"(| |)" );
2832 vRip.emplace_back( R"(| _ |)" );
2833 vRip.emplace_back( R"(|__/ |)" );
2834 iMaxWidth = utf8_width( vRip.back() );
2835 vRip.emplace_back( R"( / `--. |)" );
2836 vRip.emplace_back( R"(| ( )" );
2837 iInfoLine = vRip.size();
2838 vRip.emplace_back( R"(| |)" );
2839 vRip.emplace_back( R"(| |)" );
2840 vRip.emplace_back( R"(| % . |)" );
2841 vRip.emplace_back( R"(| @` %% |)" );
2842 vRip.emplace_back( R"(| %@%@%\ * %`%@%|)" );
2843 vRip.emplace_back( R"(%%@@@.%@%\%% `\ %%.%%@@%@)" );
2844 vRip.emplace_back( R"(@%@@%%%%%@@@@@@%%%%%%%%@@%%@@@%%%@%%@)" );
2845 }
2846
2847 const point iOffset( TERMX > FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ? ( TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ) / 2 : 0,
2848 TERMY > FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ? ( TERMY - FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ) / 2 : 0 );
2849
2850 catacurses::window w_rip = catacurses::newwin( FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT, FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH,
2851 iOffset );
2852 draw_border( w_rip );
2853
2854 sfx::do_player_death_hurt( get_player_character(), true );
2855 sfx::fade_audio_group( sfx::group::weather, 2000 );
2856 sfx::fade_audio_group( sfx::group::time_of_day, 2000 );
2857 sfx::fade_audio_group( sfx::group::context_themes, 2000 );
2858 sfx::fade_audio_group( sfx::group::fatigue, 2000 );
2859
2860 for( size_t iY = 0; iY < vRip.size(); ++iY ) {
2861 size_t iX = 0;
2862 const char *str = vRip[iY].data();
2863 for( int slen = vRip[iY].size(); slen > 0; ) {
2864 const uint32_t cTemp = UTF8_getch( &str, &slen );
2865 if( cTemp != U' ' ) {
2866 nc_color ncColor = c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray);
2867
2868 if( cTemp == U'%' ) {
2869 ncColor = c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green);
2870
2871 } else if( cTemp == U'_' || cTemp == U'|' ) {
2872 ncColor = c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white);
2873
2874 } else if( cTemp == U'@' ) {
2875 ncColor = c_brownget_all_colors().get(def_c_brown);
2876
2877 } else if( cTemp == U'*' ) {
2878 ncColor = c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red);
2879 }
2880
2881 mvwputch( w_rip, point( iX + FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH / 2 - ( iMaxWidth / 2 ), iY + 1 ), ncColor,
2882 cTemp );
2883 }
2884 iX += mk_wcwidth( cTemp );
2885 }
2886 }
2887
2888 std::string sTemp;
2889
2890 center_print( w_rip, iInfoLine++, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Survived:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Survived:" ) ) ) );
2891
2892 const time_duration survived = calendar::turn - calendar::start_of_game;
2893 const int minutes = to_minutes<int>( survived ) % 60;
2894 const int hours = to_hours<int>( survived ) % 24;
2895 const int days = to_days<int>( survived );
2896
2897 if( days > 0 ) {
2898 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-translate-string-literal)
2899 sTemp = string_format( "%dd %dh %dm", days, hours, minutes );
2900 } else if( hours > 0 ) {
2901 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-translate-string-literal)
2902 sTemp = string_format( "%dh %dm", hours, minutes );
2903 } else {
2904 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-translate-string-literal)
2905 sTemp = string_format( "%dm", minutes );
2906 }
2907
2908 center_print( w_rip, iInfoLine++, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), sTemp );
2909
2910 const int iTotalKills = g->get_kill_tracker().monster_kill_count();
2911
2912 sTemp = _( "Kills:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Kills:" ) ) );
2913 mvwprintz( w_rip, point( FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH / 2 - 5, 1 + iInfoLine++ ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
2914 ( sTemp + " " ) );
2915 wprintz( w_rip, c_magentaget_all_colors().get(def_c_magenta), "%d", iTotalKills );
2916
2917 sTemp = _( "In memory of:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "In memory of:" ) ) );
2918 mvwprintz( w_rip, point( FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH / 2 - utf8_width( sTemp ) / 2, iNameLine++ ),
2919 c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
2920 sTemp );
2921
2922 sTemp = u.get_name();
2923 mvwprintz( w_rip, point( FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH / 2 - utf8_width( sTemp ) / 2, iNameLine++ ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white),
2924 sTemp );
2925
2926 sTemp = _( "Last Words:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Last Words:" ) ) );
2927 mvwprintz( w_rip, point( FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH / 2 - utf8_width( sTemp ) / 2, iNameLine++ ),
2928 c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
2929 sTemp );
2930
2931 int iStartX = FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH / 2 - ( ( iMaxWidth - 4 ) / 2 );
2932 std::string sLastWords = string_input_popup()
2933 .window( w_rip, point( iStartX, iNameLine ), iStartX + iMaxWidth - 4 - 1 )
2934 .max_length( iMaxWidth - 4 - 1 )
2935 .query_string();
2936
2937 const bool is_suicide = uquit == QUIT_SUICIDE;
2938 get_event_bus().send<event_type::game_avatar_death>( u.getID(), u.name, u.male, is_suicide,
2939 sLastWords );
2940}
2941
2942void game::death_screen()
2943{
2944 gamemode->game_over();
2945 Messages::display_messages();
2946 u.get_avatar_diary()->death_entry();
2947 show_scores_ui( *achievements_tracker_ptr, stats(), get_kill_tracker() );
2948 disp_NPC_epilogues();
2949 follower_ids.clear();
2950 display_faction_epilogues();
2951}
2952
2953// A timestamp that can be used to make unique file names
2954// Date format is a somewhat ISO-8601 compliant local time date (except we use '-' instead of ':' probably because of Windows file name rules).
2955// XXX: removed the timezone suffix due to an mxe bug
2956// See: https://github.com/mxe/mxe/issues/2749
2957static std::string timestamp_now()
2958{
2959 std::time_t time = std::time( nullptr );
2960 std::stringstream date_buffer;
2961 date_buffer << std::put_time( std::localtime( &time ), "%Y-%m-%dT%H-%M-%S" );
2962 return date_buffer.str();
2963}
2964
2965void game::move_save_to_graveyard()
2966{
2967 const std::string &save_dir = PATH_INFO::world_base_save_path();
2968 const std::string graveyard_dir = PATH_INFO::graveyarddir() + "/" + timestamp_now() + "/";
2969 const std::string &prefix = base64_encode( u.get_save_id() ) + ".";
2970
2971 if( !assure_dir_exist( graveyard_dir ) ) {
2972 debugmsg( "could not create graveyard path '%s'", graveyard_dir )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "2972", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "could not create graveyard path '%s'"
, graveyard_dir);
2973 }
2974
2975 const auto save_files = get_files_from_path( prefix, save_dir );
2976 if( save_files.empty() ) {
2977 debugmsg( "could not find save files in '%s'", save_dir )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "2977", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "could not find save files in '%s'"
, save_dir);
2978 }
2979
2980 for( const auto &src_path : save_files ) {
2981 const std::string dst_path = graveyard_dir +
2982 src_path.substr( src_path.rfind( '/' ), std::string::npos );
2983
2984 if( rename_file( src_path, dst_path ) ) {
2985 continue;
2986 }
2987
2988 debugmsg( "could not rename file '%s' to '%s'", src_path, dst_path )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "2988", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "could not rename file '%s' to '%s'"
, src_path, dst_path);
2989
2990 if( remove_file( src_path ) ) {
2991 continue;
2992 }
2993
2994 debugmsg( "could not remove file '%s'", src_path )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "2994", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "could not remove file '%s'", src_path
);
2995 }
2996}
2997
2998void game::load_master()
2999{
3000 const cata_path datafile = PATH_INFO::world_base_save_path_path() / SAVE_MASTER;
3001 read_from_file_optional( datafile, [this, &datafile]( std::istream & is ) {
3002 unserialize_master( datafile, is );
3003 } );
3004}
3005
3006bool game::load( const std::string &world )
3007{
3008 world_generator->init();
3009 WORLD *const wptr = world_generator->get_world( world );
3010 if( !wptr ) {
3011 return false;
3012 }
3013 if( wptr->world_saves.empty() ) {
3014 debugmsg( "world '%s' contains no saves", world )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "3014", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "world '%s' contains no saves"
, world);
3015 return false;
3016 }
3017
3018 try {
3019 world_generator->set_active_world( wptr );
3020 g->setup();
3021 g->load( wptr->world_saves.front() );
3022 } catch( const std::exception &err ) {
3023 debugmsg( "cannot load world '%s': %s", world, err.what() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "3023", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "cannot load world '%s': %s", world
, err.what());
3024 return false;
3025 }
3026
3027 return true;
3028}
3029
3030bool game::load( const save_t &name )
3031{
3032 loading_ui ui( true );
3033 ui.new_context( _( "Loading the save…" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Loading the save…" ) ) ) );
3034
3035 const cata_path worldpath = PATH_INFO::world_base_save_path_path();
3036 const cata_path save_file_path = PATH_INFO::world_base_save_path_path() /
3037 ( name.base_path() + SAVE_EXTENSION );
3038
3039 bool abort = false;
3040
3041 using named_entry = std::pair<std::string, std::function<void()>>;
3042 const std::vector<named_entry> entries = {{
3043 {
3044 _( "Master save" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Master save" ) ) ), [&]()
3045 {
3046 // Now load up the master game data; factions (and more?)
3047 load_master();
3048 }
3049 },
3050 {
3051 _( "Character save" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Character save" ) ) ), [&]()
3052 {
3053
3054 u = avatar();
3055 u.set_save_id( name.decoded_name() );
3056 if( !read_from_file(
3057 save_file_path,
3058 [this, &save_file_path]( std::istream & is ) {
3059 unserialize( is, save_file_path );
3060 } ) ) {
3061 abort = true;
3062 }
3063 }
3064 },
3065 {
3066 _( "Map memory" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Map memory" ) ) ), [&]()
3067 {
3068 u.load_map_memory();
3069 }
3070 },
3071 {
3072 _( "Diary" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Diary" ) ) ), [&]()
3073 {
3074 u.get_avatar_diary()->load();
3075 }
3076 },
3077 {
3078 _( "Memorial" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Memorial" ) ) ), [&]()
3079 {
3080 const cata_path log_filename =
3081 worldpath / ( name.base_path() + SAVE_EXTENSION_LOG );
3082 read_from_file_optional(
3083 log_filename.get_unrelative_path(),
3084 [this]( std::istream & is ) {
3085 memorial().load( is );
3086 } );
3087 }
3088 },
3089 {
3090 _( "Finalizing" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Finalizing" ) ) ), [&]()
3091 {
3092
3093#if defined(__ANDROID__)
3094 const cata_path shortcuts_filename =
3095 worldpath / ( name.base_path() + SAVE_EXTENSION_SHORTCUTS );
3096 if( file_exist( shortcuts_filename ) ) {
3097 load_shortcuts( shortcuts_filename );
3098 }
3099#endif
3100
3101 // Now that the player's worn items are updated, their sight limits need to be
3102 // recalculated. (This would be cleaner if u.worn were private.)
3103 u.recalc_sight_limits();
3104
3105 if( !gamemode ) {
3106 gamemode = std::make_unique<special_game>();
3107 }
3108
3109 safe_mode = get_option<bool>( "SAFEMODE" ) ? SAFE_MODE_ON : SAFE_MODE_OFF;
3110 mostseen = 0; // ...and mostseen is 0, we haven't seen any monsters yet.
3111
3112 init_autosave();
3113 get_auto_pickup().load_character(); // Load character auto pickup rules
3114 get_auto_notes_settings().load( true ); // Load character auto notes settings
3115 get_safemode().load_character(); // Load character safemode rules
3116 zone_manager::get_manager().load_zones(); // Load character world zones
3117 read_from_file_optional_json(
3118 PATH_INFO::world_base_save_path_path() / "uistate.json",
3119 []( const JsonValue & jsin ) {
3120 uistate.deserialize( jsin.get_object() );
3121 } );
3122 reload_npcs();
3123 validate_npc_followers();
3124 validate_mounted_npcs();
3125 validate_camps();
3126 validate_linked_vehicles();
3127 update_map( u );
3128 for( item *&e : u.inv_dump() ) {
3129 e->set_owner( get_player_character() );
3130 }
3131 // legacy, needs to be here as we access the map.
3132 if( !u.getID().is_valid() ) {
3133 // player does not have a real id, so assign a new one,
3134 u.setID( assign_npc_id() );
3135 // The vehicle stores the IDs of the boarded players, so update it, too.
3136 if( u.in_vehicle ) {
3137 if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> vp = m.veh_at(
3138 u.pos() ).part_with_feature( "BOARDABLE", true ) ) {
3139 vp->part().passenger_id = u.getID();
3140 }
3141 }
3142 }
3143
3144 // populate calendar caches now, after active world is set, but before we do
3145 // anything else, to ensure they pick up the correct value from the save's
3146 // worldoptions
3147 calendar::set_eternal_season( ::get_option<bool>( "ETERNAL_SEASON" ) );
3148 calendar::set_season_length( ::get_option<int>( "SEASON_LENGTH" ) );
3149
3150 calendar::set_eternal_night(
3151 ::get_option<std::string>( "ETERNAL_TIME_OF_DAY" ) == "night" );
3152 calendar::set_eternal_day(
3153 ::get_option<std::string>( "ETERNAL_TIME_OF_DAY" ) == "day" );
3154
3155 u.reset();
3156 u.recalculate_enchantment_cache();
3157 u.enchantment_cache->activate_passive( u );
3158 events().send<event_type::game_load>( getVersionString() );
3159 time_of_last_load = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
3160 time_played_at_last_load = std::chrono::seconds( 0 );
3161 std::optional<event_multiset::summaries_type::value_type> last_save =
3162 stats().get_events( event_type::game_save ).last();
3163 if( last_save ) {
3164 auto time_played_it = last_save->first.find( "total_time_played" );
3165 if( time_played_it != last_save->first.end() &&
3166 time_played_it->second.type() == cata_variant_type::chrono_seconds ) {
3167 time_played_at_last_load =
3168 time_played_it->second.get<std::chrono::seconds>();
3169 }
3170 }
3171
3172 effect_on_conditions::load_existing_character( u );
3173 // recalculate light level for correctly resuming crafting and disassembly
3174 m.build_map_cache( m.get_abs_sub().z() );
3175 }
3176 },
3177 }
3178 };
3179
3180 for( const named_entry &e : entries ) {
3181 ui.add_entry( e.first );
3182 }
3183
3184 ui.show();
3185 for( const named_entry &e : entries ) {
3186 e.second();
3187 if( abort ) {
3188 return false;
3189 }
3190 ui.proceed();
3191 }
3192
3193 return true;
3194}
3195
3196void game::load_world_modfiles( loading_ui &ui )
3197{
3198 auto &mods = world_generator->active_world->active_mod_order;
3199
3200 // remove any duplicates whilst preserving order (fixes #19385)
3201 std::set<mod_id> found;
3202 mods.erase( std::remove_if( mods.begin(), mods.end(), [&found]( const mod_id & e ) {
3203 if( found.count( e ) ) {
3204 return true;
3205 } else {
3206 found.insert( e );
3207 return false;
3208 }
3209 } ), mods.end() );
3210
3211 // require at least one core mod (saves before version 6 may implicitly require dda pack)
3212 if( std::none_of( mods.begin(), mods.end(), []( const mod_id & e ) {
3213 return e->core;
3214} ) ) {
3215 mods.insert( mods.begin(), MOD_INFORMATION_dda );
3216 }
3217
3218 // this code does not care about mod dependencies,
3219 // it assumes that those dependencies are static and
3220 // are resolved during the creation of the world.
3221 // That means world->active_mod_order contains a list
3222 // of mods in the correct order.
3223 load_packs( _( "Loading files" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Loading files" ) ) ), mods, ui );
3224
3225 // Load additional mods from that world-specific folder
3226 load_data_from_dir( PATH_INFO::world_base_save_path_path() / "mods", "custom", ui );
3227
3228 DynamicDataLoader::get_instance().finalize_loaded_data( ui );
3229}
3230
3231bool game::load_packs( const std::string &msg, const std::vector<mod_id> &packs, loading_ui &ui )
3232{
3233 ui.new_context( msg );
3234 std::vector<mod_id> missing;
3235 std::vector<mod_id> available;
3236
3237 for( const mod_id &e : packs ) {
3238 if( e.is_valid() ) {
3239 available.emplace_back( e );
3240 ui.add_entry( e->name() );
3241 } else {
3242 missing.push_back( e );
3243 }
3244 }
3245
3246 ui.show();
3247 for( const auto &e : available ) {
3248 const MOD_INFORMATION &mod = *e;
3249 restore_on_out_of_scope<check_plural_t> restore_check_plural( check_plural );
3250 if( mod.ident.str() == "test_data" ) {
3251 check_plural = check_plural_t::none;
3252 }
3253 load_data_from_dir( mod.path, mod.ident.str(), ui );
3254
3255 ui.proceed();
3256 }
3257
3258 for( const auto &e : missing ) {
3259 debugmsg( "unknown content %s", e.c_str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "3259", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "unknown content %s", e.c_str(
));
3260 }
3261
3262 return missing.empty();
3263}
3264
3265void game::reset_npc_dispositions()
3266{
3267 for( character_id elem : follower_ids ) {
3268 shared_ptr_fast<npc> npc_to_get = overmap_buffer.find_npc( elem );
3269 if( !npc_to_get ) {
3270 continue;
3271 }
3272 npc *npc_to_add = npc_to_get.get();
3273 npc_to_add->chatbin.clear_all();
3274 npc_to_add->mission = NPC_MISSION_NULL;
3275 npc_to_add->set_attitude( NPCATT_NULL );
3276 npc_to_add->op_of_u = npc_opinion();
3277 npc_to_add->set_fac( faction_no_faction );
3278 npc_to_add->add_new_mission( mission::reserve_random( ORIGIN_ANY_NPC,
3279 npc_to_add->global_omt_location(),
3280 npc_to_add->getID() ) );
3281
3282 }
3283
3284}
3285
3286//Saves all factions and missions and npcs.
3287bool game::save_factions_missions_npcs()
3288{
3289 std::string masterfile = PATH_INFO::world_base_save_path() + "/" + SAVE_MASTER;
3290 return write_to_file( masterfile, [&]( std::ostream & fout ) {
3291 serialize_master( fout );
3292 }, _( "factions data" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "factions data" ) ) ) );
3293}
3294
3295bool game::save_maps()
3296{
3297 try {
3298 m.save();
3299 overmap_buffer.save(); // can throw
3300 MAPBUFFER.save(); // can throw
3301 return true;
3302 } catch( const std::exception &err ) {
3303 popup( _( "Failed to save the maps: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Failed to save the maps: %s"
) ) ), err.what() );
3304 return false;
3305 }
3306}
3307
3308bool game::save_player_data()
3309{
3310 const std::string playerfile = PATH_INFO::player_base_save_path();
3311
3312 const bool saved_data = write_to_file( playerfile + SAVE_EXTENSION, [&]( std::ostream & fout ) {
3313 serialize( fout );
3314 }, _( "player data" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "player data" ) ) ) );
3315 const bool saved_map_memory = u.save_map_memory();
3316 const bool saved_log = write_to_file( playerfile + SAVE_EXTENSION_LOG, [&](
3317 std::ostream & fout ) {
3318 memorial().save( fout );
3319 }, _( "player memorial" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "player memorial" ) ) ) );
3320#if defined(__ANDROID__)
3321 const bool saved_shortcuts = write_to_file( playerfile + SAVE_EXTENSION_SHORTCUTS, [&](
3322 std::ostream & fout ) {
3323 save_shortcuts( fout );
3324 }, _( "quick shortcuts" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "quick shortcuts" ) ) ) );
3325#endif
3326 const bool saved_diary = u.get_avatar_diary()->store();
3327 return saved_data && saved_map_memory && saved_log && saved_diary
3328#if defined(__ANDROID__)
3329 && saved_shortcuts
3330#endif
3331 ;
3332}
3333
3334
3335bool game::save_achievements()
3336{
3337 const std::string &achievement_dir = PATH_INFO::achievementdir();
3338
3339 //Check if achievement dir exists
3340 if( !assure_dir_exist( achievement_dir ) ) {
3341 dbg( D_ERROR )DebugLog((D_ERROR),D_GAME) << "/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
<< ":" << 3341 << ": " << "game:save_achievements: Unable to make achievement directory.";
3342 debugmsg( "Could not make '%s' directory", achievement_dir )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "3342", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Could not make '%s' directory"
, achievement_dir);
3343 return false;
3344 }
3345
3346 // This sets the maximum length for the filename
3347 constexpr size_t suffix_len = 24 + 1;
3348 constexpr size_t max_name_len = FILENAME_MAX4096 - suffix_len;
3349
3350 const size_t name_len = u.name.size();
3351 // Here -1 leaves space for the ~
3352 const size_t truncated_name_len = ( name_len >= max_name_len ) ? ( max_name_len - 1 ) : name_len;
3353
3354 std::ostringstream achievement_file_path;
3355
3356 achievement_file_path << achievement_dir;
3357
3358 if( get_options().has_option( "ENCODING_CONV" ) && !get_option<bool>( "ENCODING_CONV" ) ) {
3359 // Use the default locale to replace non-printable characters with _ in the player name.
3360 std::locale locale{ "C" };
3361 std::replace_copy_if( std::begin( u.name ), std::begin( u.name ) + truncated_name_len,
3362 std::ostream_iterator<char>( achievement_file_path ),
3363 [&]( const char c ) {
3364 return !std::isgraph( c, locale );
3365 }, '_' );
3366 } else {
3367 achievement_file_path << u.name;
3368 }
3369
3370 // Add a ~ if the player name was actually truncated.
3371 achievement_file_path << ( ( truncated_name_len != name_len ) ? "~-" : "-" );
3372 const int character_id = get_player_character().getID().get_value();
3373 const std::string json_path_string = achievement_file_path.str() + std::to_string(
3374 character_id ) + ".json";
3375
3376 return write_to_file( json_path_string, [&]( std::ostream & fout ) {
3377 get_achievements().write_json_achievements( fout, u.name );
3378 }, _( "player achievements" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "player achievements" ) ) ) );
3379
3380}

3384 return *event_bus_ptr;
3385}

3387stats_tracker &game::stats()

3389 return *stats_tracker_ptr;

3392achievements_tracker &game::achievements()
3393{
3394 return *achievements_tracker_ptr;
3395}
3396
3397memorial_logger &game::memorial()
3398{
3399 return *memorial_logger_ptr;
3400}
3401
3402void game::update_unique_npc_location( const std::string &id, point_abs_om loc )
3403{
3404 unique_npcs[id] = loc;
3405}
3406
3407point_abs_om game::get_unique_npc_location( const std::string &id )
3408{
3409 if( unique_npc_exists( id ) ) {
3410 return unique_npcs[id];
3411 } else {
3412 debugmsg( "Tried to find npc %s which doesn't exist.", id )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "3412", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to find npc %s which doesn't exist."
, id);
3413 return point_abs_om();
3414 }
3415}
3416
3417bool game::unique_npc_exists( const std::string &id )
3418{
3419 return unique_npcs.count( id ) > 0;
3420}
3421
3422void game::unique_npc_despawn( const std::string &id )
3423{
3424 unique_npcs.erase( id );
3425}

3427spell_events &game::spell_events_subscriber()
3428{
3429 return *spell_events_ptr;
3430}
3431
3432bool game::save()
3433{
3434 std::chrono::seconds time_since_load =
3435 std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::seconds>(
3436 std::chrono::steady_clock::now() - time_of_last_load );
3437 std::chrono::seconds total_time_played = time_played_at_last_load + time_since_load;
3438 events().send<event_type::game_save>( time_since_load, total_time_played );
3439 try {
3440 if( !save_player_data() ||
3441 !save_achievements() ||
3442 !save_factions_missions_npcs() ||
3443 !save_maps() ||
3444 !get_auto_pickup().save_character() ||
3445 !get_auto_notes_settings().save( true ) ||
3446 !get_safemode().save_character() ||
3447 !zone_manager::get_manager().save_zones() ||
3448 !write_to_file( PATH_INFO::world_base_save_path() + "/uistate.json", [&]( std::ostream & fout ) {
3449 JsonOut jsout( fout );
3450 uistate.serialize( jsout );
3451 }, _( "uistate data" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "uistate data" ) ) ) ) ) {
3452 debugmsg( "game not saved" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "3452", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "game not saved");
3453 return false;
3454 } else {
3455 world_generator->last_world_name = world_generator->active_world->world_name;
3456 world_generator->last_character_name = u.name;
3457 world_generator->save_last_world_info();
3458 world_generator->active_world->add_save( save_t::from_save_id( u.get_save_id() ) );
3459 write_to_file( PATH_INFO::world_base_save_path_path() / ( base64_encode(
3460 u.get_save_id() ) + ".pt" ), [&total_time_played]( std::ostream & fout ) {
3461 fout.imbue( std::locale::classic() );
3462 fout << total_time_played.count();
3463 } );
3464#if defined(EMSCRIPTEN)
3465 // This will allow the window to be closed without a prompt, until do_turn()
3466 // is called.
3467 EM_ASM( window.game_unsaved = false; );
3468#endif
3469 return true;
3470 }
3471 } catch( std::ios::failure & ) {
3472 popup( _( "Failed to save game data" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Failed to save game data" ) )
) );
3473 return false;
3474 }
3475}
3476
3477std::vector<std::string> game::list_active_saves()
3478{
3479 std::vector<std::string> saves;
3480 for( save_t &worldsave : world_generator->active_world->world_saves ) {
3481 saves.push_back( worldsave.decoded_name() );
3482 }
3483 return saves;
3484}
3485
3486/**
3487 * Writes information about the character out to a text file timestamped with
3488 * the time of the file was made. This serves as a record of the character's
3489 * state at the time the memorial was made (usually upon death) and
3490 * accomplishments in a human-readable format.
3491 */
3492void game::write_memorial_file( std::string sLastWords )
3493{
3494 const std::string &memorial_dir = PATH_INFO::memorialdir();
3495 const std::string &memorial_active_world_dir = memorial_dir +
3496 world_generator->active_world->world_name + "/";
3497
3498 //Check if both dirs exist. Nested assure_dir_exist fails if the first dir of the nested dir does not exist.
3499 if( !assure_dir_exist( memorial_dir ) ) {
3500 dbg( D_ERROR )DebugLog((D_ERROR),D_GAME) << "/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
<< ":" << 3500 << ": " << "game:write_memorial_file: Unable to make memorial directory.";
3501 debugmsg( "Could not make '%s' directory", memorial_dir )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "3501", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Could not make '%s' directory"
, memorial_dir);
3502 return;
3503 }
3504
3505 if( !assure_dir_exist( memorial_active_world_dir ) ) {
3506 dbg( D_ERROR )DebugLog((D_ERROR),D_GAME) << "/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
<< ":" << 3506 << ": " <<
3507 "game:write_memorial_file: Unable to make active world directory in memorial directory.";
3508 debugmsg( "Could not make '%s' directory", memorial_active_world_dir )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "3508", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Could not make '%s' directory"
, memorial_active_world_dir);
3509 return;
3510 }
3511
3512 // <name>-YYYY-MM-DD-HH-MM-SS.txt
3513 // 123456789012345678901234 ~> 24 chars + a null
3514 constexpr size_t suffix_len = 24 + 1;
3515 constexpr size_t max_name_len = FILENAME_MAX4096 - suffix_len;
3516
3517 const size_t name_len = u.name.size();
3518 // Here -1 leaves space for the ~
3519 const size_t truncated_name_len = ( name_len >= max_name_len ) ? ( max_name_len - 1 ) : name_len;
3520
3521 std::ostringstream memorial_file_path;
3522 memorial_file_path << memorial_active_world_dir;
3523
3524 if( get_options().has_option( "ENCODING_CONV" ) && !get_option<bool>( "ENCODING_CONV" ) ) {
3525 // Use the default locale to replace non-printable characters with _ in the player name.
3526 std::locale locale {"C"};
3527 std::replace_copy_if( std::begin( u.name ), std::begin( u.name ) + truncated_name_len,
3528 std::ostream_iterator<char>( memorial_file_path ),
3529 [&]( const char c ) {
3530 return !std::isgraph( c, locale );
3531 }, '_' );
3532 } else {
3533 memorial_file_path << u.name;
3534 }
3535
3536 // Add a ~ if the player name was actually truncated.
3537 memorial_file_path << ( ( truncated_name_len != name_len ) ? "~-" : "-" );
3538
3539 // Add a timestamp for uniqueness.
3540
3541#if defined(_WIN32)
3542 SYSTEMTIME current_time;
3543 GetLocalTime( &current_time );
3544 memorial_file_path << string_format( "%d-%02d-%02d-%02d-%02d-%02d",
3545 current_time.wYear, current_time.wMonth, current_time.wDay,
3546 current_time.wHour, current_time.wMinute, current_time.wSecond );
3547#else
3548 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(modernize-avoid-c-arrays)
3549 char buffer[suffix_len] {};
3550 std::time_t t = std::time( nullptr );
3551 tm current_time;
3552 localtime_r( &t, &current_time );
3553 size_t result = std::strftime( buffer, suffix_len, "%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S", &current_time );
3554 if( result == 0 ) {
3555 cata_fatal( "Could not construct filename" )do { realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "3555", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Could not construct filename"
); std::abort(); } while( false );
3556 }
3557 memorial_file_path << buffer;
3558#endif
3559
3560 const std::string text_path_string = memorial_file_path.str() + ".txt";
3561 const std::string json_path_string = memorial_file_path.str() + ".json";
3562
3563 write_to_file( text_path_string, [&]( std::ostream & fout ) {
3564 memorial().write_text_memorial( fout, sLastWords );
3565 }, _( "player memorial" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "player memorial" ) ) ) );
3566
3567 write_to_file( json_path_string, [&]( std::ostream & fout ) {
3568 memorial().write_json_memorial( fout );
3569 }, _( "player memorial" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "player memorial" ) ) ) );
3570}
3571
3572void game::disp_NPC_epilogues()
3573{
3574 // TODO: This search needs to be expanded to all NPCs
3575 for( character_id elem : follower_ids ) {
3576 shared_ptr_fast<npc> guy = overmap_buffer.find_npc( elem );
3577 if( !guy ) {
3578 continue;
3579 }
3580 const auto new_win = []() {
3581 return catacurses::newwin( FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT, FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH,
3582 point( std::max( 0, ( TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ) / 2 ),
3583 std::max( 0, ( TERMY - FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ) / 2 ) ) );
3584 };
3585 scrollable_text( new_win, guy->disp_name(), guy->get_epilogue() );
3586 }
3587}
3588
3589void game::display_faction_epilogues()
3590{
3591 for( const auto &elem : faction_manager_ptr->all() ) {
3592 if( elem.second.known_by_u ) {
3593 const std::vector<std::string> epilogue = elem.second.epilogue();
3594 if( !epilogue.empty() ) {
3595 const auto new_win = []() {
3596 return catacurses::newwin( FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT, FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH,
3597 point( std::max( 0, ( TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ) / 2 ),
3598 std::max( 0, ( TERMY - FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ) / 2 ) ) );
3599 };
3600 scrollable_text( new_win, elem.second.name,
3601 std::accumulate( epilogue.begin() + 1, epilogue.end(), epilogue.front(),
3602 []( std::string lhs, const std::string & rhs ) -> std::string {
3603 return std::move( lhs ) + "\n" + rhs;
3604 } ) );
3605 }
3606 }
3607 }
3608}
3609
3610struct npc_dist_to_player {
3611 const tripoint_abs_omt ppos{};
3612 npc_dist_to_player() : ppos( get_player_character().global_omt_location() ) { }
3613 // Operator overload required to leverage sort API.
3614 bool operator()( const shared_ptr_fast<npc> &a,
3615 const shared_ptr_fast<npc> &b ) const {
3616 const tripoint_abs_omt apos = a->global_omt_location();
3617 const tripoint_abs_omt bpos = b->global_omt_location();
3618 return square_dist( ppos.xy(), apos.xy() ) <
3619 square_dist( ppos.xy(), bpos.xy() );
3620 }
3621};
3622
3623void game::disp_NPCs()
3624{
3625 const tripoint_abs_omt ppos = u.global_omt_location();
3626 const tripoint lpos = u.pos();
3627 const int scan_range = 120;
3628 std::vector<shared_ptr_fast<npc>> npcs = overmap_buffer.get_npcs_near_player( scan_range );
3629 std::sort( npcs.begin(), npcs.end(), npc_dist_to_player() );
3630
3631 catacurses::window w;
3632 ui_adaptor ui;
3633 ui.on_screen_resize( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
3634 w = catacurses::newwin( FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT, FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH,
3635 point( TERMX > FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ? ( TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH ) / 2 : 0,
3636 TERMY > FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ? ( TERMY - FULL_SCREEN_HEIGHT ) / 2 : 0 ) );
3637 ui.position_from_window( w );
3638 } );
3639 ui.mark_resize();
3640 ui.on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
3641 werase( w );
3642 mvwprintz( w, point_zero, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Your overmap position: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your overmap position: %s" )
) ), ppos.to_string() );
3643 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-use-named-point-constants)
3644 mvwprintz( w, point( 0, 1 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Your local position: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your local position: %s" ) )
), lpos.to_string() );
3645 size_t i;
3646 int static_npc_count = 0;
3647 for( i = 0; i < npcs.size(); i++ ) {
3648 if(
3649 npcs[i]->has_trait( trait_NPC_STARTING_NPC ) || npcs[i]->has_trait( trait_NPC_STATIC_NPC ) ) {
3650 static_npc_count++;
3651 }
3652 }
3653 mvwprintz( w, point( 0, 2 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Total NPCs within %d OMTs: %d. %d are static NPCs." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Total NPCs within %d OMTs: %d. %d are static NPCs."
) ) ),
3654 scan_range, npcs.size(), static_npc_count );
3655 for( i = 0; i < 20 && i < npcs.size(); i++ ) {
3656 const tripoint_abs_omt apos = npcs[i]->global_omt_location();
3657 mvwprintz( w, point( 0, i + 4 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), "%s: %s", npcs[i]->get_name(),
3658 apos.to_string() );
3659 }
3660 for( const monster &m : all_monsters() ) {
3661 mvwprintz( w, point( 0, i + 4 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), "%s: %d, %d, %d", m.name(),
3662 m.posx(), m.posy(), m.posz() );
3663 ++i;
3664 }
3665 wnoutrefresh( w );
3666 } );
3667
3668 input_context ctxt( "DISP_NPCS" );
3669 ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
3670 ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
3671 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
3672 bool stop = false;
3673 while( !stop ) {
3674 ui_manager::redraw();
3675 const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
3676 if( action == "CONFIRM" || action == "QUIT" ) {
3677 stop = true;
3678 }
3679 }
3680}
3681
3682// A little helper to draw footstep glyphs.
3683static void draw_footsteps( const catacurses::window &window, const tripoint &offset )
3684{
3685 for( const tripoint &footstep : sounds::get_footstep_markers() ) {
3686 char glyph = '?';
3687 if( footstep.z != offset.z ) { // Here z isn't an offset, but a coordinate
3688 glyph = footstep.z > offset.z ? '^' : 'v';
3689 }
3690
3691 mvwputch( window, footstep.xy() + offset.xy(), c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow), glyph );
3692 }
3693}
3694
3695shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> game::create_or_get_main_ui_adaptor()
3696{
3697 shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> ui = main_ui_adaptor.lock();
3698 if( !ui ) {
3699 main_ui_adaptor = ui = make_shared_fast<ui_adaptor>();
3700 ui->on_redraw( []( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
3701 g->draw( ui );
3702 } );
3703 ui->on_screen_resize( [this]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
3704 // remove some space for the sidebar, this is the maximal space
3705 // (using standard font) that the terrain window can have
3706 const int sidebar_left = panel_manager::get_manager().get_width_left();
3707 const int sidebar_right = panel_manager::get_manager().get_width_right();
3708
3709 TERRAIN_WINDOW_HEIGHT = TERMY;
3710 TERRAIN_WINDOW_WIDTH = TERMX - ( sidebar_left + sidebar_right );
3711 TERRAIN_WINDOW_TERM_WIDTH = TERRAIN_WINDOW_WIDTH;
3712 TERRAIN_WINDOW_TERM_HEIGHT = TERRAIN_WINDOW_HEIGHT;
3713
3714 /**
3715 * In tiles mode w_terrain can have a different font (with a different
3716 * tile dimension) or can be drawn by cata_tiles which uses tiles that again
3717 * might have a different dimension then the normal font used everywhere else.
3718 *
3719 * TERRAIN_WINDOW_WIDTH/TERRAIN_WINDOW_HEIGHT defines how many squares can
3720 * be displayed in w_terrain (using it's specific tile dimension), not
3721 * including partially drawn squares at the right/bottom. You should
3722 * use it whenever you want to draw specific squares in that window or to
3723 * determine whether a specific square is draw on screen (or outside the screen
3724 * and needs scrolling).
3725 *
3726 * TERRAIN_WINDOW_TERM_WIDTH/TERRAIN_WINDOW_TERM_HEIGHT defines the size of
3727 * w_terrain in the standard font dimension (the font that everything else uses).
3728 * You usually don't have to use it, expect for positioning of windows,
3729 * because the window positions use the standard font dimension.
3730 *
3731 * The code here calculates size available for w_terrain, caps it at
3732 * max_view_size (the maximal view range than any character can have at
3733 * any time).
3734 * It is stored in TERRAIN_WINDOW_*.
3735 */
3736 to_map_font_dimension( TERRAIN_WINDOW_WIDTH, TERRAIN_WINDOW_HEIGHT );
3737
3738 // Position of the player in the terrain window, it is always in the center
3739 POSX = TERRAIN_WINDOW_WIDTH / 2;
3740 POSY = TERRAIN_WINDOW_HEIGHT / 2;
3741
3742 w_terrain = w_terrain_ptr = catacurses::newwin( TERRAIN_WINDOW_HEIGHT, TERRAIN_WINDOW_WIDTH,
3743 point( sidebar_left, 0 ) );
3744
3745 // minimap is always MINIMAP_WIDTH x MINIMAP_HEIGHT in size
3746 w_minimap = w_minimap_ptr = catacurses::newwin( MINIMAP_HEIGHT, MINIMAP_WIDTH, point_zero );
3747
3748 // need to init in order to avoid crash. gets updated by the panel code.
3749 w_pixel_minimap = catacurses::newwin( 1, 1, point_zero );
3750
3751 ui.position_from_window( catacurses::stdscr );
3752 } );
3753 ui->mark_resize();
3754 }
3755 return ui;
3756}
3757
3758void game::invalidate_main_ui_adaptor() const
3759{
3760 shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> ui = main_ui_adaptor.lock();
3761 if( ui ) {
3762 ui->invalidate_ui();
3763 }
3764}
3765
3766void game::mark_main_ui_adaptor_resize() const
3767{
3768 shared_ptr_fast<ui_adaptor> ui = main_ui_adaptor.lock();
3769 if( ui ) {
3770 ui->mark_resize();
3771 }
3772}
3773
3774game::draw_callback_t::draw_callback_t( const std::function<void()> &cb )
3775 : cb( cb )
3776{
3777}
3778
3779game::draw_callback_t::~draw_callback_t()
3780{
3781 if( added ) {
3782 g->invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
3783 }
3784}
3785
3786void game::draw_callback_t::operator()()
3787{
3788 if( cb ) {
3789 cb();
3790 }
3791}
3792
3793void game::add_draw_callback( const shared_ptr_fast<draw_callback_t> &cb )
3794{
3795 draw_callbacks.erase(
3796 std::remove_if( draw_callbacks.begin(), draw_callbacks.end(),
3797 []( const weak_ptr_fast<draw_callback_t> &cbw ) {
3798 return cbw.expired();
3799 } ),
3800 draw_callbacks.end()
3801 );
3802 draw_callbacks.emplace_back( cb );
3803 cb->added = true;
3804 invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
3805}
3806
3807static void draw_trail( const tripoint &start, const tripoint &end, bool bDrawX );
3808
3809static shared_ptr_fast<game::draw_callback_t> create_zone_callback(
3810 const std::optional<tripoint> &zone_start,
3811 const std::optional<tripoint> &zone_end,
3812 const bool &zone_blink,
3813 const bool &zone_cursor,
3814 const bool &is_moving_zone = false
3815)
3816{
3817 return make_shared_fast<game::draw_callback_t>(
3818 [&]() {
3819 if( zone_cursor ) {
3820 if( is_moving_zone ) {
3821 g->draw_cursor( ( zone_start.value() + zone_end.value() ) / 2 );
3822 } else {
3823 if( zone_end ) {
3824 g->draw_cursor( zone_end.value() );
3825 } else if( zone_start ) {
3826 g->draw_cursor( zone_start.value() );
3827 }
3828 }
3829 }
3830 if( zone_blink && zone_start && zone_end ) {
3831 avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
3832 const point offset2( player_character.view_offset.xy() +
3833 point( player_character.posx() - getmaxx( g->w_terrain ) / 2,
3834 player_character.posy() - getmaxy( g->w_terrain ) / 2 ) );
3835
3836 tripoint offset;
3837#if defined(TILES)
3838 if( use_tiles ) {
3839 offset = tripoint_zero; //TILES
3840 } else {
3841#endif
3842 offset = tripoint( offset2, 0 ); //CURSES
3843#if defined(TILES)
3844 }
3845#endif
3846
3847 const tripoint start( std::min( zone_start->x, zone_end->x ),
3848 std::min( zone_start->y, zone_end->y ),
3849 zone_end->z );
3850 const tripoint end( std::max( zone_start->x, zone_end->x ),
3851 std::max( zone_start->y, zone_end->y ),
3852 zone_end->z );
3853 g->draw_zones( start, end, offset );
3854 }
3855 } );
3856}
3857
3858static shared_ptr_fast<game::draw_callback_t> create_trail_callback(
3859 const std::optional<tripoint> &trail_start,
3860 const std::optional<tripoint> &trail_end,
3861 const bool &trail_end_x
3862)
3863{
3864 return make_shared_fast<game::draw_callback_t>(
3865 [&]() {
3866 if( trail_start && trail_end ) {
3867 draw_trail( trail_start.value(), trail_end.value(), trail_end_x );
3868 }
3869 } );
3870}
3871
3872void game::init_draw_async_anim_curses( const tripoint &p, const std::string &ncstr,
3873 const nc_color &nccol )
3874{
3875 std::pair <std::string, nc_color> anim( ncstr, nccol );
3876 async_anim_layer_curses[p] = anim;
3877}
3878
3879void game::draw_async_anim_curses()
3880{
3881 // game::draw_async_anim_curses can be called multiple times, storing each animation to be played in async_anim_layer_curses
3882 // Iterate through every animation in async_anim_layer
3883 for( const auto &anim : async_anim_layer_curses ) {
3884 const tripoint p = anim.first - u.view_offset + tripoint( POSX - u.posx(), POSY - u.posy(),
3885 -u.posz() );
3886 const std::string ncstr = anim.second.first;
3887 const nc_color nccol = anim.second.second;
3888
3889 mvwprintz( w_terrain, p.xy(), nccol, ncstr );
3890 }
3891}
3892
3893void game::void_async_anim_curses()
3894{
3895 async_anim_layer_curses.clear();
3896}
3897
3898void game::init_draw_blink_curses( const tripoint &p, const std::string &ncstr,
3899 const nc_color &nccol )
3900{
3901 std::pair <std::string, nc_color> anim( ncstr, nccol );
3902 blink_layer_curses[p] = anim;
3903}
3904
3905void game::draw_blink_curses()
3906{
3907 // game::draw_blink_curses can be called multiple times, storing each animation to be played in blink_layer_curses
3908 // Iterate through every animation in async_anim_layer
3909 for( const auto &anim : blink_layer_curses ) {
3910 const tripoint p = anim.first - u.view_offset + tripoint( POSX - u.posx(), POSY - u.posy(),
3911 -u.posz() );
3912 const std::string ncstr = anim.second.first;
3913 const nc_color nccol = anim.second.second;
3914
3915 mvwprintz( w_terrain, p.xy(), nccol, ncstr );
3916 }
3917}
3918
3919void game::void_blink_curses()
3920{
3921 blink_layer_curses.clear();
3922}
3923
3924bool game::has_blink_curses()
3925{
3926 return !blink_layer_curses.empty();
3927}
3928
3929void game::draw( ui_adaptor &ui )
3930{
3931 if( test_mode ) {
3932 return;
3933 }
3934
3935 ter_view_p.z = ( u.pos() + u.view_offset ).z;
3936 m.build_map_cache( ter_view_p.z );
3937 m.update_visibility_cache( ter_view_p.z );
3938
3939 werase( w_terrain );
3940 void_blink_curses();
3941 draw_ter();
3942 for( auto it = draw_callbacks.begin(); it != draw_callbacks.end(); ) {
3943 shared_ptr_fast<draw_callback_t> cb = it->lock();
3944 if( cb ) {
3945 ( *cb )();
3946 ++it;
3947 } else {
3948 it = draw_callbacks.erase( it );
3949 }
3950 }
3951 draw_async_anim_curses();
3952 // Only draw blinking symbols when in active phase
3953 if( blink_active_phase ) {
3954 draw_blink_curses();
3955 }
3956 wnoutrefresh( w_terrain );
3957
3958 draw_panels( true );
3959
3960 // Ensure that the cursor lands on the character when everything is drawn.
3961 // This allows screen readers to describe the area around the player, making it
3962 // much easier to play with them
3963 // (e.g. for blind players)
3964 ui.set_cursor( w_terrain, -u.view_offset.xy() + point( POSX, POSY ) );
3965}
3966
3967void game::draw_panels( bool force_draw )
3968{
3969 static int previous_turn = -1;
3970 const int current_turn = to_turns<int>( calendar::turn - calendar::turn_zero );
3971 const bool draw_this_turn = current_turn > previous_turn || force_draw;
3972 panel_manager &mgr = panel_manager::get_manager();
3973 int y = 0;
3974 const bool sidebar_right = get_option<std::string>( "SIDEBAR_POSITION" ) == "right";
3975 int spacer = get_option<bool>( "SIDEBAR_SPACERS" ) ? 1 : 0;
3976 // Total up height used by all panels, and see what is left over for log
3977 int log_height = 0;
3978 for( const window_panel &panel : mgr.get_current_layout().panels() ) {
3979 // Skip height processing
3980 if( !panel.toggle || !panel.render() ) {
3981 continue;
3982 }
3983 // The panel with height -2 is the message log panel
3984 const int p_height = panel.get_height();
3985 if( p_height != -2 ) {
3986 log_height += p_height + spacer;
3987 }
3988 }
3989 log_height = std::max( TERMY - log_height, 3 );
3990 // Draw each panel having render() true
3991 for( const window_panel &panel : mgr.get_current_layout().panels() ) {
3992 if( panel.render() ) {
3993 // height clamped to window height.
3994 int h = std::min( panel.get_height(), TERMY - y );
3995 // The panel with height -2 is the message log panel
3996 if( h == -2 ) {
3997 h = log_height;
3998 }
3999 h += spacer;
4000 if( panel.toggle && panel.render() && h > 0 ) {
4001 if( panel.always_draw || draw_this_turn ) {
4002 catacurses::window w = catacurses::newwin( h, panel.get_width(),
4003 point( sidebar_right ? TERMX - panel.get_width() : 0, y ) );
4004 int tmp_h = panel.draw( { u, w, panel.get_widget() } );
4005 h += tmp_h;
4006 // lines skipped for rendering -> reclaim space in the sidebar
4007 if( tmp_h < 0 ) {
4008 y += h;
4009 log_height -= tmp_h;
4010 continue;
4011 }
4012 }
4013 if( show_panel_adm ) {
4014 const std::string panel_name = panel.get_name();
4015 const int panel_name_width = utf8_width( panel_name );
4016 catacurses::window label = catacurses::newwin( 1, panel_name_width, point( sidebar_right ?
4017 TERMX - panel.get_width() - panel_name_width - 1 : panel.get_width() + 1, y ) );
4018 werase( label );
4019 mvwprintz( label, point_zero, c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red), panel_name );
4020 wnoutrefresh( label );
4021 label = catacurses::newwin( h, 1,
4022 point( sidebar_right ? TERMX - panel.get_width() - 1 : panel.get_width(), y ) );
4023 werase( label );
4024 if( h == 1 ) {
4025 mvwputch( label, point_zero, c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red), LINE_OXOX4194417 );
4026 } else {
4027 mvwputch( label, point_zero, c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red), LINE_OXXX4194423 );
4028 for( int i = 1; i < h - 1; i++ ) {
4029 mvwputch( label, point( 0, i ), c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red), LINE_XOXO4194424 );
4030 }
4031 mvwputch( label, point( 0, h - 1 ), c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red), sidebar_right ? LINE_XXOO4194413 : LINE_XOOX4194410 );
4032 }
4033 wnoutrefresh( label );
4034 }
4035 y += h;
4036 }
4037 }
4038 }
4039 previous_turn = current_turn;
4040}
4041
4042void game::draw_pixel_minimap( const catacurses::window &w )
4043{
4044 w_pixel_minimap = w;
4045}
4046
4047void game::draw_critter( const Creature &critter, const tripoint &center )
4048{
4049 const int my = POSY + ( critter.posy() - center.y );
4050 const int mx = POSX + ( critter.posx() - center.x );
4051 if( !is_valid_in_w_terrain( point( mx, my ) ) ) {
4052 return;
4053 }
4054 if( critter.posz() != center.z ) {
4055 static constexpr tripoint up_tripoint( tripoint_above );
4056 if( critter.posz() == center.z - 1 &&
4057 ( debug_mode || u.sees( critter ) ) &&
4058 m.valid_move( critter.pos(), critter.pos() + up_tripoint, false, true ) ) {
4059 // Monster is below
4060 // TODO: Make this show something more informative than just green 'v'
4061 // TODO: Allow looking at this mon with look command
4062 init_draw_blink_curses( tripoint( critter.pos().xy(), center.z ), "v", c_green_cyanget_all_colors().get(def_c_green_cyan) );
4063 }
4064 if( critter.posz() == center.z + 1 &&
4065 ( debug_mode || u.sees( critter ) ) &&
4066 m.valid_move( critter.pos(), critter.pos() + tripoint_below, false, true ) ) {
4067 // Monster is above
4068 init_draw_blink_curses( tripoint( critter.pos().xy(), center.z ), "^", c_green_cyanget_all_colors().get(def_c_green_cyan) );
4069 }
4070 return;
4071 }
4072 if( u.sees( critter ) || &critter == &u ) {
4073 critter.draw( w_terrain, center.xy(), false );
4074 return;
4075 }
4076
4077 if( u.sees_with_infrared( critter ) || u.sees_with_specials( critter ) ) {
4078 mvwputch( w_terrain, point( mx, my ), c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red), '?' );
4079 }
4080}
4081
4082bool game::is_in_viewport( const tripoint &p, int margin ) const
4083{
4084 const tripoint diff( u.pos() + u.view_offset - p );
4085
4086 return ( std::abs( diff.x ) <= getmaxx( w_terrain ) / 2 - margin ) &&
4087 ( std::abs( diff.y ) <= getmaxy( w_terrain ) / 2 - margin );
4088}
4089
4090void game::draw_ter( const bool draw_sounds )
4091{
4092 draw_ter( u.pos() + u.view_offset, is_looking,
4093 draw_sounds );
4094}
4095
4096void game::draw_ter( const tripoint &center, const bool looking, const bool draw_sounds )
4097{
4098 ter_view_p = center;
4099
4100 m.draw( w_terrain, center );
4101
4102 if( draw_sounds ) {
4103 draw_footsteps( w_terrain, tripoint( -center.x, -center.y, center.z ) + point( POSX, POSY ) );
4104 }
4105
4106 for( Creature &critter : all_creatures() ) {
4107 draw_critter( critter, center );
4108 }
4109
4110 if( !destination_preview.empty() && u.view_offset.z == 0 ) {
4111 // Draw auto move preview trail
4112 const tripoint_bub_ms &final_destination = destination_preview.back();
4113 tripoint_bub_ms line_center = u.pos_bub() + u.view_offset;
4114 draw_line( final_destination, line_center, destination_preview, true );
4115 // TODO: fix point types
4116 mvwputch( w_terrain,
4117 final_destination.xy().raw() - u.view_offset.xy() +
4118 point( POSX - u.posx(), POSY - u.posy() ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), 'X' );
4119 }
4120
4121 if( u.controlling_vehicle && !looking ) {
4122 draw_veh_dir_indicator( false );
4123 draw_veh_dir_indicator( true );
4124 }
4125}
4126
4127std::optional<tripoint> game::get_veh_dir_indicator_location( bool next ) const
4128{
4129 if( !get_option<bool>( "VEHICLE_DIR_INDICATOR" ) ) {
4130 return std::nullopt;
4131 }
4132 const optional_vpart_position vp = m.veh_at( u.pos() );
4133 if( !vp ) {
4134 return std::nullopt;
4135 }
4136 vehicle *const veh = &vp->vehicle();
4137 rl_vec2d face = next ? veh->dir_vec() : veh->face_vec();
4138 float r = 10.0f;
4139 return tripoint( static_cast<int>( r * face.x ), static_cast<int>( r * face.y ), u.pos().z );
4140}
4141
4142void game::draw_veh_dir_indicator( bool next )
4143{
4144 if( const std::optional<tripoint> indicator_offset = get_veh_dir_indicator_location( next ) ) {
4145 nc_color col = next ? c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) : c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray);
4146 mvwputch( w_terrain, indicator_offset->xy() - u.view_offset.xy() + point( POSX, POSY ), col, 'X' );
4147 }
4148}
4149
4150void game::draw_minimap()
4151{
4152
4153 // Draw the box
4154 werase( w_minimap );
4155 draw_border( w_minimap );
4156
4157 const tripoint_abs_omt curs = u.global_omt_location();
4158 const point_abs_omt curs2( curs.xy() );
4159 const tripoint_abs_omt targ = u.get_active_mission_target();
4160 bool drew_mission = targ == overmap::invalid_tripoint;
4161
4162 const int levz = m.get_abs_sub().z();
4163 for( int i = -2; i <= 2; i++ ) {
4164 for( int j = -2; j <= 2; j++ ) {
4165 const point_abs_omt om( curs2 + point( i, j ) );
4166 nc_color ter_color;
4167 tripoint_abs_omt omp( om, levz );
4168 std::string ter_sym;
4169 const bool seen = overmap_buffer.seen( omp );
4170 if( overmap_buffer.has_note( omp ) ) {
4171
4172 const std::string &note_text = overmap_buffer.note( omp );
4173
4174 ter_color = c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow);
4175 ter_sym = "N";
4176
4177 int symbolIndex = note_text.find( ':' );
4178 int colorIndex = note_text.find( ';' );
4179
4180 bool symbolFirst = symbolIndex < colorIndex;
4181
4182 if( colorIndex > -1 && symbolIndex > -1 ) {
4183 if( symbolFirst ) {
4184 if( colorIndex > 4 ) {
4185 colorIndex = -1;
4186 }
4187 if( symbolIndex > 1 ) {
4188 symbolIndex = -1;
4189 colorIndex = -1;
4190 }
4191 } else {
4192 if( symbolIndex > 4 ) {
4193 symbolIndex = -1;
4194 }
4195 if( colorIndex > 2 ) {
4196 colorIndex = -1;
4197 }
4198 }
4199 } else if( colorIndex > 2 ) {
4200 colorIndex = -1;
4201 } else if( symbolIndex > 1 ) {
4202 symbolIndex = -1;
4203 }
4204
4205 if( symbolIndex > -1 ) {
4206 int symbolStart = 0;
4207 if( colorIndex > -1 && !symbolFirst ) {
4208 symbolStart = colorIndex + 1;
4209 }
4210 ter_sym = note_text.substr( symbolStart, symbolIndex - symbolStart ).c_str()[0];
4211 }
4212
4213 if( colorIndex > -1 ) {
4214
4215 int colorStart = 0;
4216
4217 if( symbolIndex > -1 && symbolFirst ) {
4218 colorStart = symbolIndex + 1;
4219 }
4220
4221 std::string sym = note_text.substr( colorStart, colorIndex - colorStart );
4222
4223 if( sym.length() == 2 ) {
4224 if( sym == "br" ) {
4225 ter_color = c_brownget_all_colors().get(def_c_brown);
4226 } else if( sym == "lg" ) {
4227 ter_color = c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray);
4228 } else if( sym == "dg" ) {
4229 ter_color = c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray);
4230 }
4231 } else {
4232 char colorID = sym.c_str()[0];
4233 if( colorID == 'r' ) {
4234 ter_color = c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red);
4235 } else if( colorID == 'R' ) {
4236 ter_color = c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red);
4237 } else if( colorID == 'g' ) {
4238 ter_color = c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green);
4239 } else if( colorID == 'G' ) {
4240 ter_color = c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green);
4241 } else if( colorID == 'b' ) {
4242 ter_color = c_light_blueget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_blue);
4243 } else if( colorID == 'B' ) {
4244 ter_color = c_blueget_all_colors().get(def_c_blue);
4245 } else if( colorID == 'W' ) {
4246 ter_color = c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white);
4247 } else if( colorID == 'C' ) {
4248 ter_color = c_cyanget_all_colors().get(def_c_cyan);
4249 } else if( colorID == 'c' ) {
4250 ter_color = c_light_cyanget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_cyan);
4251 } else if( colorID == 'P' ) {
4252 ter_color = c_pinkget_all_colors().get(def_c_pink);
4253 } else if( colorID == 'm' ) {
4254 ter_color = c_magentaget_all_colors().get(def_c_magenta);
4255 }
4256 }
4257 }
4258 } else if( !seen ) {
4259 ter_sym = " ";
4260 ter_color = c_blackget_all_colors().get(def_c_black);
4261 } else if( overmap_buffer.has_vehicle( omp ) ) {
4262 ter_color = c_cyanget_all_colors().get(def_c_cyan);
4263 ter_sym = overmap_buffer.get_vehicle_ter_sym( omp );
4264 } else {
4265 const oter_id &cur_ter = overmap_buffer.ter( omp );
4266 ter_sym = cur_ter->get_symbol();
4267 if( overmap_buffer.is_explored( omp ) ) {
4268 ter_color = c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray);
4269 } else {
4270 ter_color = cur_ter->get_color();
4271 }
4272 }
4273 if( !drew_mission && targ.xy() == omp.xy() ) {
4274 // If there is a mission target, and it's not on the same
4275 // overmap terrain as the player character, mark it.
4276 // TODO: Inform player if the mission is above or below
4277 drew_mission = true;
4278 if( i != 0 || j != 0 ) {
4279 ter_color = red_background( ter_color );
4280 }
4281 }
4282 if( i == 0 && j == 0 ) {
4283 mvwputch_hi( w_minimap, point( 3, 3 ), ter_color, ter_sym );
4284 } else {
4285 mvwputch( w_minimap, point( 3 + i, 3 + j ), ter_color, ter_sym );
4286 }
4287 }
4288 }
4289
4290 // Print arrow to mission if we have one!
4291 if( !drew_mission ) {
4292 double slope = curs2.x() != targ.x() ?
4293 static_cast<double>( targ.y() - curs2.y() ) / ( targ.x() - curs2.x() ) : 4;
4294
4295 if( curs2.x() == targ.x() || std::fabs( slope ) > 3.5 ) { // Vertical slope
4296 if( targ.y() > curs2.y() ) {
4297 mvwputch( w_minimap, point( 3, 6 ), c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red), "*" );
4298 } else {
4299 mvwputch( w_minimap, point( 3, 0 ), c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red), "*" );
4300 }
4301 } else {
4302 point arrow( point_north_west );
4303 if( std::fabs( slope ) >= 1. ) { // y diff is bigger!
4304 arrow.y = targ.y() > curs2.y() ? 6 : 0;
4305 arrow.x =
4306 static_cast<int>( 3 + 3 * ( targ.y() > curs2.y() ? slope : ( 0 - slope ) ) );
4307 if( arrow.x < 0 ) {
4308 arrow.x = 0;
4309 }
4310 if( arrow.x > 6 ) {
4311 arrow.x = 6;
4312 }
4313 } else {
4314 arrow.x = targ.x() > curs2.x() ? 6 : 0;
4315 arrow.y = static_cast<int>( 3 + 3 * ( targ.x() > curs2.x() ? slope : -slope ) );
4316 if( arrow.y < 0 ) {
4317 arrow.y = 0;
4318 }
4319 if( arrow.y > 6 ) {
4320 arrow.y = 6;
4321 }
4322 }
4323 char glyph = '*';
4324 if( targ.z() > u.posz() ) {
4325 glyph = '^';
4326 } else if( targ.z() < u.posz() ) {
4327 glyph = 'v';
4328 }
4329
4330 mvwputch( w_minimap, arrow, c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red), glyph );
4331 }
4332 }
4333
4334 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
4335 const int sight_points = player_character.overmap_sight_range( g->light_level(
4336 player_character.posz() ) );
4337 for( int i = -3; i <= 3; i++ ) {
4338 for( int j = -3; j <= 3; j++ ) {
4339 if( i > -3 && i < 3 && j > -3 && j < 3 ) {
4340 continue; // only do hordes on the border, skip inner map
4341 }
4342 const tripoint_abs_omt omp( curs2 + point( i, j ), levz );
4343 if( overmap_buffer.get_horde_size( omp ) >= HORDE_VISIBILITY_SIZE ) {
4344 if( overmap_buffer.seen( omp )
4345 && player_character.overmap_los( omp, sight_points ) ) {
4346 mvwputch( w_minimap, point( i + 3, j + 3 ), c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green),
4347 overmap_buffer.get_horde_size( omp ) > HORDE_VISIBILITY_SIZE * 2 ? 'Z' : 'z' );
4348 }
4349 }
4350 }
4351 }
4352
4353 wnoutrefresh( w_minimap );
4354}
4355
4356float game::natural_light_level( const int zlev ) const
4357{
4358 // ignore while underground or above limits
4359 if( zlev > OVERMAP_HEIGHT || zlev < 0 ) {
4360 return LIGHT_AMBIENT_MINIMAL;
4361 }
4362
4363 if( latest_lightlevels[zlev] > -std::numeric_limits<float>::max() ) {
4364 // Already found the light level for now?
4365 return latest_lightlevels[zlev];
4366 }
4367
4368 float ret = LIGHT_AMBIENT_MINIMAL;
4369
4370 // Sunlight/moonlight related stuff
4371 ret = sun_moon_light_at( calendar::turn );
4372 ret += get_weather().weather_id->light_modifier;
4373
4374 // Artifact light level changes here. Even though some of these only have an effect
4375 // aboveground it is cheaper performance wise to simply iterate through the entire
4376 // list once instead of twice.
4377 float mod_ret = -1;
4378 // Each artifact change does std::max(mod_ret, new val) since a brighter end value
4379 // will trump a lower one.
4380 if( const timed_event *e = timed_events.get( timed_event_type::DIM ) ) {
4381 // timed_event_type::DIM slowly dims the natural sky level, then relights it.
4382 const time_duration left = e->when - calendar::turn;
4383 // timed_event_type::DIM has an occurrence date of turn + 50, so the first 25 dim it,
4384 if( left > 25_turns ) {
4385 mod_ret = std::max( static_cast<double>( mod_ret ), ( ret * ( left - 25_turns ) ) / 25_turns );
4386 // and the last 25 scale back towards normal.
4387 } else {
4388 mod_ret = std::max( static_cast<double>( mod_ret ), ( ret * ( 25_turns - left ) ) / 25_turns );
4389 }
4390 }
4391 if( timed_events.queued( timed_event_type::ARTIFACT_LIGHT ) ) {
4392 // timed_event_type::ARTIFACT_LIGHT causes everywhere to become as bright as day.
4393 mod_ret = std::max<float>( ret, default_daylight_level() );
4394 }
4395 if( const timed_event *e = timed_events.get( timed_event_type::CUSTOM_LIGHT_LEVEL ) ) {
4396 mod_ret = e->strength;
4397 }
4398 // If we had a changed light level due to an artifact event then it overwrites
4399 // the natural light level.
4400 if( mod_ret > -1 ) {
4401 ret = mod_ret;
4402 }
4403
4404 // Cap everything to our minimum light level
4405 ret = std::max<float>( LIGHT_AMBIENT_MINIMAL, ret );
4406
4407 latest_lightlevels[zlev] = ret;
4408
4409 return ret;
4410}
4411
4412unsigned char game::light_level( const int zlev ) const
4413{
4414 const float light = natural_light_level( zlev );
4415 return LIGHT_RANGE( light );
4416}
4417
4418void game::reset_light_level()
4419{
4420 for( float &lev : latest_lightlevels ) {
4421 lev = -std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
4422 }
4423}
4424
4425//Gets the next free ID, also used for player ID's.
4426character_id game::assign_npc_id()
4427{
4428 character_id ret = next_npc_id;
4429 ++next_npc_id;
4430 return ret;
4431}
4432
4433Creature *game::is_hostile_nearby()
4434{
4435 int distance = ( get_option<int>( "SAFEMODEPROXIMITY" ) <= 0 ) ? MAX_VIEW_DISTANCE :
4436 get_option<int>( "SAFEMODEPROXIMITY" );
4437 return is_hostile_within( distance );
4438}
4439
4440Creature *game::is_hostile_very_close( bool dangerous )
4441{
4442 return is_hostile_within( DANGEROUS_PROXIMITY, dangerous );
4443}
4444
4445Creature *game::is_hostile_within( int distance, bool dangerous )
4446{
4447 for( Creature *&critter : u.get_visible_creatures( distance ) ) {
4448 if( u.attitude_to( *critter ) == Creature::Attitude::HOSTILE ) {
4449 if( dangerous ) {
4450 if( critter->is_ranged_attacker() ) {
4451 return critter;
4452 }
4453
4454 const pathfinding_settings pf_settings = pathfinding_settings{ 8, distance, distance * 2, 4, true, true, false, true, false, false };
4455 static const std::unordered_set<tripoint> path_avoid = {};
4456
4457 if( !get_map().route( u.pos(), critter->pos(), pf_settings, path_avoid ).empty() ) {
4458 return critter;
4459 }
4460 continue;
4461 }
4462 return critter;
4463 }
4464 }
4465
4466 return nullptr;
4467}
4468
4469field_entry *game::is_in_dangerous_field()
4470{
4471 map &here = get_map();
4472 for( std::pair<const field_type_id, field_entry> &field : here.field_at( u.pos() ) ) {
4473 if( u.is_dangerous_field( field.second ) ) {
4474 return &field.second;
4475 }
4476 }
4477
4478 return nullptr;
4479}
4480
4481std::unordered_set<tripoint> game::get_fishable_locations( int distance, const tripoint &fish_pos )
4482{
4483 // We're going to get the contiguous fishable terrain starting at
4484 // the provided fishing location (e.g. where a line was cast or a fish
4485 // trap was set), and then check whether or not fishable monsters are
4486 // actually in those locations. This will help us ensure that we're
4487 // getting our fish from the location that we're ACTUALLY fishing,
4488 // rather than just somewhere in the vicinity.
4489
4490 std::unordered_set<tripoint> visited;
4491
4492 const tripoint fishing_boundary_min( fish_pos + point( -distance, -distance ) );
4493 const tripoint fishing_boundary_max( fish_pos + point( distance, distance ) );
4494
4495 const inclusive_cuboid<tripoint> fishing_boundaries(
4496 fishing_boundary_min, fishing_boundary_max );
4497
4498 const auto get_fishable_terrain = [&]( tripoint starting_point,
4499 std::unordered_set<tripoint> &fishable_terrain ) {
4500 std::queue<tripoint> to_check;
4501 to_check.push( starting_point );
4502 while( !to_check.empty() ) {
4503 const tripoint current_point = to_check.front();
4504 to_check.pop();
4505
4506 // We've been here before, so bail.
4507 if( visited.find( current_point ) != visited.end() ) {
4508 continue;
4509 }
4510
4511 // This point is out of bounds, so bail.
4512 if( !fishing_boundaries.contains( current_point ) ) {
4513 continue;
4514 }
4515
4516 // Mark this point as visited.
4517 visited.emplace( current_point );
4518
4519 if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FISHABLE, current_point ) ) {
4520 fishable_terrain.emplace( current_point );
4521 to_check.push( current_point + point_south );
4522 to_check.push( current_point + point_north );
4523 to_check.push( current_point + point_east );
4524 to_check.push( current_point + point_west );
4525 }
4526 }
4527 };
4528
4529 // Starting at the provided location, get our fishable terrain
4530 // and populate a set with those locations which we'll then use
4531 // to determine if any fishable monsters are in those locations.
4532 std::unordered_set<tripoint> fishable_points;
4533 get_fishable_terrain( fish_pos, fishable_points );
4534
4535 return fishable_points;
4536}
4537
4538std::vector<monster *> game::get_fishable_monsters( std::unordered_set<tripoint>
4539 &fishable_locations )
4540{
4541 std::vector<monster *> unique_fish;
4542 for( monster &critter : all_monsters() ) {
4543 // If it is fishable...
4544 if( critter.has_flag( mon_flag_FISHABLE ) ) {
4545 const tripoint critter_pos = critter.pos();
4546 // ...and it is in a fishable location.
4547 if( fishable_locations.find( critter_pos ) != fishable_locations.end() ) {
4548 unique_fish.push_back( &critter );
4549 }
4550 }
4551 }
4552
4553 return unique_fish;
4554}
4555
4556void game::mon_info_update( )
4557{
4558 int newseen = 0;
4559 const int safe_proxy_dist = get_option<int>( "SAFEMODEPROXIMITY" );
4560 const int iProxyDist = ( safe_proxy_dist <= 0 ) ? MAX_VIEW_DISTANCE :
4561 safe_proxy_dist;
4562
4563 monster_visible_info &mon_visible = u.get_mon_visible();
4564 auto &new_seen_mon = mon_visible.new_seen_mon;
4565 auto &unique_types = mon_visible.unique_types;
4566 auto &unique_mons = mon_visible.unique_mons;
4567 auto &dangerous = mon_visible.dangerous;
4568 mon_visible.has_dangerous_creature_in_proximity = false;
4569
4570 // 7 0 1 unique_types uses these indices;
4571 // 6 8 2 0-7 are provide by direction_from()
4572 // 5 4 3 8 is used for local monsters (for when we explain them below)
4573 for( auto &t : unique_types ) {
4574 t.clear();
4575 }
4576 for( auto &m : unique_mons ) {
4577 m.clear();
4578 }
4579 std::fill( dangerous.begin(), dangerous.end(), false );
4580
4581 const tripoint view = u.pos() + u.view_offset;
4582 new_seen_mon.clear();
4583
4584 static time_point previous_turn = calendar::turn_zero;
4585 const time_duration sm_ignored_turns =
4586 time_duration::from_turns( get_option<int>( "SAFEMODEIGNORETURNS" ) );
4587
4588 for( Creature *c : u.get_visible_creatures( MAPSIZE_X ) ) {
4589 monster *m = dynamic_cast<monster *>( c );
4590 npc *p = dynamic_cast<npc *>( c );
4591 const direction dir_to_mon = direction_from( view.xy(), point( c->posx(), c->posy() ) );
4592 const point m2( -view.xy() + point( POSX + c->posx(), POSY + c->posy() ) );
4593 int index = 8;
4594 if( !is_valid_in_w_terrain( m2 ) ) {
4595 // for compatibility with old code, see diagram below, it explains the values for index,
4596 // also might need revisiting one z-levels are in.
4597 switch( dir_to_mon ) {
4598 case direction::ABOVENORTHWEST:
4599 case direction::NORTHWEST:
4600 case direction::BELOWNORTHWEST:
4601 index = 7;
4602 break;
4603 case direction::ABOVENORTH:
4604 case direction::NORTH:
4605 case direction::BELOWNORTH:
4606 index = 0;
4607 break;
4608 case direction::ABOVENORTHEAST:
4609 case direction::NORTHEAST:
4610 case direction::BELOWNORTHEAST:
4611 index = 1;
4612 break;
4613 case direction::ABOVEWEST:
4614 case direction::WEST:
4615 case direction::BELOWWEST:
4616 index = 6;
4617 break;
4618 case direction::ABOVECENTER:
4619 case direction::CENTER:
4620 case direction::BELOWCENTER:
4621 index = 8;
4622 break;
4623 case direction::ABOVEEAST:
4624 case direction::EAST:
4625 case direction::BELOWEAST:
4626 index = 2;
4627 break;
4628 case direction::ABOVESOUTHWEST:
4629 case direction::SOUTHWEST:
4630 case direction::BELOWSOUTHWEST:
4631 index = 5;
4632 break;
4633 case direction::ABOVESOUTH:
4634 case direction::SOUTH:
4635 case direction::BELOWSOUTH:
4636 index = 4;
4637 break;
4638 case direction::ABOVESOUTHEAST:
4639 case direction::SOUTHEAST:
4640 case direction::BELOWSOUTHEAST:
4641 index = 3;
4642 break;
4643 case direction::last:
4644 cata_fatal( "invalid direction" )do { realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "4644", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "invalid direction"); std::abort
(); } while( false );
4645 }
4646 }
4647
4648 bool need_processing = false;
4649 const bool safemode_empty = get_safemode().empty();
4650
4651 if( m != nullptr ) {
4652 //Safemode monster check
4653 monster &critter = *m;
4654
4655 const monster_attitude matt = critter.attitude( &u );
4656 const int mon_dist = rl_dist( u.pos(), critter.pos() );
4657 if( !safemode_empty ) {
4658 need_processing = get_safemode().check_monster(
4659 critter.name(),
4660 critter.attitude_to( u ),
4661 mon_dist,
4662 u.controlling_vehicle ) == rule_state::BLACKLISTED;
4663 } else {
