4664 need_processing = MATT_ATTACK == matt || MATT_FOLLOW == matt;
4665 }
4666 if( need_processing ) {
4667 if( index < 8 && critter.sees( get_player_character() ) ) {
4668 dangerous[index] = true;
4669 }
4670
4671 if( !safemode_empty || mon_dist <= iProxyDist ) {
4672 bool passmon = false;
4673 mon_visible.has_dangerous_creature_in_proximity = true;
4674 if( critter.ignoring > 0 ) {
4675 if( safe_mode != SAFE_MODE_ON ) {
4676 critter.ignoring = 0;
4677 } else if( ( sm_ignored_turns == time_duration() ||
4678 ( critter.lastseen_turn &&
4679 *critter.lastseen_turn > calendar::turn - sm_ignored_turns ) ) &&
4680 ( mon_dist > critter.ignoring / 2 || mon_dist < 6 ) ) {
4681 passmon = true;
4682 }
4683 critter.lastseen_turn = calendar::turn;
4684 }
4685
4686 if( !passmon ) {
4687 newseen++;
4688 new_seen_mon.push_back( shared_from( critter ) );
4689 }
4690 }
4691 }
4692
4693 std::vector<std::pair<const mtype *, int>> &vec = unique_mons[index];
4694 const auto mon_it = std::find_if( vec.begin(), vec.end(),
4695 [&]( const std::pair<const mtype *, int> &elem ) {
4696 return elem.first == critter.type;
4697 } );
4698 if( mon_it == vec.end() ) {
4699 vec.emplace_back( critter.type, 1 );
4700 } else {
4701 mon_it->second++;
4702 }
4703 } else if( p != nullptr ) {
4704 //Safe mode NPC check
4705
4706 const int npc_dist = rl_dist( u.pos(), p->pos() );
4707 if( !safemode_empty ) {
4708 need_processing = get_safemode().check_monster(
4709 get_safemode().npc_type_name(),
4710 p->attitude_to( u ),
4711 npc_dist,
4712 u.controlling_vehicle ) == rule_state::BLACKLISTED ;
4713 } else {
4714 need_processing = npc_dist <= iProxyDist &&
4715 p->get_attitude() == NPCATT_KILL;
4716 }
4717 if( need_processing ) {
4718 mon_visible.has_dangerous_creature_in_proximity = true;
4719 newseen++;
4720 }
4721 unique_types[index].push_back( p );
4722 }
4723 }
4724
4725 if( uistate.distraction_hostile_spotted && newseen > mostseen ) {
4726 if( newseen - mostseen == 1 ) {
4727 if( !new_seen_mon.empty() ) {
4728 monster &critter = *new_seen_mon.back();
4729 cancel_activity_or_ignore_query( distraction_type::hostile_spotted_far,
4730 string_format( _( "%s spotted!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s spotted!" ) ) ), critter.name() ) );
4731 if( u.has_trait( trait_M_DEFENDER ) && critter.type->in_species( species_PLANT ) ) {
4732 add_msg( m_warning, _( "We have detected a %s - an enemy of the Mycus!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "We have detected a %s - an enemy of the Mycus!"
) ) ), critter.name() );
4733 if( !u.has_effect( effect_adrenaline_mycus ) ) {
4734 u.add_effect( effect_adrenaline_mycus, 30_minutes );
4735 } else if( u.get_effect_int( effect_adrenaline_mycus ) == 1 ) {
4736 // Triffids present. We ain't got TIME to adrenaline comedown!
4737 u.add_effect( effect_adrenaline_mycus, 15_minutes );
4738 u.mod_pain( 3 ); // Does take it out of you, though
4739 add_msg( m_info, _( "Our fibers strain with renewed wrath!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Our fibers strain with renewed wrath!"
) ) ) );
4740 }
4741 }
4742 } else {
4743 //Hostile NPC
4744 cancel_activity_or_ignore_query( distraction_type::hostile_spotted_far,
4745 _( "Hostile survivor spotted!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Hostile survivor spotted!" )
) ) );
4746 }
4747 } else {
4748 cancel_activity_or_ignore_query( distraction_type::hostile_spotted_far, _( "Monsters spotted!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Monsters spotted!" ) ) ) );
4749 }
4750 turnssincelastmon = 0_turns;
4751 if( safe_mode == SAFE_MODE_ON ) {
4752 set_safe_mode( SAFE_MODE_STOP );
4753 }
4754 } else if( calendar::turn > previous_turn && get_option<bool>( "AUTOSAFEMODE" ) &&
4755 newseen == 0 ) { // Auto safe mode, but only if it's a new turn
4756 turnssincelastmon += calendar::turn - previous_turn;
4757 time_duration auto_safe_mode =
4758 time_duration::from_turns( get_option<int>( "AUTOSAFEMODETURNS" ) );
4759 if( turnssincelastmon >= auto_safe_mode && safe_mode == SAFE_MODE_OFF ) {
4760 set_safe_mode( SAFE_MODE_ON );
4761 add_msg( m_info, _( "Safe mode ON!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Safe mode ON!" ) ) ) );
4762 }
4763 }
4764
4765 if( newseen == 0 && safe_mode == SAFE_MODE_STOP ) {
4766 set_safe_mode( SAFE_MODE_ON );
4767 }
4768
4769 previous_turn = calendar::turn;
4770 mostseen = newseen;
4771}
4772
4773void game::cleanup_dead()
4774{
4775 // Dead monsters need to stay in the tracker until everything else that needs to die does so
4776 // This is because dying monsters can still interact with other dying monsters (@ref Creature::killer)
4777 bool monster_is_dead = critter_tracker->kill_marked_for_death();
4778
4779 bool npc_is_dead = false;
4780 // can't use all_npcs as that does not include dead ones
4781 for( const auto &n : critter_tracker->active_npc ) {
4782 if( n->is_dead() ) {
4783 n->die( nullptr ); // make sure this has been called to create corpses etc.
4784 npc_is_dead = true;
4785 }
4786 }
4787
4788 if( monster_is_dead ) {
4789 // From here on, pointers to creatures get invalidated as dead creatures get removed.
4790 critter_tracker->remove_dead();
4791 }
4792
4793 if( npc_is_dead ) {
4794 for( auto it = critter_tracker->active_npc.begin(); it != critter_tracker->active_npc.end(); ) {
4795 if( ( *it )->is_dead() ) {
4796 get_avatar().get_mon_visible().remove_npc( ( *it ).get() );
4797 remove_npc_follower( ( *it )->getID() );
4798 overmap_buffer.remove_npc( ( *it )->getID() );
4799 it = critter_tracker->active_npc.erase( it );
4800 } else {
4801 it++;
4802 }
4803 }
4804 }
4805
4806 critter_died = false;
4807}
4808
4809/* Knockback target at t by force number of tiles in direction from s to t
4810 stun > 0 indicates base stun duration, and causes impact stun; stun == -1 indicates only impact stun
4811 dam_mult multiplies impact damage, bash effect on impact, and sound level on impact */
4812
4813void game::knockback( const tripoint &s, const tripoint &t, int force, int stun, int dam_mult )
4814{
4815 std::vector<tripoint> traj;
4816 traj.clear();
4817 traj = line_to( s, t, 0, 0 );
4818 traj.insert( traj.begin(), s ); // how annoying, line_to() doesn't include the originating point!
4819 traj = continue_line( traj, force );
4820 traj.insert( traj.begin(), t ); // how annoying, continue_line() doesn't either!
4821
4822 knockback( traj, stun, dam_mult );
4823}
4824
4825/* Knockback target at traj.front() along line traj; traj should already have considered knockback distance.
4826 stun > 0 indicates base stun duration, and causes impact stun; stun == -1 indicates only impact stun
4827 dam_mult multiplies impact damage, bash effect on impact, and sound level on impact */
4828
4829void game::knockback( std::vector<tripoint> &traj, int stun, int dam_mult )
4830{
4831 // TODO: make the force parameter actually do something.
4832 // the header file says higher force causes more damage.
4833 // perhaps that is what it should do?
4834 tripoint tp = traj.front();
4835 creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
4836 if( !creatures.creature_at( tp ) ) {
4837 debugmsg( _( "Nothing at (%d,%d,%d) to knockback!" ), tp.x, tp.y, tp.z )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "4837", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, ( ( []( const auto & arg )
{ static auto cache = detail::get_local_translation_cache( arg
); return cache( arg ); } )( translation_argument_identity( "Nothing at (%d,%d,%d) to knockback!"
) ) ), tp.x, tp.y, tp.z);
4838 return;
4839 }
4840 std::size_t force_remaining = traj.size();
4841 if( monster *const targ = creatures.creature_at<monster>( tp, true ) ) {
4842 if( stun > 0 ) {
4843 targ->add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns * stun );
4844 add_msg( _( "%s was stunned!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s was stunned!" ) ) ), targ->name() );
4845 }
4846 for( size_t i = 1; i < traj.size(); i++ ) {
4847 if( m.impassable( traj[i].xy() ) ) {
4848 targ->setpos( traj[i - 1] );
4849 force_remaining = traj.size() - i;
4850 if( stun != 0 ) {
4851 targ->add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns * force_remaining );
4852 add_msg( _( "%s was stunned!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s was stunned!" ) ) ), targ->name() );
4853 add_msg( _( "%s slammed into an obstacle!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s slammed into an obstacle!"
) ) ), targ->name() );
4854 targ->apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "torso" ), dam_mult * force_remaining );
4855 targ->check_dead_state();
4856 }
4857 m.bash( traj[i], 2 * dam_mult * force_remaining );
4858 break;
4859 } else if( creatures.creature_at( traj[i] ) ) {
4860 targ->setpos( traj[i - 1] );
4861 force_remaining = traj.size() - i;
4862 if( stun != 0 ) {
4863 targ->add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns * force_remaining );
4864 add_msg( _( "%s was stunned!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s was stunned!" ) ) ), targ->name() );
4865 }
4866 traj.erase( traj.begin(), traj.begin() + i );
4867 if( creatures.creature_at<monster>( traj.front() ) ) {
4868 add_msg( _( "%s collided with something else and sent it flying!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s collided with something else and sent it flying!"
) ) ),
4869 targ->name() );
4870 } else if( npc *const guy = creatures.creature_at<npc>( traj.front() ) ) {
4871 if( guy->male ) {
4872 add_msg( _( "%s collided with someone else and sent him flying!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s collided with someone else and sent him flying!"
) ) ),
4873 targ->name() );
4874 } else {
4875 add_msg( _( "%s collided with someone else and sent her flying!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s collided with someone else and sent her flying!"
) ) ),
4876 targ->name() );
4877 }
4878 } else if( u.pos() == traj.front() ) {
4879 add_msg( m_bad, _( "%s collided with you and sent you flying!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s collided with you and sent you flying!"
) ) ), targ->name() );
4880 }
4881 knockback( traj, stun, dam_mult );
4882 break;
4883 }
4884 targ->setpos( traj[i] );
4885 if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_LIQUID, targ->pos() ) && !targ->can_drown() &&
4886 !targ->is_dead() ) {
4887 targ->die( nullptr );
4888 if( u.sees( *targ ) ) {
4889 add_msg( _( "The %s drowns!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s drowns!" ) ) ), targ->name() );
4890 }
4891 }
4892 if( !m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_LIQUID, targ->pos() ) && targ->has_flag( mon_flag_AQUATIC ) &&
4893 !targ->is_dead() ) {
4894 targ->die( nullptr );
4895 if( u.sees( *targ ) ) {
4896 add_msg( _( "The %s flops around and dies!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s flops around and dies!"
) ) ), targ->name() );
4897 }
4898 }
4899 }
4900 } else if( npc *const targ = creatures.creature_at<npc>( tp ) ) {
4901 if( stun > 0 ) {
4902 targ->add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns * stun );
4903 add_msg( _( "%s was stunned!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s was stunned!" ) ) ), targ->get_name() );
4904 }
4905 for( size_t i = 1; i < traj.size(); i++ ) {
4906 if( m.impassable( traj[i].xy() ) ) { // oops, we hit a wall!
4907 targ->setpos( traj[i - 1] );
4908 force_remaining = traj.size() - i;
4909 if( stun != 0 ) {
4910 targ->add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns * force_remaining );
4911 if( targ->has_effect( effect_stunned ) ) {
4912 add_msg( _( "%s was stunned!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s was stunned!" ) ) ), targ->get_name() );
4913 }
4914
4915 std::array<bodypart_id, 8> bps = {{
4916 bodypart_id( "head" ),
4917 bodypart_id( "arm_l" ), bodypart_id( "arm_r" ),
4918 bodypart_id( "hand_l" ), bodypart_id( "hand_r" ),
4919 bodypart_id( "torso" ),
4920 bodypart_id( "leg_l" ), bodypart_id( "leg_r" )
4921 }
4922 };
4923 for( const bodypart_id &bp : bps ) {
4924 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
4925 targ->deal_damage( nullptr, bp, damage_instance( damage_bash, force_remaining * dam_mult ) );
4926 }
4927 }
4928 targ->check_dead_state();
4929 }
4930 m.bash( traj[i], 2 * dam_mult * force_remaining );
4931 break;
4932 } else if( creatures.creature_at( traj[i] ) ) {
4933 targ->setpos( traj[i - 1] );
4934 force_remaining = traj.size() - i;
4935 if( stun != 0 ) {
4936 add_msg( _( "%s was stunned!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s was stunned!" ) ) ), targ->get_name() );
4937 targ->add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns * force_remaining );
4938 }
4939 traj.erase( traj.begin(), traj.begin() + i );
4940 const tripoint &traj_front = traj.front();
4941 if( creatures.creature_at<monster>( traj_front ) ) {
4942 add_msg( _( "%s collided with something else and sent it flying!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s collided with something else and sent it flying!"
) ) ),
4943 targ->get_name() );
4944 } else if( npc *const guy = creatures.creature_at<npc>( traj_front ) ) {
4945 if( guy->male ) {
4946 add_msg( _( "%s collided with someone else and sent him flying!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s collided with someone else and sent him flying!"
) ) ),
4947 targ->get_name() );
4948 } else {
4949 add_msg( _( "%s collided with someone else and sent her flying!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s collided with someone else and sent her flying!"
) ) ),
4950 targ->get_name() );
4951 }
4952 } else if( u.posx() == traj_front.x && u.posy() == traj_front.y &&
4953 u.has_trait( trait_LEG_TENT_BRACE ) && u.is_barefoot() ) {
4954 add_msg( _( "%s collided with you, and barely dislodges your tentacles!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s collided with you, and barely dislodges your tentacles!"
) ) ), targ->get_name() );
4955 } else if( u.posx() == traj_front.x && u.posy() == traj_front.y ) {
4956 add_msg( m_bad, _( "%s collided with you and sent you flying!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s collided with you and sent you flying!"
) ) ), targ->get_name() );
4957 }
4958 knockback( traj, stun, dam_mult );
4959 break;
4960 }
4961 targ->setpos( traj[i] );
4962 }
4963 } else if( u.pos() == tp ) {
4964 if( stun > 0 ) {
4965 u.add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns * stun );
4966 add_msg( m_bad, n_gettext( "You were stunned for %d turn!",
4967 "You were stunned for %d turns!",
4968 stun ),
4969 stun );
4970 }
4971 for( size_t i = 1; i < traj.size(); i++ ) {
4972 if( m.impassable( traj[i] ) ) { // oops, we hit a wall!
4973 u.setpos( traj[i - 1] );
4974 force_remaining = traj.size() - i;
4975 if( stun != 0 ) {
4976 if( u.has_effect( effect_stunned ) ) {
4977 add_msg( m_bad, n_gettext( "You were stunned AGAIN for %d turn!",
4978 "You were stunned AGAIN for %d turns!",
4979 force_remaining ),
4980 force_remaining );
4981 } else {
4982 add_msg( m_bad, n_gettext( "You were stunned for %d turn!",
4983 "You were stunned for %d turns!",
4984 force_remaining ),
4985 force_remaining );
4986 }
4987 u.add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns * force_remaining );
4988 std::array<bodypart_id, 8> bps = {{
4989 bodypart_id( "head" ),
4990 bodypart_id( "arm_l" ), bodypart_id( "arm_r" ),
4991 bodypart_id( "hand_l" ), bodypart_id( "hand_r" ),
4992 bodypart_id( "torso" ),
4993 bodypart_id( "leg_l" ), bodypart_id( "leg_r" )
4994 }
4995 };
4996 for( const bodypart_id &bp : bps ) {
4997 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
4998 u.deal_damage( nullptr, bp, damage_instance( damage_bash, force_remaining * dam_mult ) );
4999 }
5000 }
5001 u.check_dead_state();
5002 }
5003 m.bash( traj[i], 2 * dam_mult * force_remaining );
5004 break;
5005 } else if( creatures.creature_at( traj[i] ) ) {
5006 u.setpos( traj[i - 1] );
5007 force_remaining = traj.size() - i;
5008 if( stun != 0 ) {
5009 if( u.has_effect( effect_stunned ) ) {
5010 add_msg( m_bad, n_gettext( "You were stunned AGAIN for %d turn!",
5011 "You were stunned AGAIN for %d turns!",
5012 force_remaining ),
5013 force_remaining );
5014 } else {
5015 add_msg( m_bad, n_gettext( "You were stunned for %d turn!",
5016 "You were stunned for %d turns!",
5017 force_remaining ),
5018 force_remaining );
5019 }
5020 u.add_effect( effect_stunned, 1_turns * force_remaining );
5021 }
5022 traj.erase( traj.begin(), traj.begin() + i );
5023 if( creatures.creature_at<monster>( traj.front() ) ) {
5024 add_msg( _( "You collided with something and sent it flying!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You collided with something and sent it flying!"
) ) ) );
5025 } else if( npc *const guy = creatures.creature_at<npc>( traj.front() ) ) {
5026 if( guy->male ) {
5027 add_msg( _( "You collided with someone and sent him flying!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You collided with someone and sent him flying!"
) ) ) );
5028 } else {
5029 add_msg( _( "You collided with someone and sent her flying!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You collided with someone and sent her flying!"
) ) ) );
5030 }
5031 }
5032 knockback( traj, stun, dam_mult );
5033 break;
5034 }
5035 if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_LIQUID, u.pos() ) && force_remaining == 0 ) {
5036 avatar_action::swim( m, u, u.pos() );
5037 } else {
5038 u.setpos( traj[i] );
5039 }
5040 }
5041 }
5042}
5043
5044void game::use_computer( const tripoint &p )
5045{
5046 if( u.has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
5047 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can not read a computer screen!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can not read a computer screen!"
) ) ) );
5048 return;
5049 }
5050 if( u.is_blind() ) {
5051 // we don't have screen readers in game
5052 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can not see a computer screen!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can not see a computer screen!"
) ) ) );
5053 return;
5054 }
5055 if( u.has_flag( json_flag_HYPEROPIC ) && !u.worn_with_flag( flag_FIX_FARSIGHT ) &&
5056 !u.has_effect( effect_contacts ) && !u.has_effect( effect_transition_contacts ) &&
5057 !u.has_flag( STATIC( json_character_flag( "ENHANCED_VISION" ) )(([]()-> const auto &{ using ExprType = std::decay_t<
decltype(static_argument_identity( json_character_flag( "ENHANCED_VISION"
) ))>; using CachedType = std::conditional_t<std::is_same_v
<ExprType, const char*>, std::string, ExprType>; static
const CachedType _cached_expr = static_argument_identity( json_character_flag
( "ENHANCED_VISION" ) ); return _cached_expr; })()) ) ) {
5058 add_msg( m_info, _( "You'll need to put on reading glasses before you can see the screen." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You'll need to put on reading glasses before you can see the screen."
) ) ) );
5059 return;
5060 }
5061
5062 computer *used = m.computer_at( p );
5063
5064 if( used == nullptr ) {
5065 if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_CONSOLE, p ) ) { //Console without map data
5066 add_msg( m_bad, _( "The console doesn't display anything coherent." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The console doesn't display anything coherent."
) ) ) );
5067 } else {
5068 dbg( D_ERROR )DebugLog((D_ERROR),D_GAME) << "/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
<< ":" << 5068 << ": " << "game:use_computer: Tried to use computer at (" <<
5069 p.x << ", " << p.y << ", " << p.z << ") - none there";
5070 debugmsg( "Tried to use computer at (%d, %d, %d) - none there", p.x, p.y, p.z )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "5070", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to use computer at (%d, %d, %d) - none there"
, p.x, p.y, p.z);
5071 }
5072 return;
5073 }
5074 if( used->eocs.empty() ) {
5075 computer_session( *used ).use();
5076 } else {
5077 dialogue d( get_talker_for( get_avatar() ), get_talker_for( used ) );
5078 for( const effect_on_condition_id &eoc : used->eocs ) {
5079 eoc->activate( d );
5080 }
5081 }
5082}
5083
5084template<typename T>
5085shared_ptr_fast<T> game::shared_from( const T &critter )
5086{
5087 if( static_cast<const Creature *>( &critter ) == static_cast<const Creature *>( &u ) ) {
5088 // u is not stored in a shared_ptr, but it won't go out of scope anyway
5089 return std::dynamic_pointer_cast<T>( u_shared_ptr );
5090 }
5091 if( critter.is_monster() ) {
5092 if( const shared_ptr_fast<monster> mon_ptr = critter_tracker->find( critter.get_location() ) ) {
5093 if( static_cast<const Creature *>( mon_ptr.get() ) == static_cast<const Creature *>( &critter ) ) {
5094 return std::dynamic_pointer_cast<T>( mon_ptr );
5095 }
5096 }
5097 }
5098 if( critter.is_npc() ) {
5099 for( auto &cur_npc : critter_tracker->active_npc ) {
5100 if( static_cast<const Creature *>( cur_npc.get() ) == static_cast<const Creature *>( &critter ) ) {
5101 return std::dynamic_pointer_cast<T>( cur_npc );
5102 }
5103 }
5104 }
5105 return nullptr;
5106}
5107
5108template shared_ptr_fast<Creature> game::shared_from<Creature>( const Creature & );
5109template shared_ptr_fast<Character> game::shared_from<Character>( const Character & );
5110template shared_ptr_fast<avatar> game::shared_from<avatar>( const avatar & );
5111template shared_ptr_fast<monster> game::shared_from<monster>( const monster & );
5112template shared_ptr_fast<npc> game::shared_from<npc>( const npc & );
5113
5114template<typename T>
5115T *game::critter_by_id( const character_id &id )
5116{
5117 if( id == u.getID() ) {
5118 // player is always alive, therefore no is-dead check
5119 return dynamic_cast<T *>( &u );
5120 }
5121 return find_npc( id );
5122}
5123
5124// monsters don't have ids
5125template Character *game::critter_by_id<Character>( const character_id & );
5126template npc *game::critter_by_id<npc>( const character_id & );
5127template Creature *game::critter_by_id<Creature>( const character_id & );
5128
5129static bool can_place_monster( const monster &mon, const tripoint &p )
5130{
5131 creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
5132 if( const monster *const critter = creatures.creature_at<monster>( p ) ) {
5133 // creature_tracker handles this. The hallucination monster will simply vanish
5134 if( !critter->is_hallucination() ) {
5135 return false;
5136 }
5137 }
5138 // Although monsters can sometimes exist on the same place as a Character (e.g. ridden horse),
5139 // it is usually wrong. So don't allow it.
5140 if( creatures.creature_at<Character>( p ) ) {
5141 return false;
5142 }
5143 return mon.will_move_to( p ) && mon.know_danger_at( p );
5144}
5145
5146static bool can_place_npc( const tripoint &p )
5147{
5148 creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
5149 if( const monster *const critter = creatures.creature_at<monster>( p ) ) {
5150 // creature_tracker handles this. The hallucination monster will simply vanish
5151 if( !critter->is_hallucination() ) {
5152 return false;
5153 }
5154 }
5155 if( creatures.creature_at<Character>( p ) ) {
5156 return false;
5157 }
5158 return !g->is_dangerous_tile( p );
5159}
5160
5161static std::optional<tripoint> choose_where_to_place_monster( const monster &mon,
5162 const tripoint_range<tripoint> &range )
5163{
5164 return random_point( range, [&]( const tripoint & p ) {
5165 return can_place_monster( mon, p );
5166 } );
5167}
5168
5169monster *game::place_critter_at( const mtype_id &id, const tripoint &p )
5170{
5171 return place_critter_around( id, p, 0 );
5172}
5173
5174monster *game::place_critter_at( const shared_ptr_fast<monster> &mon, const tripoint &p )
5175{
5176 return place_critter_around( mon, p, 0 );
5177}
5178
5179monster *game::place_critter_around( const mtype_id &id, const tripoint &center, const int radius )
5180{
5181 // TODO: change this into an assert, it must never happen.
5182 if( id.is_null() ) {
5183 return nullptr;
5184 }
5185 shared_ptr_fast<monster> mon = make_shared_fast<monster>( id );
5186 mon->ammo = mon->type->starting_ammo;
5187 return place_critter_around( mon, center, radius );
5188}
5189
5190monster *game::place_critter_around( const shared_ptr_fast<monster> &mon,
5191 const tripoint &center,
5192 const int radius,
5193 bool forced )
5194{
5195 std::optional<tripoint> where;
5196 if( forced || can_place_monster( *mon, center ) ) {
5197 where = center;
5198 }
5199
5200 // This loop ensures the monster is placed as close to the center as possible,
5201 // but all places that equally far from the center have the same probability.
5202 for( int r = 1; r <= radius && !where; ++r ) {
5203 where = choose_where_to_place_monster( *mon, m.points_in_radius( center, r ) );
5204 }
5205
5206 if( !where ) {
5207 return nullptr;
5208 }
5209 mon->spawn( *where );
5210 return critter_tracker->add( mon ) ? mon.get() : nullptr;
5211}
5212
5213monster *game::place_critter_within( const mtype_id &id, const tripoint_range<tripoint> &range )
5214{
5215 // TODO: change this into an assert, it must never happen.
5216 if( id.is_null() ) {
5217 return nullptr;
5218 }
5219 return place_critter_within( make_shared_fast<monster>( id ), range );
5220}
5221
5222monster *game::place_critter_within( const shared_ptr_fast<monster> &mon,
5223 const tripoint_range<tripoint> &range )
5224{
5225 const std::optional<tripoint> where = choose_where_to_place_monster( *mon, range );
5226 if( !where ) {
5227 return nullptr;
5228 }
5229 mon->spawn( *where );
5230 return critter_tracker->add( mon ) ? mon.get() : nullptr;
5231}
5232
5233size_t game::num_creatures() const
5234{
5235 // Plus one for the player.
5236 return critter_tracker->size() + critter_tracker->active_npc.size() + 1;
5237}
5238
5239bool game::update_zombie_pos( const monster &critter, const tripoint_abs_ms &old_pos,
5240 const tripoint_abs_ms &new_pos )
5241{
5242 return critter_tracker->update_pos( critter, old_pos, new_pos );
5243}
5244
5245void game::remove_zombie( const monster &critter )
5246{
5247 critter_tracker->remove( critter );
5248}
5249
5250void game::clear_zombies()
5251{
5252 critter_tracker->clear();
5253}
5254
5255bool game::find_nearby_spawn_point( const tripoint &target, const mtype_id &mt, int min_radius,
5256 int max_radius, tripoint &point, bool outdoor_only, bool indoor_only, bool open_air_allowed )
5257{
5258 tripoint target_point;
5259 //find a legal outdoor place to spawn based on the specified radius,
5260 //we just try a bunch of random points and use the first one that works, it none do then no spawn
5261 for( int attempts = 0; attempts < 75; attempts++ ) {
5262 target_point = target + tripoint( rng( -max_radius, max_radius ),
5263 rng( -max_radius, max_radius ), 0 );
5264 if( can_place_monster( monster( mt->id ), target_point ) &&
5265 ( open_air_allowed || get_map().has_floor_or_water( target_point ) ) &&
5266 ( !outdoor_only || get_map().is_outside( target_point ) ) &&
5267 ( !indoor_only || !get_map().is_outside( target_point ) ) &&
5268 rl_dist( target_point, target ) >= min_radius ) {
5269 point = target_point;
5270 return true;
5271 }
5272 }
5273 return false;
5274}
5275
5276bool game::find_nearby_spawn_point( const tripoint &target, int min_radius,
5277 int max_radius, tripoint &point, bool outdoor_only, bool indoor_only, bool open_air_allowed )
5278{
5279 tripoint target_point;
5280 //find a legal outdoor place to spawn based on the specified radius,
5281 //we just try a bunch of random points and use the first one that works, it none do then no spawn
5282 for( int attempts = 0; attempts < 75; attempts++ ) {
5283 target_point = target + tripoint( rng( -max_radius, max_radius ),
5284 rng( -max_radius, max_radius ), 0 );
5285 if( can_place_npc( target_point ) &&
5286 ( open_air_allowed || get_map().has_floor_or_water( target_point ) ) &&
5287 ( !outdoor_only || get_map().is_outside( target_point ) ) &&
5288 ( !indoor_only || !get_map().is_outside( target_point ) ) &&
5289 rl_dist( target_point, target ) >= min_radius ) {
5290 point = target_point;
5291 return true;
5292 }
5293 }
5294 return false;
5295}
5296
5297/**
5298 * Attempts to spawn a hallucination at given location.
5299 * Returns false if the hallucination couldn't be spawned for whatever reason, such as
5300 * a monster already in the target square.
5301 * @return Whether or not a hallucination was successfully spawned.
5302 */
5303bool game::spawn_hallucination( const tripoint &p )
5304{
5305 //Don't spawn hallucinations on open air
5306 if( get_map().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NO_FLOOR, p ) ) {
5307 return false;
5308 }
5309
5310 if( one_in( 100 ) ) {
5311 shared_ptr_fast<npc> tmp = make_shared_fast<npc>();
5312 tmp->normalize();
5313 tmp->randomize( NC_HALLU );
5314 tmp->spawn_at_precise( tripoint_abs_ms( get_map().getabs( p ) ) );
5315 if( !get_creature_tracker().creature_at( p, true ) ) {
5316 overmap_buffer.insert_npc( tmp );
5317 load_npcs();
5318 return true;
5319 } else {
5320 return false;
5321 }
5322 }
5323
5324 mtype_id hallu = MonsterGenerator::generator().get_valid_hallucination();
5325
5326 // If there's 'spawns' exist for player's current location, then
5327 // spawn random hallucination monster from 'spawns'-dependent monster group (90% chance)
5328 // or a completely random hallucination monster (10% chance)
5329 const oter_id &terrain_type = overmap_buffer.ter( get_player_character().global_omt_location() );
5330 const overmap_static_spawns &spawns = terrain_type->get_static_spawns();
5331 if( !spawns.group.is_null() && !one_in( 9 ) ) {
5332 hallu = MonsterGroupManager::GetRandomMonsterFromGroup( spawns.group );
5333 }
5334
5335 return spawn_hallucination( p, hallu, std::nullopt );
5336}
5337/**
5338 * Attempts to spawn a hallucination at given location.
5339 * Returns false if the hallucination couldn't be spawned for whatever reason, such as
5340 * a monster already in the target square.
5341 * @return Whether or not a hallucination was successfully spawned.
5342 */
5343bool game::spawn_hallucination( const tripoint &p, const mtype_id &mt,
5344 std::optional<time_duration> lifespan )
5345{
5346 //Don't spawn hallucinations on open air
5347 if( get_map().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NO_FLOOR, p ) ) {
5348 return false;
5349 }
5350
5351 const shared_ptr_fast<monster> phantasm = make_shared_fast<monster>( mt );
5352 phantasm->hallucination = true;
5353 phantasm->spawn( p );
5354 if( lifespan.has_value() ) {
5355 phantasm->set_summon_time( lifespan.value() );
5356 }
5357 //Don't attempt to place phantasms inside of other creatures
5358 if( !get_creature_tracker().creature_at( phantasm->pos(), true ) ) {
5359 return critter_tracker->add( phantasm );
5360 } else {
5361 return false;
5362 }
5363}
5364
5365bool game::spawn_npc( const tripoint &p, const string_id<npc_template> &npc_class,
5366 std::string &unique_id,
5367 std::vector<trait_id> &traits, std::optional<time_duration> lifespan )
5368{
5369 if( !unique_id.empty() && g->unique_npc_exists( unique_id ) ) {
5370 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_NPC, "NPC with unique id %s already exists.", unique_id )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_NPC ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "NPC with unique id %s already exists."
, unique_id ) ) ); } } while( false );
5371 return false;
5372 }
5373 shared_ptr_fast<npc> tmp = make_shared_fast<npc>();
5374 tmp->normalize();
5375 tmp->load_npc_template( npc_class );
5376 tmp->spawn_at_precise( tripoint_abs_ms( get_map().getabs( p ) ) );
5377 if( !get_creature_tracker().creature_at( p, true ) ) {
5378 overmap_buffer.insert_npc( tmp );
5379 for( const trait_id &new_trait : traits ) {
5380 tmp->set_mutation( new_trait );
5381 }
5382 if( !unique_id.empty() ) {
5383 tmp->set_unique_id( unique_id );
5384 }
5385 if( lifespan.has_value() ) {
5386 tmp->set_summon_time( lifespan.value() );
5387 }
5388 load_npcs();
5389 return true;
5390 } else {
5391 return false;
5392 }
5393}
5394
5395bool game::swap_critters( Creature &a, Creature &b )
5396{
5397 if( &a == &b ) {
5398 // No need to do anything, but print a debugmsg anyway
5399 debugmsg( "Tried to swap %s with itself", a.disp_name() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "5399", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to swap %s with itself"
, a.disp_name());
5400 return true;
5401 }
5402 creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
5403 if( creatures.creature_at( a.pos() ) != &a ) {
5404 debugmsg( "Tried to swap when it would cause a collision between %s and %s.",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "5405", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to swap when it would cause a collision between %s and %s."
, b.disp_name(), creatures.creature_at( a.pos() )->disp_name
())
5405 b.disp_name(), creatures.creature_at( a.pos() )->disp_name() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "5405", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to swap when it would cause a collision between %s and %s."
, b.disp_name(), creatures.creature_at( a.pos() )->disp_name
());
5406 return false;
5407 }
5408 if( creatures.creature_at( b.pos() ) != &b ) {
5409 debugmsg( "Tried to swap when it would cause a collision between %s and %s.",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "5410", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to swap when it would cause a collision between %s and %s."
, a.disp_name(), creatures.creature_at( b.pos() )->disp_name
())
5410 a.disp_name(), creatures.creature_at( b.pos() )->disp_name() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "5410", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to swap when it would cause a collision between %s and %s."
, a.disp_name(), creatures.creature_at( b.pos() )->disp_name
());
5411 return false;
5412 }
5413 // Simplify by "sorting" the arguments
5414 // Only the first argument can be u
5415 // If swapping player/npc with a monster, monster is second
5416 bool a_first = a.is_avatar() ||
5417 ( a.is_npc() && !b.is_avatar() );
5418 Creature &first = a_first ? a : b;
5419 Creature &second = a_first ? b : a;
5420 // Possible options:
5421 // both first and second are monsters
5422 // second is a monster, first is a player or an npc
5423 // first is a player, second is an npc
5424 // both first and second are npcs
5425 if( first.is_monster() ) {
5426 monster *m1 = dynamic_cast< monster * >( &first );
5427 monster *m2 = dynamic_cast< monster * >( &second );
5428 if( m1 == nullptr || m2 == nullptr || m1 == m2 ) {
5429 debugmsg( "Couldn't swap two monsters" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "5429", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Couldn't swap two monsters");
5430 return false;
5431 }
5432
5433 critter_tracker->swap_positions( *m1, *m2 );
5434 return true;
5435 }
5436
5437 Character *u_or_npc = dynamic_cast< Character * >( &first );
5438 Character *other_npc = dynamic_cast< Character * >( &second );
5439
5440 if( u_or_npc->in_vehicle ) {
5441 m.unboard_vehicle( u_or_npc->pos() );
5442 }
5443
5444 if( other_npc && other_npc->in_vehicle ) {
5445 m.unboard_vehicle( other_npc->pos() );
5446 }
5447
5448 tripoint temp = second.pos();
5449 second.setpos( first.pos() );
5450
5451 if( first.is_avatar() ) {
5452 walk_move( temp );
5453 } else {
5454 first.setpos( temp );
5455 if( m.veh_at( u_or_npc->pos() ).part_with_feature( VPFLAG_BOARDABLE, true ) ) {
5456 m.board_vehicle( u_or_npc->pos(), u_or_npc );
5457 }
5458 }
5459
5460 if( other_npc && m.veh_at( other_npc->pos() ).part_with_feature( VPFLAG_BOARDABLE, true ) ) {
5461 m.board_vehicle( other_npc->pos(), other_npc );
5462 }
5463 return true;
5464}
5465
5466bool game::is_empty( const tripoint &p )
5467{
5468 return ( m.passable( p ) || m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_LIQUID, p ) ) &&
5469 get_creature_tracker().creature_at( p ) == nullptr;
5470}
5471
5472bool game::is_empty( const tripoint_bub_ms &p )
5473{
5474 return is_empty( p.raw() );
5475}
5476
5477bool game::is_in_sunlight( const tripoint &p )
5478{
5479 return !is_sheltered( p ) &&
5480 incident_sun_irradiance( get_weather().weather_id, calendar::turn ) > irradiance::minimal;
5481}
5482
5483bool game::is_sheltered( const tripoint &p )
5484{
5485 const optional_vpart_position vp = m.veh_at( p );
5486 bool is_inside = vp && vp->is_inside();
5487
5488 return !m.is_outside( p ) ||
5489 p.z < 0 ||
5490 is_inside;
5491}
5492
5493bool game::revive_corpse( const tripoint &p, item &it )
5494{
5495 return revive_corpse( p, it, 1 );
5496}
5497
5498bool game::revive_corpse( const tripoint &p, item &it, int radius )
5499{
5500 if( !it.is_corpse() ) {
5501 debugmsg( "Tried to revive a non-corpse." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "5501", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to revive a non-corpse."
);
5502 return false;
5503 }
5504 // If this is not here, the game may attempt to spawn a monster before the map exists,
5505 // leading to it querying for furniture, and crashing.
5506 if( g->new_game ) {
5507 return false;
5508 }
5509 if( it.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) || it.has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ||
5510 it.has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ) {
5511 // Failed reanimation due to corpse being butchered
5512 return false;
5513 }
5514 shared_ptr_fast<monster> newmon_ptr;
5515 if( it.has_var( "zombie_form" ) ) {
5516 // the monster was not a zombie but turns into one when its corpse is revived
5517 newmon_ptr = make_shared_fast<monster>( mtype_id( it.get_var( "zombie_form" ) ) );
5518 } else {
5519 newmon_ptr = make_shared_fast<monster>( it.get_mtype()->id );
5520 }
5521 monster &critter = *newmon_ptr;
5522 critter.init_from_item( it );
5523 if( critter.get_hp() < 1 ) {
5524 // Failed reanimation due to corpse being too burned
5525 return false;
5526 }
5527
5528 critter.no_extra_death_drops = true;
5529 critter.add_effect( effect_downed, 5_turns, true );
5530
5531 if( it.get_var( "no_ammo" ) == "no_ammo" ) {
5532 for( auto &ammo : critter.ammo ) {
5533 ammo.second = 0;
5534 }
5535 }
5536
5537 return place_critter_around( newmon_ptr, p, radius );
5538}
5539
5540void game::save_cyborg( item *cyborg, const tripoint &couch_pos, Character &installer )
5541{
5542 int damage = cyborg->damage();
5543 int dmg_lvl = cyborg->damage_level();
5544 int difficulty = 12;
5545
5546 if( damage != 0 ) {
5547
5548 popup( _( "WARNING: Patient's body is damaged. Difficulty of the procedure is increased by %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "WARNING: Patient's body is damaged. Difficulty of the procedure is increased by %s."
) ) ),
5549 dmg_lvl );
5550
5551 // Damage of the cyborg increases difficulty
5552 difficulty += dmg_lvl;
5553 }
5554
5555 int chance_of_success = bionic_success_chance( true, -1, difficulty, installer );
5556 int success = chance_of_success - rng( 1, 100 );
5557
5558 if( !get_avatar().query_yn(
5559 _( "WARNING: %i percent chance of SEVERE damage to all body parts! Continue anyway?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "WARNING: %i percent chance of SEVERE damage to all body parts! Continue anyway?"
) ) ),
5560 100 - static_cast<int>( chance_of_success ) ) ) {
5561 return;
5562 }
5563
5564 if( success > 0 ) {
5565 add_msg( m_good, _( "Successfully removed Personality override." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Successfully removed Personality override."
) ) ) );
5566 add_msg( m_bad, _( "Autodoc immediately destroys the CBM upon removal." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Autodoc immediately destroys the CBM upon removal."
) ) ) );
5567
5568 m.i_rem( couch_pos, cyborg );
5569
5570 shared_ptr_fast<npc> tmp = make_shared_fast<npc>();
5571 tmp->normalize();
5572 tmp->load_npc_template( npc_template_cyborg_rescued );
5573 tmp->spawn_at_precise( tripoint_abs_ms( get_map().getabs( couch_pos ) ) );
5574 overmap_buffer.insert_npc( tmp );
5575 tmp->hurtall( dmg_lvl * 10, nullptr );
5576 tmp->add_effect( effect_downed, rng( 1_turns, 4_turns ), false, 0, true );
5577 load_npcs();
5578
5579 } else {
5580 const int failure_level = static_cast<int>( std::sqrt( std::abs( success ) * 4.0 * difficulty /
5581 installer.bionics_adjusted_skill( true, 12 ) ) );
5582 const int fail_type = std::min( 5, failure_level );
5583 switch( fail_type ) {
5584 case 1:
5585 case 2:
5586 add_msg( m_info, _( "The removal fails." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The removal fails." ) ) ) );
5587 add_msg( m_bad, _( "The body is damaged." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The body is damaged." ) ) ) );
5588 cyborg->mod_damage( 1000 );
5589 break;
5590 case 3:
5591 case 4:
5592 add_msg( m_info, _( "The removal fails badly." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The removal fails badly." ) )
) );
5593 add_msg( m_bad, _( "The body is badly damaged!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The body is badly damaged!" )
) ) );
5594 cyborg->mod_damage( 2000 );
5595 break;
5596 case 5:
5597 add_msg( m_info, _( "The removal is a catastrophe." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The removal is a catastrophe."
) ) ) );
5598 add_msg( m_bad, _( "The body is destroyed!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The body is destroyed!" ) ) ) );
5599 m.i_rem( couch_pos, cyborg );
5600 break;
5601 default:
5602 break;
5603 }
5604
5605 }
5606
5607}
5608
5609void game::exam_appliance( vehicle &veh, const point &c )
5610{
5611 player_activity act = veh_app_interact::run( veh, c );
5612 if( act ) {
5613 u.moves = 0;
5614 u.assign_activity( act );
5615 }
5616}
5617
5618void game::exam_vehicle( vehicle &veh, const point &c )
5619{
5620 if( veh.magic ) {
5621 add_msg( m_info, _( "This is your %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This is your %s" ) ) ), veh.name );
5622 return;
5623 }
5624 player_activity act = veh_interact::run( veh, c );
5625 if( act ) {
5626 u.moves = 0;
5627 u.assign_activity( act );
5628 }
5629}
5630
5631bool game::forced_door_closing( const tripoint &p, const ter_id &door_type, int bash_dmg )
5632{
5633 // TODO: Z
5634 const int &x = p.x;
5635 const int &y = p.y;
5636 const std::string &door_name = door_type.obj().name();
5637 point kb( x, y ); // and when moving items out of the way
5638 const auto valid_location = [&]( const tripoint & p ) {
5639 return g->is_empty( p );
5640 };
5641 if( const std::optional<tripoint> pos = random_point( m.points_in_radius( p, 2 ),
5642 valid_location ) ) {
5643 kb.x = -pos->x + x + x;
5644 kb.y = -pos->y + y + y;
5645 }
5646 const tripoint kbp( kb, p.z );
5647 if( kbp == p ) {
5648 // can't pushback any creatures anywhere, that means the door can't close.
5649 return false;
5650 }
5651 const bool can_see = u.sees( tripoint( x, y, p.z ) );
5652 creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
5653 Character *npc_or_player = creatures.creature_at<Character>( tripoint( x, y, p.z ), false );
5654 if( npc_or_player != nullptr ) {
5655 if( bash_dmg <= 0 ) {
5656 return false;
5657 }
5658 if( npc_or_player->is_npc() && can_see ) {
5659 add_msg( _( "The %1$s hits the %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %1$s hits the %2$s." ) )
), door_name, npc_or_player->get_name() );
5660 } else if( npc_or_player->is_avatar() ) {
5661 add_msg( m_bad, _( "The %s hits you." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s hits you." ) ) ), door_name );
5662 }
5663 if( npc_or_player->activity ) {
5664 npc_or_player->cancel_activity();
5665 }
5666 // TODO: make the npc angry?
5667 npc_or_player->hitall( bash_dmg, 0, nullptr );
5668 knockback( kbp, p, std::max( 1, bash_dmg / 10 ), -1, 1 );
5669 // TODO: perhaps damage/destroy the gate
5670 // if the npc was really big?
5671 }
5672 if( monster *const mon_ptr = creatures.creature_at<monster>( p ) ) {
5673 monster &critter = *mon_ptr;
5674 if( bash_dmg <= 0 ) {
5675 return false;
5676 }
5677 if( can_see ) {
5678 add_msg( _( "The %1$s hits the %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %1$s hits the %2$s." ) )
), door_name, critter.name() );
5679 }
5680 if( critter.type->size <= creature_size::small ) {
5681 critter.die_in_explosion( nullptr );
5682 } else {
5683 critter.apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "torso" ), bash_dmg );
5684 critter.check_dead_state();
5685 }
5686 if( !critter.is_dead() && critter.type->size >= creature_size::huge ) {
5687 // big critters simply prevent the gate from closing
5688 // TODO: perhaps damage/destroy the gate
5689 // if the critter was really big?
5690 return false;
5691 }
5692 if( !critter.is_dead() ) {
5693 // Still alive? Move the critter away so the door can close
5694 knockback( kbp, p, std::max( 1, bash_dmg / 10 ), -1, 1 );
5695 if( creatures.creature_at( p ) ) {
5696 return false;
5697 }
5698 }
5699 }
5700 if( const optional_vpart_position vp = m.veh_at( p ) ) {
5701 if( bash_dmg <= 0 ) {
5702 return false;
5703 }
5704 vp->vehicle().damage( m, vp->part_index(), bash_dmg );
5705 if( m.veh_at( p ) ) {
5706 // Check again in case all parts at the door tile
5707 // have been destroyed, if there is still a vehicle
5708 // there, the door can not be closed
5709 return false;
5710 }
5711 }
5712 if( bash_dmg < 0 && !m.i_at( point( x, y ) ).empty() ) {
5713 return false;
5714 }
5715 if( bash_dmg == 0 ) {
5716 for( item &elem : m.i_at( point( x, y ) ) ) {
5717 if( elem.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
5718 // Liquids are OK, will be destroyed later
5719 continue;
5720 }
5721 if( elem.volume() < 250_ml ) {
5722 // Dito for small items, will be moved away
5723 continue;
5724 }
5725 // Everything else prevents the door from closing
5726 return false;
5727 }
5728 }
5729
5730 m.ter_set( point( x, y ), door_type );
5731 if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NOITEM, point( x, y ) ) ) {
5732 map_stack items = m.i_at( point( x, y ) );
5733 for( map_stack::iterator it = items.begin(); it != items.end(); ) {
5734 if( it->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
5735 it = items.erase( it );
5736 continue;
5737 }
5738 const int glass_portion = it->made_of( material_glass );
5739 const float glass_fraction = glass_portion / static_cast<float>( it->type->mat_portion_total );
5740 if( glass_portion && rng_float( 0.0f, 1.0f ) < glass_fraction * 0.5f ) {
5741 if( can_see ) {
5742 add_msg( m_warning, _( "A %s shatters!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "A %s shatters!" ) ) ), it->tname() );
5743 } else {
5744 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Something shatters!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Something shatters!" ) ) ) );
5745 }
5746 it = items.erase( it );
5747 continue;
5748 }
5749 m.add_item_or_charges( kbp, *it );
5750 it = items.erase( it );
5751 }
5752 }
5753 return true;
5754}
5755
5756bool game::forced_door_closing( const tripoint_bub_ms &p, const ter_id &door_type, int bash_dmg )
5757{
5758 return forced_door_closing( p.raw(), door_type, bash_dmg );
5759}
5760
5761void game::open_gate( const tripoint &p )
5762{
5763 open_gate( tripoint_bub_ms( p ) );
5764}
5765
5766void game::open_gate( const tripoint_bub_ms &p )
5767{
5768 gates::open_gate( p, u );
5769}
5770
5771void game::moving_vehicle_dismount( const tripoint &dest_loc )
5772{
5773 const optional_vpart_position vp = m.veh_at( u.pos() );
5774 if( !vp ) {
5775 debugmsg( "Tried to exit non-existent vehicle." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "5775", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to exit non-existent vehicle."
);
5776 return;
5777 }
5778 vehicle *const veh = &vp->vehicle();
5779 if( u.pos() == dest_loc ) {
5780 debugmsg( "Need somewhere to dismount towards." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "5780", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Need somewhere to dismount towards."
);
5781 return;
5782 }
5783 tileray ray( dest_loc.xy() + point( -u.posx(), -u.posy() ) );
5784 // TODO:: make dir() const correct!
5785 const units::angle d = ray.dir();
5786 add_msg( _( "You dive from the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You dive from the %s." ) ) ), veh->name );
5787 m.unboard_vehicle( u.pos() );
5788 u.moves -= 200;
5789 // Dive three tiles in the direction of tox and toy
5790 fling_creature( &u, d, 30, true, true );
5791 // Hit the ground according to vehicle speed
5792 if( !m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, u.pos() ) ) {
5793 if( veh->velocity > 0 ) {
5794 fling_creature( &u, veh->face.dir(), veh->velocity / static_cast<float>( 100 ), false, true );
5795 } else {
5796 fling_creature( &u, veh->face.dir() + 180_degrees,
5797 -( veh->velocity ) / static_cast<float>( 100 ), false, true );
5798 }
5799 }
5800}
5801
5802void game::control_vehicle()
5803{
5804 if( vehicle *remote_veh = remoteveh() ) { // remote controls have priority
5805 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : remote_veh->get_avail_parts( "REMOTE_CONTROLS" ) ) {
5806 remote_veh->interact_with( vpr.pos() );
5807 return;
5808 }
5809 }
5810 vehicle *veh = nullptr;
5811 if( const optional_vpart_position vp = m.veh_at( u.pos() ) ) {
5812 veh = &vp->vehicle();
5813 const int controls_idx = veh->avail_part_with_feature( vp->mount(), "CONTROLS" );
5814 const int reins_idx = veh->avail_part_with_feature( vp->mount(), "CONTROL_ANIMAL" );
5815 const bool controls_ok = controls_idx >= 0; // controls available to "drive"
5816 const bool reins_ok = reins_idx >= 0 // reins + animal available to "drive"
5817 && veh->has_engine_type( fuel_type_animal, false )
5818 && veh->get_harnessed_animal();
5819 if( veh->player_in_control( u ) ) {
5820 // player already "driving" - offer ways to leave
5821 if( controls_ok ) {
5822 veh->interact_with( u.pos() );
5823 } else if( reins_idx >= 0 ) {
5824 u.controlling_vehicle = false;
5825 add_msg( m_info, _( "You let go of the reins." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You let go of the reins." ) )
) );
5826 }
5827 } else if( u.in_vehicle && ( controls_ok || reins_ok ) ) {
5828 // player not driving but has controls or reins on tile
5829 if( veh->is_locked ) {
5830 veh->interact_with( u.pos() );
5831 return; // interact_with offers to hotwire
5832 }
5833 if( !veh->handle_potential_theft( u ) ) {
5834 return; // player not owner and refused to steal
5835 }
5836 if( veh->engine_on ) {
5837 u.controlling_vehicle = true;
5838 add_msg( _( "You take control of the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You take control of the %s."
) ) ), veh->name );
5839 } else {
5840 veh->start_engines( true );
5841 }
5842 }
5843 }
5844 if( !veh ) { // no controls or animal reins under player position, search nearby
5845 int num_valid_controls = 0;
5846 std::optional<tripoint> vehicle_position;
5847 std::optional<vpart_reference> vehicle_controls;
5848 for( const tripoint &elem : m.points_in_radius( get_player_character().pos(), 1 ) ) {
5849 if( const optional_vpart_position vp = m.veh_at( elem ) ) {
5850 const std::optional<vpart_reference> controls = vp.value().part_with_feature( "CONTROLS", true );
5851 if( controls ) {
5852 num_valid_controls++;
5853 vehicle_position = elem;
5854 vehicle_controls = controls;
5855 }
5856 }
5857 }
5858 if( num_valid_controls < 1 ) {
5859 add_msg( _( "No vehicle controls found." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "No vehicle controls found." )
) ) );
5860 return;
5861 } else if( num_valid_controls > 1 ) {
5862 vehicle_position = choose_adjacent( _( "Control vehicle where?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Control vehicle where?" ) ) ) );
5863 if( !vehicle_position ) {
5864 return;
5865 }
5866 const optional_vpart_position vp = m.veh_at( *vehicle_position );
5867 if( vp ) {
5868 vehicle_controls = vp.value().part_with_feature( "CONTROLS", true );
5869 if( !vehicle_controls ) {
5870 add_msg( _( "The vehicle doesn't have controls there." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The vehicle doesn't have controls there."
) ) ) );
5871 return;
5872 }
5873 } else {
5874 add_msg( _( "No vehicle there." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "No vehicle there." ) ) ) );
5875 return;
5876 }
5877 }
5878 // If we hit neither of those, there's only one set of vehicle controls, which should already have been found.
5879 if( vehicle_controls ) {
5880 veh = &vehicle_controls->vehicle();
5881 if( !veh->handle_potential_theft( u ) ) {
5882 return;
5883 }
5884 veh->interact_with( *vehicle_position );
5885 }
5886 }
5887 if( veh ) {
5888 // If we reached here, we gained control of a vehicle.
5889 // Clear the map memory for the area covered by the vehicle to eliminate ghost vehicles.
5890 for( const tripoint &target : veh->get_points() ) {
5891 u.memorize_clear_decoration( m.getglobal( target ), "vp_" );
5892 m.memory_cache_dec_set_dirty( target, true );
5893 }
5894 veh->is_following = false;
5895 veh->is_patrolling = false;
5896 veh->autopilot_on = false;
5897 veh->is_autodriving = false;
5898 }
5899}
5900
5901bool game::npc_menu( npc &who )
5902{
5903 enum choices : int {
5904 talk = 0,
5905 swap_pos,
5906 push,
5907 examine_wounds,
5908 examine_status,
5909 use_item,
5910 sort_armor,
5911 attack,
5912 disarm,
5913 steal,
5914 trade
5915 };
5916
5917 const bool obeys = debug_mode || ( who.is_friendly( u ) && !who.in_sleep_state() );
5918
5919 uilist amenu;
5920
5921 amenu.text = string_format( _( "What to do with %s?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "What to do with %s?" ) ) ), who.disp_name() );
5922 amenu.addentry( talk, true, 't', _( "Talk" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Talk" ) ) ) );
5923 amenu.addentry( swap_pos, obeys && !who.is_mounted() &&
5924 !u.is_mounted(), 's', _( "Swap positions" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Swap positions" ) ) ) );
5925 amenu.addentry( push, obeys && !who.is_mounted(), 'p', _( "Push away" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Push away" ) ) ) );
5926 amenu.addentry( examine_wounds, true, 'w', _( "Examine wounds" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Examine wounds" ) ) ) );
5927 amenu.addentry( examine_status, true, 'e', _( "Examine status" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Examine status" ) ) ) );
5928 amenu.addentry( use_item, true, 'i', _( "Use item on" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Use item on" ) ) ) );
5929 amenu.addentry( sort_armor, true, 'r', _( "Sort armor" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Sort armor" ) ) ) );
5930 amenu.addentry( attack, true, 'a', _( "Attack" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Attack" ) ) ) );
5931 if( !who.is_player_ally() ) {
5932 amenu.addentry( disarm, who.is_armed(), 'd', _( "Disarm" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Disarm" ) ) ) );
5933 amenu.addentry( steal, !who.is_enemy(), 'S', _( "Steal" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Steal" ) ) ) );
5934 } else {
5935 amenu.addentry( trade, true, 'b', _( "Trade" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Trade" ) ) ) );
5936 }
5937
5938 amenu.query();
5939
5940 const int choice = amenu.ret;
5941 if( choice == talk ) {
5942 u.talk_to( get_talker_for( who ) );
5943 } else if( choice == swap_pos ) {
5944 if( !prompt_dangerous_tile( who.pos() ) ) {
5945 return true;
5946 }
5947 if( u.get_grab_type() == object_type::NONE ) {
5948 // TODO: Make NPCs protest when displaced onto dangerous crap
5949 add_msg( _( "You swap places with %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You swap places with %s." ) )
), who.get_name() );
5950 swap_critters( u, who );
5951 // TODO: Make that depend on stuff
5952 u.mod_moves( -200 );
5953 } else {
5954 add_msg( _( "You cannot swap places while grabbing something." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot swap places while grabbing something."
) ) ) );
5955 }
5956 } else if( choice == push ) {
5957 // TODO: Make NPCs protest when displaced onto dangerous crap
5958 tripoint oldpos = who.pos();
5959 who.move_away_from( u.pos(), true );
5960 u.mod_moves( -20 );
5961 if( oldpos != who.pos() ) {
5962 add_msg( _( "%s moves out of the way." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s moves out of the way." ) )
), who.get_name() );
5963 } else {
5964 add_msg( m_warning, _( "%s has nowhere to go!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s has nowhere to go!" ) ) ), who.get_name() );
5965 }
5966 } else if( choice == examine_wounds ) {
5967 ///\EFFECT_PER slightly increases precision when examining NPCs' wounds
5968 ///\EFFECT_FIRSTAID increases precision when examining NPCs' wounds
5969 float prof_bonus = u.get_skill_level( skill_firstaid );
5970 prof_bonus = u.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care ) ? prof_bonus + 1 : prof_bonus;
5971 prof_bonus = u.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_wound_care_expert ) ? prof_bonus + 2 : prof_bonus;
5972 const bool precise = prof_bonus * 4 + u.per_cur >= 20;
5973 who.body_window( _( "Limbs of: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Limbs of: " ) ) ) + who.disp_name(), true, precise, 0, 0, 0, 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f,
5974 0.0f, 0.0f );
5975 } else if( choice == examine_status ) {
5976 if( debug_mode || ( who.is_npc() && ( who.as_npc()->op_of_u.trust >= 5 ||
5977 who.is_friendly( u ) ) ) ||
5978 who.in_sleep_state() ) {
5979 display_bodygraph( who );
5980 } else {
5981 who.say( SNIPPET.random_from_category( "<no>" ).value_or( translation() ).translated() );
5982 }
5983 } else if( choice == use_item ) {
5984 static const std::string heal_string( "heal" );
5985 const auto will_accept = [&who]( const item & it ) {
5986 if( it.has_flag( json_flag_SPLINT ) && who.can_wear( it ).success() ) {
5987 return true;
5988 }
5989 const use_function *use_fun = it.get_use( heal_string );
5990 if( use_fun == nullptr ) {
5991 return false;
5992 }
5993
5994 const auto *actor = dynamic_cast<const heal_actor *>( use_fun->get_actor_ptr() );
5995
5996 return actor != nullptr &&
5997 actor->limb_power >= 0 &&
5998 actor->head_power >= 0 &&
5999 actor->torso_power >= 0;
6000 };
6001 item_location loc = game_menus::inv::titled_filter_menu( will_accept, u, _( "Use which item?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Use which item?" ) ) ) );
6002
6003 if( !loc ) {
6004 add_msg( _( "Never mind" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind" ) ) ) );
6005 return false;
6006 }
6007 item &used = *loc;
6008 if( used.has_flag( json_flag_SPLINT ) ) {
6009 std::string reason = _( "Nope." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Nope." ) ) );
6010 if( who.wear_if_wanted( used, reason ) ) {
6011 u.i_rem( &used );
6012 }
6013 } else {
6014 bool did_use = u.invoke_item( &used, heal_string, who.pos() );
6015 if( did_use ) {
6016 // Note: exiting a body part selection menu counts as use here
6017 u.mod_moves( -300 );
6018 }
6019 }
6020 } else if( choice == sort_armor ) {
6021 if( who.is_hallucination() ) {
6022 who.say( SNIPPET.random_from_category( "<no>" ).value_or( translation() ).translated() );
6023 } else {
6024 who.worn.sort_armor( who );
6025 u.mod_moves( -100 );
6026 }
6027 } else if( choice == attack ) {
6028 if( who.is_enemy() || query_yn( _( "You may be attacked! Proceed?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You may be attacked! Proceed?"
) ) ) ) ) {
6029 u.melee_attack( who, true );
6030 who.on_attacked( u );
6031 }
6032 } else if( choice == disarm ) {
6033 if( who.is_enemy() || query_yn( _( "You may be attacked! Proceed?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You may be attacked! Proceed?"
) ) ) ) ) {
6034 u.disarm( who );
6035 }
6036 } else if( choice == steal && query_yn( _( "You may be attacked! Proceed?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You may be attacked! Proceed?"
) ) ) ) ) {
6037 u.steal( who );
6038 } else if( choice == trade ) {
6039 if( who.is_hallucination() ) {
6040 who.say( SNIPPET.random_from_category( "<hallu_dont_trade>" ).value_or(
6041 translation() ).translated() );
6042 } else {
6043 npc_trading::trade( who, 0, _( "Trade" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Trade" ) ) ) );
6044 }
6045 }
6046
6047 return true;
6048}
6049
6050void game::examine( bool with_pickup )
6051{
6052 // if we are driving a vehicle, examine the
6053 // current tile without asking.
6054 const optional_vpart_position vp = m.veh_at( u.pos() );
6055 if( vp && vp->vehicle().player_in_control( u ) ) {
6056 examine( u.pos(), with_pickup );
6057 return;
6058 }
6059
6060 std::optional<tripoint> examp;
6061 if( with_pickup ) {
6062 // Examine and/or pick up items
6063 examp = choose_adjacent_highlight( _( "Examine terrain, furniture, or items where?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Examine terrain, furniture, or items where?"
) ) ),
6064 _( "There is nothing that can be examined nearby." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is nothing that can be examined nearby."
) ) ),
6065 ACTION_EXAMINE_AND_PICKUP, false );
6066 } else {
6067 // Examine but do not pick up items
6068 examp = choose_adjacent_highlight( _( "Examine terrain or furniture where?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Examine terrain or furniture where?"
) ) ),
6069 _( "There is nothing that can be examined nearby." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is nothing that can be examined nearby."
) ) ),
6070 ACTION_EXAMINE, false );
6071 }
6072
6073 if( !examp ) {
6074 return;
6075 }
6076 u.manual_examine = true;
6077 examine( *examp, with_pickup );
6078 u.manual_examine = false;
6079}
6080
6081static std::string get_fire_fuel_string( const tripoint &examp )
6082{
6083 map &here = get_map();
6084 if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FIRE_CONTAINER, examp ) ) {
6085 field_entry *fire = here.get_field( examp, fd_fire );
6086 if( fire ) {
6087 std::string ss;
6088 ss += _( "There is a fire here." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is a fire here." ) ) );
6089 ss += " ";
6090 if( fire->get_field_intensity() > 1 ) {
6091 ss += _( "It's too big and unpredictable to evaluate how long it will last." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's too big and unpredictable to evaluate how long it will last."
) ) );
6092 return ss;
6093 }
6094 time_duration fire_age = fire->get_field_age();
6095 // half-life inclusion
6096 int mod = 5 - get_player_character().get_skill_level( skill_survival );
6097 mod = std::max( mod, 0 );
6098 if( fire_age >= 0_turns ) {
6099 if( mod >= 4 ) { // = survival level 0-1
6100 ss += _( "It's going to go out soon without extra fuel." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's going to go out soon without extra fuel."
) ) );
6101 return ss;
6102 } else {
6103 fire_age = 30_minutes - fire_age;
6104 if( to_string_approx( fire_age - fire_age * mod / 5 ) == to_string_approx(
6105 fire_age + fire_age * mod / 5 ) ) {
6106 ss += string_format(
6107 _( "Without extra fuel it might burn yet for maybe %s, but might also go out sooner." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Without extra fuel it might burn yet for maybe %s, but might also go out sooner."
) ) ),
6108 to_string_approx( fire_age - fire_age * mod / 5 ) );
6109 } else {
6110 ss += string_format(
6111 _( "Without extra fuel it might burn yet for between %s to %s, but might also go out sooner." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Without extra fuel it might burn yet for between %s to %s, but might also go out sooner."
) ) ),
6112 to_string_approx( fire_age - fire_age * mod / 5 ),
6113 to_string_approx( fire_age + fire_age * mod / 5 ) );
6114 }
6115 return ss;
6116 }
6117 } else {
6118 fire_age = fire_age * -1 + 30_minutes;
6119 if( mod >= 4 ) { // = survival level 0-1
6120 if( fire_age <= 1_hours ) {
6121 ss += _( "It's quite decent and looks like it'll burn for a bit without extra fuel." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's quite decent and looks like it'll burn for a bit without extra fuel."
) ) );
6122 return ss;
6123 } else if( fire_age <= 3_hours ) {
6124 ss += _( "It looks solid, and will burn for a few hours without extra fuel." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It looks solid, and will burn for a few hours without extra fuel."
) ) );
6125 return ss;
6126 } else {
6127 ss += _( "It's very well supplied and even without extra fuel might burn for at least a part of a day." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's very well supplied and even without extra fuel might burn for at least a part of a day."
) ) );
6128 return ss;
6129 }
6130 } else {
6131 if( to_string_approx( fire_age - fire_age * mod / 5 ) == to_string_approx(
6132 fire_age + fire_age * mod / 5 ) ) {
6133 ss += string_format( _( "Without extra fuel it will burn for %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Without extra fuel it will burn for %s."
) ) ),
6134 to_string_approx( fire_age - fire_age * mod / 5 ) );
6135 } else {
6136 ss += string_format( _( "Without extra fuel it will burn for between %s to %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Without extra fuel it will burn for between %s to %s."
) ) ),
6137 to_string_approx( fire_age - fire_age * mod / 5 ),
6138 to_string_approx( fire_age + fire_age * mod / 5 ) );
6139 }
6140 return ss;
6141 }
6142 }
6143 }
6144 }
6145 return {};
6146}
6147
6148void game::examine( const tripoint &examp, bool with_pickup )
6149{
6150 if( disable_robot( examp ) ) {
6151 return;
6152 }
6153
6154 Creature *c = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( examp );
6155 if( c != nullptr ) {
6156 monster *mon = dynamic_cast<monster *>( c );
6157 if( mon != nullptr ) {
6158 add_msg( _( "There is a %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is a %s." ) ) ), mon->get_name() );
6159 if( mon->has_effect( effect_pet ) && !u.is_mounted() ) {
6160 if( monexamine::pet_menu( *mon ) ) {
6161 return;
6162 }
6163 } else if( mon->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) && !mon->has_effect( effect_pet ) ) {
6164 if( monexamine::mech_hack( *mon ) ) {
6165 return;
6166 }
6167 } else if( mon->has_flag( mon_flag_PAY_BOT ) ) {
6168 if( monexamine::pay_bot( *mon ) ) {
6169 return;
6170 }
6171 } else if( mon->attitude_to( u ) == Creature::Attitude::FRIENDLY && !u.is_mounted() ) {
6172 if( monexamine::mfriend_menu( *mon ) ) {
6173 return;
6174 }
6175 } else if( mon->has_flag( mon_flag_CONVERSATION ) && !mon->type->chat_topics.empty() ) {
6176 get_avatar().talk_to( get_talker_for( mon ) );
6177 }
6178 } else {
6179 u.cant_do_mounted();
6180 }
6181 npc *np = dynamic_cast<npc *>( c );
6182 if( np != nullptr && !u.cant_do_mounted() ) {
6183 if( npc_menu( *np ) ) {
6184 return;
6185 }
6186 }
6187 }
6188
6189 const optional_vpart_position vp = m.veh_at( examp );
6190 if( vp ) {
6191 if( !u.is_mounted() || u.mounted_creature->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
6192 if( !vp->vehicle().is_appliance() ) {
6193 vp->vehicle().interact_with( examp, with_pickup );
6194 } else {
6195 g->exam_appliance( vp->vehicle(), vp->mount() );
6196 }
6197 return;
6198 } else {
6199 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You cannot interact with a vehicle while mounted." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot interact with a vehicle while mounted."
) ) ) );
6200 }
6201 }
6202
6203 iexamine::part_con( get_avatar(), examp );
6204 // trap::iexamine will handle the invisible traps.
6205 m.tr_at( examp ).examine( examp );
6206
6207 if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_CONSOLE, examp ) && !u.is_mounted() ) {
6208 use_computer( examp );
6209 return;
6210 } else if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_CONSOLE, examp ) && u.is_mounted() ) {
6211 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You cannot use a console while mounted." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot use a console while mounted."
) ) ) );
6212 }
6213 const furn_t &xfurn_t = m.furn( examp ).obj();
6214 const ter_t &xter_t = m.ter( examp ).obj();
6215
6216 const tripoint player_pos = u.pos();
6217
6218 if( m.has_furn( examp ) ) {
6219 if( !u.cant_do_mounted() ) {
6220 xfurn_t.examine( u, examp );
6221 }
6222 } else {
6223 if( xter_t.can_examine( examp ) && !u.is_mounted() ) {
6224 xter_t.examine( u, examp );
6225 }
6226 }
6227
6228 // Did the player get moved? Bail out if so; our examp probably
6229 // isn't valid anymore.
6230 if( player_pos != u.pos() ) {
6231 return;
6232 }
6233
6234 bool none = true;
6235 if( xter_t.can_examine( examp ) || xfurn_t.can_examine( examp ) ) {
6236 none = false;
6237 }
6238
6239 // In case of teleport trap or somesuch
6240 if( player_pos != u.pos() ) {
6241 return;
6242 }
6243
6244 // Feedback for fire lasting time, this can be judged while mounted
6245 const std::string fire_fuel = get_fire_fuel_string( examp );
6246 if( !fire_fuel.empty() ) {
6247 add_msg( fire_fuel );
6248 }
6249
6250 if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SEALED, examp ) ) {
6251 if( none ) {
6252 if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_UNSTABLE, examp ) ) {
6253 add_msg( _( "The %s is too unstable to remove anything." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s is too unstable to remove anything."
) ) ), m.name( examp ) );
6254 } else {
6255 add_msg( _( "The %s is firmly sealed." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s is firmly sealed." ) )
), m.name( examp ) );
6256 }
6257 }
6258 } else {
6259 //examp has no traps, is a container and doesn't have a special examination function
6260 if( m.tr_at( examp ).is_null() && m.i_at( examp ).empty() &&
6261 m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_CONTAINER, examp ) && none ) {
6262 add_msg( _( "It is empty." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It is empty." ) ) ) );
6263 } else if( ( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FIRE_CONTAINER, examp ) &&
6264 xfurn_t.has_examine( iexamine::fireplace ) ) ||
6265 xfurn_t.has_examine( iexamine::workbench ) ) {
6266 return;
6267 } else {
6268 sounds::process_sound_markers( &u );
6269 // Pick up items, if there are any, unless there is reason to not to
6270 if( with_pickup && m.has_items( examp ) && !u.is_mounted() &&
6271 !m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NO_PICKUP_ON_EXAMINE, examp ) &&
6272 !m.only_liquid_in_liquidcont( examp ) ) {
6273 pickup( examp );
6274 }
6275 }
6276 }
6277}
6278
6279void game::pickup()
6280{
6281 // Prompt for which adjacent/current tile to pick up items from
6282 const std::optional<tripoint> where_ = choose_adjacent_highlight( _( "Pick up items where?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Pick up items where?" ) ) ),
6283 _( "There is nothing to pick up nearby." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
