translation_argument_identity( "There is nothing to pick up nearby."
) ) ),
6284 ACTION_PICKUP, false );
6285 if( !where_ ) {
6286 return;
6287 }
6288 // Pick up items only from the selected tile
6289 u.pick_up( game_menus::inv::pickup( u, *where_ ) );
6290}
6291
6292void game::pickup_all()
6293{
6294 // Pick up items from current and all adjacent tiles
6295 u.pick_up( game_menus::inv::pickup( u ) );
6296}
6297
6298void game::pickup( const tripoint &p )
6299{
6300 // Highlight target
6301 shared_ptr_fast<game::draw_callback_t> hilite_cb = make_shared_fast<game::draw_callback_t>( [&]() {
6302 m.drawsq( w_terrain, p, drawsq_params().highlight( true ) );
6303 } );
6304 add_draw_callback( hilite_cb );
6305
6306 // Pick up items only from the selected tile
6307 u.pick_up( game_menus::inv::pickup( u, p ) );
6308}
6309
6310//Shift player by one tile, look_around(), then restore previous position.
6311//represents carefully peeking around a corner, hence the large move cost.
6312void game::peek()
6313{
6314 const std::optional<tripoint> p = choose_direction( _( "Peek where?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Peek where?" ) ) ), true );
6315 if( !p ) {
6316 return;
6317 }
6318 tripoint new_pos = u.pos() + *p;
6319 if( p->z != 0 ) {
6320 // Character might peek to a different submap; ensures return location is accurate.
6321 const tripoint_abs_ms old_loc = u.get_location();
6322 vertical_move( p->z, false, true );
6323
6324 if( old_loc != u.get_location() ) {
6325 new_pos = u.pos();
6326 u.move_to( old_loc );
6327 m.vertical_shift( old_loc.z() );
6328 } else {
6329 return;
6330 }
6331 }
6332
6333 if( m.impassable( new_pos ) ) {
6334 return;
6335 }
6336
6337 peek( new_pos );
6338}
6339
6340void game::peek( const tripoint &p )
6341{
6342 u.moves -= 200;
6343 tripoint prev = u.pos();
6344 u.setpos( p );
6345 const bool is_same_pos = u.pos() == prev;
6346 const bool is_standup_peek = is_same_pos && u.is_crouching();
6347 tripoint center = p;
6348 m.build_map_cache( p.z );
6349 m.update_visibility_cache( p.z );
6350
6351 look_around_result result;
6352 const look_around_params looka_params = { true, center, center, false, false, true, true };
6353 if( is_standup_peek ) { // Non moving peek from crouch is a standup peek
6354 u.reset_move_mode();
6355 result = look_around( looka_params );
6356 u.activate_crouch_mode();
6357 } else { // Else is normal peek
6358 result = look_around( looka_params );
6359 u.setpos( prev );
6360 }
6361
6362 if( result.peek_action && *result.peek_action == PA_BLIND_THROW ) {
6363 item_location loc;
6364 avatar_action::plthrow( u, loc, p );
6365 }
6366 m.invalidate_map_cache( p.z );
6367 m.invalidate_visibility_cache();
6368}
6369
6370////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
6371std::optional<tripoint> game::look_debug()
6372{
6373 editmap edit;
6374 return edit.edit();
6375}
6376////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
6377
6378void game::draw_look_around_cursor( const tripoint &lp, const visibility_variables &cache )
6379{
6380 if( !liveview.is_enabled() ) {
6381#if defined( TILES )
6382 if( is_draw_tiles_mode() ) {
6383 draw_cursor( lp );
6384 return;
6385 }
6386#endif
6387 const tripoint view_center = u.pos() + u.view_offset;
6388 visibility_type visibility = visibility_type::HIDDEN;
6389 const bool inbounds = m.inbounds( lp );
6390 if( inbounds ) {
6391 visibility = m.get_visibility( m.apparent_light_at( lp, cache ), cache );
6392 }
6393 if( visibility == visibility_type::CLEAR ) {
6394 const Creature *const creature = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( lp, true );
6395 if( creature != nullptr && u.sees( *creature ) ) {
6396 creature->draw( w_terrain, view_center, true );
6397 } else {
6398 m.drawsq( w_terrain, lp, drawsq_params().highlight( true ).center( view_center ) );
6399 }
6400 } else {
6401 std::string visibility_indicator;
6402 nc_color visibility_indicator_color = c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white);
6403 switch( visibility ) {
6404 case visibility_type::CLEAR:
6405 // Already handled by the outer if statement
6406 break;
6407 case visibility_type::BOOMER:
6408 case visibility_type::BOOMER_DARK:
6409 visibility_indicator = '#';
6410 visibility_indicator_color = c_pinkget_all_colors().get(def_c_pink);
6411 break;
6412 case visibility_type::DARK:
6413 visibility_indicator = '#';
6414 visibility_indicator_color = c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray);
6415 break;
6416 case visibility_type::LIT:
6417 visibility_indicator = '#';
6418 visibility_indicator_color = c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray);
6419 break;
6420 case visibility_type::HIDDEN:
6421 visibility_indicator = 'x';
6422 visibility_indicator_color = c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white);
6423 break;
6424 }
6425
6426 const tripoint screen_pos = point( POSX, POSY ) + lp - view_center;
6427 mvwputch( w_terrain, screen_pos.xy(), visibility_indicator_color, visibility_indicator );
6428 }
6429 }
6430}
6431
6432void game::print_all_tile_info( const tripoint &lp, const catacurses::window &w_look,
6433 const std::string &area_name, int column,
6434 int &line,
6435 const int last_line,
6436 const visibility_variables &cache )
6437{
6438 visibility_type visibility = visibility_type::HIDDEN;
6439 const bool inbounds = m.inbounds( lp );
6440 if( inbounds ) {
6441 visibility = m.get_visibility( m.apparent_light_at( lp, cache ), cache );
6442 }
6443 const Creature *creature = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( lp, true );
6444 switch( visibility ) {
6445 case visibility_type::CLEAR: {
6446 const optional_vpart_position vp = m.veh_at( lp );
6447 print_terrain_info( lp, w_look, area_name, column, line );
6448 print_fields_info( lp, w_look, column, line );
6449 print_trap_info( lp, w_look, column, line );
6450 print_part_con_info( lp, w_look, column, line );
6451 print_creature_info( creature, w_look, column, line, last_line );
6452 print_vehicle_info( veh_pointer_or_null( vp ), vp ? vp->part_index() : -1, w_look, column, line,
6453 last_line );
6454 print_items_info( lp, w_look, column, line, last_line );
6455 print_graffiti_info( lp, w_look, column, line, last_line );
6456 }
6457 break;
6458 case visibility_type::BOOMER:
6459 case visibility_type::BOOMER_DARK:
6460 case visibility_type::DARK:
6461 case visibility_type::LIT:
6462 case visibility_type::HIDDEN:
6463 print_visibility_info( w_look, column, line, visibility );
6464
6465 if( creature != nullptr ) {
6466 std::vector<std::string> buf;
6467 if( u.sees_with_infrared( *creature ) ) {
6468 creature->describe_infrared( buf );
6469 } else if( u.sees_with_specials( *creature ) ) {
6470 creature->describe_specials( buf );
6471 }
6472 for( const std::string &s : buf ) {
6473 mvwprintw( w_look, point( 1, ++line ), s );
6474 }
6475 }
6476 break;
6477 }
6478 if( !inbounds ) {
6479 return;
6480 }
6481 const int max_width = getmaxx( w_look ) - column - 1;
6482
6483 std::string this_sound = sounds::sound_at( lp );
6484 if( !this_sound.empty() ) {
6485 const int lines = fold_and_print( w_look, point( 1, ++line ), max_width, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
6486 _( "From here you heard %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "From here you heard %s" ) ) ),
6487 this_sound );
6488 line += lines - 1;
6489 } else {
6490 // Check other z-levels
6491 tripoint tmp = lp;
6492 for( tmp.z = -OVERMAP_DEPTH; tmp.z <= OVERMAP_HEIGHT; tmp.z++ ) {
6493 if( tmp.z == lp.z ) {
6494 continue;
6495 }
6496
6497 std::string zlev_sound = sounds::sound_at( tmp );
6498 if( !zlev_sound.empty() ) {
6499 const int lines = fold_and_print( w_look, point( 1, ++line ), max_width, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
6500 tmp.z > lp.z ?
6501 _( "From above you heard %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "From above you heard %s" ) )
) : _( "From below you heard %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "From below you heard %s" ) )
), zlev_sound );
6502 line += lines - 1;
6503 }
6504 }
6505 }
6506}
6507
6508void game::print_visibility_info( const catacurses::window &w_look, int column, int &line,
6509 visibility_type visibility )
6510{
6511 const char *visibility_message = nullptr;
6512 switch( visibility ) {
6513 case visibility_type::CLEAR:
6514 visibility_message = _( "Clearly visible." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Clearly visible." ) ) );
6515 break;
6516 case visibility_type::BOOMER:
6517 visibility_message = _( "A bright pink blur." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "A bright pink blur." ) ) );
6518 break;
6519 case visibility_type::BOOMER_DARK:
6520 visibility_message = _( "A pink blur." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "A pink blur." ) ) );
6521 break;
6522 case visibility_type::DARK:
6523 visibility_message = _( "Darkness." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Darkness." ) ) );
6524 break;
6525 case visibility_type::LIT:
6526 visibility_message = _( "Bright light." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Bright light." ) ) );
6527 break;
6528 case visibility_type::HIDDEN:
6529 visibility_message = _( "Unseen." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Unseen." ) ) );
6530 break;
6531 }
6532
6533 mvwprintz( w_look, point( line, column ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), visibility_message );
6534 line += 2;
6535}
6536
6537void game::print_terrain_info( const tripoint &lp, const catacurses::window &w_look,
6538 const std::string &area_name, int column, int &line )
6539{
6540 const int max_width = getmaxx( w_look ) - column - 1;
6541
6542 // Print OMT type and terrain type on first two lines
6543 // if can't fit in one line.
6544 std::string tile = uppercase_first_letter( m.tername( lp ) );
6545 std::string area = uppercase_first_letter( area_name );
6546 if( const timed_event *e = get_timed_events().get( timed_event_type::OVERRIDE_PLACE ) ) {
6547 area = e->string_id;
6548 }
6549 mvwprintz( w_look, point( column, line++ ), c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow), area );
6550 mvwprintz( w_look, point( column, line++ ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), tile );
6551 std::string desc = string_format( m.ter( lp ).obj().description );
6552 std::vector<std::string> lines = foldstring( desc, max_width );
6553 int numlines = lines.size();
6554 for( int i = 0; i < numlines; i++ ) {
6555 mvwprintz( w_look, point( column, line++ ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), lines[i] );
6556 }
6557
6558 // Furniture, if any
6559 print_furniture_info( lp, w_look, column, line );
6560
6561 // Cover percentage from terrain and furniture next.
6562 fold_and_print( w_look, point( column, ++line ), max_width, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), _( "Cover: %d%%" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Cover: %d%%" ) ) ),
6563 m.coverage( lp ) );
6564
6565 if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_TREE, lp ) ) {
6566 const int lines = fold_and_print( w_look, point( column, ++line ), max_width, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
6567 _( "Can be <color_green>cut down</color> with the right tools." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can be <color_green>cut down</color> with the right tools."
) ) ) );
6568 line += lines - 1;
6569 }
6570
6571 // Terrain and furniture flags next. These can be several lines for some combinations of
6572 // furnitures and terrains.
6573 lines = foldstring( m.features( lp ), max_width );
6574 numlines = lines.size();
6575 for( int i = 0; i < numlines; i++ ) {
6576 mvwprintz( w_look, point( column, ++line ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), lines[i] );
6577 }
6578
6579 // Move cost from terrain and furniture and vehicle parts.
6580 // Vehicle part information is printed in a different function.
6581 if( m.impassable( lp ) ) {
6582 mvwprintz( w_look, point( column, ++line ), c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red), _( "Impassable" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Impassable" ) ) ) );
6583 } else {
6584 mvwprintz( w_look, point( column, ++line ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), _( "Move cost: %d" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Move cost: %d" ) ) ),
6585 m.move_cost( lp ) * 50 );
6586 }
6587
6588 // Next print the string on any SIGN flagged furniture if any.
6589 std::string signage = m.get_signage( lp );
6590 if( !signage.empty() ) {
6591 std::string sign_string = u.has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ? "???" : signage;
6592 const int lines = fold_and_print( w_look, point( column, ++line ), max_width, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
6593 _( "Sign: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Sign: %s" ) ) ), sign_string );
6594 line += lines - 1;
6595 }
6596
6597 // Print light level on the selected tile.
6598 std::pair<std::string, nc_color> ll = get_light_level( std::max( 1.0,
6599 LIGHT_AMBIENT_LIT - m.ambient_light_at( lp ) + 1.0 ) );
6600 mvwprintz( w_look, point( column, ++line ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), _( "Lighting: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Lighting: " ) ) ) );
6601 mvwprintz( w_look, point( column + utf8_width( _( "Lighting: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Lighting: " ) ) ) ), line ), ll.second, ll.first );
6602
6603 // Print the terrain and any furntiure on the tile below and whether it is walkable.
6604 if( lp.z > -OVERMAP_DEPTH && !m.has_floor( lp ) ) {
6605 tripoint below( lp.xy(), lp.z - 1 );
6606 std::string tile_below = m.tername( below );
6607 if( m.has_furn( below ) ) {
6608 tile_below += ", " + m.furnname( below );
6609 }
6610
6611 if( !m.has_floor_or_support( lp ) ) {
6612 fold_and_print( w_look, point( column, ++line ), max_width, c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray),
6613 _( "Below: %s; No support" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Below: %s; No support" ) ) ), tile_below );
6614 } else {
6615 fold_and_print( w_look, point( column, ++line ), max_width, c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray), _( "Below: %s; Walkable" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Below: %s; Walkable" ) ) ),
6616 tile_below );
6617 }
6618 }
6619
6620 ++line;
6621}
6622
6623void game::print_furniture_info( const tripoint &lp, const catacurses::window &w_look, int column,
6624 int &line )
6625{
6626 // Do nothing if there is no furniture here
6627 if( !m.has_furn( lp ) ) {
6628 return;
6629 }
6630 const int max_width = getmaxx( w_look ) - column - 1;
6631
6632 // Print furniture name in white
6633 std::string desc = uppercase_first_letter( m.furnname( lp ) );
6634 mvwprintz( w_look, point( column, line++ ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), desc );
6635
6636 // Print each line of furniture description in gray
6637 desc = string_format( m.furn( lp ).obj().description );
6638 std::vector<std::string> lines = foldstring( desc, max_width );
6639 int numlines = lines.size();
6640 for( int i = 0; i < numlines; i++ ) {
6641 mvwprintz( w_look, point( column, line++ ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), lines[i] );
6642 }
6643
6644 // If this furniture has a crafting pseudo item, check for tool qualities and print them
6645 if( !m.furn( lp )->crafting_pseudo_item.is_empty() ) {
6646 // Make a pseudo item instance so we can use qualities_info later
6647 const item pseudo( m.furn( lp )->crafting_pseudo_item );
6648 // Set up iteminfo query to show qualities
6649 std::vector<iteminfo_parts> quality_part = { iteminfo_parts::QUALITIES };
6650 const iteminfo_query quality_query( quality_part );
6651 // Render info into info_vec
6652 std::vector<iteminfo> info_vec;
6653 pseudo.qualities_info( info_vec, &quality_query, 1, false );
6654 // Get a newline-separated string of quality info, then parse and print each line
6655 std::string quality_string = format_item_info( info_vec, {} );
6656 size_t strpos = 0;
6657 while( ( strpos = quality_string.find( '\n' ) ) != std::string::npos ) {
6658 trim_and_print( w_look, point( column, line++ ), max_width, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
6659 quality_string.substr( 0, strpos + 1 ) );
6660 // Delete used token
6661 quality_string.erase( 0, strpos + 1 );
6662 }
6663 }
6664}
6665
6666void game::print_fields_info( const tripoint &lp, const catacurses::window &w_look, int column,
6667 int &line )
6668{
6669 const field &tmpfield = m.field_at( lp );
6670 for( const auto &fld : tmpfield ) {
6671 const field_entry &cur = fld.second;
6672 if( fld.first.obj().has_fire && ( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FIRE_CONTAINER, lp ) ||
6673 m.ter( lp ) == t_pit_shallow || m.ter( lp ) == t_pit ) ) {
6674 const int max_width = getmaxx( w_look ) - column - 2;
6675 int lines = fold_and_print( w_look, point( column, ++line ), max_width, cur.color(),
6676 get_fire_fuel_string( lp ) ) - 1;
6677 line += lines;
6678 } else {
6679 mvwprintz( w_look, point( column, ++line ), cur.color(), cur.name() );
6680 }
6681 }
6682
6683 int size = std::distance( tmpfield.begin(), tmpfield.end() );
6684 if( size > 0 ) {
6685 mvwprintz( w_look, point( column, ++line ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), "\n" );
6686 }
6687}
6688
6689void game::print_trap_info( const tripoint &lp, const catacurses::window &w_look, const int column,
6690 int &line )
6691{
6692 const trap &tr = m.tr_at( lp );
6693 if( tr.can_see( lp, u ) ) {
6694 std::string tr_name = tr.name();
6695 mvwprintz( w_look, point( column, ++line ), tr.color, tr_name );
6696 }
6697
6698 ++line;
6699}
6700
6701void game::print_part_con_info( const tripoint &lp, const catacurses::window &w_look,
6702 const int column,
6703 int &line )
6704{
6705 // TODO: fix point types
6706 partial_con *pc = m.partial_con_at( tripoint_bub_ms( lp ) );
6707 std::string tr_name;
6708 if( pc != nullptr ) {
6709 const construction &built = pc->id.obj();
6710 tr_name = string_format( _( "Unfinished task: %s, %d%% complete" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Unfinished task: %s, %d%% complete"
) ) ), built.group->name(),
6711 pc->counter / 100000 );
6712
6713 int const width = getmaxx( w_look ) - column - 2;
6714 fold_and_print( w_look, point( column, ++line ), width, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), tr_name );
6715
6716 ++line;
6717 }
6718}
6719
6720void game::print_creature_info( const Creature *creature, const catacurses::window &w_look,
6721 const int column, int &line, const int last_line )
6722{
6723 int vLines = last_line - line;
6724 if( creature != nullptr && ( u.sees( *creature ) || creature == &u ) ) {
6725 line = creature->print_info( w_look, ++line, vLines, column );
6726 }
6727}
6728
6729void game::print_vehicle_info( const vehicle *veh, int veh_part, const catacurses::window &w_look,
6730 const int column, int &line, const int last_line )
6731{
6732 if( veh ) {
6733 // Print the name of the vehicle.
6734 mvwprintz( w_look, point( column, ++line ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), _( "Vehicle: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Vehicle: " ) ) ) );
6735 mvwprintz( w_look, point( column + utf8_width( _( "Vehicle: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Vehicle: " ) ) ) ), line ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), "%s",
6736 veh->name );
6737 // Then the list of parts on that tile.
6738 line = veh->print_part_list( w_look, ++line, last_line, getmaxx( w_look ), veh_part );
6739 }
6740}
6741
6742static void add_visible_items_recursive( std::map<std::string, std::pair<int, nc_color>>
6743 &item_names, const item &it )
6744{
6745 ++item_names[it.tname()].first;
6746 item_names[it.tname()].second = it.color_in_inventory();
6747
6748 for( const item *content : it.all_known_contents() ) {
6749 add_visible_items_recursive( item_names, *content );
6750 }
6751}
6752
6753void game::print_items_info( const tripoint &lp, const catacurses::window &w_look, const int column,
6754 int &line,
6755 const int last_line )
6756{
6757 if( !m.sees_some_items( lp, u ) ) {
6758 return;
6759 } else if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_CONTAINER, lp ) && !m.could_see_items( lp, u ) ) {
6760 mvwprintw( w_look, point( column, ++line ), _( "You cannot see what is inside of it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot see what is inside of it."
) ) ) );
6761 } else if( u.has_effect( effect_blind ) || u.worn_with_flag( flag_BLIND ) ) {
6762 mvwprintz( w_look, point( column, ++line ), c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow),
6763 _( "There's something there, but you can't see what it is." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There's something there, but you can't see what it is."
) ) ) );
6764 return;
6765 } else {
6766 std::map<std::string, std::pair<int, nc_color>> item_names;
6767 for( const item &it : m.i_at( lp ) ) {
6768 add_visible_items_recursive( item_names, it );
6769 }
6770
6771 const int max_width = getmaxx( w_look ) - column - 1;
6772 for( auto it = item_names.begin(); it != item_names.end(); ++it ) {
6773 // last line but not last item
6774 if( line + 1 >= last_line && std::next( it ) != item_names.end() ) {
6775 mvwprintz( w_look, point( column, ++line ), c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow), _( "More items here…" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "More items here…" ) ) ) );
6776 break;
6777 }
6778
6779 if( it->second.first > 1 ) {
6780 trim_and_print( w_look, point( column, ++line ), max_width, it->second.second,
6781 pgettext( "%s is the name of the item. %d is the quantity of that item.", "%s [%d]" ),
6782 it->first.c_str(), it->second.first );
6783 } else {
6784 trim_and_print( w_look, point( column, ++line ), max_width, it->second.second, it->first );
6785 }
6786 }
6787 }
6788}
6789
6790void game::print_graffiti_info( const tripoint &lp, const catacurses::window &w_look,
6791 const int column, int &line,
6792 const int last_line )
6793{
6794 if( line > last_line ) {
6795 return;
6796 }
6797
6798 const int max_width = getmaxx( w_look ) - column - 2;
6799 if( m.has_graffiti_at( lp ) ) {
6800 const int lines = fold_and_print( w_look, point( column, ++line ), max_width, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
6801 m.ter( lp ) == t_grave_new ? _( "Graffiti: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Graffiti: %s" ) ) ) : _( "Inscription: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Inscription: %s" ) ) ),
6802 m.graffiti_at( lp ) );
6803 line += lines - 1;
6804 }
6805}
6806
6807bool game::check_zone( const zone_type_id &type, const tripoint &where ) const
6808{
6809 return zone_manager::get_manager().has( type, m.getglobal( where ) );
6810}
6811
6812bool game::check_near_zone( const zone_type_id &type, const tripoint &where ) const
6813{
6814 return zone_manager::get_manager().has_near( type, m.getglobal( where ) );
6815}
6816
6817bool game::is_zones_manager_open() const
6818{
6819 return zones_manager_open;
6820}
6821
6822static void zones_manager_shortcuts( const catacurses::window &w_info, faction_id const &faction )
6823{
6824 werase( w_info );
6825
6826 int tmpx = 1;
6827 tmpx += shortcut_print( w_info, point( tmpx, 1 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green), _( "<A>dd" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<A>dd" ) ) ) ) + 2;
6828 tmpx += shortcut_print( w_info, point( tmpx, 1 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green), _( "<P>ersonal" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<P>ersonal" ) ) ) ) + 2;
6829 tmpx += shortcut_print( w_info, point( tmpx, 1 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green), _( "<R>emove" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<R>emove" ) ) ) ) + 2;
6830 tmpx += shortcut_print( w_info, point( tmpx, 1 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green), _( "<E>nable" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<E>nable" ) ) ) ) + 2;
6831 shortcut_print( w_info, point( tmpx, 1 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green), _( "<D>isable" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<D>isable" ) ) ) );
6832
6833 tmpx = 1;
6834 shortcut_print( w_info, point( tmpx, 2 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green),
6835 _( "<T>-Toggle zone display" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<T>-Toggle zone display"
) ) ) );
6836
6837 tmpx += shortcut_print( w_info, point( tmpx, 3 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green),
6838 _( "<Z>-Enable personal" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<Z>-Enable personal" )
) ) ) + 2;
6839 shortcut_print( w_info, point( tmpx, 3 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green),
6840 _( "<X>-Disable personal" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<X>-Disable personal" )
) ) );
6841
6842 tmpx = 1;
6843 tmpx += shortcut_print( w_info, point( tmpx, 4 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green),
6844 _( "<+-> Move up/down" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<+-> Move up/down" ) )
) ) + 2;
6845 shortcut_print( w_info, point( tmpx, 4 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green), _( "<Enter>-Edit" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<Enter>-Edit" ) ) ) );
6846
6847 tmpx = 1;
6848 tmpx += shortcut_print( w_info, point( tmpx, 5 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green),
6849 _( "<S>how all / hide distant" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<S>how all / hide distant"
) ) ) ) + 2;
6850 shortcut_print( w_info, point( tmpx, 5 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green), _( "<M>ap" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<M>ap" ) ) ) );
6851
6852 if( debug_mode ) {
6853 shortcut_print( w_info, point( 1, 6 ), c_light_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_red), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green),
6854 string_format( _( "Shown <F>action: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Shown <F>action: %s" )
) ), faction.str() ) );
6855 }
6856
6857 wnoutrefresh( w_info );
6858}
6859
6860static void zones_manager_draw_borders( const catacurses::window &w_border,
6861 const catacurses::window &w_info_border,
6862 const int iInfoHeight, const int width )
6863{
6864 for( int i = 1; i < TERMX; ++i ) {
6865 if( i < width ) {
6866 mvwputch( w_border, point( i, 0 ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_OXOX4194417 ); // -
6867 mvwputch( w_border, point( i, TERMY - iInfoHeight - 1 ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
6868 LINE_OXOX4194417 ); // -
6869 }
6870
6871 if( i < TERMY - iInfoHeight ) {
6872 mvwputch( w_border, point( 0, i ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_XOXO4194424 ); // |
6873 mvwputch( w_border, point( width - 1, i ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_XOXO4194424 ); // |
6874 }
6875 }
6876
6877 mvwputch( w_border, point_zero, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_OXXO4194412 ); // |^
6878 mvwputch( w_border, point( width - 1, 0 ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_OOXX4194411 ); // ^|
6879
6880 mvwputch( w_border, point( 0, TERMY - iInfoHeight - 1 ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
6881 LINE_XXXO4194420 ); // |-
6882 mvwputch( w_border, point( width - 1, TERMY - iInfoHeight - 1 ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
6883 LINE_XOXX4194421 ); // -|
6884
6885 mvwprintz( w_border, point( 2, 0 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Zones manager" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Zones manager" ) ) ) );
6886 wnoutrefresh( w_border );
6887
6888 for( int j = 0; j < iInfoHeight - 1; ++j ) {
6889 mvwputch( w_info_border, point( 0, j ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_XOXO4194424 );
6890 mvwputch( w_info_border, point( width - 1, j ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_XOXO4194424 );
6891 }
6892
6893 for( int j = 0; j < width - 1; ++j ) {
6894 mvwputch( w_info_border, point( j, iInfoHeight - 1 ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_OXOX4194417 );
6895 }
6896
6897 mvwputch( w_info_border, point( 0, iInfoHeight - 1 ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_XXOO4194413 );
6898 mvwputch( w_info_border, point( width - 1, iInfoHeight - 1 ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_XOOX4194410 );
6899 wnoutrefresh( w_info_border );
6900}
6901
6902void game::zones_manager()
6903{
6904 const tripoint stored_view_offset = u.view_offset;
6905
6906 u.view_offset = tripoint_zero;
6907
6908 const int zone_ui_height = 14;
6909 const int zone_options_height = debug_mode ? 6 : 7;
1
Assuming 'debug_mode' is false
→
2
←
'?' condition is false
→
6910
6911 const int width = 45;
6912
6913 int offsetX = 0;
6914 int max_rows = 0;
6915
6916 catacurses::window w_zones;
6917 catacurses::window w_zones_border;
6918 catacurses::window w_zones_info;
6919 catacurses::window w_zones_info_border;
6920 catacurses::window w_zones_options;
6921
6922 bool show = true;
6923
6924 ui_adaptor ui;
6925 ui.on_screen_resize( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
6926 if( !show ) {
6927 ui.position( point_zero, point_zero );
6928 return;
6929 }
6930 offsetX = get_option<std::string>( "SIDEBAR_POSITION" ) != "left" ?
6931 TERMX - width : 0;
6932 const int w_zone_height = TERMY - zone_ui_height;
6933 max_rows = w_zone_height - 2;
6934 w_zones = catacurses::newwin( w_zone_height - 2, width - 2,
6935 point( offsetX + 1, 1 ) );
6936 w_zones_border = catacurses::newwin( w_zone_height, width,
6937 point( offsetX, 0 ) );
6938 w_zones_info = catacurses::newwin( zone_ui_height - zone_options_height - 1,
6939 width - 2, point( offsetX + 1, w_zone_height ) );
6940 w_zones_info_border = catacurses::newwin( zone_ui_height, width,
6941 point( offsetX, w_zone_height ) );
6942 w_zones_options = catacurses::newwin( zone_options_height - 1, width - 2,
6943 point( offsetX + 1, TERMY - zone_options_height ) );
6944
6945 ui.position( point( offsetX, 0 ), point( width, TERMY ) );
6946 } );
6947 ui.mark_resize();
6948
6949 input_context ctxt( "ZONES_MANAGER" );
6950 ctxt.register_navigate_ui_list();
6951 ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
6952 ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
6953 ctxt.register_action( "ADD_ZONE" );

6969
6970 zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
6971 int start_index = 0;
6972 int active_index = 0;
6973 bool blink = false;
6974 bool stuff_changed = false;
6975 bool show_all_zones = false;
6976 int zone_cnt = 0;
6977 faction_id zones_faction( your_fac );
6978
6979 // reset any zones that were temporarily disabled for an activity
6980 mgr.reset_disabled();

6982 // cache the players location for person zones
6983 if( mgr.has_personal_zones() ) {

6986
6987 // get zones with distance between player and
6988 // zone center point <= 60 or all zones, if show_all_zones is true
6989 auto get_zones = [&]() {
6990 std::vector<zone_manager::ref_zone_data> zones;
6991 if( show_all_zones ) {
6992 zones = mgr.get_zones( zones_faction );
6993 } else {
6994 const tripoint_abs_ms u_abs_pos = u.get_location();
6995 for( zone_manager::ref_zone_data &ref : mgr.get_zones( zones_faction ) ) {
6996 const tripoint_abs_ms &zone_abs_pos = ref.get().get_center_point();
6997 if( rl_dist( u_abs_pos, zone_abs_pos ) <= ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE ) {
6998 zones.emplace_back( ref );
6999 }
7000 }
7001 }
7002 zones.erase( std::remove_if( zones.begin(), zones.end(),
7003 []( zone_manager::ref_zone_data const & it ) {
7004 zone_type_id const type = it.get().get_type();
7005 return !debug_mode && type.is_valid() && type->hidden;
7006 } ),
7007 zones.end() );
7008 zone_cnt = static_cast<int>( zones.size() );
7009 return zones;
7010 };
7011
7012 auto zones = get_zones();
7013
7014 auto zones_manager_options = [&]() {
7015 werase( w_zones_options );
7016
7017 if( zone_cnt > 0 ) {
7018 const zone_data &zone = zones[active_index].get();
7019
7020 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-use-named-point-constants)
7021 mvwprintz( w_zones_options, point( 1, 0 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), mgr.get_name_from_type( zone.get_type() ) );
7022
7023 if( zone.has_options() ) {
7024 const auto &descriptions = zone.get_options().get_descriptions();
7025
7026 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-use-named-point-constants)
7027 mvwprintz( w_zones_options, point( 1, 1 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Options" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Options" ) ) ) );
7028
7029 int y = 2;
7030 for( const auto &desc : descriptions ) {
7031 mvwprintz( w_zones_options, point( 3, y ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), desc.first );
7032 mvwprintz( w_zones_options, point( 20, y ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), desc.second );
7033 y++;
7034 }
7035 }
7036 }
7037
7038 wnoutrefresh( w_zones_options );
7039 };
7040
7041 std::optional<tripoint> zone_start;
7042 std::optional<tripoint> zone_end;
7043 bool zone_blink = false;
7044 bool zone_cursor = false;
7045 shared_ptr_fast<draw_callback_t> zone_cb = create_zone_callback(
7046 zone_start, zone_end, zone_blink, zone_cursor );
7047 add_draw_callback( zone_cb );
7048
7049 // This lambda returns either absolute coordinates or relative-to-player
7050 // coordinates, depending on whether personal is false or true respectively.
7051 // In C++20 we could have the return type depend on the parameter using
7052 // if constexpr( personal ) but for now it will just return tripoints.
7053 auto query_position =
7054 [&]( bool personal = false ) -> std::optional<std::pair<tripoint, tripoint>> {
7055 on_out_of_scope invalidate_current_ui( [&]()
7056 {
7057 ui.mark_resize();
7058 } );
7059 restore_on_out_of_scope<bool> show_prev( show );
7060 restore_on_out_of_scope<std::optional<tripoint>> zone_start_prev( zone_start );
7061 restore_on_out_of_scope<std::optional<tripoint>> zone_end_prev( zone_end );
7062 show = false;
7063 zone_start = std::nullopt;
7064 zone_end = std::nullopt;
7065 ui.mark_resize();
7066
7067 static_popup popup;
7068 popup.on_top( true );
7069 popup.message( "%s", _( "Select first point." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select first point." ) ) ) );
7070
7071 tripoint center = u.pos() + u.view_offset;
7072
7073 const look_around_result first =
7074 look_around( /*show_window=*/false, center, center, false, true, false );
7075 if( first.position )
7076 {
7077 popup.message( "%s", _( "Select second point." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select second point." ) ) ) );
7078
7079 const look_around_result second = look_around( /*show_window=*/false, center, *first.position,
7080 true, true, false );
7081 if( second.position ) {
7082 if( personal ) {
7083 tripoint first_rel(
7084 std::min( first.position->x - u.posx(), second.position->x - u.posx() ),
7085 std::min( first.position->y - u.posy(), second.position->y - u.posy() ),
7086 std::min( first.position->z - u.posz(), second.position->z - u.posz() ) ) ;
7087 tripoint second_rel(
7088 std::max( first.position->x - u.posx(), second.position->x - u.posx() ),
7089 std::max( first.position->y - u.posy(), second.position->y - u.posy() ),
7090 std::max( first.position->z - u.posz(), second.position->z - u.posz() ) ) ;
7091 return { { first_rel, second_rel } };
7092 }
7093 tripoint_abs_ms first_abs =
7094 m.getglobal(
7095 tripoint(
7096 std::min( first.position->x, second.position->x ),
7097 std::min( first.position->y, second.position->y ),
7098 std::min( first.position->z, second.position->z ) ) );
7099 tripoint_abs_ms second_abs =
7100 m.getglobal(
7101 tripoint(
7102 std::max( first.position->x, second.position->x ),
7103 std::max( first.position->y, second.position->y ),
7104 std::max( first.position->z, second.position->z ) ) );
7105
7106 return { { first_abs.raw(), second_abs.raw() } };
7107 }
7108 }
7109
7110 return std::nullopt;
7111 };
7112
7113 ui.on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
7114 if( !show ) {
7115 return;
7116 }
7117 zones_manager_draw_borders( w_zones_border, w_zones_info_border, zone_ui_height, width );
7118 zones_manager_shortcuts( w_zones_info, zones_faction );
7119
7120 if( zone_cnt == 0 ) {
7121 werase( w_zones );
7122 mvwprintz( w_zones, point( 2, 5 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "No Zones defined." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "No Zones defined." ) ) ) );
7123
7124 } else {
7125 werase( w_zones );
7126
7127 calcStartPos( start_index, active_index, max_rows, zone_cnt );
7128
7129 draw_scrollbar( w_zones_border, active_index, max_rows, zone_cnt, point_south );
7130 wnoutrefresh( w_zones_border );
7131
7132 int iNum = 0;
7133
7134 tripoint_abs_ms player_absolute_pos = u.get_location();
7135
7136 //Display saved zones
7137 for( auto &i : zones ) {
7138 if( iNum >= start_index &&
7139 iNum < start_index + ( ( max_rows > zone_cnt ) ? zone_cnt : max_rows ) ) {
7140 const zone_data &zone = i.get();
7141
7142 nc_color colorLine = zone.get_enabled() ? c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray);
7143
7144 if( iNum == active_index ) {
7145 mvwprintz( w_zones, point( 0, iNum - start_index ), c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow), "%s", ">>" );
7146 colorLine = zone.get_enabled() ? c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) : c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green);
7147 }
7148
7149 //Draw Zone name
7150 mvwprintz( w_zones, point( 3, iNum - start_index ), colorLine,
7151 //~ "P: <Zone Name>" represents a personal zone
7152 trim_by_length( ( zone.get_is_personal() ? _( "P: " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "P: " ) ) ) : "" ) + zone.get_name(), 28 ) );
7153
7154 tripoint_abs_ms center = zone.get_center_point();
7155
7156 //Draw direction + distance
7157 mvwprintz( w_zones, point( 32, iNum - start_index ), colorLine, "%*d %s",
7158 5, static_cast<int>( trig_dist( player_absolute_pos, center ) ),
7159 direction_name_short( direction_from( player_absolute_pos,
7160 center ) ) );
7161
7162 //Draw Vehicle Indicator
7163 mvwprintz( w_zones, point( 41, iNum - start_index ), colorLine,
7164 zone.get_is_vehicle() ? "*" : "" );
7165 }
7166 iNum++;
7167 }
7168
7169 // Display zone options
7170 zones_manager_options();
7171 }
7172
7173 wnoutrefresh( w_zones );
7174 } );
7175
7176 const int scroll_rate = zone_cnt > 20 ? 10 : 3;

'?' condition is true

7178 bool save = false;
7179 zones_manager_open = true;
7180 zone_manager::get_manager().save_zones( "zmgr-temp" );
7181 while( !quit ) {

7185 zone_start = m.getlocal( zone.get_start_point() );

7189 blink = false;

7191 ctxt.reset_timeout();

7193
7194 // Actually accessed from the terrain overlay callback `zone_cb` in the
7195 // call to `ui_manager::redraw`.
7196 //NOLINTNEXTLINE(clang-analyzer-deadcode.DeadStores)
7197 zone_blink = blink;
7198 invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
7199
7200 ui_manager::redraw();
7201
7202 //Wait for input
7203 const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
7204
7205 if( action == "ADD_ZONE" ) {
7206 do { // not a loop, just for quick bailing out if canceled
7207 const auto maybe_id = mgr.query_type();
7208 if( !maybe_id.has_value() ) {
7209 break;
7210 }
7211
7212 const zone_type_id &id = maybe_id.value();
7213 auto options = zone_options::create( id );
7214
7215 if( !options->query_at_creation() ) {
7216 break;
7217 }
7218
7219 std::string default_name = options->get_zone_name_suggestion();
7220 if( default_name.empty() ) {
7221 default_name = mgr.get_name_from_type( id );
7222 }
7223 const auto maybe_name = mgr.query_name( default_name );
7224 if( !maybe_name.has_value() ) {
7225 break;
7226 }
7227 const std::string &name = maybe_name.value();
7228
7229 const auto position = query_position();
7230 if( !position ) {
7231 break;
7232 }
7233
7234 int vehicle_zones_pre = 0;
7235 for( zone_manager::ref_zone_data zone : get_zones() ) {
7236 if( zone.get().get_is_vehicle() ) {
7237 vehicle_zones_pre++;
7238 }
7239 }
7240
7241 // TODO: fix point types
7242 mgr.add( name, id, get_player_character().get_faction()->id, false, true,
7243 position->first, position->second, options, false );
7244
7245 zones = get_zones();
7246 active_index = zone_cnt - 1;
7247
7248 int vehicle_zones_post = 0;
7249 for( zone_manager::ref_zone_data zone : zones ) {
7250 if( zone.get().get_is_vehicle() ) {
7251 vehicle_zones_post++;
7252 }
7253 }
7254
7255 if( vehicle_zones_post == vehicle_zones_pre ) {
7256 active_index -= vehicle_zones_post;
7257 }
7258
7259 stuff_changed = true;
7260 } while( false );
7261
7262 blink = false;
7263 } else if( action == "ADD_PERSONAL_ZONE" ) {
7264 do { // not a loop, just for quick bailing out if canceled
7265 const auto maybe_id = mgr.query_type( true );
7266 if( !maybe_id.has_value() ) {
7267 break;
7268 }
7269
7270 const zone_type_id &id = maybe_id.value();
7271 auto options = zone_options::create( id );
7272
7273 if( !options->query_at_creation() ) {
7274 break;
7275 }
7276
7277 std::string default_name = options->get_zone_name_suggestion();
7278 if( default_name.empty() ) {
7279 default_name = mgr.get_name_from_type( id );
7280 }
7281 const auto maybe_name = mgr.query_name( default_name );
7282 if( !maybe_name.has_value() ) {
7283 break;
7284 }
7285 const std::string &name = maybe_name.value();
7286
7287 const auto position = query_position( true );
7288 if( !position ) {
7289 break;
7290 }
7291
7292 //add a zone that is relative to the avatar position
7293 // TODO: fix point types
7294 mgr.add( name, id, get_player_character().get_faction()->id, false, true,
7295 position->first, position->second, options, true );
7296 zones = get_zones();
7297 active_index = zone_cnt - 1;
7298
7299 int vehicle_zones = 0;
7300 for( zone_manager::ref_zone_data zone : zones ) {
7301 if( zone.get().get_is_vehicle() ) {
7302 vehicle_zones++;
7303 }
7304 }
7305
7306 active_index -= vehicle_zones;
7307
7308 stuff_changed = true;
7309 } while( false );
7310
7311 blink = false;
7312 } else if( action == "SHOW_ALL_ZONES" ) {
7313 show_all_zones = !show_all_zones;
7314 zones = get_zones();
7315 active_index = 0;
7316 } else if( action == "CHANGE_FACTION" ) {
7317 ui.invalidate_ui();
7318 std::string facname = zones_faction.str();
7319 string_input_popup()
7320 .description( _( "Show zones for faction:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Show zones for faction:" ) )
) )
7321 .width( 55 )
7322 .max_length( 256 )
7323 .edit( facname );
7324 zones_faction = faction_id( facname );
7325 zones = get_zones();
7326 } else if( action == "QUIT" ) {
7327 if( stuff_changed ) {
7328 const query_ynq_result res = query_ynq( _( "Save changes?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Save changes?" ) ) ) );
7329 switch( res ) {
7330 case query_ynq_result::quit:
7331 break;
7332 case query_ynq_result::no:
7333 save = false;
7334 quit = true;
7335 break;
7336 case query_ynq_result::yes:
7337 save = true;
7338 quit = true;
7339 break;
7340 }
7341 } else {
7342 save = false;
7343 quit = true;
7344 }
7345 } else if( zone_cnt > 0 ) {
7346 if( navigate_ui_list( action, active_index, scroll_rate, zone_cnt, true ) ) {
7347 blink = false;
7348 } else if( action == "REMOVE_ZONE" ) {
7349 if( active_index < zone_cnt ) {
7350 mgr.remove( zones[active_index] );
7351 zones = get_zones();
7352 active_index--;
7353
7354 if( active_index < 0 ) {
7355 active_index = 0;
7356 }
7357 }
7358 blink = false;
7359 stuff_changed = true;
7360
7361 } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
7362 zone_data &zone = zones[active_index].get();
7363
7364 uilist as_m;
7365 as_m.text = _( "What do you want to change:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "What do you want to change:"
) ) );
7366 as_m.entries.emplace_back( 1, true, '1', _( "Edit name" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Edit name" ) ) ) );
7367 as_m.entries.emplace_back( 2, true, '2', _( "Edit type" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Edit type" ) ) ) );
7368 as_m.entries.emplace_back( 3, zone.get_options().has_options(), '3',
7369 zone.get_type() == zone_type_LOOT_CUSTOM ? _( "Edit filter" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Edit filter" ) ) ) : _( "Edit options" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Edit options" ) ) ) );
7370 as_m.entries.emplace_back( 4, !zone.get_is_vehicle(), '4', _( "Edit position" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Edit position" ) ) ) );
7371 as_m.entries.emplace_back( 5, !zone.get_is_vehicle(), '5', _( "Move position" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Move position" ) ) ) );
7372 as_m.query();
7373
7374 switch( as_m.ret ) {
7375 case 1:
7376 if( zone.set_name() ) {
7377 stuff_changed = true;
7378 }
7379 break;
7380 case 2:
7381 if( zone.set_type() ) {
7382 stuff_changed = true;
7383 }
7384 break;
7385 case 3:
7386 if( zone.get_options().query() ) {
7387 stuff_changed = true;
7388 }
7389 break;
7390 case 4: {
7391 const auto pos = query_position( zone.get_is_personal() );
7392 // FIXME: this comparison is nonsensival in the
7393 // personal zone case because it's between different
7394 // coordinate systems.
7395 if( pos && ( pos->first != zone.get_start_point().raw() ||
7396 pos->second != zone.get_end_point().raw() ) ) {
7397 zone.set_position( *pos );
7398 stuff_changed = true;
7399 }
7400 break;
7401 }
7402 case 5: {
7403 on_out_of_scope invalidate_current_ui( [&]() {
7404 ui.mark_resize();
7405 } );
7406 restore_on_out_of_scope<bool> show_prev( show );
7407 restore_on_out_of_scope<std::optional<tripoint>> zone_start_prev( zone_start );
7408 restore_on_out_of_scope<std::optional<tripoint>> zone_end_prev( zone_end );
7409 show = false;
7410 zone_start = std::nullopt;
7411 zone_end = std::nullopt;
7412 ui.mark_resize();
7413 static_popup message_pop;
7414 message_pop.on_top( true );
7415 message_pop.message( "%s", _( "Moving zone." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Moving zone." ) ) ) );
7416 const tripoint zone_local_start_point = m.getlocal( zone.get_start_point() );
7417 const tripoint zone_local_end_point = m.getlocal( zone.get_end_point() );
7418 // local position of the zone center, used to calculate the u.view_offset,
7419 // could center the screen to the position it represents
7420 tripoint view_center = m.getlocal( zone.get_center_point() );
7421 const look_around_result result_local = look_around( false, view_center,
7422 zone_local_start_point, false, false,
7423 false, true, zone_local_end_point );
7424 if( result_local.position ) {
7425 const tripoint_abs_ms new_start_point = m.getglobal( *result_local.position );
7426 const tripoint_abs_ms new_end_point = zone.get_end_point() - zone.get_start_point() +
7427 new_start_point;
7428 if( new_start_point == zone.get_start_point() ) {
7429 break; // Nothing changed, don't save
7430 }
7431 if( zone.get_is_personal() ) {
7432 const tripoint_rel_ms new_start_point_rl = new_start_point - u.get_location();
7433 const tripoint_rel_ms new_end_point_rl = new_end_point - u.get_location();
7434 zone.set_position( std::make_pair( new_start_point_rl.raw(), new_end_point_rl.raw() ) );
7435 } else {
7436 zone.set_position( std::make_pair( new_start_point.raw(), new_end_point.raw() ) );
7437 }
7438 stuff_changed = true;
7439 }
7440 }
7441 break;
7442 default:
7443 break;
7444 }
7445
7446 blink = false;
7447 } else if( action == "MOVE_ZONE_UP" && zone_cnt > 1 ) {
7448 if( active_index < zone_cnt - 1 ) {
7449 mgr.swap( zones[active_index], zones[active_index + 1] );
7450 zones = get_zones();
7451 active_index++;
7452 }
7453 blink = false;
7454 stuff_changed = true;
7455
7456 } else if( action == "MOVE_ZONE_DOWN" && zone_cnt > 1 ) {
7457 if( active_index > 0 ) {
7458 mgr.swap( zones[active_index], zones[active_index - 1] );
7459 zones = get_zones();
7460 active_index--;
7461 }
7462 blink = false;
7463 stuff_changed = true;
7464
7465 } else if( action == "SHOW_ZONE_ON_MAP" ) {
7466 //show zone position on overmap;
7467 tripoint_abs_omt player_overmap_position = u.global_omt_location();
7468 tripoint_abs_omt zone_overmap =
7469 project_to<coords::omt>( zones[active_index].get().get_center_point() );
7470
7471 ui::omap::display_zones( player_overmap_position, zone_overmap, active_index );
7472 } else if( action == "ENABLE_ZONE" ) {
7473 zones[active_index].get().set_enabled( true );
7474
7475 stuff_changed = true;
7476
7477 } else if( action == "DISABLE_ZONE" ) {
7478 zones[active_index].get().set_enabled( false );
7479
7480 stuff_changed = true;
7481
7482 } else if( action == "TOGGLE_ZONE_DISPLAY" ) {
7483 zones[active_index].get().toggle_display();
7484 stuff_changed = true;
7485
7486 } else if( action == "ENABLE_PERSONAL_ZONES" ) {
7487 bool zones_changed = false;
7488
7489 for( const auto &i : zones ) {
7490 zone_data &zone = i.get();
7491 if( zone.get_enabled() ) {
7492 continue;
7493 }
7494 if( zone.get_is_personal() ) {
7495 zone.set_enabled( true );
7496 zones_changed = true;
7497 }
7498 }
7499
7500 stuff_changed = zones_changed;
7501 } else if( action == "DISABLE_PERSONAL_ZONES" ) {
7502 bool zones_changed = false;
7503
7504 for( const auto &i : zones ) {
7505 zone_data &zone = i.get();
7506 if( !zone.get_enabled() ) {
7507 continue;
7508 }
7509 if( zone.get_is_personal() ) {
7510 zone.set_enabled( false );
7511 zones_changed = true;
7512 }
7513 }
7514
7515 stuff_changed = zones_changed;
7516 }
7517 }
7518 }
7519 zones_manager_open = false;
7520 ctxt.reset_timeout();
7521 zone_cb = nullptr;
7522
7523 if( stuff_changed ) {
7524 zone_manager &zones = zone_manager::get_manager();
7525 if( !save ) {
7526 zones.load_zones( "zmgr-temp" );
7527 }
7528
7529 zones.cache_data();
7530 }
7531
7532 u.view_offset = stored_view_offset;
7533}
7534
7535void game::pre_print_all_tile_info( const tripoint &lp, const catacurses::window &w_info,
7536 int &first_line, const int last_line,
7537 const visibility_variables &cache )
7538{
7539 // get global area info according to look_around caret position
7540 // TODO: fix point types
7541 const oter_id &cur_ter_m = overmap_buffer.ter( tripoint_abs_omt( ms_to_omt_copy( m.getabs(
7542 lp ) ) ) );
7543 // we only need the area name and then pass it to print_all_tile_info() function below
7544 const std::string area_name = cur_ter_m->get_name();
7545 print_all_tile_info( lp, w_info, area_name, 1, first_line, last_line, cache );
7546}
7547
7548std::optional<std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms>> game::safe_route_to( Character &who,
7549 const tripoint_bub_ms &target, int threshold,
7550 const std::function<void( const std::string &msg )> &report ) const
7551{
7552 map &here = get_map();
7553 if( !who.sees( target ) ) {
7554 report( _( "You can't see the destination." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't see the destination."
) ) ) );
7555 return std::nullopt;
7556 }
7557 if( rl_dist( who.pos_bub(), target ) <= threshold ) {
7558 return {}; // no need to move anywhere, already near destination
7559 }
7560 using route_t = std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms>;
7561 const auto get_shorter_route = [&who]( const route_t &a, const route_t &b ) {
7562 if( a.empty() ) {
7563 return b; // if route is empty return the non-empty one
7564 } else if( b.empty() ) {
7565 return a; // if route is empty return the non-empty one
7566 } else if( a.size() != b.size() ) {
7567 return a.size() < b.size() ? a : b; // if both non empty return shortest length in tiles
7568 } else {
7569 // if both are equal length in tiles return the one closest to target
7570 const float dist_a = rl_dist_exact( who.pos_bub().raw(), a.back().raw() );
7571 const float dist_b = rl_dist_exact( who.pos_bub().raw(), b.back().raw() );
7572 return dist_a < dist_b ? a : b;
7573 }
7574 };
7575 route_t shortest_route;
7576 std::unordered_set<tripoint> path_avoid;
7577 for( const tripoint_bub_ms &p : points_in_radius( who.pos_bub(), 60 ) ) {
7578 if( is_dangerous_tile( p.raw() ) ) {
7579 path_avoid.insert( p.raw() );
7580 }
7581 }
7582 for( const tripoint_bub_ms &p : here.points_in_radius( target, threshold, 0 ) ) {
7583 if( path_avoid.count( p.raw() ) > 0 ) {
7584 continue; // dont route to dangerous tiles
7585 }
7586 const route_t route = here.route( who.pos_bub(), p, who.get_pathfinding_settings(), path_avoid );
7587 if( route.empty() ) {
7588 continue; // no route
7589 }
7590 shortest_route = get_shorter_route( shortest_route, route );
7591 }
7592 if( shortest_route.empty() ) {
7593 report( _( "You can't travel there." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't travel there." ) )
) );
7594 return std::nullopt;
7595 }
7596 return shortest_route;
7597}
7598
7599std::optional<tripoint> game::look_around()
7600{
7601 tripoint center = u.pos() + u.view_offset;
7602 look_around_result result = look_around( /*show_window=*/true, center, center, false, false,
7603 false );
7604 return result.position;
7605}
7606
7607//look_around_result game::look_around( const bool show_window, tripoint &center,
7608// const tripoint &start_point, bool has_first_point, bool select_zone, bool peeking )
7609look_around_result game::look_around(
7610 const bool show_window, tripoint &center, const tripoint &start_point, bool has_first_point,
7611 bool select_zone, bool peeking, bool is_moving_zone, const tripoint &end_point, bool change_lv )
7612{
7613 bVMonsterLookFire = false;
7614
7615 temp_exit_fullscreen();
7616
7617 // TODO: fix point types
7618 tripoint_bub_ms lp( is_moving_zone ? ( start_point + end_point ) / 2 : start_point ); // cursor
7619 int &lx = lp.x();
7620 int &ly = lp.y();
7621 int &lz = lp.z();
7622
7623 int soffset = get_option<int>( "FAST_SCROLL_OFFSET" );
7624 static bool fast_scroll = false;
7625
7626 std::unique_ptr<ui_adaptor> ui;
7627 catacurses::window w_info;
7628 if( show_window ) {
7629 ui = std::make_unique<ui_adaptor>();
7630 ui->on_screen_resize( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
7631 int panel_width = panel_manager::get_manager().get_current_layout().panels().begin()->get_width();
7632 int height = pixel_minimap_option ? TERMY - getmaxy( w_pixel_minimap ) : TERMY;
7633
7634 // If particularly small, base height on panel width irrespective of other elements.
7635 // Value here is attempting to get a square-ish result assuming 1x2 proportioned font.
7636 if( height < panel_width / 2 ) {
7637 height = panel_width / 2;
7638 }
7639
7640 int la_y = 0;
7641 int la_x = TERMX - panel_width;
7642 std::string position = get_option<std::string>( "LOOKAROUND_POSITION" );
7643 if( position == "left" ) {
7644 if( get_option<std::string>( "SIDEBAR_POSITION" ) == "right" ) {
7645 la_x = panel_manager::get_manager().get_width_left();
7646 } else {
7647 la_x = panel_manager::get_manager().get_width_left() - panel_width;
7648 }
7649 }
7650 int la_h = height;
7651 int la_w = panel_width;
7652 w_info = catacurses::newwin( la_h, la_w, point( la_x, la_y ) );
7653
7654 ui.position_from_window( w_info );
7655 } );
7656 ui->mark_resize();
7657 }
7658
7659 dbg( D_PEDANTIC_INFO )DebugLog((D_PEDANTIC_INFO),D_GAME) << "/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
<< ":" << 7659 << ": " << ": calling handle_input()";
7660
7661 std::string action;
7662 input_context ctxt( "LOOK" );
7663 ctxt.set_iso( true );
7664 ctxt.register_directions();
7665 ctxt.register_action( "COORDINATE" );
7666 if( change_lv && fov_3d_z_range > 0 ) {
7667 ctxt.register_action( "LEVEL_UP" );
7668 ctxt.register_action( "LEVEL_DOWN" );
7669 }
7670 ctxt.register_action( "TOGGLE_FAST_SCROLL" );
7671 ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_MONSTER_NAME" );
7672 ctxt.register_action( "EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION" );
7673 ctxt.register_action( "SELECT" );
7674 if( peeking ) {
7675 ctxt.register_action( "throw_blind" );
7676 }
7677 if( !select_zone ) {
7678 ctxt.register_action( "TRAVEL_TO" );
7679 ctxt.register_action( "LIST_ITEMS" );
7680 }
7681 ctxt.register_action( "MOUSE_MOVE" );
7682 ctxt.register_action( "CENTER" );
7683
7684 ctxt.register_action( "debug_scent" );
7685 ctxt.register_action( "debug_scent_type" );
7686 ctxt.register_action( "debug_temp" );
7687 ctxt.register_action( "debug_visibility" );
7688 ctxt.register_action( "debug_lighting" );
7689 ctxt.register_action( "debug_radiation" );
7690 ctxt.register_action( "debug_hour_timer" );
7691 ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
7692 ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
7693 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
7694 ctxt.register_action( "zoom_out" );
7695 ctxt.register_action( "zoom_in" );
7696 ctxt.register_action( "toggle_pixel_minimap" );
7697
7698 const int old_levz = m.get_abs_sub().z();
7699 const int min_levz = std::max( old_levz - fov_3d_z_range, -OVERMAP_DEPTH );
7700 const int max_levz = std::min( old_levz + fov_3d_z_range, OVERMAP_HEIGHT - 1 );
7701
7702 m.update_visibility_cache( old_levz );
7703 const visibility_variables &cache = m.get_visibility_variables_cache();
7704
7705 bool blink = true;
7706 look_around_result result;
7707
7708 shared_ptr_fast<draw_callback_t> ter_indicator_cb;
7709
7710 if( show_window && ui ) {
7711 ui->on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
7712 werase( w_info );
7713 draw_border( w_info );
7714
7715 center_print( w_info, 0, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), string_format( _( "< <color_green>Look around</color> >" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "< <color_green>Look around</color> >"
) ) ) ) );
7716
7717 creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
7718 monster *const mon = creatures.creature_at<monster>( lp, true );
7719 if( mon && u.sees( *mon ) ) {
7720 std::string mon_name_text = string_format( _( "%s - %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s - %s" ) ) ),
7721 ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_MONSTER_NAME" ),
7722 ctxt.get_action_name( "CHANGE_MONSTER_NAME" ) );
7723 mvwprintz( w_info, point( 1, getmaxy( w_info ) - 2 ), c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red), mon_name_text );
7724 }
7725
7726 std::string fast_scroll_text = string_format( _( "%s - %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s - %s" ) ) ),
7727 ctxt.get_desc( "TOGGLE_FAST_SCROLL" ),
7728 ctxt.get_action_name( "TOGGLE_FAST_SCROLL" ) );
7729 mvwprintz( w_info, point( 1, getmaxy( w_info ) - 1 ), fast_scroll ? c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) : c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green),
7730 fast_scroll_text );
7731
7732 if( !ctxt.keys_bound_to( "toggle_pixel_minimap" ).empty() ) {
7733 std::string pixel_minimap_text = string_format( _( "%s - %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s - %s" ) ) ),
7734 ctxt.get_desc( "toggle_pixel_minimap" ),
7735 ctxt.get_action_name( "toggle_pixel_minimap" ) );
7736 right_print( w_info, getmaxy( w_info ) - 1, 1, pixel_minimap_option ? c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) : c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green),
7737 pixel_minimap_text );
7738 }
7739
7740 int first_line = 1;
7741 const int last_line = getmaxy( w_info ) - 2;
7742 // TODO: fix point types
7743 pre_print_all_tile_info( lp.raw(), w_info, first_line, last_line, cache );
7744
7745 wnoutrefresh( w_info );
7746 } );
7747 ter_indicator_cb = make_shared_fast<draw_callback_t>( [&]() {
7748 // TODO: fix point types
7749 draw_look_around_cursor( lp.raw(), cache );
7750 } );
7751 add_draw_callback( ter_indicator_cb );
7752 }
7753
7754 std::optional<tripoint> zone_start;
7755 std::optional<tripoint> zone_end;
7756 bool zone_blink = false;
7757 bool zone_cursor = true;
7758 shared_ptr_fast<draw_callback_t> zone_cb = create_zone_callback( zone_start, zone_end, zone_blink,
7759 zone_cursor, is_moving_zone );
7760 add_draw_callback( zone_cb );
7761
7762 is_looking = true;
7763 const tripoint prev_offset = u.view_offset;
7764#if defined(TILES)
7765 const int prev_tileset_zoom = tileset_zoom;
7766 while( is_moving_zone && square_dist( start_point, end_point ) > 256 / get_zoom() &&
7767 get_zoom() != 4 ) {
7768 zoom_out();
7769 }
7770 mark_main_ui_adaptor_resize();
7771#endif
7772 do {
7773 u.view_offset = center - u.pos();
7774 if( select_zone ) {
7775 if( has_first_point ) {
7776 zone_start = start_point;
7777 // TODO: fix point types
7778 zone_end = lp.raw();
7779 } else {
7780 // TODO: fix point types
7781 zone_start = lp.raw();
7782 zone_end = std::nullopt;
7783 }
7784 // Actually accessed from the terrain overlay callback `zone_cb` in the
7785 // call to `ui_manager::redraw`.
7786 //NOLINTNEXTLINE(clang-analyzer-deadcode.DeadStores)
7787 zone_blink = blink;
7788 }
7789
7790 if( is_moving_zone ) {
7791 // TODO: fix point types
7792 zone_start = lp.raw() - ( start_point + end_point ) / 2 + start_point;
7793 // TODO: fix point types
7794 zone_end = lp.raw() - ( start_point + end_point ) / 2 + end_point;
7795 // Actually accessed from the terrain overlay callback `zone_cb` in the
7796 // call to `ui_manager::redraw`.
7797 //NOLINTNEXTLINE(clang-analyzer-deadcode.DeadStores)
7798 zone_blink = blink;
7799 }
7800#if defined(TILES)
7801 // Mark cata_tiles draw caches as dirty
7802 tilecontext->set_draw_cache_dirty();
7803#endif
7804 invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
7805 ui_manager::redraw();
7806
7807 if( ( select_zone && has_first_point ) || is_moving_zone ) {
7808 ctxt.set_timeout( get_option<int>( "BLINK_SPEED" ) );
7809 }
7810
7811 //Wait for input
7812 // only specify a timeout here if "EDGE_SCROLL" is enabled
7813 // otherwise use the previously set timeout
7814 const tripoint edge_scroll = mouse_edge_scrolling_terrain( ctxt );
7815 const int scroll_timeout = get_option<int>( "EDGE_SCROLL" );
7816 const bool edge_scrolling = edge_scroll != tripoint_zero && scroll_timeout >= 0;
7817 if( edge_scrolling ) {
7818 action = ctxt.handle_input( scroll_timeout );
7819 } else {
7820 action = ctxt.handle_input();
7821 }
7822 if( ( action == "LEVEL_UP" || action == "LEVEL_DOWN" || action == "MOUSE_MOVE" ||
7823 ctxt.get_direction( action ) ) && ( ( select_zone && has_first_point ) || is_moving_zone ) ) {
7824 blink = true; // Always draw blink symbols when moving cursor
7825 } else if( action == "TIMEOUT" ) {
7826 blink = !blink;
7827 }
7828 if( action == "LIST_ITEMS" ) {
7829 list_items_monsters();
7830 } else if( action == "TOGGLE_FAST_SCROLL" ) {
7831 fast_scroll = !fast_scroll;
7832 } else if( action == "toggle_pixel_minimap" ) {
7833 toggle_pixel_minimap();
7834
7835 if( show_window && ui ) {
7836 ui->mark_resize();
7837 }
7838 } else if( action == "LEVEL_UP" || action == "LEVEL_DOWN" ) {
7839 const int dz = action == "LEVEL_UP" ? 1 : -1;
7840 lz = clamp( lz + dz, min_levz, max_levz );
7841 center.z = clamp( center.z + dz, min_levz, max_levz );
7842
7843 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_GAME, "levx: %d, levy: %d, levz: %d",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "levx: %d, levy: %d, levz: %d"
, get_map().get_abs_sub().x(), get_map().get_abs_sub().y(), center
.z ) ) ); } } while( false )
7844 get_map().get_abs_sub().x(), get_map().get_abs_sub().y(), center.z )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "levx: %d, levy: %d, levz: %d"
, get_map().get_abs_sub().x(), get_map().get_abs_sub().y(), center
.z ) ) ); } } while( false );
7845 u.view_offset.z = center.z - u.posz();
7846 m.invalidate_map_cache( center.z );
7847 // Fix player character not visible from above
7848 m.build_map_cache( u.posz() );
7849 m.invalidate_visibility_cache();
7850 } else if( action == "TRAVEL_TO" ) {
7851 const std::optional<std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms>> try_route = safe_route_to( u, lp,
7852 0, []( const std::string & msg ) {
7853 add_msg( msg );
7854 } );
7855 if( try_route.has_value() ) {
7856 u.set_destination( *try_route );
7857 continue;
7858 }
7859 } else if( action == "debug_scent" || action == "debug_scent_type" ) {
7860 if( !MAP_SHARING::isCompetitive() || MAP_SHARING::isDebugger() ) {
7861 display_scent();
7862 }
7863 } else if( action == "debug_temp" ) {
7864 if( !MAP_SHARING::isCompetitive() || MAP_SHARING::isDebugger() ) {
7865 display_temperature();
7866 }
7867 } else if( action == "debug_lighting" ) {
7868 if( !MAP_SHARING::isCompetitive() || MAP_SHARING::isDebugger() ) {
7869 display_lighting();
7870 }
7871 } else if( action == "debug_transparency" ) {
7872 if( !MAP_SHARING::isCompetitive() || MAP_SHARING::isDebugger() ) {
7873 display_transparency();
7874 }
7875 } else if( action == "debug_radiation" ) {
7876 if( !MAP_SHARING::isCompetitive() || MAP_SHARING::isDebugger() ) {
7877 display_radiation();
7878 }
7879 } else if( action == "debug_hour_timer" ) {
7880 toggle_debug_hour_timer();
7881 } else if( action == "EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION" ) {
7882 // TODO: fix point types
7883 extended_description( lp.raw() );
7884 } else if( action == "CHANGE_MONSTER_NAME" ) {
7885 creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
7886 monster *const mon = creatures.creature_at<monster>( lp, true );
7887 if( mon ) {
7888 string_input_popup popup;
7889 popup
7890 .title( _( "Nickname:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Nickname:" ) ) ) )
7891 .width( 85 )
7892 .edit( mon->nickname );
7893 }
7894 } else if( action == "CENTER" ) {
7895 center = u.pos();
7896 lp = u.pos_bub();
7897 u.view_offset.z = 0;
7898 } else if( action == "MOUSE_MOVE" || action == "TIMEOUT" ) {
7899 // This block is structured this way so that edge scroll can work
7900 // whether the mouse is moving at the edge or simply stationary
7901 // at the edge. But even if edge scroll isn't in play, there's
7902 // other things for us to do here.
7903
7904 if( edge_scrolling ) {
7905 center += action == "MOUSE_MOVE" ? edge_scroll * 2 : edge_scroll;
7906 } else if( action == "MOUSE_MOVE" ) {
7907 const std::optional<tripoint> mouse_pos = ctxt.get_coordinates( w_terrain, ter_view_p.xy(), true );
7908 if( mouse_pos ) {
7909 lx = mouse_pos->x;
7910 ly = mouse_pos->y;
7911 }
7912 }
7913 } else if( std::optional<tripoint> vec = ctxt.get_direction( action ) ) {
7914 if( fast_scroll ) {
7915 vec->x *= soffset;
7916 vec->y *= soffset;
7917 }
7918
7919 lx = lx + vec->x;
7920 ly = ly + vec->y;
7921 center.x = center.x + vec->x;
7922 center.y = center.y + vec->y;
7923 } else if( action == "throw_blind" ) {
7924 result.peek_action = PA_BLIND_THROW;
7925 } else if( action == "zoom_in" ) {
7926 // TODO: fix point types
7927 center.x = lp.x();
7928 center.y = lp.y();
7929 zoom_in();
7930 mark_main_ui_adaptor_resize();
7931 } else if( action == "zoom_out" ) {
7932 // TODO: fix point types
7933 center.x = lp.x();
7934 center.y = lp.y();
7935 zoom_out();
7936 mark_main_ui_adaptor_resize();
7937 }
7938 } while( action != "QUIT" && action != "CONFIRM" && action != "SELECT" && action != "TRAVEL_TO" &&
7939 action != "throw_blind" );
7940
7941 if( center.z != old_levz ) {
7942 m.invalidate_map_cache( old_levz );
7943 m.build_map_cache( old_levz );
7944 u.view_offset.z = 0;
7945 }
7946
7947 ctxt.reset_timeout();
7948 u.view_offset = prev_offset;
7949 zone_cb = nullptr;
7950 is_looking = false;
7951
7952 reenter_fullscreen();
7953 bVMonsterLookFire = true;
7954
7955 if( action == "CONFIRM" || action == "SELECT" ) {
7956 // TODO: fix point types
7957 result.position = is_moving_zone ? zone_start : lp.raw();
7958 }
7959
7960#if defined(TILES)
7961 if( is_moving_zone && get_zoom() != prev_tileset_zoom ) {
7962 // Reset the tileset zoom to the previous value
7963 set_zoom( prev_tileset_zoom );
7964 mark_main_ui_adaptor_resize();
7965 }
7966#endif
7967
7968 return result;
7969}
7970
7971look_around_result game::look_around( look_around_params looka_params )
7972{
7973 return look_around( looka_params.show_window, looka_params.center, looka_params.start_point,
7974 looka_params.has_first_point, looka_params.select_zone, looka_params.peeking, false, tripoint_zero,
7975 looka_params.change_lv );
7976}
7977
7978static void add_item_recursive( std::vector<std::string> &item_order,
7979 std::map<std::string, map_item_stack> &temp_items, const item *it, const tripoint &relative_pos )
7980{
7981 const std::string name = it->tname();
7982
7983 if( std::find( item_order.begin(), item_order.end(), name ) == item_order.end() ) {
7984 item_order.push_back( name );
7985 temp_items[name] = map_item_stack( it, relative_pos );
7986 } else {
7987 temp_items[name].add_at_pos( it, relative_pos );
7988 }
7989
7990 for( const item *content : it->all_known_contents() ) {
7991 add_item_recursive( item_order, temp_items, content, relative_pos );
7992 }
7993}
7994
7995std::vector<map_item_stack> game::find_nearby_items( int iRadius )
7996{
7997 std::map<std::string, map_item_stack> temp_items;
7998 std::vector<map_item_stack> ret;
7999 std::vector<std::string> item_order;
8000
8001 if( u.is_blind() ) {
8002 return ret;
8003 }
8004
8005 for( tripoint &points_p_it : closest_points_first( u.pos(), iRadius ) ) {
8006 if( points_p_it.y >= u.posy() - iRadius && points_p_it.y <= u.posy() + iRadius &&
8007 u.sees( points_p_it ) &&
8008 m.sees_some_items( points_p_it, u ) ) {
8009
8010 for( item &elem : m.i_at( points_p_it ) ) {
8011 const tripoint relative_pos = points_p_it - u.pos();
8012
8013 add_item_recursive( item_order, temp_items, &elem, relative_pos );
8014 }
8015 }
8016 }
8017
8018 for( auto &elem : item_order ) {
8019 ret.push_back( temp_items[elem] );
8020 }
8021
8022 return ret;
8023}
8024
8025void draw_trail( const tripoint &start, const tripoint &end, const bool bDrawX )
8026{
8027 std::vector<tripoint> pts;
8028 avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
8029 tripoint center = player_character.pos() + player_character.view_offset;
8030 if( start != end ) {
8031 //Draw trail
8032 pts = line_to( start, end, 0, 0 );
8033 } else {
8034 //Draw point
8035 pts.emplace_back( start );
8036 }
8037
8038 g->draw_line( end, center, pts );
8039 if( bDrawX ) {
8040 char sym = 'X';
8041 if( end.z > center.z ) {
8042 sym = '^';
8043 } else if( end.z < center.z ) {
8044 sym = 'v';
8045 }
8046 if( pts.empty() ) {
8047 mvwputch( g->w_terrain, point( POSX, POSY ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), sym );
8048 } else {
8049 mvwputch( g->w_terrain, pts.back().xy() - player_character.view_offset.xy() +
8050 point( POSX - player_character.posx(), POSY - player_character.posy() ),
8051 c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), sym );
8052 }
8053 }
8054}
8055
8056void game::draw_trail_to_square( const tripoint &t, bool bDrawX )
8057{
8058 ::draw_trail( u.pos(), u.pos() + t, bDrawX );
8059}
8060
8061static void centerlistview( const tripoint &active_item_position, int ui_width )
8062{
8063 Character &u = get_avatar();
8064 if( get_option<std::string>( "SHIFT_LIST_ITEM_VIEW" ) != "false" ) {
8065 u.view_offset.z = active_item_position.z;
8066 if( get_option<std::string>( "SHIFT_LIST_ITEM_VIEW" ) == "centered" ) {
8067 u.view_offset.x = active_item_position.x;
8068 u.view_offset.y = active_item_position.y;
8069 } else {
8070 point pos( active_item_position.xy() + point( POSX, POSY ) );
8071
8072 // item/monster list UI is on the right, so get the difference between its width
8073 // and the width of the sidebar on the right (if any)
8074 int sidebar_right_adjusted = ui_width - panel_manager::get_manager().get_width_right();
8075 // if and only if that difference is greater than zero, use that as offset
8076 int right_offset = sidebar_right_adjusted > 0 ? sidebar_right_adjusted : 0;
8077
8078 // Convert offset to tile counts, calculate adjusted terrain window width
8079 // This lets us account for possible differences in terrain width between
8080 // the normal sidebar and the list-all-whatever display.
8081 to_map_font_dim_width( right_offset );
8082 int terrain_width = TERRAIN_WINDOW_WIDTH - right_offset;
8083
8084 if( pos.x < 0 ) {
8085 u.view_offset.x = pos.x;
8086 } else if( pos.x >= terrain_width ) {
8087 u.view_offset.x = pos.x - ( terrain_width - 1 );
8088 } else {
8089 u.view_offset.x = 0;
8090 }
8091
8092 if( pos.y < 0 ) {
8093 u.view_offset.y = pos.y;
8094 } else if( pos.y >= TERRAIN_WINDOW_HEIGHT ) {
8095 u.view_offset.y = pos.y - ( TERRAIN_WINDOW_HEIGHT - 1 );
8096 } else {
8097 u.view_offset.y = 0;
8098 }
8099 }
8100 }
8101
8102}
8103
8104#if defined(TILES)
8105static constexpr int MAXIMUM_ZOOM_LEVEL = 4;
8106#endif
8107void game::zoom_out()
8108{
8109#if defined(TILES)
8110 if( tileset_zoom > MAXIMUM_ZOOM_LEVEL ) {
8111 tileset_zoom = tileset_zoom / 2;
8112 } else {
8113 tileset_zoom = 64;
8114 }
8115 rescale_tileset( tileset_zoom );
8116#endif
8117}
8118
8119void game::zoom_out_overmap()
8120{
8121#if defined(TILES)
8122 if( overmap_tileset_zoom > MAXIMUM_ZOOM_LEVEL ) {
8123 overmap_tileset_zoom /= 2;
8124 } else {
8125 overmap_tileset_zoom = 64;
8126 }
8127 overmap_tilecontext->set_draw_scale( overmap_tileset_zoom );
8128#endif
8129}
8130
8131void game::zoom_in()
8132{
8133#if defined(TILES)
8134 if( tileset_zoom == 64 ) {
8135 tileset_zoom = MAXIMUM_ZOOM_LEVEL;
8136 } else {
8137 tileset_zoom = tileset_zoom * 2;
8138 }
8139 rescale_tileset( tileset_zoom );
8140#endif
8141}
8142
8143void game::zoom_in_overmap()
8144{
8145#if defined(TILES)
8146 if( overmap_tileset_zoom == 64 ) {
8147 overmap_tileset_zoom = MAXIMUM_ZOOM_LEVEL;
8148 } else {
8149 overmap_tileset_zoom *= 2;
8150 }
8151 overmap_tilecontext->set_draw_scale( overmap_tileset_zoom );
8152#endif
8153}
8154
8155void game::reset_zoom()
8156{
8157#if defined(TILES)
