8158 tileset_zoom = DEFAULT_TILESET_ZOOM;
8159 rescale_tileset( tileset_zoom );
8160#endif // TILES
8161}
8162
8163void game::set_zoom( const int level )
8164{
8165#if defined(TILES)
8166 if( tileset_zoom != level ) {
8167 tileset_zoom = level;
8168 rescale_tileset( tileset_zoom );
8169 }
8170#else
8171 static_cast<void>( level );
8172#endif // TILES
8173}
8174
8175int game::get_zoom() const
8176{
8177#if defined(TILES)
8178 return tileset_zoom;
8179#else
8180 return DEFAULT_TILESET_ZOOM;
8181#endif
8182}
8183
8184int game::get_moves_since_last_save() const
8185{
8186 return moves_since_last_save;
8187}
8188
8189int game::get_user_action_counter() const
8190{
8191 return user_action_counter;
8192}
8193
8194#if defined(TILES)
8195bool game::take_screenshot( const std::string &path ) const
8196{
8197 return save_screenshot( path );
8198}
8199
8200bool game::take_screenshot() const
8201{
8202 // check that the current '<world>/screenshots' directory exists
8203 std::stringstream map_directory;
8204 map_directory << PATH_INFO::world_base_save_path() << "/screenshots/";
8205 assure_dir_exist( map_directory.str() );
8206
8207 // build file name: <map_dir>/screenshots/[<character_name>]_<date>.png
8208 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-translate-string-literal)
8209 const std::string tmp_file_name = string_format( "[%s]_%s.png", get_player_character().get_name(),
8210 timestamp_now() );
8211
8212 std::string file_name = ensure_valid_file_name( tmp_file_name );
8213 auto current_file_path = map_directory.str() + file_name;
8214
8215 // Take a screenshot of the viewport.
8216 if( take_screenshot( current_file_path ) ) {
8217 popup( _( "Successfully saved your screenshot to: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Successfully saved your screenshot to: %s"
) ) ), map_directory.str() );
8218 return true;
8219 } else {
8220 popup( _( "An error occurred while trying to save the screenshot." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "An error occurred while trying to save the screenshot."
) ) ) );
8221 return false;
8222 }
8223}
8224#else
8225bool game::take_screenshot( const std::string &/*path*/ ) const
8226{
8227 return false;
8228}
8229
8230bool game::take_screenshot() const
8231{
8232 popup( _( "This binary was not compiled with tiles support." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This binary was not compiled with tiles support."
) ) ) );
8233 return false;
8234}
8235#endif
8236
8237//helper method so we can keep list_items shorter
8238void game::reset_item_list_state( const catacurses::window &window, int height, bool bRadiusSort )
8239{
8240 const int width = getmaxx( window );
8241 for( int i = 1; i < TERMX; i++ ) {
8242 if( i < width ) {
8243 mvwputch( window, point( i, 0 ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_OXOX4194417 ); // -
8244 mvwputch( window, point( i, TERMY - height - 1 ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
8245 LINE_OXOX4194417 ); // -
8246 }
8247
8248 if( i < TERMY - height ) {
8249 mvwputch( window, point( 0, i ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_XOXO4194424 ); // |
8250 mvwputch( window, point( width - 1, i ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_XOXO4194424 ); // |
8251 }
8252 }
8253
8254 mvwputch( window, point_zero, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_OXXO4194412 ); // |^
8255 mvwputch( window, point( width - 1, 0 ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), LINE_OOXX4194411 ); // ^|
8256
8257 mvwputch( window, point( 0, TERMY - height - 1 ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
8258 LINE_XXXO4194420 ); // |-
8259 mvwputch( window, point( width - 1, TERMY - height - 1 ), c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
8260 LINE_XOXX4194421 ); // -|
8261
8262 mvwprintz( window, point( 2, 0 ), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green), "<Tab> " );
8263 wprintz( window, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Items" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Items" ) ) ) );
8264
8265 std::string sSort;
8266 if( bRadiusSort ) {
8267 //~ Sort type: distance.
8268 sSort = _( "<s>ort: dist" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<s>ort: dist" ) ) );
8269 } else {
8270 //~ Sort type: category.
8271 sSort = _( "<s>ort: cat" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<s>ort: cat" ) ) );
8272 }
8273
8274 int letters = utf8_width( sSort );
8275
8276 shortcut_print( window, point( getmaxx( window ) - letters, 0 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green), sSort );
8277
8278 std::vector<std::string> tokens;
8279 if( !sFilter.empty() ) {
8280 tokens.emplace_back( _( "<R>eset" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<R>eset" ) ) ) );
8281 }
8282
8283 tokens.emplace_back( _( "<E>xamine" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<E>xamine" ) ) ) );
8284 tokens.emplace_back( _( "<C>ompare" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<C>ompare" ) ) ) );
8285 tokens.emplace_back( _( "<F>ilter" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<F>ilter" ) ) ) );
8286 tokens.emplace_back( _( "<+/->Priority" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<+/->Priority" ) ) ) );
8287
8288 int gaps = tokens.size() + 1;
8289 letters = 0;
8290 int n = tokens.size();
8291 for( int i = 0; i < n; i++ ) {
8292 letters += utf8_width( tokens[i] ) - 2; //length ignores < >
8293 }
8294
8295 int usedwidth = letters;
8296 const int gap_spaces = ( width - usedwidth ) / gaps;
8297 usedwidth += gap_spaces * gaps;
8298 point pos( gap_spaces + ( width - usedwidth ) / 2, TERMY - height - 1 );
8299
8300 for( int i = 0; i < n; i++ ) {
8301 pos.x += shortcut_print( window, pos, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green),
8302 tokens[i] ) + gap_spaces;
8303 }
8304}
8305
8306void game::list_items_monsters()
8307{
8308 // Search whole reality bubble because each function internally verifies
8309 // the visibility of the items / monsters in question.
8310 std::vector<Creature *> mons = u.get_visible_creatures( 60 );
8311 const std::vector<map_item_stack> items = find_nearby_items( 60 );
8312
8313 if( mons.empty() && items.empty() ) {
8314 add_msg( m_info, _( "You don't see any items or monsters around you!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You don't see any items or monsters around you!"
) ) ) );
8315 return;
8316 }
8317
8318 std::sort( mons.begin(), mons.end(), [&]( const Creature * lhs, const Creature * rhs ) {
8319 if( !u.has_trait( trait_INATTENTIVE ) ) {
8320 const Creature::Attitude att_lhs = lhs->attitude_to( u );
8321 const Creature::Attitude att_rhs = rhs->attitude_to( u );
8322
8323 return att_lhs < att_rhs || ( att_lhs == att_rhs
8324 && rl_dist( u.pos(), lhs->pos() ) < rl_dist( u.pos(), rhs->pos() ) );
8325 } else { // Sort just by ditance if player has inattentive trait
8326 return ( rl_dist( u.pos(), lhs->pos() ) < rl_dist( u.pos(), rhs->pos() ) );
8327 }
8328
8329 } );
8330
8331 // If the current list is empty, switch to the non-empty list
8332 if( uistate.vmenu_show_items ) {
8333 if( items.empty() ) {
8334 uistate.vmenu_show_items = false;
8335 }
8336 } else if( mons.empty() ) {
8337 uistate.vmenu_show_items = true;
8338 }
8339
8340 temp_exit_fullscreen();
8341 game::vmenu_ret ret;
8342 while( true ) {
8343 ret = uistate.vmenu_show_items ? list_items( items ) : list_monsters( mons );
8344 if( ret == game::vmenu_ret::CHANGE_TAB ) {
8345 uistate.vmenu_show_items = !uistate.vmenu_show_items;
8346 } else {
8347 break;
8348 }
8349 }
8350
8351 if( ret == game::vmenu_ret::FIRE ) {
8352 avatar_action::fire_wielded_weapon( u );
8353 }
8354 reenter_fullscreen();
8355}
8356
8357static std::string list_items_filter_history_help()
8358{
8359 return colorize( _( "UP: history, CTRL-U: clear line, ESC: abort, ENTER: save" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "UP: history, CTRL-U: clear line, ESC: abort, ENTER: save"
) ) ), c_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_green) );
8360}
8361
8362game::vmenu_ret game::list_items( const std::vector<map_item_stack> &item_list )
8363{
8364 std::vector<map_item_stack> ground_items = item_list;
8365 int iInfoHeight = 0;
8366 int iMaxRows = 0;
8367 int width = 0;
8368 int max_name_width = 0;
8369
8370 //find max length of item name and resize window width
8371 for( const map_item_stack &cur_item : ground_items ) {
8372 const int item_len = utf8_width( remove_color_tags( cur_item.example->display_name() ) ) + 15;
8373 if( item_len > max_name_width ) {
8374 max_name_width = item_len;
8375 }
8376 }
8377
8378 tripoint active_pos;
8379 map_item_stack *activeItem = nullptr;
8380
8381 catacurses::window w_items;
8382 catacurses::window w_items_border;
8383 catacurses::window w_item_info;
8384
8385 ui_adaptor ui;
8386 ui.on_screen_resize( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
8387 iInfoHeight = std::min( 25, TERMY / 2 );
8388 iMaxRows = TERMY - iInfoHeight - 2;
8389
8390 width = clamp( max_name_width, 55, TERMX / 3 );
8391
8392 const int offsetX = TERMX - width;
8393
8394 w_items = catacurses::newwin( TERMY - 2 - iInfoHeight,
8395 width - 2, point( offsetX + 1, 1 ) );
8396 w_items_border = catacurses::newwin( TERMY - iInfoHeight,
8397 width, point( offsetX, 0 ) );
8398 w_item_info = catacurses::newwin( iInfoHeight, width,
8399 point( offsetX, TERMY - iInfoHeight ) );
8400
8401 if( activeItem ) {
8402 centerlistview( active_pos, width );
8403 }
8404
8405 ui.position( point( offsetX, 0 ), point( width, TERMY ) );
8406 } );
8407 ui.mark_resize();
8408
8409 // use previously selected sorting method
8410 bool sort_radius = uistate.list_item_sort != 2;
8411 bool addcategory = !sort_radius;
8412
8413 // reload filter/priority settings on the first invocation, if they were active
8414 if( !uistate.list_item_init ) {
8415 if( uistate.list_item_filter_active ) {
8416 sFilter = uistate.list_item_filter;
8417 }
8418 if( uistate.list_item_downvote_active ) {
8419 list_item_downvote = uistate.list_item_downvote;
8420 }
8421 if( uistate.list_item_priority_active ) {
8422 list_item_upvote = uistate.list_item_priority;
8423 }
8424 uistate.list_item_init = true;
8425 }
8426
8427 //this stores only those items that match our filter
8428 std::vector<map_item_stack> filtered_items =
8429 !sFilter.empty() ? filter_item_stacks( ground_items, sFilter ) : ground_items;
8430 int highPEnd = list_filter_high_priority( filtered_items, list_item_upvote );
8431 int lowPStart = list_filter_low_priority( filtered_items, highPEnd, list_item_downvote );
8432 int iItemNum = ground_items.size();
8433
8434 const tripoint stored_view_offset = u.view_offset;
8435
8436 u.view_offset = tripoint_zero;
8437
8438 int iActive = 0; // Item index that we're looking at
8439 bool refilter = true;
8440 int page_num = 0;
8441 int iCatSortNum = 0;
8442 int iScrollPos = 0;
8443 std::map<int, std::string> mSortCategory;
8444
8445 std::string action;
8446 input_context ctxt( "LIST_ITEMS" );
8447 ctxt.register_action( "UP", to_translation( "Move cursor up" ) );
8448 ctxt.register_action( "DOWN", to_translation( "Move cursor down" ) );
8449 ctxt.register_action( "LEFT", to_translation( "Previous item" ) );
8450 ctxt.register_action( "RIGHT", to_translation( "Next item" ) );
8451 ctxt.register_action( "PAGE_UP", to_translation( "Fast scroll up" ) );
8452 ctxt.register_action( "PAGE_DOWN", to_translation( "Fast scroll down" ) );
8453 ctxt.register_action( "SCROLL_ITEM_INFO_DOWN" );
8454 ctxt.register_action( "SCROLL_ITEM_INFO_UP" );
8455 ctxt.register_action( "zoom_in" );
8456 ctxt.register_action( "zoom_out" );
8457 ctxt.register_action( "NEXT_TAB" );
8458 ctxt.register_action( "PREV_TAB" );
8459 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
8460 ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
8461 ctxt.register_action( "FILTER" );
8462 ctxt.register_action( "RESET_FILTER" );
8463 ctxt.register_action( "EXAMINE" );
8464 ctxt.register_action( "COMPARE" );
8465 ctxt.register_action( "PRIORITY_INCREASE" );
8466 ctxt.register_action( "PRIORITY_DECREASE" );
8467 ctxt.register_action( "SORT" );
8468 ctxt.register_action( "TRAVEL_TO" );
8469
8470 ui.on_redraw( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
8471 reset_item_list_state( w_items_border, iInfoHeight, sort_radius );
8472
8473 int iStartPos = 0;
8474 if( ground_items.empty() ) {
8475 wnoutrefresh( w_items_border );
8476 mvwprintz( w_items, point( 2, 10 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "You don't see any items around you!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You don't see any items around you!"
) ) ) );
8477 } else {
8478 werase( w_items );
8479 calcStartPos( iStartPos, iActive, iMaxRows, iItemNum );
8480 int iNum = 0;
8481 bool high = false;
8482 bool low = false;
8483 int index = 0;
8484 int iCatSortOffset = 0;
8485
8486 for( int i = 0; i < iStartPos; i++ ) {
8487 if( !mSortCategory[i].empty() ) {
8488 iNum++;
8489 }
8490 }
8491 for( auto iter = filtered_items.begin(); iter != filtered_items.end(); ++index ) {
8492 if( highPEnd > 0 && index < highPEnd + iCatSortOffset ) {
8493 high = true;
8494 low = false;
8495 } else if( index >= lowPStart + iCatSortOffset ) {
8496 high = false;
8497 low = true;
8498 } else {
8499 high = false;
8500 low = false;
8501 }
8502
8503 if( iNum >= iStartPos && iNum < iStartPos + std::min( iMaxRows, iItemNum ) ) {
8504 int iThisPage = 0;
8505 if( !mSortCategory[iNum].empty() ) {
8506 iCatSortOffset++;
8507 mvwprintz( w_items, point( 1, iNum - iStartPos ), c_magentaget_all_colors().get(def_c_magenta), mSortCategory[iNum] );
8508 } else {
8509 if( iNum == iActive ) {
8510 iThisPage = page_num;
8511 }
8512 std::string sText;
8513 if( iter->vIG.size() > 1 ) {
8514 sText += string_format( "[%d/%d] (%d) ", iThisPage + 1, iter->vIG.size(), iter->totalcount );
8515 }
8516 sText += iter->example->tname();
8517 if( iter->vIG[iThisPage].count > 1 ) {
8518 sText += string_format( "[%d]", iter->vIG[iThisPage].count );
8519 }
8520
8521 nc_color col = c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray);
8522 if( iNum == iActive ) {
8523 col = hilite( c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) );
8524 } else if( high ) {
8525 col = c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow);
8526 } else if( low ) {
8527 col = c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red);
8528 } else {
8529 col = iter->example->color_in_inventory();
8530 }
8531 trim_and_print( w_items, point( 1, iNum - iStartPos ), width - 9, col, sText );
8532 const int numw = iItemNum > 9 ? 2 : 1;
8533 const point p( iter->vIG[iThisPage].pos.xy() );
8534 mvwprintz( w_items, point( width - 6 - numw, iNum - iStartPos ),
8535 iNum == iActive ? c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
8536 "%*d %s", numw, rl_dist( point_zero, p ),
8537 direction_name_short( direction_from( point_zero, p ) ) );
8538 ++iter;
8539 }
8540 } else {
8541 ++iter;
8542 }
8543 iNum++;
8544 }
8545 iNum = 0;
8546 for( int i = 0; i < iActive; i++ ) {
8547 if( !mSortCategory[i].empty() ) {
8548 iNum++;
8549 }
8550 }
8551 mvwprintz( w_items_border, point( ( width - 9 ) / 2 + ( iItemNum > 9 ? 0 : 1 ), 0 ),
8552 c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green), " %*d", iItemNum > 9 ? 2 : 1, iItemNum > 0 ? iActive - iNum + 1 : 0 );
8553 wprintz( w_items_border, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), " / %*d ", iItemNum > 9 ? 2 : 1, iItemNum - iCatSortNum );
8554 werase( w_item_info );
8555
8556 if( iItemNum > 0 && activeItem ) {
8557 std::vector<iteminfo> vThisItem;
8558 std::vector<iteminfo> vDummy;
8559 activeItem->vIG[page_num].it->info( true, vThisItem );
8560
8561 item_info_data dummy( "", "", vThisItem, vDummy, iScrollPos );
8562 dummy.without_getch = true;
8563 dummy.without_border = true;
8564
8565 draw_item_info( w_item_info, dummy );
8566 }
8567 draw_scrollbar( w_items_border, iActive, iMaxRows, iItemNum, point_south );
8568 wnoutrefresh( w_items_border );
8569 }
8570
8571 const bool bDrawLeft = ground_items.empty() || filtered_items.empty() || !activeItem;
8572 draw_custom_border( w_item_info, bDrawLeft, 1, 1, 1, LINE_XXXO4194420, LINE_XOXX4194421, 1, 1 );
8573
8574 if( iItemNum > 0 && activeItem ) {
8575 // print info window title: < item name >
8576 mvwprintw( w_item_info, point( 2, 0 ), "< " );
8577 trim_and_print( w_item_info, point( 4, 0 ), width - 8,
8578 activeItem->vIG[page_num].it->color_in_inventory(),
8579 activeItem->vIG[page_num].it->display_name() );
8580 wprintw( w_item_info, " >" );
8581 // move the cursor to the selected item (for screen readers)
8582 ui.set_cursor( w_items, point( 1, iActive - iStartPos ) );
8583 }
8584
8585 wnoutrefresh( w_items );
8586 wnoutrefresh( w_item_info );
8587 } );
8588
8589 std::optional<tripoint> trail_start;
8590 std::optional<tripoint> trail_end;
8591 bool trail_end_x = false;
8592 shared_ptr_fast<draw_callback_t> trail_cb = create_trail_callback( trail_start, trail_end,
8593 trail_end_x );
8594 add_draw_callback( trail_cb );
8595
8596 do {
8597 if( action == "COMPARE" && activeItem ) {
8598 game_menus::inv::compare( u, active_pos );
8599 } else if( action == "FILTER" ) {
8600 ui.invalidate_ui();
8601 string_input_popup()
8602 .title( _( "Filter:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Filter:" ) ) ) )
8603 .width( 55 )
8604 .description( item_filter_rule_string( item_filter_type::FILTER ) + "\n\n"
8605 + list_items_filter_history_help() )
8606 .desc_color( c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) )
8607 .identifier( "item_filter" )
8608 .max_length( 256 )
8609 .edit( sFilter );
8610 refilter = true;
8611 addcategory = !sort_radius;
8612 uistate.list_item_filter_active = !sFilter.empty();
8613 } else if( action == "RESET_FILTER" ) {
8614 sFilter.clear();
8615 filtered_items = ground_items;
8616 refilter = true;
8617 uistate.list_item_filter_active = false;
8618 addcategory = !sort_radius;
8619 } else if( action == "EXAMINE" && !filtered_items.empty() && activeItem ) {
8620 std::vector<iteminfo> vThisItem;
8621 std::vector<iteminfo> vDummy;
8622 activeItem->vIG[page_num].it->info( true, vThisItem );
8623
8624 item_info_data info_data( activeItem->vIG[page_num].it->tname(),
8625 activeItem->vIG[page_num].it->type_name(), vThisItem,
8626 vDummy );
8627 info_data.handle_scrolling = true;
8628
8629 draw_item_info( [&]() -> catacurses::window {
8630 return catacurses::newwin( TERMY, width - 5, point_zero );
8631 }, info_data );
8632 } else if( action == "PRIORITY_INCREASE" ) {
8633 ui.invalidate_ui();
8634 list_item_upvote = string_input_popup()
8635 .title( _( "High Priority:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "High Priority:" ) ) ) )
8636 .width( 55 )
8637 .text( list_item_upvote )
8638 .description( item_filter_rule_string( item_filter_type::HIGH_PRIORITY ) + "\n\n"
8639 + list_items_filter_history_help() )
8640 .desc_color( c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) )
8641 .identifier( "list_item_priority" )
8642 .max_length( 256 )
8643 .query_string();
8644 refilter = true;
8645 addcategory = !sort_radius;
8646 uistate.list_item_priority_active = !list_item_upvote.empty();
8647 } else if( action == "PRIORITY_DECREASE" ) {
8648 ui.invalidate_ui();
8649 list_item_downvote = string_input_popup()
8650 .title( _( "Low Priority:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Low Priority:" ) ) ) )
8651 .width( 55 )
8652 .text( list_item_downvote )
8653 .description( item_filter_rule_string( item_filter_type::LOW_PRIORITY ) + "\n\n"
8654 + list_items_filter_history_help() )
8655 .desc_color( c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white) )
8656 .identifier( "list_item_downvote" )
8657 .max_length( 256 )
8658 .query_string();
8659 refilter = true;
8660 addcategory = !sort_radius;
8661 uistate.list_item_downvote_active = !list_item_downvote.empty();
8662 } else if( action == "SORT" ) {
8663 if( sort_radius ) {
8664 sort_radius = false;
8665 addcategory = true;
8666 uistate.list_item_sort = 2; // list is sorted by category
8667 } else {
8668 sort_radius = true;
8669 uistate.list_item_sort = 1; // list is sorted by distance
8670 }
8671 highPEnd = -1;
8672 lowPStart = -1;
8673 iCatSortNum = 0;
8674
8675 mSortCategory.clear();
8676 refilter = true;
8677 } else if( action == "TRAVEL_TO" && activeItem ) {
8678 // try finding route to the tile, or one tile away from it
8679 const std::optional<std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms>> try_route =
8680 safe_route_to( u, u.pos_bub() + active_pos, 1, []( const std::string & msg ) {
8681 popup( msg );
8682 } );
8683 if( try_route.has_value() ) {
8684 u.set_destination( *try_route );
8685 break;
8686 }
8687 }
8688 if( uistate.list_item_sort == 1 ) {
8689 ground_items = item_list;
8690 } else if( uistate.list_item_sort == 2 ) {
8691 std::sort( ground_items.begin(), ground_items.end(), map_item_stack::map_item_stack_sort );
8692 }
8693
8694 if( refilter ) {
8695 refilter = false;
8696 filtered_items = filter_item_stacks( ground_items, sFilter );
8697 highPEnd = list_filter_high_priority( filtered_items, list_item_upvote );
8698 lowPStart = list_filter_low_priority( filtered_items, highPEnd, list_item_downvote );
8699 iActive = 0;
8700 page_num = 0;
8701 iItemNum = filtered_items.size();
8702 }
8703
8704 if( addcategory ) {
8705 addcategory = false;
8706 iCatSortNum = 0;
8707 mSortCategory.clear();
8708 if( highPEnd > 0 ) {
8709 mSortCategory[0] = _( "HIGH PRIORITY" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "HIGH PRIORITY" ) ) );
8710 iCatSortNum++;
8711 }
8712 std::string last_cat_name;
8713 for( int i = std::max( 0, highPEnd );
8714 i < std::min( lowPStart, static_cast<int>( filtered_items.size() ) ); i++ ) {
8715 const std::string &cat_name =
8716 filtered_items[i].example->get_category_of_contents().name_header();
8717 if( cat_name != last_cat_name ) {
8718 mSortCategory[i + iCatSortNum++] = cat_name;
8719 last_cat_name = cat_name;
8720 }
8721 }
8722 if( lowPStart < static_cast<int>( filtered_items.size() ) ) {
8723 mSortCategory[lowPStart + iCatSortNum++] = _( "LOW PRIORITY" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "LOW PRIORITY" ) ) );
8724 }
8725 if( !mSortCategory[0].empty() ) {
8726 iActive++;
8727 }
8728 iItemNum = static_cast<int>( filtered_items.size() ) + iCatSortNum;
8729 }
8730
8731 const int item_info_scroll_lines = catacurses::getmaxy( w_item_info ) - 4;
8732 const int scroll_rate = iItemNum > 20 ? 10 : 3;
8733
8734 if( action == "UP" ) {
8735 do {
8736 iActive--;
8737 } while( !mSortCategory[iActive].empty() );
8738 iScrollPos = 0;
8739 page_num = 0;
8740 if( iActive < 0 ) {
8741 iActive = iItemNum - 1;
8742 }
8743 } else if( action == "DOWN" ) {
8744 do {
8745 iActive++;
8746 } while( !mSortCategory[iActive].empty() );
8747 iScrollPos = 0;
8748 page_num = 0;
8749 if( iActive >= iItemNum ) {
8750 iActive = mSortCategory[0].empty() ? 0 : 1;
8751 }
8752 } else if( action == "PAGE_DOWN" ) {
8753 iScrollPos = 0;
8754 page_num = 0;
8755 if( iActive == iItemNum - 1 ) {
8756 iActive = mSortCategory[0].empty() ? 0 : 1;
8757 } else if( iActive + scroll_rate >= iItemNum ) {
8758 iActive = iItemNum - 1;
8759 } else {
8760 iActive += +scroll_rate - 1;
8761 do {
8762 iActive++;
8763 } while( !mSortCategory[iActive].empty() );
8764 }
8765 } else if( action == "PAGE_UP" ) {
8766 iScrollPos = 0;
8767 page_num = 0;
8768 if( mSortCategory[0].empty() ? iActive == 0 : iActive == 1 ) {
8769 iActive = iItemNum - 1;
8770 } else if( iActive <= scroll_rate ) {
8771 iActive = mSortCategory[0].empty() ? 0 : 1;
8772 } else {
8773 iActive += -scroll_rate + 1;
8774 do {
8775 iActive--;
8776 } while( !mSortCategory[iActive].empty() );
8777 }
8778 } else if( action == "RIGHT" ) {
8779 if( !filtered_items.empty() && activeItem ) {
8780 if( ++page_num >= static_cast<int>( activeItem->vIG.size() ) ) {
8781 page_num = activeItem->vIG.size() - 1;
8782 }
8783 }
8784 } else if( action == "LEFT" ) {
8785 page_num = std::max( 0, page_num - 1 );
8786 } else if( action == "SCROLL_ITEM_INFO_UP" ) {
8787 iScrollPos -= item_info_scroll_lines;
8788 } else if( action == "SCROLL_ITEM_INFO_DOWN" ) {
8789 iScrollPos += item_info_scroll_lines;
8790 } else if( action == "zoom_in" ) {
8791 zoom_in();
8792 mark_main_ui_adaptor_resize();
8793 } else if( action == "zoom_out" ) {
8794 zoom_out();
8795 mark_main_ui_adaptor_resize();
8796 } else if( action == "NEXT_TAB" || action == "PREV_TAB" ) {
8797 u.view_offset = stored_view_offset;
8798 return game::vmenu_ret::CHANGE_TAB;
8799 }
8800
8801 active_pos = tripoint_zero;
8802 activeItem = nullptr;
8803
8804 if( mSortCategory[iActive].empty() ) {
8805 auto iter = filtered_items.begin();
8806 for( int iNum = 0; iter != filtered_items.end() && iNum < iActive; iNum++ ) {
8807 if( mSortCategory[iNum].empty() ) {
8808 ++iter;
8809 }
8810 }
8811 if( iter != filtered_items.end() ) {
8812 active_pos = iter->vIG[page_num].pos;
8813 activeItem = &( *iter );
8814 }
8815 }
8816
8817 if( activeItem ) {
8818 centerlistview( active_pos, width );
8819 trail_start = u.pos();
8820 trail_end = u.pos() + active_pos;
8821 // Actually accessed from the terrain overlay callback `trail_cb` in the
8822 // call to `ui_manager::redraw`.
8823 //NOLINTNEXTLINE(clang-analyzer-deadcode.DeadStores)
8824 trail_end_x = true;
8825 } else {
8826 u.view_offset = stored_view_offset;
8827 trail_start = trail_end = std::nullopt;
8828 }
8829 invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
8830
8831 ui_manager::redraw();
8832
8833 action = ctxt.handle_input();
8834 } while( action != "QUIT" );
8835
8836 u.view_offset = stored_view_offset;
8837 return game::vmenu_ret::QUIT;
8838}
8839
8840game::vmenu_ret game::list_monsters( const std::vector<Creature *> &monster_list )
8841{
8842 const int iInfoHeight = 15;
8843 const int width = 55;
8844 int offsetX = 0;
8845 int iMaxRows = 0;
8846
8847 catacurses::window w_monsters;
8848 catacurses::window w_monsters_border;
8849 catacurses::window w_monster_info;
8850 catacurses::window w_monster_info_border;
8851
8852 Creature *cCurMon = nullptr;
8853 tripoint iActivePos;
8854
8855 bool hide_ui = false;
8856
8857 ui_adaptor ui;
8858 ui.on_screen_resize( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
8859 if( hide_ui ) {
8860 ui.position( point_zero, point_zero );
8861 } else {
8862 offsetX = TERMX - width;
8863 iMaxRows = TERMY - iInfoHeight - 1;
8864
8865 w_monsters = catacurses::newwin( iMaxRows, width - 2, point( offsetX + 1,
8866 1 ) );
8867 w_monsters_border = catacurses::newwin( iMaxRows + 1, width, point( offsetX,
8868 0 ) );
8869 w_monster_info = catacurses::newwin( iInfoHeight - 2, width - 2,
8870 point( offsetX + 1, TERMY - iInfoHeight + 1 ) );
8871 w_monster_info_border = catacurses::newwin( iInfoHeight, width, point( offsetX,
8872 TERMY - iInfoHeight ) );
8873
8874 if( cCurMon ) {
8875 centerlistview( iActivePos, width );
8876 }
8877
8878 ui.position( point( offsetX, 0 ), point( width, TERMY ) );
8879 }
8880 } );
8881 ui.mark_resize();
8882
8883 int max_gun_range = 0;
8884 if( u.get_wielded_item() ) {
8885 max_gun_range = u.get_wielded_item()->gun_range( &u );
8886 }
8887
8888 const tripoint stored_view_offset = u.view_offset;
8889 u.view_offset = tripoint_zero;
8890
8891 int iActive = 0; // monster index that we're looking at
8892
8893 std::string action;
8894 input_context ctxt( "LIST_MONSTERS" );
8895 ctxt.register_navigate_ui_list();
8896 ctxt.register_action( "NEXT_TAB" );
8897 ctxt.register_action( "PREV_TAB" );
8898 ctxt.register_action( "zoom_in" );
8899 ctxt.register_action( "zoom_out" );
8900 ctxt.register_action( "SAFEMODE_BLACKLIST_ADD" );
8901 ctxt.register_action( "SAFEMODE_BLACKLIST_REMOVE" );
8902 ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
8903 if( bVMonsterLookFire ) {
8904 ctxt.register_action( "look" );
8905 ctxt.register_action( "fire" );
8906 }
8907 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
8908
8909 // first integer is the row the attitude category string is printed in the menu
8910 std::map<int, Creature::Attitude> mSortCategory;
8911 const bool player_knows = !u.has_trait( trait_INATTENTIVE );
8912 if( player_knows ) {
8913 for( int i = 0, last_attitude = -1; i < static_cast<int>( monster_list.size() ); i++ ) {
8914 const Creature::Attitude attitude = monster_list[i]->attitude_to( u );
8915 if( static_cast<int>( attitude ) != last_attitude ) {
8916 mSortCategory[i + mSortCategory.size()] = attitude;
8917 last_attitude = static_cast<int>( attitude );
8918 }
8919 }
8920 }
8921
8922 ui.on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
8923 if( !hide_ui ) {
8924 draw_custom_border( w_monsters_border, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, LINE_XOXO4194424, LINE_XOXO4194424 );
8925 draw_custom_border( w_monster_info_border, 1, 1, 1, 1, LINE_XXXO4194420, LINE_XOXX4194421, 1, 1 );
8926
8927 mvwprintz( w_monsters_border, point( 2, 0 ), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green), "<Tab> " );
8928 wprintz( w_monsters_border, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), _( "Monsters" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Monsters" ) ) ) );
8929
8930 if( monster_list.empty() ) {
8931 werase( w_monsters );
8932 mvwprintz( w_monsters, point( 2, iMaxRows / 3 ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white),
8933 _( "You don't see any monsters around you!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You don't see any monsters around you!"
) ) ) );
8934 } else {
8935 werase( w_monsters );
8936
8937 const int iNumMonster = monster_list.size();
8938 const int iMenuSize = monster_list.size() + mSortCategory.size();
8939
8940 const int numw = iNumMonster > 999 ? 4 :
8941 iNumMonster > 99 ? 3 :
8942 iNumMonster > 9 ? 2 : 1;
8943
8944 // given the currently selected monster iActive. get the selected row
8945 int iSelPos = iActive;
8946 for( auto &ia : mSortCategory ) {
8947 int index = ia.first;
8948 if( index <= iSelPos ) {
8949 ++iSelPos;
8950 } else {
8951 break;
8952 }
8953 }
8954 int iStartPos = 0;
8955 // use selected row get the start row
8956 calcStartPos( iStartPos, iSelPos, iMaxRows - 1, iMenuSize );
8957
8958 // get first visible monster and category
8959 int iCurMon = iStartPos;
8960 auto CatSortIter = mSortCategory.cbegin();
8961 while( CatSortIter != mSortCategory.cend() && CatSortIter->first < iStartPos ) {
8962 ++CatSortIter;
8963 --iCurMon;
8964 }
8965
8966 std::string monNameSelected;
8967 std::string sSafemode;
8968 const int endY = std::min<int>( iMaxRows - 1, iMenuSize );
8969 for( int y = 0; y < endY; ++y ) {
8970
8971 if( player_knows && CatSortIter != mSortCategory.cend() ) {
8972 const int iCurPos = iStartPos + y;
8973 const int iCatPos = CatSortIter->first;
8974 if( iCurPos == iCatPos ) {
8975 const std::string cat_name = Creature::get_attitude_ui_data(
8976 CatSortIter->second ).first.translated();
8977 mvwprintz( w_monsters, point( 1, y ), c_magentaget_all_colors().get(def_c_magenta), cat_name );
8978 ++CatSortIter;
8979 continue;
8980 }
8981 }
8982
8983 // select current monster
8984 Creature *critter = monster_list[iCurMon];
8985 const bool selected = iCurMon == iActive;
8986 ++iCurMon;
8987 if( critter->sees( u ) && player_knows ) {
8988 mvwprintz( w_monsters, point( 0, y ), c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow), "!" );
8989 }
8990 bool is_npc = false;
8991 const monster *m = dynamic_cast<monster *>( critter );
8992 const npc *p = dynamic_cast<npc *>( critter );
8993 nc_color name_color = critter->basic_symbol_color();
8994
8995 if( selected ) {
8996 name_color = hilite( name_color );
8997 }
8998
8999 if( m != nullptr ) {
9000 trim_and_print( w_monsters, point( 1, y ), width - 32, name_color, m->name() );
9001 } else {
9002 trim_and_print( w_monsters, point( 1, y ), width - 32, name_color, critter->disp_name() );
9003 is_npc = true;
9004 }
9005
9006 if( selected && !get_safemode().empty() ) {
9007 monNameSelected = is_npc ? get_safemode().npc_type_name() : m->name();
9008
9009 if( get_safemode().has_rule( monNameSelected, Creature::Attitude::ANY ) ) {
9010 sSafemode = _( "<R>emove from safe mode blacklist" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<R>emove from safe mode blacklist"
) ) );
9011 } else {
9012 sSafemode = _( "<A>dd to safe mode blacklist" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<A>dd to safe mode blacklist"
) ) );
9013 }
9014 }
9015
9016 nc_color color = c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white);
9017 std::string sText;
9018
9019 if( m != nullptr ) {
9020 m->get_HP_Bar( color, sText );
9021 } else {
9022 std::tie( sText, color ) =
9023 ::get_hp_bar( critter->get_hp(), critter->get_hp_max(), false );
9024 }
9025 mvwprintz( w_monsters, point( width - 31, y ), color, sText );
9026 const int bar_max_width = 5;
9027 const int bar_width = utf8_width( sText );
9028 for( int i = 0; i < bar_max_width - bar_width; ++i ) {
9029 mvwprintz( w_monsters, point( width - 27 - i, y ), c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), "." );
9030 }
9031
9032 if( m != nullptr ) {
9033 const auto att = m->get_attitude();
9034 sText = att.first;
9035 color = att.second;
9036 } else if( p != nullptr ) {
9037 sText = npc_attitude_name( p->get_attitude() );
9038 color = p->symbol_color();
9039 }
9040 if( !player_knows ) {
9041 sText = _( "Unknown" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Unknown" ) ) );
9042 color = c_yellowget_all_colors().get(def_c_yellow);
9043 }
9044 mvwprintz( w_monsters, point( width - 19, y ), color, sText );
9045
9046 const int mon_dist = rl_dist( u.pos(), critter->pos() );
9047 const int numd = mon_dist > 999 ? 4 :
9048 mon_dist > 99 ? 3 :
9049 mon_dist > 9 ? 2 : 1;
9050
9051 trim_and_print( w_monsters, point( width - ( 5 + numd ), y ), 6 + numd,
9052 selected ? c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green) : c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray),
9053 "%*d %s",
9054 numd, mon_dist,
9055 direction_name_short( direction_from( u.pos(), critter->pos() ) ) );
9056 }
9057
9058 mvwprintz( w_monsters_border, point( ( width / 2 ) - numw - 2, 0 ), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green), " %*d", numw,
9059 iActive + 1 );
9060 wprintz( w_monsters_border, c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), " / %*d ", numw, static_cast<int>( monster_list.size() ) );
9061
9062 werase( w_monster_info );
9063 if( cCurMon ) {
9064 cCurMon->print_info( w_monster_info, 1, iInfoHeight - 3, 1 );
9065 }
9066
9067 draw_custom_border( w_monster_info_border, 1, 1, 1, 1, LINE_XXXO4194420, LINE_XOXX4194421, 1, 1 );
9068
9069 if( bVMonsterLookFire ) {
9070 mvwprintw( w_monster_info_border, point_east, "< " );
9071 wprintz( w_monster_info_border, c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green), ctxt.press_x( "look" ) );
9072 wprintz( w_monster_info_border, c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray), " %s", _( "to look around" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "to look around" ) ) ) );
9073
9074 if( cCurMon && rl_dist( u.pos(), cCurMon->pos() ) <= max_gun_range ) {
9075 std::string press_to_fire_text = string_format( _( "%s %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s %s" ) ) ),
9076 ctxt.press_x( "fire" ),
9077 string_format( _( "<color_light_gray>to shoot</color>" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<color_light_gray>to shoot</color>"
) ) ) ) );
9078 right_print( w_monster_info_border, 0, 3, c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green), press_to_fire_text );
9079 }
9080 wprintw( w_monster_info_border, " >" );
9081 }
9082
9083 if( !get_safemode().empty() ) {
9084 if( get_safemode().has_rule( monNameSelected, Creature::Attitude::ANY ) ) {
9085 sSafemode = _( "<R>emove from safe mode blacklist" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<R>emove from safe mode blacklist"
) ) );
9086 } else {
9087 sSafemode = _( "<A>dd to safe mode blacklist" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<A>dd to safe mode blacklist"
) ) );
9088 }
9089
9090 shortcut_print( w_monsters, point( 2, getmaxy( w_monsters ) - 1 ),
9091 c_whiteget_all_colors().get(def_c_white), c_light_greenget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_green), sSafemode );
9092 }
9093
9094 draw_scrollbar( w_monsters_border, iActive, iMaxRows, static_cast<int>( monster_list.size() ),
9095 point_south );
9096 }
9097
9098 wnoutrefresh( w_monsters_border );
9099 wnoutrefresh( w_monster_info_border );
9100 wnoutrefresh( w_monsters );
9101 wnoutrefresh( w_monster_info );
9102 }
9103 } );
9104
9105 std::optional<tripoint> trail_start;
9106 std::optional<tripoint> trail_end;
9107 bool trail_end_x = false;
9108 shared_ptr_fast<draw_callback_t> trail_cb = create_trail_callback( trail_start, trail_end,
9109 trail_end_x );
9110 add_draw_callback( trail_cb );
9111 const int recmax = static_cast<int>( monster_list.size() );
9112 const int scroll_rate = recmax > 20 ? 10 : 3;
9113
9114 do {
9115 if( navigate_ui_list( action, iActive, scroll_rate, recmax, true ) ) {
9116 } else if( action == "NEXT_TAB" || action == "PREV_TAB" ) {
9117 u.view_offset = stored_view_offset;
9118 return game::vmenu_ret::CHANGE_TAB;
9119 } else if( action == "zoom_in" ) {
9120 zoom_in();
9121 mark_main_ui_adaptor_resize();
9122 } else if( action == "zoom_out" ) {
9123 zoom_out();
9124 mark_main_ui_adaptor_resize();
9125 } else if( action == "SAFEMODE_BLACKLIST_REMOVE" ) {
9126 const monster *m = dynamic_cast<monster *>( cCurMon );
9127 const std::string monName = ( m != nullptr ) ? m->name() : "human";
9128
9129 if( get_safemode().has_rule( monName, Creature::Attitude::ANY ) ) {
9130 get_safemode().remove_rule( monName, Creature::Attitude::ANY );
9131 }
9132 } else if( action == "SAFEMODE_BLACKLIST_ADD" ) {
9133 if( !get_safemode().empty() ) {
9134 const monster *m = dynamic_cast<monster *>( cCurMon );
9135 const std::string monName = ( m != nullptr ) ? m->name() : "human";
9136
9137 get_safemode().add_rule( monName, Creature::Attitude::ANY, get_option<int>( "SAFEMODEPROXIMITY" ),
9138 rule_state::BLACKLISTED );
9139 }
9140 } else if( action == "look" ) {
9141 hide_ui = true;
9142 ui.mark_resize();
9143 look_around();
9144 hide_ui = false;
9145 ui.mark_resize();
9146 } else if( action == "fire" ) {
9147 if( cCurMon != nullptr && rl_dist( u.pos(), cCurMon->pos() ) <= max_gun_range ) {
9148 u.last_target = shared_from( *cCurMon );
9149 u.recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
9150 u.view_offset = stored_view_offset;
9151 return game::vmenu_ret::FIRE;
9152 }
9153 }
9154
9155 if( iActive >= 0 && static_cast<size_t>( iActive ) < monster_list.size() ) {
9156 cCurMon = monster_list[iActive];
9157 iActivePos = cCurMon->pos() - u.pos();
9158 centerlistview( iActivePos, width );
9159 trail_start = u.pos();
9160 trail_end = cCurMon->pos();
9161 // Actually accessed from the terrain overlay callback `trail_cb` in the
9162 // call to `ui_manager::redraw`.
9163 //NOLINTNEXTLINE(clang-analyzer-deadcode.DeadStores)
9164 trail_end_x = false;
9165 } else {
9166 cCurMon = nullptr;
9167 iActivePos = tripoint_zero;
9168 u.view_offset = stored_view_offset;
9169 trail_start = trail_end = std::nullopt;
9170 }
9171 invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
9172
9173 ui_manager::redraw();
9174
9175 action = ctxt.handle_input();
9176 } while( action != "QUIT" );
9177
9178 u.view_offset = stored_view_offset;
9179
9180 return game::vmenu_ret::QUIT;
9181}
9182
9183void game::insert_item( drop_locations &targets )
9184{
9185 if( targets.empty() || !targets.front().first ) {
9186 return;
9187 }
9188 std::string title = string_format( _( "%s: %s and %d items" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s: %s and %d items" ) ) ), _( "Insert item" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Insert item" ) ) ),
9189 targets.front().first->tname(), targets.size() - 1 );
9190 item_location item_loc = inv_map_splice( [ &, targets]( const item_location & it ) {
9191 if( targets.front().first.parent_item() == it ) {
9192 return false;
9193 }
9194 return it->is_container() && !it->is_corpse() && rate_action_insert( u, it ) == hint_rating::good;
9195 }, title, 1, _( "You have no container to insert items." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You have no container to insert items."
) ) ) );
9196
9197 if( !item_loc ) {
9198 add_msg( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
9199 return;
9200 }
9201
9202 u.assign_activity( insert_item_activity_actor( item_loc, targets, true ) );
9203}
9204
9205void game::insert_item()
9206{
9207 item_location item_loc = inv_map_splice( [&]( const item_location & it ) {
9208 return it->is_container() && !it->is_corpse() && rate_action_insert( u, it ) == hint_rating::good;
9209 }, _( "Insert item" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Insert item" ) ) ), 1, _( "You have no container to insert items." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You have no container to insert items."
) ) ) );
9210
9211 if( !item_loc ) {
9212 add_msg( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
9213 return;
9214 }
9215
9216 game_menus::inv::insert_items( u, item_loc );
9217}
9218
9219void game::unload_container()
9220{
9221 if( const std::optional<tripoint> pnt = choose_adjacent( _( "Unload where?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Unload where?" ) ) ) ) ) {
9222 u.drop( game_menus::inv::unload_container( u ), *pnt );
9223 }
9224}
9225
9226void game::drop_in_direction( const tripoint &pnt )
9227{
9228 u.drop( game_menus::inv::multidrop( u ), pnt );
9229}
9230
9231// Used to set up the first Hotkey in the display set
9232static std::optional<input_event> get_initial_hotkey( const size_t menu_index )
9233{
9234 return menu_index == 0
9235 ? hotkey_for_action( ACTION_BUTCHER, /*maximum_modifier_count=*/1 )
9236 : std::nullopt;
9237}
9238
9239// Returns a vector of pairs.
9240// Pair.first is the iterator to the first item with a unique tname.
9241// Pair.second is the number of equivalent items per unique tname
9242// There are options for optimization here, but the function is hit infrequently
9243// enough that optimizing now is not a useful time expenditure.
9244static std::vector<std::pair<map_stack::iterator, int>> generate_butcher_stack_display(
9245 const std::vector<map_stack::iterator> &its )
9246{
9247 std::vector<std::pair<map_stack::iterator, int>> result;
9248 std::vector<std::string> result_strings;
9249 result.reserve( its.size() );
9250 result_strings.reserve( its.size() );
9251
9252 for( const map_stack::iterator &it : its ) {
9253 const std::string tname = it->tname();
9254 size_t s = 0;
9255 // Search for the index with a string equivalent to tname
9256 for( ; s < result_strings.size(); ++s ) {
9257 if( result_strings[s] == tname ) {
9258 break;
9259 }
9260 }
9261 // If none is found, this is a unique tname so we need to add
9262 // the tname to string vector, and make an empty result pair.
9263 // Has the side effect of making 's' a valid index
9264 if( s == result_strings.size() ) {
9265 // make a new entry
9266 result.emplace_back( it, 0 );
9267 // Also push new entry string
9268 result_strings.push_back( tname );
9269 }
9270 result[s].second += it->count_by_charges() ? it->charges : 1;
9271 }
9272
9273 return result;
9274}
9275
9276// Corpses are always individual items
9277// Just add them individually to the menu
9278static void add_corpses( uilist &menu, const std::vector<map_stack::iterator> &its,
9279 size_t &menu_index )
9280{
9281 std::optional<input_event> hotkey = get_initial_hotkey( menu_index );
9282
9283 for( const map_stack::iterator &it : its ) {
9284 menu.addentry( menu_index++, true, hotkey, it->get_mtype()->nname() );
9285 hotkey = std::nullopt;
9286 }
9287}
9288
9289// Salvagables stack so we need to pass in a stack vector rather than an item index vector
9290static void add_salvagables( uilist &menu,
9291 const std::vector<std::pair<map_stack::iterator, int>> &stacks,
9292 size_t &menu_index, const salvage_actor &salvage_iuse )
9293{
9294 if( !stacks.empty() ) {
9295 std::optional<input_event> hotkey = get_initial_hotkey( menu_index );
9296
9297 for( const auto &stack : stacks ) {
9298 const item &it = *stack.first;
9299
9300 //~ Name and number of items listed for cutting up
9301 const std::string &msg = string_format( pgettext( "butchery menu", "Cut up %s (%d)" ),
9302 it.tname(), stack.second );
9303 menu.addentry_col( menu_index++, true, hotkey, msg,
9304 to_string_clipped( time_duration::from_turns( salvage_iuse.time_to_cut_up( it ) / 100 ) ) );
9305 hotkey = std::nullopt;
9306 }
9307 }
9308}
9309
9310// Disassemblables stack so we need to pass in a stack vector rather than an item index vector
9311static void add_disassemblables( uilist &menu,
9312 const std::vector<std::pair<map_stack::iterator, int>> &stacks, size_t &menu_index )
9313{
9314 if( !stacks.empty() ) {
9315 std::optional<input_event> hotkey = get_initial_hotkey( menu_index );
9316
9317 for( const auto &stack : stacks ) {
9318 const item &it = *stack.first;
9319
9320 //~ Name, number of items and time to complete disassembling
9321 const std::string &msg = string_format( pgettext( "butchery menu", "Disassemble %s (%d)" ),
9322 it.tname(), stack.second );
9323 recipe uncraft_recipe;
9324 if( it.typeId() == itype_disassembly ) {
9325 uncraft_recipe = it.get_making();
9326 } else {
9327 uncraft_recipe = recipe_dictionary::get_uncraft( it.typeId() );
9328 }
9329 menu.addentry_col( menu_index++, true, hotkey, msg,
9330 to_string_clipped( uncraft_recipe.time_to_craft( get_player_character(),
9331 recipe_time_flag::ignore_proficiencies ) ) );
9332 hotkey = std::nullopt;
9333 }
9334 }
9335}
9336
9337// Butchery sub-menu and time calculation
9338static void butcher_submenu( const std::vector<map_stack::iterator> &corpses, int index = -1 )
9339{
9340 avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
9341 auto cut_time = [&]( butcher_type bt ) {
9342 int time_to_cut = 0;
9343 if( index != -1 ) {
9344 const mtype &corpse = *corpses[index]->get_mtype();
9345 const float factor = corpse.harvest->get_butchery_requirements().get_fastest_requirements(
9346 player_character.crafting_inventory(),
9347 corpse.size, bt ).first;
9348 time_to_cut = butcher_time_to_cut( player_character, *corpses[index], bt ) * factor;
9349 } else {
9350 for( const map_stack::iterator &it : corpses ) {
9351 const mtype &corpse = *it->get_mtype();
9352 const float factor = corpse.harvest->get_butchery_requirements().get_fastest_requirements(
9353 player_character.crafting_inventory(),
9354 corpse.size, bt ).first;
9355 time_to_cut += butcher_time_to_cut( player_character, *it, bt ) * factor;
9356 }
9357 }
9358 return to_string_clipped( time_duration::from_moves( time_to_cut ) );
9359 };
9360 const bool enough_light = player_character.fine_detail_vision_mod() <= 4;
9361
9362 const int factor = player_character.max_quality( qual_BUTCHER, PICKUP_RANGE );
9363 const std::string msgFactor = factor > INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1)
9364 ? string_format( _( "Your best tool has <color_cyan>%d butchering</color>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your best tool has <color_cyan>%d butchering</color>."
) ) ), factor )
9365 : _( "You have no butchering tool." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You have no butchering tool."
) ) );
9366
9367 const int factorD = player_character.max_quality( qual_CUT_FINE, PICKUP_RANGE );
9368 const std::string msgFactorD = factorD > INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1)
9369 ? string_format( _( "Your best tool has <color_cyan>%d fine cutting</color>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your best tool has <color_cyan>%d fine cutting</color>."
) ) ), factorD )
9370 : _( "You have no fine cutting tool." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You have no fine cutting tool."
) ) );
9371
9372 bool has_blood = false;
9373 bool has_skin = false;
9374 bool has_organs = false;
9375 std::string dissect_wp_hint; // dissection weakpoint proficiencies training hint
9376 int dissect_wp_hint_lines = 0; // track hint lines so menu width doesn't change
9377
9378 if( index != -1 ) {
9379 const mtype *dead_mon = corpses[index]->get_mtype();
9380 if( dead_mon ) {
9381 for( const harvest_entry &entry : dead_mon->harvest.obj() ) {
9382 if( entry.type == harvest_drop_skin && !corpses[index]->has_flag( flag_SKINNED ) ) {
9383 has_skin = true;
9384 }
9385 if( entry.type == harvest_drop_offal && !( corpses[index]->has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ||
9386 corpses[index]->has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) ||
9387 corpses[index]->has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) ) ) {
9388 has_organs = true;
9389 }
9390 if( entry.type == harvest_drop_blood && dead_mon->bleed_rate > 0 &&
9391 !( corpses[index]->has_flag( flag_QUARTERED ) ||
9392 corpses[index]->has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS ) ||
9393 corpses[index]->has_flag( flag_FIELD_DRESS_FAILED ) || corpses[index]->has_flag( flag_BLED ) ) ) {
9394 has_blood = true;
9395 }
9396 }
9397 if( !dead_mon->families.families.empty() ) {
9398 dissect_wp_hint += std::string( "\n\n" ) + _( "Dissecting may yield knowledge of:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Dissecting may yield knowledge of:"
) ) );
9399 dissect_wp_hint_lines += 2;
9400 for( const weakpoint_family &wf : dead_mon->families.families ) {
9401 std::string prof_status;
9402 if( !player_character.has_prof_prereqs( wf.proficiency ) ) {
9403 prof_status += colorize( string_format( " (%s)", _( "missing proficiencies" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "missing proficiencies" ) ) ) ), c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red) );
9404 } else if( player_character.has_proficiency( wf.proficiency ) ) {
9405 prof_status += colorize( string_format( " (%s)", _( "already known" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "already known" ) ) ) ), c_dark_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_dark_gray) );
9406 }
9407 dissect_wp_hint += string_format( "\n %s%s", wf.proficiency->name(), prof_status );
9408 dissect_wp_hint_lines++;
9409 }
9410 }
9411 }
9412 }
9413
9414 uilist smenu;
9415 smenu.desc_enabled = true;
9416 smenu.desc_lines_hint += dissect_wp_hint_lines;
9417 smenu.text = _( "Choose type of butchery:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Choose type of butchery:" ) )
);
9418
9419 const std::string cannot_see = colorize( _( "can't see!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "can't see!" ) ) ), c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red) );
9420
9421 smenu.addentry_col( static_cast<int>( butcher_type::QUICK ), enough_light,
9422 'B', _( "Quick butchery" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Quick butchery" ) ) ),
9423 enough_light ? cut_time( butcher_type::QUICK ) : cannot_see,
9424 string_format( "%s %s",
9425 _( "This technique is used when you are in a hurry, "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This technique is used when you are in a hurry, "
"but still want to harvest something from the corpse. " " Yields are lower as you don't try to be precise, "
"but it's useful if you don't want to set up a workshop. " "Prevents zombies from raising."
) ) )
9426 "but still want to harvest something from the corpse. "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This technique is used when you are in a hurry, "
"but still want to harvest something from the corpse. " " Yields are lower as you don't try to be precise, "
"but it's useful if you don't want to set up a workshop. " "Prevents zombies from raising."
) ) )
9427 " Yields are lower as you don't try to be precise, "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This technique is used when you are in a hurry, "
"but still want to harvest something from the corpse. " " Yields are lower as you don't try to be precise, "
"but it's useful if you don't want to set up a workshop. " "Prevents zombies from raising."
) ) )
9428 "but it's useful if you don't want to set up a workshop. "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This technique is used when you are in a hurry, "
"but still want to harvest something from the corpse. " " Yields are lower as you don't try to be precise, "
"but it's useful if you don't want to set up a workshop. " "Prevents zombies from raising."
) ) )
9429 "Prevents zombies from raising." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This technique is used when you are in a hurry, "
"but still want to harvest something from the corpse. " " Yields are lower as you don't try to be precise, "
"but it's useful if you don't want to set up a workshop. " "Prevents zombies from raising."
) ) ),
9430 msgFactor ) );
9431 smenu.addentry_col( static_cast<int>( butcher_type::FULL ), enough_light,
9432 'b', _( "Full butchery" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Full butchery" ) ) ),
9433 enough_light ? cut_time( butcher_type::FULL ) : cannot_see,
9434 string_format( "%s %s",
9435 _( "This technique is used to properly butcher a corpse, "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This technique is used to properly butcher a corpse, "
"and requires a rope & a tree or a butchering rack, " "a flat surface (for ex. a table, a leather tarp, etc.) "
"and good tools. Yields are plentiful and varied, " "but it is time consuming."
) ) )

get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(

) ) )

) ) )
9438 "and good tools. Yields are plentiful and varied, "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::

) ) ),

"stay fresh longer. Can be combined with other methods for "
"better effects." ) ) )

get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(

"better effects." ) ) )

"viscera to protect the corpse from rotting from inside. " "Yields internal organs. Carcass will be lighter and will "
"stay fresh longer. Can be combined with other methods for "
"better effects." ) ) )
9449 "stay fresh longer. Can be combined with other methods for "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Technique that involves removing internal organs and "
"viscera to protect the corpse from rotting from inside. " "Yields internal organs. Carcass will be lighter and will "
"stay fresh longer. Can be combined with other methods for "
"better effects." ) ) )
9450 "better effects." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Technique that involves removing internal organs and "
"viscera to protect the corpse from rotting from inside. " "Yields internal organs. Carcass will be lighter and will "
"stay fresh longer. Can be combined with other methods for "
"better effects." ) ) ),
9451 msgFactor ) );
9452 smenu.addentry_col( static_cast<int>( butcher_type::SKIN ), enough_light && has_skin,
9453 's', _( "Skin corpse" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(

get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(

9455 c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red) ) ) : cannot_see,
9456 string_format( "%s %s",
9457 _( "Skinning a corpse is an involved and careful process that "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Skinning a corpse is an involved and careful process that "

"scraps that can be used in other ways." ) ) )
9458 "usually takes some time. You need skill and an appropriately "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Skinning a corpse is an involved and careful process that "

9459 "sharp and precise knife to do a good job. Some corpses are "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Skinning a corpse is an involved and careful process that "
"usually takes some time. You need skill and an appropriately "

"too small to yield a full-sized hide and will instead produce "

9460 "too small to yield a full-sized hide and will instead produce "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::

"to do a good job." ) ) )
9470 "You need skill and an appropriately sharp and precise knife "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Bleeding involves severing the carotid arteries and jugular "
"veins, or the blood vessels from which they arise. " "You need skill and an appropriately sharp and precise knife "
"to do a good job." ) ) )
9471 "to do a good job." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::

"to do a good job." ) ) ),
9472 msgFactor ) );
9473 smenu.addentry_col( static_cast<int>( butcher_type::QUARTER ), enough_light,
9474 'k', _( "Quarter corpse" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(

9475 enough_light ? cut_time( butcher_type::QUARTER ) : cannot_see,
9476 string_format( "%s %s",
9477 _( "By quartering a previously field dressed corpse you will "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "By quartering a previously field dressed corpse you will "
"acquire four parts with reduced weight and volume. It " "may help in transporting large game. This action destroys "

) ) )
9478 "acquire four parts with reduced weight and volume. It "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::

) ) )
9479 "may help in transporting large game. This action destroys "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "By quartering a previously field dressed corpse you will "
"acquire four parts with reduced weight and volume. It " "may help in transporting large game. This action destroys "
"skin, hide, pelt, etc., so don't use it if you want to " "harvest them later."
) ) )
9480 "skin, hide, pelt, etc., so don't use it if you want to "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "By quartering a previously field dressed corpse you will "
"acquire four parts with reduced weight and volume. It " "may help in transporting large game. This action destroys "
"skin, hide, pelt, etc., so don't use it if you want to " "harvest them later."
) ) )
9481 "harvest them later." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "By quartering a previously field dressed corpse you will "

"skin, hide, pelt, etc., so don't use it if you want to " "harvest them later."
) ) ),
9482 msgFactor ) );
9483 smenu.addentry_col( static_cast<int>( butcher_type::DISMEMBER ), true,
9484 'm', _( "Dismember corpse" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Dismember corpse" ) ) ),
9485 cut_time( butcher_type::DISMEMBER ),
9486 string_format( "%s %s",
9487 _( "If you're aiming to just destroy a body outright and don't "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "If you're aiming to just destroy a body outright and don't "
"care about harvesting it, dismembering it will hack it apart "
"in a very short amount of time but yields little to no usable flesh."
) ) )
9488 "care about harvesting it, dismembering it will hack it apart "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "If you're aiming to just destroy a body outright and don't "
"care about harvesting it, dismembering it will hack it apart "
"in a very short amount of time but yields little to no usable flesh."
) ) )
9489 "in a very short amount of time but yields little to no usable flesh." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "If you're aiming to just destroy a body outright and don't "
"care about harvesting it, dismembering it will hack it apart "
"in a very short amount of time but yields little to no usable flesh."
) ) ),
9490 msgFactor ) );
9491 smenu.addentry_col( static_cast<int>( butcher_type::DISSECT ), enough_light,
9492 'd', _( "Dissect corpse" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Dissect corpse" ) ) ),
9493 enough_light ? cut_time( butcher_type::DISSECT ) : cannot_see,
9494 string_format( "%s %s%s",
9495 _( "By careful dissection of the corpse, you will examine it for "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "By careful dissection of the corpse, you will examine it for "
"possible bionic implants, or discrete organs and harvest them "
"if possible. Requires scalpel-grade cutting tools, ruins "
"corpse, and consumes a lot of time. Your medical knowledge "
"is most useful here." ) ) )
9496 "possible bionic implants, or discrete organs and harvest them "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "By careful dissection of the corpse, you will examine it for "
"possible bionic implants, or discrete organs and harvest them "
"if possible. Requires scalpel-grade cutting tools, ruins "
"corpse, and consumes a lot of time. Your medical knowledge "
"is most useful here." ) ) )
9497 "if possible. Requires scalpel-grade cutting tools, ruins "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "By careful dissection of the corpse, you will examine it for "
"possible bionic implants, or discrete organs and harvest them "
"if possible. Requires scalpel-grade cutting tools, ruins "
"corpse, and consumes a lot of time. Your medical knowledge "
"is most useful here." ) ) )
9498 "corpse, and consumes a lot of time. Your medical knowledge "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "By careful dissection of the corpse, you will examine it for "
"possible bionic implants, or discrete organs and harvest them "
"if possible. Requires scalpel-grade cutting tools, ruins "
"corpse, and consumes a lot of time. Your medical knowledge "
"is most useful here." ) ) )
9499 "is most useful here." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "By careful dissection of the corpse, you will examine it for "
"possible bionic implants, or discrete organs and harvest them "
"if possible. Requires scalpel-grade cutting tools, ruins "
"corpse, and consumes a lot of time. Your medical knowledge "
"is most useful here." ) ) ),
9500 msgFactorD, dissect_wp_hint ) );
9501 smenu.query();
9502 switch( smenu.ret ) {
9503 case static_cast<int>( butcher_type::QUICK ):
9504 player_character.assign_activity( ACT_BUTCHER, 0, true );
9505 break;
9506 case static_cast<int>( butcher_type::FULL ):
9507 player_character.assign_activity( ACT_BUTCHER_FULL, 0, true );
9508 break;
9509 case static_cast<int>( butcher_type::FIELD_DRESS ):
9510 player_character.assign_activity( ACT_FIELD_DRESS, 0, true );
9511 break;
9512 case static_cast<int>( butcher_type::SKIN ):
9513 player_character.assign_activity( ACT_SKIN, 0, true );
9514 break;
9515 case static_cast<int>( butcher_type::BLEED ) :
9516 player_character.assign_activity( ACT_BLEED, 0, true );
9517 break;
9518 case static_cast<int>( butcher_type::QUARTER ):
9519 player_character.assign_activity( ACT_QUARTER, 0, true );
9520 break;
9521 case static_cast<int>( butcher_type::DISMEMBER ):
9522 player_character.assign_activity( ACT_DISMEMBER, 0, true );
9523 break;
9524 case static_cast<int>( butcher_type::DISSECT ):
9525 player_character.assign_activity( ACT_DISSECT, 0, true );
9526 break;
9527 default:
9528 return;
9529 }
9530}
9531
9532void game::butcher()
9533{
9534 static const std::string salvage_string = "salvage";
9535 if( u.controlling_vehicle ) {
9536 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't butcher while driving!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't butcher while driving!"
) ) ) );
9537 return;
9538 }
9539
9540 const int factor = u.max_quality( qual_BUTCHER, PICKUP_RANGE );
9541 const int factorD = u.max_quality( qual_CUT_FINE, PICKUP_RANGE );
9542 const std::string no_knife_msg = _( "You don't have a butchering tool." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You don't have a butchering tool."
) ) );
9543 const std::string no_corpse_msg = _( "There are no corpses here to butcher." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There are no corpses here to butcher."
) ) );
9544
9545 //You can't butcher on sealed terrain- you have to smash/shovel/etc it open first
9546 if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SEALED, u.pos() ) ) {
9547 if( m.sees_some_items( u.pos(), u ) ) {
9548 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't access the items here." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't access the items here."
) ) ) );
9549 } else if( factor > INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1) || factorD > INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1) ) {
9550 add_msg( m_info, no_corpse_msg );
9551 } else {
9552 add_msg( m_info, no_knife_msg );
9553 }
9554 return;
9555 }
9556
9557 const item *first_item_without_tools = nullptr;
9558 // Indices of relevant items
9559 std::vector<map_stack::iterator> corpses;
9560 std::vector<map_stack::iterator> disassembles;
9561 std::vector<map_stack::iterator> salvageables;
9562 map_stack items = m.i_at( u.pos() );
9563 const inventory &crafting_inv = u.crafting_inventory();
9564
9565 // TODO: Properly handle different material whitelists
9566 // TODO: Improve quality of this section
9567 auto salvage_filter = []( const item & it ) {
9568 const item *usable = it.get_usable_item( salvage_string );
9569 return usable != nullptr;
9570 };
9571
9572 std::vector< item * > salvage_tools = u.items_with( salvage_filter );
9573 int salvage_tool_index = INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1);
9574 item *salvage_tool = nullptr;
9575 const salvage_actor *salvage_iuse = nullptr;
9576 if( !salvage_tools.empty() ) {
9577 salvage_tool = salvage_tools.front();
9578 salvage_tool_index = u.get_item_position( salvage_tool );
9579 item *usable = salvage_tool->get_usable_item( salvage_string );
9580 salvage_iuse = dynamic_cast<const salvage_actor *>(
9581 usable->get_use( salvage_string )->get_actor_ptr() );
9582 }
9583
9584 // Reserve capacity for each to hold entire item set if necessary to prevent
9585 // reallocations later on
9586 corpses.reserve( items.size() );
9587 salvageables.reserve( items.size() );
9588 disassembles.reserve( items.size() );
9589
9590 // Split into corpses, disassemble-able, and salvageable items
9591 // It's not much additional work to just generate a corpse list and
9592 // clear it later, but does make the splitting process nicer.
9593 for( map_stack::iterator it = items.begin(); it != items.end(); ++it ) {
9594 if( it->is_corpse() ) {
9595 corpses.push_back( it );
9596 } else {
9597 if( ( salvage_tool_index != INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1) ) && salvage_iuse->valid_to_cut_up( nullptr, *it ) ) {
9598 salvageables.push_back( it );
9599 }
9600 if( u.can_disassemble( *it, crafting_inv ).success() ) {
9601 disassembles.push_back( it );
9602 } else if( !first_item_without_tools ) {
9603 first_item_without_tools = &*it;
9604 }
9605 }
9606 }
9607
9608 // Clear corpses if butcher and dissect factors are INT_MIN
9609 if( factor == INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1) && factorD == INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1) ) {
9610 corpses.clear();
9611 }
9612
9613 if( corpses.empty() && disassembles.empty() && salvageables.empty() ) {
9614 if( factor > INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1) || factorD > INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1) ) {
9615 add_msg( m_info, no_corpse_msg );
9616 } else {
9617 add_msg( m_info, no_knife_msg );
9618 }
9619
9620 if( first_item_without_tools ) {
9621 add_msg( m_info, _( "You don't have the necessary tools to disassemble any items here." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You don't have the necessary tools to disassemble any items here."
) ) ) );
9622 // Just for the "You need x to disassemble y" messages
9623 const auto ret = u.can_disassemble( *first_item_without_tools, crafting_inv );
9624 if( !ret.success() ) {
9625 add_msg( m_info, "%s", ret.c_str() );
9626 }
9627 }
9628 return;
9629 }
9630
9631 Creature *hostile_critter = is_hostile_very_close( true );
9632 if( hostile_critter != nullptr ) {
9633 if( !query_yn( _( "You see %s nearby! Start butchering anyway?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You see %s nearby! Start butchering anyway?"
) ) ),
9634 hostile_critter->disp_name() ) ) {
9635 return;
9636 }
9637 }
9638
9639 // Magic indices for special butcher options
9640 enum : int {
9641 MULTISALVAGE = MAX_ITEM_IN_SQUARE + 1,
9642 MULTIBUTCHER,
9643 MULTIDISASSEMBLE_ONE,
9644 MULTIDISASSEMBLE_ALL,
9645 NUM_BUTCHER_ACTIONS
9646 };
9647 // What are we butchering (i.e.. which vector to pick indices from)
9648 enum {
9649 BUTCHER_CORPSE,
9650 BUTCHER_DISASSEMBLE,
9651 BUTCHER_SALVAGE,
9652 BUTCHER_OTHER // For multisalvage etc.
9653 } butcher_select = BUTCHER_CORPSE;
9654 // Index to std::vector of iterators...
9655 int indexer_index = 0;
9656
9657 // Generate the indexed stacks so we can display them nicely
9658 const auto disassembly_stacks = generate_butcher_stack_display( disassembles );
9659 const auto salvage_stacks = generate_butcher_stack_display( salvageables );
9660 // Always ask before cutting up/disassembly, but not before butchery
9661 size_t ret = 0;
9662 if( !corpses.empty() || !disassembles.empty() || !salvageables.empty() ) {
9663 uilist kmenu;
9664 kmenu.text = _( "Choose corpse to butcher / item to disassemble" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Choose corpse to butcher / item to disassemble"
) ) );
9665
9666 size_t i = 0;
9667 // Add corpses, disassembleables, and salvagables to the UI
9668 add_corpses( kmenu, corpses, i );
9669 add_disassemblables( kmenu, disassembly_stacks, i );
9670 if( salvage_iuse && !salvageables.empty() ) {
9671 add_salvagables( kmenu, salvage_stacks, i, *salvage_iuse );
9672 }
9673
9674 if( corpses.size() > 1 ) {
9675 kmenu.addentry( MULTIBUTCHER, true, 'b', _( "Butcher everything" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Butcher everything" ) ) ) );
9676 }
9677
9678 if( disassembly_stacks.size() > 1 || ( disassembly_stacks.size() == 1 &&
9679 disassembly_stacks.front().second > 1 ) ) {
9680 int time_to_disassemble_once = 0;
9681 int time_to_disassemble_recursive = 0;
9682 for( const auto &stack : disassembly_stacks ) {
9683 recipe uncraft_recipe;
9684 if( stack.first->typeId() == itype_disassembly ) {
9685 uncraft_recipe = stack.first->get_making();
9686 } else {
9687 uncraft_recipe = recipe_dictionary::get_uncraft( stack.first->typeId() );
9688 }
9689
9690 const int time = uncraft_recipe.time_to_craft_moves(
9691 get_player_character(), recipe_time_flag::ignore_proficiencies );
9692 time_to_disassemble_once += time * stack.second;
9693 if( stack.first->typeId() == itype_disassembly ) {
9694 item test( uncraft_recipe.result(), calendar::turn, 1 );
9695 time_to_disassemble_recursive += test.get_recursive_disassemble_moves(
9696 get_player_character() ) * stack.second;
9697 } else {
9698 time_to_disassemble_recursive += stack.first->get_recursive_disassemble_moves(
9699 get_player_character() ) * stack.second;
9700 }
9701
9702 }
9703
9704 kmenu.addentry_col( MULTIDISASSEMBLE_ONE, true, 'D', _( "Disassemble everything once" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Disassemble everything once"
) ) ),
9705 to_string_clipped( time_duration::from_moves( time_to_disassemble_once ) ) );
9706 kmenu.addentry_col( MULTIDISASSEMBLE_ALL, true, 'd', _( "Disassemble everything recursively" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Disassemble everything recursively"
) ) ),
9707 to_string_clipped( time_duration::from_moves( time_to_disassemble_recursive ) ) );
9708 }
9709 if( salvage_iuse && salvageables.size() > 1 ) {
9710 int time_to_salvage = 0;
9711 for( const auto &stack : salvage_stacks ) {
9712 time_to_salvage += salvage_iuse->time_to_cut_up( *stack.first ) * stack.second;
9713 }
9714
9715 kmenu.addentry_col( MULTISALVAGE, true, 'z', _( "Cut up everything" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Cut up everything" ) ) ),
9716 to_string_clipped( time_duration::from_moves( time_to_salvage ) ) );
9717 }
9718
9719 kmenu.query();
9720
9721 if( kmenu.ret < 0 || kmenu.ret >= NUM_BUTCHER_ACTIONS ) {
9722 return;
9723 }
9724
9725 ret = static_cast<size_t>( kmenu.ret );
9726 if( ret >= MULTISALVAGE && ret < NUM_BUTCHER_ACTIONS ) {
9727 butcher_select = BUTCHER_OTHER;
9728 indexer_index = ret;
9729 } else if( ret < corpses.size() ) {
9730 butcher_select = BUTCHER_CORPSE;
9731 indexer_index = ret;
9732 } else if( ret < corpses.size() + disassembly_stacks.size() ) {
9733 butcher_select = BUTCHER_DISASSEMBLE;
9734 indexer_index = ret - corpses.size();
9735 } else if( ret < corpses.size() + disassembly_stacks.size() + salvage_stacks.size() ) {
9736 butcher_select = BUTCHER_SALVAGE;
