9737 indexer_index = ret - corpses.size() - disassembly_stacks.size();
9738 } else {
9739 debugmsg( "Invalid butchery index: %d", ret )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "9739", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Invalid butchery index: %d", ret
);
9740 return;
9741 }
9742 }
9743
9744 if( !u.has_morale_to_craft() ) {
9745 if( butcher_select == BUTCHER_CORPSE || indexer_index == MULTIBUTCHER ) {
9746 add_msg( m_info,
9747 _( "You are not in the mood and the prospect of guts and blood on your hands convinces you to turn away." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are not in the mood and the prospect of guts and blood on your hands convinces you to turn away."
) ) ) );
9748 } else {
9749 add_msg( m_info,
9750 _( "You are not in the mood and the prospect of work stops you before you begin." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are not in the mood and the prospect of work stops you before you begin."
) ) ) );
9751 }
9752 return;
9753 }
9754 const std::vector<Character *> helpers = u.get_crafting_helpers();
9755 for( std::size_t i = 0; i < helpers.size() && i < 3; i++ ) {
9756 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s helps with this task…" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s helps with this task…" )
) ), helpers[i]->get_name() );
9757 }
9758 switch( butcher_select ) {
9759 case BUTCHER_OTHER:
9760 switch( indexer_index ) {
9761 case MULTISALVAGE:
9762 u.assign_activity( longsalvage_activity_actor( salvage_tool_index ) );
9763 break;
9764 case MULTIBUTCHER:
9765 butcher_submenu( corpses );
9766 for( map_stack::iterator &it : corpses ) {
9767 u.activity.targets.emplace_back( map_cursor( u.pos() ), &*it );
9768 }
9769 break;
9770 case MULTIDISASSEMBLE_ONE:
9771 u.disassemble_all( true );
9772 break;
9773 case MULTIDISASSEMBLE_ALL:
9774 u.disassemble_all( false );
9775 break;
9776 default:
9777 debugmsg( "Invalid butchery type: %d", indexer_index )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "9777", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Invalid butchery type: %d", indexer_index
);
9778 return;
9779 }
9780 break;
9781 case BUTCHER_CORPSE: {
9782 butcher_submenu( corpses, indexer_index );
9783 u.activity.targets.emplace_back( map_cursor( u.pos() ), &*corpses[indexer_index] );
9784 }
9785 break;
9786 case BUTCHER_DISASSEMBLE: {
9787 // Pick index of first item in the disassembly stack
9788 item *const target = &*disassembly_stacks[indexer_index].first;
9789 u.disassemble( item_location( map_cursor( u.pos() ), target ), true );
9790 }
9791 break;
9792 case BUTCHER_SALVAGE: {
9793 if( !salvage_iuse || !salvage_tool ) {
9794 debugmsg( "null salvage_iuse or salvage_tool" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "9794", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "null salvage_iuse or salvage_tool"
);
9795 } else {
9796 // Pick index of first item in the salvage stack
9797 item *const target = &*salvage_stacks[indexer_index].first;
9798 item_location item_loc( map_cursor( u.pos() ), target );
9799 salvage_iuse->try_to_cut_up( u, *salvage_tool, item_loc );
9800 }
9801 }
9802 break;
9803 }
9804}
9805
9806void game::reload( item_location &loc, bool prompt, bool empty )
9807{
9808 // bows etc. do not need to reload. select favorite ammo for them instead
9809 if( loc->has_flag( flag_RELOAD_AND_SHOOT ) ) {
9810 item::reload_option opt = u.select_ammo( loc, prompt );
9811 if( !opt ) {
9812 return;
9813 } else if( u.ammo_location && opt.ammo == u.ammo_location ) {
9814 u.ammo_location = item_location();
9815 } else {
9816 u.ammo_location = opt.ammo;
9817 }
9818 return;
9819 }
9820
9821 switch( u.rate_action_reload( *loc ) ) {
9822 case hint_rating::iffy:
9823 if( ( loc->is_ammo_container() || loc->is_magazine() ) && loc->ammo_remaining() > 0 &&
9824 loc->remaining_ammo_capacity() == 0 ) {
9825 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is already fully loaded!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s is already fully loaded!"
) ) ), loc->tname() );
9826 return;
9827 }
9828 if( loc->is_ammo_belt() ) {
9829 const auto &linkage = loc->type->magazine->linkage;
9830 if( linkage && !u.has_charges( *linkage, 1 ) ) {
9831 add_msg( m_info, _( "You need at least one %s to reload the %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need at least one %s to reload the %s!"
) ) ),
9832 item::nname( *linkage, 1 ), loc->tname() );
9833 return;
9834 }
9835 }
9836 if( loc->is_watertight_container() && loc->is_container_full() ) {
9837 add_msg( m_info, _( "The %s is already full!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s is already full!" ) )
), loc->tname() );
9838 return;
9839 }
9840
9841 // intentional fall-through
9842
9843 case hint_rating::cant:
9844 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't reload a %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't reload a %s!" ) ) ), loc->tname() );
9845 return;
9846
9847 case hint_rating::good:
9848 break;
9849 }
9850
9851 if( !u.has_item( *loc ) && !loc->has_flag( flag_ALLOWS_REMOTE_USE ) ) {
9852 loc = loc.obtain( u );
9853 if( !loc ) {
9854 add_msg( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
9855 return;
9856 }
9857 }
9858
9859 // for holsters and ammo pouches try to reload any contained item
9860 if( loc->type->can_use( "holster" ) && loc->num_item_stacks() == 1 ) {
9861 loc = item_location( loc, &loc->only_item() );
9862 }
9863
9864 item::reload_option opt = u.ammo_location &&
9865 loc->can_reload_with( *u.ammo_location.get_item(), false ) ?
9866 item::reload_option( &u, loc, u.ammo_location ) :
9867 u.select_ammo( loc, prompt, empty );
9868
9869 if( opt.ammo.get_item() == nullptr || ( opt.ammo.get_item()->is_frozen_liquid() &&
9870 !u.crush_frozen_liquid( opt.ammo ) ) ) {
9871 return;
9872 }
9873
9874 if( opt ) {
9875 const int extra_moves = loc->get_var( "dirt", 0 ) > 7800 ? 2500 : 0;
9876 if( extra_moves > 0 ) {
9877 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You struggle to reload the fouled %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You struggle to reload the fouled %s."
) ) ), loc->tname() );
9878 }
9879 u.assign_activity( reload_activity_actor( std::move( opt ), extra_moves ) );
9880 }
9881}
9882
9883// Reload something.
9884void game::reload_item()
9885{
9886 item_location item_loc = inv_map_splice( [&]( const item & it ) {
9887 return u.rate_action_reload( it ) == hint_rating::good;
9888 }, _( "Reload item" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Reload item" ) ) ), 1, _( "You have nothing to reload." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You have nothing to reload."
) ) ) );
9889
9890 if( !item_loc ) {
9891 add_msg( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
9892 return;
9893 }
9894
9895 reload( item_loc );
9896}
9897
9898void game::reload_wielded( bool prompt )
9899{
9900 item_location weapon = u.get_wielded_item();
9901 if( !weapon || !weapon->is_reloadable() ) {
9902 add_msg( _( "You aren't holding something you can reload." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You aren't holding something you can reload."
) ) ) );
9903 return;
9904 }
9905 reload( weapon, prompt );
9906}
9907
9908void game::reload_weapon( bool try_everything )
9909{
9910 // As a special streamlined activity, hitting reload repeatedly should:
9911 // Reload wielded gun
9912 // First reload a magazine if necessary.
9913 // Then load said magazine into gun.
9914 // Reload magazines that are compatible with the current gun.
9915 // Reload other guns in inventory.
9916 // Reload misc magazines in inventory.
9917 std::vector<item_location> reloadables = u.find_reloadables();
9918 std::sort( reloadables.begin(), reloadables.end(),
9919 [this]( const item_location & a, const item_location & b ) {
9920 // Non gun/magazines are sorted last and later ignored.
9921 if( !a->is_magazine() && !a->is_gun() ) {
9922 return false;
9923 }
9924 // Current wielded weapon comes first.
9925 if( this->u.is_wielding( *b ) ) {
9926 return false;
9927 }
9928 if( this->u.is_wielding( *a ) ) {
9929 return true;
9930 }
9931 // Second sort by affiliation with wielded gun
9932 item_location weapon = u.get_wielded_item();
9933 if( weapon ) {
9934 const bool mag_a = weapon->is_compatible( *a ).success();
9935 const bool mag_b = weapon->is_compatible( *b ).success();
9936 if( mag_a != mag_b ) {
9937 return mag_a;
9938 }
9939 }
9940 // Third sort by gun vs magazine,
9941 if( a->is_gun() != b->is_gun() ) {
9942 return a->is_gun();
9943 }
9944 // Finally sort by speed to reload.
9945 return ( a->get_reload_time() * a->remaining_ammo_capacity() ) <
9946 ( b->get_reload_time() * b->remaining_ammo_capacity() );
9947 } );
9948 for( item_location &candidate : reloadables ) {
9949 if( !candidate->is_magazine() && !candidate->is_gun() ) {
9950 continue;
9951 }
9952 std::vector<item::reload_option> ammo_list;
9953 u.list_ammo( candidate, ammo_list, false );
9954 if( !ammo_list.empty() ) {
9955 reload( candidate, false, false );
9956 return;
9957 }
9958 }
9959 // Just for testing, bail out here to avoid unwanted side effects.
9960 if( !try_everything ) {
9961 return;
9962 }
9963 // If we make it here and haven't found anything to reload, start looking elsewhere.
9964 const optional_vpart_position ovp = m.veh_at( u.pos() );
9965 if( ovp ) {
9966 const turret_data turret = ovp->vehicle().turret_query( ovp->pos() );
9967 if( turret.can_reload() ) {
9968 item::reload_option opt = u.select_ammo( turret.base(), true );
9969 if( opt ) {
9970 u.assign_activity( reload_activity_actor( std::move( opt ) ) );
9971 }
9972 }
9973 return;
9974 }
9975
9976 reload_item();
9977}
9978
9979void game::wield( item_location loc )
9980{
9981 if( !loc ) {
9982 debugmsg( "ERROR: tried to wield null item" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "9982", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "ERROR: tried to wield null item"
);
9983 return;
9984 }
9985 const item_location weapon = u.get_wielded_item();
9986 if( weapon && weapon != loc && weapon->has_item( *loc ) ) {
9987 add_msg( m_info, _( "You need to put the bag away before trying to wield something from it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need to put the bag away before trying to wield something from it."
) ) ) );
9988 return;
9989 }
9990 if( u.has_wield_conflicts( *loc ) ) {
9991 const bool is_unwielding = u.is_wielding( *loc );
9992 const auto ret = u.can_unwield( *loc );
9993
9994 if( !ret.success() ) {
9995 add_msg( m_info, "%s", ret.c_str() );
9996 }
9997
9998 if( !u.unwield() ) {
9999 return;
10000 }
10001
10002 if( is_unwielding ) {
10003 if( !u.martial_arts_data->selected_is_none() ) {
10004 u.martial_arts_data->martialart_use_message( u );
10005 }
10006 return;
10007 }
10008 }
10009 const auto ret = u.can_wield( *loc );
10010 if( !ret.success() ) {
10011 add_msg( m_info, "%s", ret.c_str() );
10012 }
10013 // Need to do this here because holster_actor::use() checks if/where the item is worn
10014 item &target = *loc.get_item();
10015 if( target.get_use( "holster" ) && !target.empty() ) {
10016 //~ %1$s: holster name
10017 if( query_yn( pgettext( "holster", "Draw from %1$s?" ),
10018 target.tname() ) ) {
10019 u.invoke_item( &target );
10020 return;
10021 }
10022 }
10023
10024 // Can't use loc.obtain() here because that would cause things to spill.
10025 item to_wield = *loc.get_item();
10026 item_location::type location_type = loc.where();
10027 tripoint pos = loc.position();
10028 const int obtain_cost = loc.obtain_cost( u );
10029 int worn_index = INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1);
10030
10031 // Need to account for case where we're trying to wield a weapon that belongs to someone else
10032 if( !avatar_action::check_stealing( u, *loc.get_item() ) ) {
10033 return;
10034 }
10035
10036 if( u.is_worn( *loc.get_item() ) ) {
10037 auto ret = u.can_takeoff( *loc.get_item() );
10038 if( !ret.success() ) {
10039 add_msg( m_info, "%s", ret.c_str() );
10040 return;
10041 }
10042 int item_pos = u.get_item_position( loc.get_item() );
10043 if( item_pos != INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1) ) {
10044 worn_index = Character::worn_position_to_index( item_pos );
10045 }
10046 }
10047 loc.remove_item();
10048 if( !u.wield( to_wield, obtain_cost ) ) {
10049 switch( location_type ) {
10050 case item_location::type::container:
10051 // this will not cause things to spill, as it is inside another item
10052 loc = loc.obtain( u );
10053 wield( loc );
10054 break;
10055 case item_location::type::character:
10056 if( worn_index != INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1) ) {
10057 u.worn.insert_item_at_index( to_wield, worn_index );
10058 } else {
10059 u.i_add( to_wield, true, nullptr, loc.get_item() );
10060 }
10061 break;
10062 case item_location::type::map:
10063 m.add_item( pos, to_wield );
10064 break;
10065 case item_location::type::vehicle: {
10066 const std::optional<vpart_reference> ovp = m.veh_at( pos ).cargo();
10067 // If we fail to return the item to the vehicle for some reason, add it to the map instead.
10068 if( !ovp || !ovp->vehicle().add_item( ovp->part(), to_wield ) ) {
10069 m.add_item( pos, to_wield );
10070 }
10071 break;
10072 }
10073 case item_location::type::invalid:
10074 debugmsg( "Failed wield from invalid item location" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "10074", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Failed wield from invalid item location"
);
10075 break;
10076 }
10077 return;
10078 }
10079}
10080
10081void game::wield()
10082{
10083 item_location loc = game_menus::inv::wield( u );
10084
10085 if( loc ) {
10086 wield( loc );
10087 } else {
10088 add_msg( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
10089 }
10090}
10091
10092bool game::check_safe_mode_allowed( bool repeat_safe_mode_warnings )
10093{
10094 if( !repeat_safe_mode_warnings && safe_mode_warning_logged ) {
10095 // Already warned player since safe_mode_warning_logged is set.
10096 return false;
10097 }
10098
10099 std::string msg_ignore = press_x( ACTION_IGNORE_ENEMY );
10100 if( !msg_ignore.empty() ) {
10101 std::wstring msg_ignore_wide = utf8_to_wstr( msg_ignore );
10102 // Operate on a wide-char basis to prevent corrupted multi-byte string
10103 msg_ignore_wide[0] = towlower( msg_ignore_wide[0] );
10104 msg_ignore = wstr_to_utf8( msg_ignore_wide );
10105 }
10106
10107 if( u.has_effect( effect_laserlocked ) ) {
10108 // Automatic and mandatory safemode. Make BLOODY sure the player notices!
10109 if( u.get_int_base() < 5 || u.has_trait( trait_PROF_CHURL ) ) {
10110 add_msg( game_message_params{ m_warning, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
10111 _( "There's an angry red dot on your body, %s to brush it off." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There's an angry red dot on your body, %s to brush it off."
) ) ), msg_ignore );
10112 } else {
10113 add_msg( game_message_params{ m_warning, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
10114 _( "You are being laser-targeted, %s to ignore." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are being laser-targeted, %s to ignore."
) ) ), msg_ignore );
10115 }
10116 safe_mode_warning_logged = true;
10117 return false;
10118 }
10119 if( safe_mode != SAFE_MODE_STOP ) {
10120 return true;
10121 }
10122 // Currently driving around, ignore the monster, they have no chance against a proper car anyway (-:
10123 if( u.controlling_vehicle && !get_option<bool>( "SAFEMODEVEH" ) ) {
10124 return true;
10125 }
10126 // Monsters around and we don't want to run
10127 std::string spotted_creature_text;
10128 const monster_visible_info &mon_visible = u.get_mon_visible();
10129 const std::vector<shared_ptr_fast<monster>> &new_seen_mon = mon_visible.new_seen_mon;
10130
10131 const nc_color mon_color = c_redget_all_colors().get(def_c_red);
10132 const nc_color dir_color = c_light_blueget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_blue);
10133 if( new_seen_mon.empty() ) {
10134 // naming consistent with code in game::mon_info
10135 spotted_creature_text = colorize( _( "a survivor" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "a survivor" ) ) ), mon_color );
10136 get_safemode().lastmon_whitelist = get_safemode().npc_type_name();
10137 } else if( new_seen_mon.size() == 1 ) {
10138 const shared_ptr_fast<monster> &mon = new_seen_mon.back();
10139 const std::string dist_text = string_format( _( "%d tiles" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%d tiles" ) ) ), rl_dist( u.pos(), mon->pos() ) );
10140 //~ %s: Cardinal/ordinal direction ("east")
10141 const std::string dir_text = string_format( _( "to the %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "to the %s" ) ) ),
10142 colorize( direction_name( direction_from( u.pos(), mon->pos() ) ), dir_color ) );
10143 //~ %1$s: Name of monster spotted ("headless zombie")
10144 //~ %2$s: Distance to monster ("17 tiles")
10145 //~ %3$s: Description of where the monster is ("to the east")
10146 spotted_creature_text = string_format( pgettext( "monster description", "%1$s %2$s %3$s" ),
10147 colorize( mon->name(), mon_color ),
10148 dist_text,
10149 dir_text );
10150 get_safemode().lastmon_whitelist = mon->name();
10151 } else {
10152 // We've got multiple monsters to inform about.
10153 // Find the range of distances.
10154 int min_dist = INT_MAX2147483647;
10155 int max_dist = 0;
10156 // Find the most frequent type to call out by name.
10157 std::unordered_map<std::string, std::vector<const monster *>> mons_by_name;
10158 for( const shared_ptr_fast<monster> &mon : new_seen_mon ) {
10159 min_dist = std::min( min_dist, rl_dist( u.pos(), mon->pos() ) );
10160 max_dist = std::max( min_dist, rl_dist( u.pos(), mon->pos() ) );
10161 mons_by_name[mon->name()].push_back( mon.get() );
10162 }
10163 const std::vector<const monster *> &most_frequent_mon = std::max_element( mons_by_name.begin(),
10164 mons_by_name.end(), []( const auto & a, const auto & b ) {
10165 return a.second.size() < b.second.size();
10166 } )->second;
10167
10168 const monster *const mon = most_frequent_mon.back();
10169 const std::string most_frequent_mon_text = colorize( most_frequent_mon.size() > 1 ?
10170 string_format( "%d %s",
10171 most_frequent_mon.size(), mon->name( most_frequent_mon.size() ) ) : mon->name(), mon_color );
10172
10173 const std::string dist_text = min_dist == max_dist ?
10174 //~ %d: Distance to all monsters ("7")
10175 string_format( _( "%d tiles" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%d tiles" ) ) ), max_dist ) :
10176 //~ %d, %d: Minimum and Maximum distance to the monsters ("5"; "20")
10177 string_format( _( "%d-%d tiles" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%d-%d tiles" ) ) ), min_dist, max_dist );
10178
10179 // If they're all in one or two directions, let's call that out.
10180 // Otherwise, we can say they're in "various directions", so it's clear they aren't clustered.
10181 std::set<direction> most_frequent_mon_dirs;
10182 std::transform( most_frequent_mon.begin(), most_frequent_mon.end(),
10183 std::inserter( most_frequent_mon_dirs,
10184 most_frequent_mon_dirs.begin() ), [&]( const monster * const mon ) {
10185 return direction_from( u.pos(), mon->pos() );
10186 } );
10187 std::string dir_text;
10188 if( most_frequent_mon_dirs.size() == 1 ) {
10189 //~ %s: Cardinal/ordinal direction ("east")
10190 dir_text = string_format( _( "to the %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "to the %s" ) ) ),
10191 colorize( direction_name( *most_frequent_mon_dirs.begin() ), dir_color ) );
10192 } else if( most_frequent_mon_dirs.size() == 2 ) {
10193 //~ %s, %s: Cardinal/ordinal directions ("east"; "southwest")
10194 dir_text = string_format( _( "to the %s and %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "to the %s and %s" ) ) ),
10195 colorize( direction_name( *most_frequent_mon_dirs.begin() ), dir_color ),
10196 colorize( direction_name( *std::next( most_frequent_mon_dirs.begin() ) ), dir_color ) );
10197 } else {
10198 dir_text = colorize( _( "in various directions" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "in various directions" ) ) ), dir_color );
10199 }
10200
10201 // Finally, let's mention that there are other monsters around that we didn't name explicitly.
10202 const size_t other_mon_count = new_seen_mon.size() - most_frequent_mon.size();
10203 std::string other_mon_text;
10204 if( other_mon_count > 0 ) {
10205 //~ %s: Description of other monster count ("4 others"), %d: How many other monsters there are
10206 other_mon_text = string_format( _( " and %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( " and %s" ) ) ),
10207 colorize( string_format( n_gettext( _( "%d other" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%d other" ) ) ), _( "%d others" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%d others" ) ) ),
10208 other_mon_count ), other_mon_count ), mon_color ) );
10209 }
10210
10211 //~ %1$s: Description of primary monster spotted ("3 fat zombies")
10212 //~ %2$s: Description of how far away the monsters are ("7 tiles" or "5-20 tiles")
10213 //~ %3$s: Description of where the primary monster is ("to the east and south")
10214 //~ %4$s: Description of any other monsters spotted (" and 4 others")
10215 spotted_creature_text = string_format( _( "%1$s %2$s %3$s%4$s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s %2$s %3$s%4$s" ) ) ), most_frequent_mon_text,
10216 dist_text,
10217 dir_text,
10218 other_mon_text );
10219 get_safemode().lastmon_whitelist = mon->name();
10220 }
10221
10222 std::string whitelist;
10223 if( !get_safemode().empty() ) {
10224 whitelist = string_format( _( ", or %s to whitelist the monster" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( ", or %s to whitelist the monster"
) ) ),
10225 press_x( ACTION_WHITELIST_ENEMY ) );
10226 }
10227
10228 const std::string msg_safe_mode = press_x( ACTION_TOGGLE_SAFEMODE );
10229 add_msg( game_message_params{ m_warning, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
10230 _( "Spotted %1$s -- safe mode is on! (%2$s to turn it off, %3$s to ignore monster%4$s)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Spotted %1$s -- safe mode is on! (%2$s to turn it off, %3$s to ignore monster%4$s)"
) ) ),
10231 spotted_creature_text, msg_safe_mode, msg_ignore, whitelist );
10232 safe_mode_warning_logged = true;
10233 return false;
10234}
10235
10236void game::set_safe_mode( safe_mode_type mode )
10237{
10238 safe_mode = mode;
10239 safe_mode_warning_logged = false;
10240}
10241
10242bool game::disable_robot( const tripoint &p )
10243{
10244 monster *const mon_ptr = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( p );
10245 if( !mon_ptr ) {
10246 return false;
10247 }
10248 monster &critter = *mon_ptr;
10249 if( !disable_activity_actor::can_disable_or_reprogram( critter ) ) {
10250 return false;
10251 }
10252
10253 const mtype_id mid = critter.type->id;
10254 const itype_id mon_item_id = critter.type->revert_to_itype;
10255 if( !mon_item_id.is_empty() &&
10256 query_yn( _( "Deactivate the %s?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Deactivate the %s?" ) ) ), critter.name() ) ) {
10257 const disable_activity_actor actor( p, disable_activity_actor::get_disable_turns(), false );
10258 u.assign_activity( actor );
10259 return true;
10260 }
10261 // Manhacks are special, they have their own menu here.
10262 if( mid == mon_manhack ) {
10263 int choice = UILIST_CANCEL;
10264 if( critter.has_effect( effect_docile ) ) {
10265 choice = uilist( _( "Reprogram the manhack?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Reprogram the manhack?" ) ) ), { _( "Engage targets." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Engage targets." ) ) ) } );
10266 } else {
10267 choice = uilist( _( "Reprogram the manhack?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Reprogram the manhack?" ) ) ), { _( "Follow me." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Follow me." ) ) ) } );
10268 }
10269
10270 if( choice == 0 ) {
10271 u.assign_activity( disable_activity_actor( p, disable_activity_actor::get_disable_turns(), true ) );
10272 }
10273 }
10274 return false;
10275}
10276
10277bool game::is_dangerous_tile( const tripoint &dest_loc ) const
10278{
10279 return !get_dangerous_tile( dest_loc ).empty();
10280}
10281
10282bool game::prompt_dangerous_tile( const tripoint &dest_loc ) const
10283{
10284 if( u.has_effect( effect_stunned ) || u.has_effect( effect_psi_stunned ) ) {
10285 return true;
10286 }
10287
10288 std::vector<std::string> harmful_stuff = get_dangerous_tile( dest_loc );
10289
10290 if( !harmful_stuff.empty() &&
10291 !query_yn( _( "Really step into %s?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Really step into %s?" ) ) ), enumerate_as_string( harmful_stuff ) ) ) {
10292 return false;
10293 }
10294 if( !harmful_stuff.empty() && u.is_mounted() && m.tr_at( dest_loc ) == tr_ledge ) {
10295 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Your %s refuses to move over that ledge!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %s refuses to move over that ledge!"
) ) ),
10296 u.mounted_creature->get_name() );
10297 return false;
10298 }
10299 return true;
10300}
10301
10302std::vector<std::string> game::get_dangerous_tile( const tripoint &dest_loc ) const
10303{
10304 if( u.is_blind() ) {
10305 return {}; // blinded players don't see dangerous tiles
10306 }
10307
10308 std::vector<std::string> harmful_stuff;
10309 const field fields_here = m.field_at( u.pos() );
10310 const auto veh_here = m.veh_at( u.pos() ).part_with_feature( "BOARDABLE", true );
10311 const auto veh_dest = m.veh_at( dest_loc ).part_with_feature( "BOARDABLE", true );
10312 const bool veh_here_inside = veh_here && veh_here->is_inside();
10313 const bool veh_dest_inside = veh_dest && veh_dest->is_inside();
10314
10315 for( const std::pair<const field_type_id, field_entry> &e : m.field_at( dest_loc ) ) {
10316 if( !u.is_dangerous_field( e.second ) ) {
10317 continue;
10318 }
10319
10320 const bool has_field_here = fields_here.find_field( e.first ) != nullptr;
10321 const bool empty_effects = e.second.field_effects().empty();
10322
10323 // if the field is dangerous but has no effects apparently this
10324 // means effects are hardcoded in map_field.cpp so we should...
10325 bool danger_dest = empty_effects; // ... warn if effects are empty
10326 bool danger_here = has_field_here && empty_effects;
10327 for( const field_effect &fe : e.second.field_effects() ) {
10328 if( !danger_dest ) {
10329 danger_dest = true;
10330 if( fe.immune_in_vehicle && veh_dest ) { // NOLINT(bugprone-branch-clone)
10331 danger_dest = false;
10332 } else if( fe.immune_inside_vehicle && veh_dest_inside ) {
10333 danger_dest = false;
10334 } else if( fe.immune_outside_vehicle && !veh_dest_inside ) {
10335 danger_dest = false;
10336 } else if( u.is_immune_effect( fe.id ) || u.check_immunity_data( fe.immunity_data ) ) {
10337 danger_dest = false;
10338 }
10339 }
10340 if( has_field_here && !danger_here ) {
10341 danger_here = true;
10342 if( fe.immune_in_vehicle && veh_here ) { // NOLINT(bugprone-branch-clone)
10343 danger_here = false;
10344 } else if( fe.immune_inside_vehicle && veh_here_inside ) {
10345 danger_here = false;
10346 } else if( fe.immune_outside_vehicle && !veh_here_inside ) {
10347 danger_here = false;
10348 } else if( u.is_immune_effect( fe.id ) || u.check_immunity_data( fe.immunity_data ) ) {
10349 danger_here = false;
10350 }
10351 }
10352 }
10353
10354 // don't warn if already in a field of the same type
10355 if( !danger_dest || danger_here ) {
10356 continue;
10357 }
10358
10359 harmful_stuff.push_back( e.second.name() );
10360 }
10361
10362 const trap &tr = m.tr_at( dest_loc );
10363 // HACK: Hack for now, later ledge should stop being a trap
10364 if( tr == tr_ledge ) {
10365 if( !veh_dest && !u.has_effect_with_flag( json_flag_LEVITATION ) ) {
10366 harmful_stuff.emplace_back( tr.name() );
10367 }
10368 } else if( tr.can_see( dest_loc, u ) && !tr.is_benign() && !veh_dest ) {
10369 harmful_stuff.emplace_back( tr.name() );
10370 }
10371
10372 static const std::set< bodypart_str_id > sharp_bps = {
10373 body_part_eyes, body_part_mouth, body_part_head,
10374 body_part_leg_l, body_part_leg_r, body_part_foot_l,
10375 body_part_foot_r, body_part_arm_l, body_part_arm_r,
10376 body_part_hand_l, body_part_hand_r, body_part_torso
10377 };
10378
10379 const auto sharp_bp_check = [this]( bodypart_id bp ) {
10380 return u.immune_to( bp, { damage_cut, 10 } );
10381 };
10382
10383 if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_ROUGH, dest_loc ) &&
10384 !m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_ROUGH, u.pos() ) &&
10385 !veh_dest &&
10386 ( u.get_armor_type( damage_bash, bodypart_id( "foot_l" ) ) < 5 ||
10387 u.get_armor_type( damage_bash, bodypart_id( "foot_r" ) ) < 5 ) ) { // NOLINT(bugprone-branch-clone)
10388 harmful_stuff.emplace_back( m.name( dest_loc ) );
10389 } else if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SHARP, dest_loc ) &&
10390 !m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SHARP, u.pos() ) &&
10391 !( u.in_vehicle || m.veh_at( dest_loc ) ) &&
10392 u.dex_cur < 78 &&
10393 !( u.is_mounted() &&
10394 u.mounted_creature->get_armor_type( damage_cut, bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) >= 10 ) &&
10395 !std::all_of( sharp_bps.begin(), sharp_bps.end(), sharp_bp_check ) ) {
10396 harmful_stuff.emplace_back( m.name( dest_loc ) );
10397 }
10398
10399 return harmful_stuff;
10400}
10401
10402bool game::walk_move( const tripoint &dest_loc, const bool via_ramp, const bool furniture_move )
10403{
10404 if( m.has_flag_ter( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SMALL_PASSAGE, dest_loc ) ) {
10405 if( u.get_size() > creature_size::medium ) {
10406 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You can't fit there." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't fit there." ) ) ) );
10407 return false; // character too large to fit through a tight passage
10408 }
10409 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
10410 monster *mount = u.mounted_creature.get();
10411 if( mount->get_size() > creature_size::medium ) {
10412 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Your mount can't fit there." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your mount can't fit there."
) ) ) );
10413 return false; // char's mount is too large for tight passages
10414 }
10415 }
10416 }
10417
10418 const int ramp_adjust = via_ramp ? u.posz() : dest_loc.z;
10419 const float dest_light_level = get_map().ambient_light_at( tripoint( dest_loc.xy(), ramp_adjust ) );
10420
10421 // Allow players with nyctophobia to move freely through cloudy and dark tiles
10422 const float nyctophobia_threshold = LIGHT_AMBIENT_LIT - 3.0f;
10423
10424 // Forbid players from moving through very dark tiles, unless they are running or took xanax
10425 if( u.has_flag( json_flag_NYCTOPHOBIA ) && !u.has_effect( effect_took_xanax ) && !u.is_running() &&
10426 dest_light_level < nyctophobia_threshold ) {
10427 add_msg( m_bad,
10428 _( "It's so dark and scary in there! You can't force yourself to walk into this tile. Switch to running movement mode to move there." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's so dark and scary in there! You can't force yourself to walk into this tile. Switch to running movement mode to move there."
) ) ) );
10429 return false;
10430 }
10431
10432 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
10433 monster *mons = u.mounted_creature.get();
10434 if( mons->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
10435 if( !mons->check_mech_powered() ) {
10436 add_msg( m_bad, _( "Your %s refuses to move as its batteries have been drained." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %s refuses to move as its batteries have been drained."
) ) ),
10437 mons->get_name() );
10438 return false;
10439 }
10440 }
10441 if( !mons->move_effects( false ) ) {
10442 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You cannot move as your %s isn't able to move." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot move as your %s isn't able to move."
) ) ), mons->get_name() );
10443 return false;
10444 }
10445 }
10446 const optional_vpart_position vp_here = m.veh_at( u.pos() );
10447 const optional_vpart_position vp_there = m.veh_at( dest_loc );
10448
10449 bool pushing = false; // moving -into- grabbed tile; skip check for move_cost > 0
10450 bool pulling = false; // moving -away- from grabbed tile; check for move_cost > 0
10451 bool shifting_furniture = false; // moving furniture and staying still; skip check for move_cost > 0
10452
10453 const tripoint furn_pos = u.pos() + u.grab_point;
10454 const tripoint furn_dest = dest_loc + tripoint( u.grab_point.xy(), 0 );
10455
10456 bool grabbed = u.get_grab_type() != object_type::NONE;
10457 if( grabbed ) {
10458 const tripoint dp = dest_loc - u.pos();
10459 pushing = dp.xy() == u.grab_point.xy();
10460 pulling = dp.xy() == -u.grab_point.xy();
10461 }
10462
10463 // Now make sure we're actually holding something
10464 const vehicle *grabbed_vehicle = nullptr;
10465 const optional_vpart_position vp_grabbed = m.veh_at( u.pos() + u.grab_point );
10466 if( grabbed && u.get_grab_type() == object_type::FURNITURE ) {
10467 // We only care about shifting, because it's the only one that can change our destination
10468 if( m.has_furn( u.pos() + u.grab_point ) ) {
10469 shifting_furniture = !pushing && !pulling;
10470 } else {
10471 // We were grabbing a furniture that isn't there
10472 grabbed = false;
10473 }
10474 } else if( grabbed && u.get_grab_type() == object_type::VEHICLE ) {
10475 grabbed_vehicle = veh_pointer_or_null( m.veh_at( u.pos() + u.grab_point ) );
10476 if( grabbed_vehicle == nullptr ) {
10477 // We were grabbing a vehicle that isn't there anymore
10478 grabbed = false;
10479 }
10480 } else if( grabbed ) {
10481 // We were grabbing something WEIRD, let's pretend we weren't
10482 grabbed = false;
10483 }
10484 if( u.grab_point != tripoint_zero && !grabbed && !furniture_move ) {
10485 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Can't find grabbed object." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can't find grabbed object." )
) ) );
10486 u.grab( object_type::NONE );
10487 }
10488
10489 if( m.impassable( dest_loc ) && !pushing && !shifting_furniture ) {
10490 if( vp_there && u.mounted_creature && u.mounted_creature->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) &&
10491 vp_there->vehicle().handle_potential_theft( u ) ) {
10492 tripoint diff = dest_loc - u.pos();
10493 if( diff.x < 0 ) {
10494 diff.x -= 2;
10495 } else if( diff.x > 0 ) {
10496 diff.x += 2;
10497 }
10498 if( diff.y < 0 ) {
10499 diff.y -= 2;
10500 } else if( diff.y > 0 ) {
10501 diff.y += 2;
10502 }
10503 u.mounted_creature->shove_vehicle( dest_loc + diff.xy(),
10504 dest_loc );
10505 }
10506 return false;
10507 }
10508 if( vp_there && !vp_there->vehicle().handle_potential_theft( u ) ) {
10509 return false;
10510 }
10511 if( u.is_mounted() && !pushing && vp_there ) {
10512 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You cannot board a vehicle whilst riding." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot board a vehicle whilst riding."
) ) ) );
10513 return false;
10514 }
10515 u.set_underwater( false );
10516
10517 if( vp_there && !u.move_in_vehicle( static_cast<Creature *>( &u ), dest_loc ) ) {
10518 return false;
10519 }
10520
10521 if( !shifting_furniture && !pushing && is_dangerous_tile( dest_loc ) ) {
10522 std::vector<std::string> harmful_stuff = get_dangerous_tile( dest_loc );
10523 if( harmful_stuff.size() == 1 && harmful_stuff[0] == "ledge" ) {
10524 iexamine::ledge( u, dest_loc );
10525 return true;
10526 } else if( get_option<std::string>( "DANGEROUS_TERRAIN_WARNING_PROMPT" ) == "ALWAYS" &&
10527 !prompt_dangerous_tile( dest_loc ) ) {
10528 return true;
10529 } else if( get_option<std::string>( "DANGEROUS_TERRAIN_WARNING_PROMPT" ) == "RUNNING" &&
10530 ( !u.is_running() || !prompt_dangerous_tile( dest_loc ) ) ) {
10531 add_msg( m_warning,
10532 _( "Stepping into that %1$s looks risky. Run into it if you wish to enter anyway." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stepping into that %1$s looks risky. Run into it if you wish to enter anyway."
) ) ),
10533 enumerate_as_string( harmful_stuff ) );
10534 return true;
10535 } else if( get_option<std::string>( "DANGEROUS_TERRAIN_WARNING_PROMPT" ) == "CROUCHING" &&
10536 ( !u.is_crouching() || !prompt_dangerous_tile( dest_loc ) ) ) {
10537 add_msg( m_warning,
10538 _( "Stepping into that %1$s looks risky. Crouch and move into it if you wish to enter anyway." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stepping into that %1$s looks risky. Crouch and move into it if you wish to enter anyway."
) ) ),
10539 enumerate_as_string( harmful_stuff ) );
10540 return true;
10541 } else if( get_option<std::string>( "DANGEROUS_TERRAIN_WARNING_PROMPT" ) == "NEVER" &&
10542 !u.is_running() ) {
10543 add_msg( m_warning,
10544 _( "Stepping into that %1$s looks risky. Run into it if you wish to enter anyway." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stepping into that %1$s looks risky. Run into it if you wish to enter anyway."
) ) ),
10545 enumerate_as_string( harmful_stuff ) );
10546 return true;
10547 }
10548 }
10549 // Used to decide whether to print a 'moving is slow message
10550 const int mcost_from = m.move_cost( u.pos() ); //calculate this _before_ calling grabbed_move
10551
10552 int modifier = 0;
10553 if( grabbed && u.get_grab_type() == object_type::FURNITURE && u.pos() + u.grab_point == dest_loc ) {
10554 modifier = -m.furn( dest_loc ).obj().movecost;
10555 }
10556
10557 const int mcost = m.combined_movecost( u.pos(), dest_loc, grabbed_vehicle, modifier,
10558 via_ramp );
10559
10560 if( !furniture_move && grabbed_move( dest_loc - u.pos(), via_ramp ) ) {
10561 return true;
10562 } else if( mcost == 0 ) {
10563 return false;
10564 }
10565 bool diag = trigdist && u.posx() != dest_loc.x && u.posy() != dest_loc.y;
10566 const int previous_moves = u.moves;
10567 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
10568 auto *crit = u.mounted_creature.get();
10569 if( !crit->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) &&
10570 ( m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_MOUNTABLE, dest_loc ) ||
10571 m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_BARRICADABLE_DOOR, dest_loc ) ||
10572 m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_OPENCLOSE_INSIDE, dest_loc ) ||
10573 m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_BARRICADABLE_DOOR_DAMAGED, dest_loc ) ||
10574 m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_BARRICADABLE_DOOR_REINFORCED, dest_loc ) ) ) {
10575 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You cannot pass obstacles whilst mounted." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot pass obstacles whilst mounted."
) ) ) );
10576 return false;
10577 }
10578 const double base_moves = u.run_cost( mcost, diag ) * 100.0 / crit->get_speed();
10579 const double encumb_moves = u.get_weight() / 4800.0_gram;
10580 u.moves -= static_cast<int>( std::ceil( base_moves + encumb_moves ) );
10581 crit->use_mech_power( u.current_movement_mode()->mech_power_use() );
10582 } else {
10583 u.moves -= u.run_cost( mcost, diag );
10584 /**
10585 TODO:
10586 This should really use the mounted creatures stamina, if mounted.
10587 Monsters don't currently have stamina however.
10588 For the time being just don't burn players stamina when mounted.
10589 */
10590 if( grabbed_vehicle == nullptr || grabbed_vehicle->wheelcache.empty() ) {
10591 //Burn normal amount of stamina if no vehicle grabbed or vehicle lacks wheels
10592 u.burn_move_stamina( previous_moves - u.moves );
10593 } else {
10594 //Burn half as much stamina if vehicle has wheels, without changing move time
10595 u.burn_move_stamina( 0.50 * ( previous_moves - u.moves ) );
10596 }
10597 }
10598 // Max out recoil & reset aim point
10599 u.recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
10600 u.last_target_pos = std::nullopt;
10601
10602 // Print a message if movement is slow
10603 const int mcost_to = m.move_cost( dest_loc ); //calculate this _after_ calling grabbed_move
10604 const bool fungus = m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FUNGUS, u.pos() ) ||
10605 m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FUNGUS,
10606 dest_loc ); //fungal furniture has no slowing effect on Mycus characters
10607 const bool slowed = ( ( !u.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_parkour ) && ( mcost_to > 2 ||
10608 mcost_from > 2 ) ) ||
10609 mcost_to > 4 || mcost_from > 4 ) ||
10610 ( !u.has_trait( trait_M_IMMUNE ) && fungus );
10611 if( slowed && !u.is_mounted() ) {
10612 // Unless u.pos() has a higher movecost than dest_loc, state that dest_loc is the cause
10613 if( mcost_to >= mcost_from ) {
10614 if( auto displayed_part = vp_there.part_displayed() ) {
10615 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Moving onto this %s is slow!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Moving onto this %s is slow!"
) ) ),
10616 displayed_part->part().name() );
10617 sfx::do_obstacle( displayed_part->part().info().id.str() );
10618 } else {
10619 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Moving onto this %s is slow!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Moving onto this %s is slow!"
) ) ), m.name( dest_loc ) );
10620 if( m.has_furn( dest_loc ) ) {
10621 sfx::do_obstacle( m.furn( dest_loc ).id().str() );
10622 } else {
10623 sfx::do_obstacle( m.ter( dest_loc ).id().str() );
10624 }
10625 }
10626 } else {
10627 if( auto displayed_part = vp_here.part_displayed() ) {
10628 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Moving off of this %s is slow!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Moving off of this %s is slow!"
) ) ),
10629 displayed_part->part().name() );
10630 sfx::do_obstacle( displayed_part->part().info().id.str() );
10631 } else {
10632 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Moving off of this %s is slow!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Moving off of this %s is slow!"
) ) ), m.name( u.pos() ) );
10633 if( m.has_furn( u.pos() ) ) {
10634 sfx::do_obstacle( m.furn( u.pos() ).id().str() );
10635 } else {
10636 sfx::do_obstacle( m.ter( u.pos() ).id().str() );
10637 }
10638 }
10639 }
10640 }
10641 if( !u.is_mounted() && u.has_trait( trait_LEG_TENT_BRACE ) &&
10642 u.is_barefoot() ) {
10643 // DX and IN are long suits for Cephalopods,
10644 // so this shouldn't cause too much hardship
10645 // Presumed that if it's swimmable, they're
10646 // swimming and won't stick
10647 ///\EFFECT_DEX decreases chance of tentacles getting stuck to the ground
10648
10649 ///\EFFECT_INT decreases chance of tentacles getting stuck to the ground
10650 if( !m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, dest_loc ) &&
10651 one_in( 80 + u.dex_cur + u.int_cur ) ) {
10652 add_msg( _( "Your tentacles stick to the ground, but you pull them free." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your tentacles stick to the ground, but you pull them free."
) ) ) );
10653 u.mod_fatigue( 1 );
10654 }
10655 }
10656
10657 u.make_footstep_noise();
10658
10659 //only clatter items every so often based on activity level
10660 if( to_turns<int>( calendar::turn - u.last_pocket_noise ) > std::max( static_cast<int>
10661 ( 10 - u.activity_level() ), 1 ) ) {
10662 u.make_clatter_sound();
10663 u.last_pocket_noise = calendar::turn;
10664 }
10665
10666 if( m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_HIDE_PLACE, dest_loc ) ) {
10667 add_msg( m_good, _( "You are hiding in the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are hiding in the %s." )
) ), m.name( dest_loc ) );
10668 }
10669
10670 tripoint oldpos = u.pos();
10671 tripoint old_abs_pos = m.getabs( oldpos );
10672
10673 bool moving = dest_loc != oldpos;
10674
10675 point submap_shift = place_player( dest_loc );
10676 point ms_shift = sm_to_ms_copy( submap_shift );
10677 oldpos = oldpos - ms_shift;
10678
10679 if( moving ) {
10680 cata_event_dispatch::avatar_moves( old_abs_pos, u, m );
10681
10682 // Add trail animation when sprinting
10683 if( get_option<bool>( "ANIMATIONS" ) && u.is_running() ) {
10684 if( u.posy() < oldpos.y ) {
10685 if( u.posx() < oldpos.x ) {
10686 draw_async_anim( oldpos, "run_nw", "\\", c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) );
10687 } else if( u.posx() == oldpos.x ) {
10688 draw_async_anim( oldpos, "run_n", "|", c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) );
10689 } else {
10690 draw_async_anim( oldpos, "run_ne", "/", c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) );
10691 }
10692 } else if( u.posy() == oldpos.y ) {
10693 if( u.posx() < oldpos.x ) {
10694 draw_async_anim( oldpos, "run_w", "-", c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) );
10695 } else {
10696 draw_async_anim( oldpos, "run_e", "-", c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) );
10697 }
10698 } else {
10699 if( u.posx() < oldpos.x ) {
10700 draw_async_anim( oldpos, "run_sw", "/", c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) );
10701 } else if( u.posx() == oldpos.x ) {
10702 draw_async_anim( oldpos, "run_s", "|", c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) );
10703 } else {
10704 draw_async_anim( oldpos, "run_se", "\\", c_light_grayget_all_colors().get(def_c_light_gray) );
10705 }
10706 }
10707 }
10708 }
10709
10710 if( furniture_move ) {
10711 // Adjust the grab_point if player has changed z level.
10712 u.grab_point.z -= u.posz() - oldpos.z;
10713 }
10714
10715 if( grabbed_vehicle ) {
10716 // Vehicle might be at different z level than the grabbed part.
10717 u.grab_point.z = vp_grabbed->pos().z - u.posz();
10718 }
10719
10720 if( pulling ) {
10721 const tripoint shifted_furn_pos = furn_pos - ms_shift;
10722 const tripoint shifted_furn_dest = furn_dest - ms_shift;
10723 const time_duration fire_age = m.get_field_age( shifted_furn_pos, fd_fire );
10724 const int fire_intensity = m.get_field_intensity( shifted_furn_pos, fd_fire );
10725 m.remove_field( shifted_furn_pos, fd_fire );
10726 m.set_field_intensity( shifted_furn_dest, fd_fire, fire_intensity );
10727 m.set_field_age( shifted_furn_dest, fd_fire, fire_age );
10728 }
10729
10730 if( u.is_hauling() ) {
10731 start_hauling( oldpos );
10732 }
10733
10734 on_move_effects();
10735
10736 return true;
10737}
10738
10739point game::place_player( const tripoint &dest_loc, bool quick )
10740{
10741 const optional_vpart_position vp1 = m.veh_at( dest_loc );
10742 if( const std::optional<std::string> label = vp1.get_label() ) {
10743 add_msg( m_info, _( "Label here: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Label here: %s" ) ) ), *label );
10744 }
10745 std::string signage = m.get_signage( dest_loc );
10746 if( !signage.empty() ) {
10747 if( !u.has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
10748 add_msg( m_info, _( "The sign says: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The sign says: %s" ) ) ), signage );
10749 } else {
10750 add_msg( m_info, _( "There is a sign here, but you are unable to read it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is a sign here, but you are unable to read it."
) ) ) );
10751 }
10752 }
10753 if( m.has_graffiti_at( dest_loc ) ) {
10754 if( !u.has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
10755 add_msg( m_info, _( "Written here: %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Written here: %s" ) ) ), m.graffiti_at( dest_loc ) );
10756 } else {
10757 add_msg( m_info, _( "Something is written here, but you are unable to read it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Something is written here, but you are unable to read it."
) ) ) );
10758 }
10759 }
10760 // TODO: Move the stuff below to a Character method so that NPCs can reuse it
10761 if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_ROUGH, dest_loc ) && ( !u.in_vehicle ) &&
10762 ( !u.is_mounted() ) ) {
10763 if( one_in( 5 ) && u.get_armor_type( damage_bash, bodypart_id( "foot_l" ) ) < rng( 2, 5 ) ) {
10764 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You hurt your left foot on the %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You hurt your left foot on the %s!"
) ) ),
10765 m.has_flag_ter( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_ROUGH, dest_loc ) ? m.tername( dest_loc ) : m.furnname(
10766 dest_loc ) );
10767 u.deal_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "foot_l" ), damage_instance( damage_cut, 1 ) );
10768 }
10769 if( one_in( 5 ) && u.get_armor_type( damage_bash, bodypart_id( "foot_r" ) ) < rng( 2, 5 ) ) {
10770 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You hurt your right foot on the %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You hurt your right foot on the %s!"
) ) ),
10771 m.has_flag_ter( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_ROUGH, dest_loc ) ? m.tername( dest_loc ) : m.furnname(
10772 dest_loc ) );
10773 u.deal_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "foot_l" ), damage_instance( damage_cut, 1 ) );
10774 }
10775 }
10776 ///\EFFECT_DEX increases chance of avoiding cuts on sharp terrain
10777 if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SHARP, dest_loc ) && !one_in( 3 ) &&
10778 !x_in_y( 1 + u.dex_cur / 2.0, 40 ) &&
10779 ( !u.in_vehicle && !m.veh_at( dest_loc ) ) && ( !u.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_parkour ) ||
10780 one_in( 4 ) ) && ( u.has_trait( trait_THICKSKIN ) ? !one_in( 8 ) : true ) ) {
10781 const int sharp_damage = rng( 1, 10 );
10782 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
10783 if( u.mounted_creature->get_armor_type( damage_cut, bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) < sharp_damage &&
10784 u.mounted_creature->get_hp() > sharp_damage ) {
10785 add_msg( _( "Your %s gets cut!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %s gets cut!" ) ) ), u.mounted_creature->get_name() );
10786 u.mounted_creature->apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "torso" ), sharp_damage );
10787 }
10788 } else {
10789 if( u.get_hp() > sharp_damage ) {
10790 const bodypart_id bp = u.get_random_body_part();
10791 if( u.deal_damage( nullptr, bp,
10792 damage_instance( damage_cut, sharp_damage ) ).total_damage() > 0 ) {
10793 //~ 1$s - bodypart name in accusative, 2$s is terrain name.
10794 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You cut your %1$s on the %2$s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cut your %1$s on the %2$s!"
) ) ),
10795 body_part_name_accusative( bp ),
10796 m.has_flag_ter( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SHARP, dest_loc ) ? m.tername( dest_loc ) : m.furnname(
10797 dest_loc ) );
10798 if( !u.has_flag( json_flag_INFECTION_IMMUNE ) ) {
10799 const int chance_in = u.has_trait( trait_INFRESIST ) ? 1024 : 256;
10800 if( one_in( chance_in ) ) {
10801 u.add_effect( effect_tetanus, 1_turns, true );
10802 }
10803 }
10804 }
10805 }
10806 }
10807 }
10808 if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_UNSTABLE, dest_loc ) &&
10809 !u.is_mounted() && !m.has_vehicle_floor( dest_loc ) ) {
10810 u.add_effect( effect_bouldering, 1_turns, true );
10811 } else if( u.has_effect( effect_bouldering ) ) {
10812 u.remove_effect( effect_bouldering );
10813 }
10814 if( m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NO_SIGHT, dest_loc ) ) {
10815 u.add_effect( effect_no_sight, 1_turns, true );
10816 } else if( u.has_effect( effect_no_sight ) ) {
10817 u.remove_effect( effect_no_sight );
10818 }
10819
10820 // If we moved out of the nonant, we need update our map data
10821 if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, dest_loc ) && u.has_effect( effect_onfire ) ) {
10822 add_msg( _( "The water puts out the flames!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The water puts out the flames!"
) ) ) );
10823 u.remove_effect( effect_onfire );
10824 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
10825 monster *mon = u.mounted_creature.get();
10826 if( mon->has_effect( effect_onfire ) ) {
10827 mon->remove_effect( effect_onfire );
10828 }
10829 }
10830 }
10831
10832 if( monster *const mon_ptr = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( dest_loc ) ) {
10833 // We displaced a monster. It's probably a bug if it wasn't a friendly mon...
10834 // Immobile monsters can't be displaced.
10835 monster &critter = *mon_ptr;
10836 // TODO: handling for ridden creatures other than players mount.
10837 if( !critter.has_effect( effect_ridden ) ) {
10838 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
10839 std::vector<tripoint> maybe_valid;
10840 for( const tripoint &jk : m.points_in_radius( critter.pos(), 1 ) ) {
10841 if( is_empty( jk ) ) {
10842 maybe_valid.push_back( jk );
10843 }
10844 }
10845 bool moved = false;
10846 while( !maybe_valid.empty() ) {
10847 if( critter.move_to( random_entry_removed( maybe_valid ) ) ) {
10848 add_msg( _( "You push the %s out of the way." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You push the %s out of the way."
) ) ), critter.name() );
10849 moved = true;
10850 }
10851 }
10852 if( !moved ) {
10853 add_msg( _( "There is no room to push the %s out of the way." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is no room to push the %s out of the way."
) ) ), critter.name() );
10854 return u.pos().xy();
10855 }
10856 } else {
10857 // Force the movement even though the player is there right now.
10858 const bool moved = critter.move_to( u.pos(), /*force=*/false, /*step_on_critter=*/true );
10859 if( moved ) {
10860 add_msg( _( "You displace the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You displace the %s." ) ) ), critter.name() );
10861 } else {
10862 add_msg( _( "You cannot move the %s out of the way." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot move the %s out of the way."
) ) ), critter.name() );
10863 return u.pos().xy();
10864 }
10865 }
10866 } else if( !u.has_effect( effect_riding ) ) {
10867 add_msg( _( "You cannot move the %s out of the way." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot move the %s out of the way."
) ) ), critter.name() );
10868 return u.pos().xy();
10869 }
10870 }
10871
10872 // If the player is in a vehicle, unboard them from the current part
10873 bool was_in_control_same_pos = false;
10874 if( u.in_vehicle ) {
10875 if( u.pos() == dest_loc ) {
10876 was_in_control_same_pos = true;
10877 } else {
10878 m.unboard_vehicle( u.pos() );
10879 }
10880 }
10881 // Move the player
10882 // Start with z-level, to make it less likely that old functions (2D ones) freak out
10883 bool z_level_changed = false;
10884 if( dest_loc.z != m.get_abs_sub().z() ) {
10885 z_level_changed = vertical_shift( dest_loc.z );
10886 }
10887
10888 if( u.is_hauling() && ( !m.can_put_items( dest_loc ) ||
10889 m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, dest_loc ) ||
10890 vp1 ) ) {
10891 u.stop_hauling();
10892 }
10893 u.setpos( dest_loc );
10894 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
10895 monster *mon = u.mounted_creature.get();
10896 mon->setpos( dest_loc );
10897 mon->process_triggers();
10898 m.creature_in_field( *mon );
10899 }
10900 point submap_shift = update_map( u, z_level_changed );
10901 // Important: don't use dest_loc after this line. `update_map` may have shifted the map
10902 // and dest_loc was not adjusted and therefore is still in the un-shifted system and probably wrong.
10903 // If you must use it you can calculate the position in the new, shifted system with
10904 // adjusted_pos = ( old_pos.x - submap_shift.x * SEEX, old_pos.y - submap_shift.y * SEEY, old_pos.z )
10905
10906 //Auto pulp or butcher and Auto foraging
10907 if( !quick && get_option<bool>( "AUTO_FEATURES" ) && mostseen == 0 && !u.is_mounted() ) {
10908 static constexpr std::array<direction, 8> adjacentDir = {
10909 direction::NORTH, direction::NORTHEAST, direction::EAST, direction::SOUTHEAST,
10910 direction::SOUTH, direction::SOUTHWEST, direction::WEST, direction::NORTHWEST
10911 };
10912
10913 const std::string forage_type = get_option<std::string>( "AUTO_FORAGING" );
10914 if( forage_type != "off" ) {
10915 const auto forage = [&]( const tripoint & pos ) {
10916 const ter_t &xter_t = *m.ter( pos );
10917 const furn_t &xfurn_t = *m.furn( pos );
10918 const bool forage_everything = forage_type == "all";
10919 const bool forage_bushes = forage_everything || forage_type == "bushes";
10920 const bool forage_trees = forage_everything || forage_type == "trees";
10921 const bool forage_crops = forage_everything || forage_type == "crops";
10922 if( !xter_t.can_examine( pos ) && !xfurn_t.can_examine( pos ) ) {
10923 return;
10924 } else if( ( forage_bushes && xter_t.has_examine( iexamine::shrub_marloss ) ) ||
10925 ( forage_bushes && xter_t.has_examine( iexamine::shrub_wildveggies ) ) ||
10926 ( forage_bushes && xter_t.has_examine( iexamine::harvest_ter_nectar ) ) ||
10927 ( forage_trees && xter_t.has_examine( iexamine::tree_marloss ) ) ||
10928 ( forage_trees && xter_t.has_examine( iexamine::harvest_ter ) ) ||
10929 ( forage_trees && xter_t.has_examine( iexamine::harvest_ter_nectar ) ) ||
10930 ( forage_crops && xter_t.has_examine( iexamine::harvest_plant_ex ) )
10931 ) {
10932 xter_t.examine( u, pos );
10933 } else if( ( forage_everything && xfurn_t.has_examine( iexamine::harvest_furn ) ) ||
10934 ( forage_everything && xfurn_t.has_examine( iexamine::harvest_furn_nectar ) ) ||
10935 ( forage_crops && xfurn_t.has_examine( iexamine::harvest_plant_ex ) )
10936 ) {
10937 xfurn_t.examine( u, pos );
10938 }
10939 };
10940
10941 for( const direction &elem : adjacentDir ) {
10942 forage( u.pos() + displace_XY( elem ) );
10943 }
10944 }
10945
10946 const std::string pulp_butcher = get_option<std::string>( "AUTO_PULP_BUTCHER" );
10947 if( pulp_butcher == "butcher" &&
10948 u.max_quality( qual_BUTCHER, PICKUP_RANGE ) > INT_MIN(-2147483647 -1) ) {
10949 std::vector<item *> corpses;
10950
10951 for( item &it : m.i_at( u.pos() ) ) {
10952 corpses.push_back( &it );
10953 }
10954
10955 if( !corpses.empty() ) {
10956 u.assign_activity( ACT_BUTCHER, 0, true );
10957 for( item *it : corpses ) {
10958 u.activity.targets.emplace_back( map_cursor( u.pos() ), it );
10959 }
10960 }
10961 } else if( pulp_butcher == "pulp" || pulp_butcher == "pulp_adjacent" ||
10962 pulp_butcher == "pulp_zombie_only" || pulp_butcher == "pulp_adjacent_zombie_only" ) {
10963 const bool acid_immune = u.is_immune_damage( damage_acid ) || u.is_immune_field( fd_acid );
10964 const auto pulp = [&]( const tripoint & pos ) {
10965 for( const item &maybe_corpse : m.i_at( pos ) ) {
10966 if( maybe_corpse.is_corpse() && maybe_corpse.can_revive() &&
10967 ( !maybe_corpse.get_mtype()->bloodType().obj().has_acid || acid_immune ) ) {
10968
10969 if( pulp_butcher == "pulp_zombie_only" || pulp_butcher == "pulp_adjacent_zombie_only" ) {
10970 if( !maybe_corpse.get_mtype()->has_flag( mon_flag_REVIVES ) ) {
10971 continue;
10972 }
10973 }
10974
10975 u.assign_activity( ACT_PULP, calendar::INDEFINITELY_LONG, 0 );
10976 u.activity.placement = m.getglobal( pos );
10977 u.activity.auto_resume = true;
10978 u.activity.str_values.emplace_back( "auto_pulp_no_acid" );
10979 return;
10980 }
10981 }
10982 };
10983
10984 if( pulp_butcher == "pulp_adjacent" || pulp_butcher == "pulp_adjacent_zombie_only" ) {
10985 for( const direction &elem : adjacentDir ) {
10986 pulp( u.pos() + displace_XY( elem ) );
10987 }
10988 } else {
10989 pulp( u.pos() );
10990 }
10991 }
10992 }
10993
10994 // Auto pickup
10995 if( !quick && !u.is_mounted() && get_option<bool>( "AUTO_PICKUP" ) && !u.is_hauling() &&
10996 ( !get_option<bool>( "AUTO_PICKUP_SAFEMODE" ) ||
10997 !u.get_mon_visible().has_dangerous_creature_in_proximity ) &&
10998 ( m.has_items( u.pos() ) || get_option<bool>( "AUTO_PICKUP_ADJACENT" ) ) ) {
10999 Pickup::autopickup( u.pos() );
11000 }
11001
11002 // If the new tile is a boardable part, board it
11003 if( !was_in_control_same_pos && vp1.part_with_feature( "BOARDABLE", true ) && !u.is_mounted() ) {
11004 m.board_vehicle( u.pos(), &u );
11005 }
11006
11007 // Traps!
11008 // Try to detect.
11009 u.search_surroundings();
11010 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
11011 m.creature_on_trap( *u.mounted_creature );
11012 } else {
11013 m.creature_on_trap( u );
11014 }
11015 // Drench the player if swimmable
11016 if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, u.pos() ) &&
11017 !m.has_flag_furn( "BRIDGE", u.pos() ) &&
11018 !( u.is_mounted() || ( u.in_vehicle && vp1->vehicle().can_float() ) ) ) {
11019 u.drench( 80, u.get_drenching_body_parts( false, false ),
11020 false );
11021 }
11022
11023 // List items here
11024 if( !quick && !m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SEALED, u.pos() ) ) {
11025 if( get_option<bool>( "NO_AUTO_PICKUP_ZONES_LIST_ITEMS" ) ||
11026 !check_zone( zone_type_NO_AUTO_PICKUP, u.pos() ) ) {
11027 if( u.is_blind() && !m.i_at( u.pos() ).empty() ) {
11028 add_msg( _( "There's something here, but you can't see what it is." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There's something here, but you can't see what it is."
) ) ) );
11029 } else if( m.has_items( u.pos() ) ) {
11030 std::vector<std::string> names;
11031 std::vector<size_t> counts;
11032 std::vector<item> items;
11033 for( item &tmpitem : m.i_at( u.pos() ) ) {
11034
11035 std::string next_tname = tmpitem.tname();
11036 std::string next_dname = tmpitem.display_name();
11037 bool by_charges = tmpitem.count_by_charges();
11038 bool got_it = false;
11039 for( size_t i = 0; i < names.size(); ++i ) {
11040 if( by_charges && next_tname == names[i] ) {
11041 counts[i] += tmpitem.charges;
11042 got_it = true;
11043 break;
11044 } else if( next_dname == names[i] ) {
11045 counts[i] += 1;
11046 got_it = true;
11047 break;
11048 }
11049 }
11050 if( !got_it ) {
11051 if( by_charges ) {
11052 names.push_back( tmpitem.tname( tmpitem.charges ) );
11053 counts.push_back( tmpitem.charges );
11054 } else {
11055 names.push_back( tmpitem.display_name( 1 ) );
11056 counts.push_back( 1 );
11057 }
11058 items.push_back( tmpitem );
11059 }
11060 if( names.size() > 10 ) {
11061 break;
11062 }
11063 }
11064 for( size_t i = 0; i < names.size(); ++i ) {
11065 if( !items[i].count_by_charges() ) {
11066 names[i] = items[i].display_name( counts[i] );
11067 } else {
11068 names[i] = items[i].tname( counts[i] );
11069 }
11070 }
11071 int and_the_rest = 0;
11072 for( size_t i = 0; i < names.size(); ++i ) {
11073 //~ number of items: "<number> <item>"
11074 std::string fmt = n_gettext( "%1$d %2$s", "%1$d %2$s", counts[i] );
11075 names[i] = string_format( fmt, counts[i], names[i] );
11076 // Skip the first two.
11077 if( i > 1 ) {
11078 and_the_rest += counts[i];
11079 }
11080 }
11081
11082 if( get_option<bool>( "LOG_ITEMS_ON_THE_GROUND" ) ) {
11083 if( names.size() == 1 ) {
11084 add_msg( _( "You see here %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You see here %s." ) ) ), names[0] );
11085 } else if( names.size() == 2 ) {
11086 add_msg( _( "You see here %s and %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You see here %s and %s." ) )
), names[0], names[1] );
11087 } else if( names.size() == 3 ) {
11088 add_msg( _( "You see here %s, %s, and %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You see here %s, %s, and %s."
) ) ), names[0], names[1], names[2] );
11089 } else if( and_the_rest < 7 ) {
11090 add_msg( n_gettext( "You see here %s, %s and %d more item.",
11091 "You see here %s, %s and %d more items.",
11092 and_the_rest ),
11093 names[0], names[1], and_the_rest );
11094 } else {
11095 add_msg( _( "You see here %s and many more items." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You see here %s and many more items."
) ) ), names[0] );
11096 }
11097 }
11098 }
11099 }
11100 }
11101
11102 if( !was_in_control_same_pos &&
11103 ( vp1.part_with_feature( "CONTROL_ANIMAL", true ) ||
11104 vp1.part_with_feature( "CONTROLS", true ) ) && u.in_vehicle && !u.is_mounted() ) {
11105 add_msg( _( "There are vehicle controls here." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There are vehicle controls here."
) ) ) );
11106 if( !u.has_trait( trait_WAYFARER ) ) {
11107 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s to drive." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s to drive." ) ) ), press_x( ACTION_CONTROL_VEHICLE ) );
11108 }
11109 } else if( vp1.part_with_feature( "CONTROLS", true ) && u.in_vehicle &&
11110 u.is_mounted() ) {
11111 add_msg( _( "There are vehicle controls here but you cannot reach them whilst mounted." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There are vehicle controls here but you cannot reach them whilst mounted."
) ) ) );
11112 }
11113 return submap_shift;
11114}
11115
11116void game::place_player_overmap( const tripoint_abs_omt &om_dest, bool move_player )
11117{
11118 // if player is teleporting around, they don't bring their horse with them
11119 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
11120 u.remove_effect( effect_riding );
11121 u.mounted_creature->remove_effect( effect_ridden );
11122 u.mounted_creature = nullptr;
11123 }
11124 // offload the active npcs.
11125 unload_npcs();
11126 for( monster &critter : all_monsters() ) {
11127 despawn_monster( critter );
11128 }
11129 if( u.in_vehicle ) {
11130 m.unboard_vehicle( u.pos() );
11131 }
11132 for( int z = -OVERMAP_DEPTH; z <= OVERMAP_HEIGHT; z++ ) {
11133 m.clear_vehicle_list( z );
11134 }
11135 m.rebuild_vehicle_level_caches();
11136 m.access_cache( m.get_abs_sub().z() ).map_memory_cache_dec.reset();
11137 m.access_cache( m.get_abs_sub().z() ).map_memory_cache_ter.reset();
11138 // offset because load_map expects the coordinates of the top left corner, but the
11139 // player will be centered in the middle of the map.
11140 const tripoint_abs_sm map_sm_pos =
11141 project_to<coords::sm>( om_dest ) - point( HALF_MAPSIZE, HALF_MAPSIZE );
11142 const tripoint player_pos( u.pos().xy(), map_sm_pos.z() );
11143 load_map( map_sm_pos );
11144 load_npcs();
11145 m.spawn_monsters( true ); // Static monsters
11146 update_overmap_seen();
11147 // update weather now as it could be different on the new location
11148 weather.nextweather = calendar::turn;
11149 if( move_player ) {
11150 place_player( player_pos );
11151 }
11152}
11153
11154bool game::phasing_move( const tripoint &dest_loc, const bool via_ramp )
11155{
11156 const units::energy trigger_cost = bio_probability_travel->power_trigger;
11157
11158 if( !u.has_active_bionic( bio_probability_travel ) ||
11159 u.get_power_level() < trigger_cost ) {
11160 return false;
11161 }
11162
11163 if( dest_loc.z != u.posz() && !via_ramp ) {
11164 // No vertical phasing yet
11165 return false;
11166 }
11167
11168 //probability travel through walls but not water
11169 tripoint dest = dest_loc;
11170 // tile is impassable
11171 int tunneldist = 0;
11172 const point d( sgn( dest.x - u.posx() ), sgn( dest.y - u.posy() ) );
11173 creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
11174 while( m.impassable( dest ) ||
11175 ( creatures.creature_at( dest ) != nullptr && tunneldist > 0 ) ) {
11176 //add 1 to tunnel distance for each impassable tile in the line
11177 tunneldist += 1;
11178 //Being dimensionally anchored prevents quantum shenanigans.
11179 if( u.worn_with_flag( flag_DIMENSIONAL_ANCHOR ) ||
11180 u.has_flag( flag_DIMENSIONAL_ANCHOR ) ) {
11181 u.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You are repelled by the barrier!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are repelled by the barrier!"
) ) ) );
11182 u.mod_power_level( -trigger_cost ); //cost of tunneling one tile.
11183 return false;
11184 }
11185 if( tunneldist * trigger_cost >
11186 u.get_power_level() ) { //oops, not enough energy! Tunneling costs 250 bionic power per impassable tile
11187 add_msg( _( "You try to quantum tunnel through the barrier but are reflected! Try again with more energy!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You try to quantum tunnel through the barrier but are reflected! Try again with more energy!"
) ) ) );
11188 u.mod_power_level( -trigger_cost );
11189 return false;
11190 }
11191 if( tunneldist > 24 ) {
11192 add_msg( m_info, _( "It's too dangerous to tunnel that far!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's too dangerous to tunnel that far!"
) ) ) );
11193 u.mod_power_level( -trigger_cost );
11194 return false;
11195 }
11196
11197 dest.x += d.x;
11198 dest.y += d.y;
11199 }
11200
11201 if( tunneldist != 0 ) {
11202 if( u.in_vehicle ) {
11203 m.unboard_vehicle( u.pos() );
11204 }
11205
11206 add_msg( _( "You quantum tunnel through the %d-tile wide barrier!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You quantum tunnel through the %d-tile wide barrier!"
) ) ), tunneldist );
11207 //tunneling costs 250 bionic power per impassable tile
11208 u.mod_power_level( -( tunneldist * trigger_cost ) );
11209 u.moves -= 100; //tunneling costs 100 moves
11210 u.setpos( dest );
11211
11212 if( m.veh_at( u.pos() ).part_with_feature( "BOARDABLE", true ) ) {
11213 m.board_vehicle( u.pos(), &u );
11214 }
11215
11216 u.grab( object_type::NONE );
11217 on_move_effects();
11218 m.creature_on_trap( u );
11219 return true;
11220 }
11221
11222 return false;
11223}
11224
11225bool game::can_move_furniture( tripoint fdest, const tripoint &dp )
11226{
11227 const bool pulling_furniture = dp.xy() == -u.grab_point.xy();
11228 const bool has_floor = m.has_floor_or_water( fdest );
11229 creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
11230 bool is_ramp_or_road = m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP_DOWN, fdest ) ||
11231 m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP_UP, fdest ) ||
11232 m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_ROAD, fdest );
11233 return m.passable( fdest ) &&
11234 creatures.creature_at<npc>( fdest ) == nullptr &&
11235 creatures.creature_at<monster>( fdest ) == nullptr &&
11236 ( !pulling_furniture || is_empty( u.pos() + dp ) ) &&
11237 ( !has_floor || m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FLAT, fdest ) ||
11238 is_ramp_or_road ) &&
11239 !m.has_furn( fdest ) &&
11240 !m.veh_at( fdest ) &&
11241 ( !has_floor || m.tr_at( fdest ).is_null() );
11242}
11243
11244int game::grabbed_furn_move_time( const tripoint &dp )
11245{
11246 // Furniture: pull, push, or standing still and nudging object around.
11247 // Can push furniture out of reach.
11248 tripoint fpos = u.pos() + u.grab_point;
11249 // supposed position of grabbed furniture
11250 if( !m.has_furn( fpos ) ) {
11251 return 0;
11252 }
11253
11254 tripoint fdest = fpos + tripoint( dp.xy(), 0 ); // intended destination of furniture.
11255
11256 const bool canmove = can_move_furniture( fdest, dp );
11257 const furn_t &furntype = m.furn( fpos ).obj();
11258 const int dst_items = m.i_at( fdest ).size();
11259
11260 const bool only_liquid_items = std::all_of( m.i_at( fdest ).begin(), m.i_at( fdest ).end(),
11261 [&]( item & liquid_item ) {
11262 return liquid_item.made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID );
11263 } );
11264
11265 const bool dst_item_ok = !m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NOITEM, fdest ) &&
11266 !m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, fdest ) &&
11267 !m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DESTROY_ITEM, fdest ) &&
11268 only_liquid_items;
11269 const bool src_item_ok = m.furn( fpos ).obj().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_CONTAINER ) ||
11270 m.furn( fpos ).obj().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FIRE_CONTAINER ) ||
11271 m.furn( fpos ).obj().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SEALED );
11272
11273 int str_req = furntype.move_str_req;
11274 // Factor in weight of items contained in the furniture.
11275 units::mass furniture_contents_weight = 0_gram;
11276 for( item &contained_item : m.i_at( fpos ) ) {
11277 furniture_contents_weight += contained_item.weight();
11278 }
11279 str_req += furniture_contents_weight / 4_kilogram;
11280 //ARM_STR affects dragging furniture
11281 int str = u.get_arm_str();
11282
11283 const float weary_mult = 1.0f / u.exertion_adjusted_move_multiplier();
11284 if( !canmove ) { // NOLINT(bugprone-branch-clone)
11285 return 50 * weary_mult;
11286 } else if( str_req > str &&
11287 one_in( std::max( 20 - ( str_req - str ), 2 ) ) ) {
11288 return 100 * weary_mult;
11289 } else if( !src_item_ok && !dst_item_ok && dst_items > 0 ) {
11290 return 50 * weary_mult;
11291 }
11292 int moves_total = 0;
11293 moves_total = str_req * 10;
11294 // Additional penalty if we can't comfortably move it.
11295 if( str_req > str ) {
11296 int move_penalty = std::pow( str_req, 2.0 ) + 100.0;
11297 if( move_penalty <= 1000 ) {
11298 if( str >= str_req - 3 ) {
11299 moves_total += std::max( 3000, move_penalty * 10 ) * weary_mult;
11300 } else {
11301 moves_total += 100 * weary_mult;
11302 return moves_total;
11303 }
11304 }
11305 moves_total += move_penalty;
11306 }
11307 return moves_total;
11308}
11309
11310bool game::grabbed_furn_move( const tripoint &dp )
11311{
11312 // Furniture: pull, push, or standing still and nudging object around.
11313 // Can push furniture out of reach.
11314 tripoint fpos = u.pos() + u.grab_point;
11315 // supposed position of grabbed furniture
11316 if( !m.has_furn( fpos ) ) {
