11317 // Where did it go? We're grabbing thin air so reset.
11318 add_msg( m_info, _( "No furniture at grabbed point." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "No furniture at grabbed point."
) ) ) );
11319 u.grab( object_type::NONE );
11320 return false;
11321 }
11322
11323 int ramp_offset = 0;
11324 // Furniture could be on a ramp at different time than player so adjust for that.
11325 if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP_UP, fpos + tripoint( dp.xy(), 0 ) ) ) {
11326 ramp_offset = 1;
11327 } else if( m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_RAMP_DOWN, fpos + tripoint( dp.xy(), 0 ) ) ) {
11328 ramp_offset = -1;
11329 }
11330
11331 const bool pushing_furniture = dp.xy() == u.grab_point.xy();
11332 const bool pulling_furniture = dp.xy() == -u.grab_point.xy();
11333 const bool shifting_furniture = !pushing_furniture && !pulling_furniture;
11334
11335 // Intended destination of furniture.
11336 const tripoint fdest = fpos + tripoint( dp.xy(), ramp_offset );
11337
11338 // Unfortunately, game::is_empty fails for tiles we're standing on,
11339 // which will forbid pulling, so:
11340 const bool canmove = can_move_furniture( fdest, dp );
11341 // @TODO: it should be possible to move over invisible traps. This should probably
11342 // trigger the trap.
11343 // The current check (no move if trap) allows a player to detect invisible traps by
11344 // attempting to move stuff onto it.
11345
11346 const furn_t furntype = m.furn( fpos ).obj();
11347 const int src_items = m.i_at( fpos ).size();
11348 const int dst_items = m.i_at( fdest ).size();
11349
11350 const bool only_liquid_items = std::all_of( m.i_at( fdest ).begin(), m.i_at( fdest ).end(),
11351 [&]( item & liquid_item ) {
11352 return liquid_item.made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID );
11353 } );
11354
11355 const bool dst_item_ok = !m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NOITEM, fdest ) &&
11356 !m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, fdest ) &&
11357 !m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DESTROY_ITEM, fdest );
11358
11359 const bool src_item_ok = m.furn( fpos ).obj().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_CONTAINER ) ||
11360 m.furn( fpos ).obj().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FIRE_CONTAINER ) ||
11361 m.furn( fpos ).obj().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SEALED );
11362
11363 const int fire_intensity = m.get_field_intensity( fpos, fd_fire );
11364 time_duration fire_age = m.get_field_age( fpos, fd_fire );
11365
11366 int str_req = furntype.move_str_req;
11367 // Factor in weight of items contained in the furniture.
11368 units::mass furniture_contents_weight = 0_gram;
11369 for( item &contained_item : m.i_at( fpos ) ) {
11370 furniture_contents_weight += contained_item.weight();
11371 }
11372 str_req += furniture_contents_weight / 4_kilogram;
11373 int str = u.get_arm_str();
11374
11375 if( !canmove ) {
11376 // TODO: What is something?
11377 add_msg( _( "The %s collides with something." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s collides with something."
) ) ), furntype.name() );
11378 return true;
11379 } else if( str_req > str && u.get_perceived_pain() > 40 &&
11380 !u.has_trait( trait_CENOBITE ) && !u.has_trait( trait_MASOCHIST ) &&
11381 !u.has_trait( trait_MASOCHIST_MED ) ) {
11382 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You are in too much pain to try moving the heavy %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are in too much pain to try moving the heavy %s!"
) ) ),
11383 furntype.name() );
11384 return true;
11385
11386 } else if( str_req > str && u.get_perceived_pain() > 50 &&
11387 ( u.has_trait( trait_MASOCHIST ) || u.has_trait( trait_MASOCHIST_MED ) ) ) {
11388 add_msg( m_bad,
11389 _( "Even with your appetite for pain, you are in too much pain to try moving the heavy %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Even with your appetite for pain, you are in too much pain to try moving the heavy %s!"
) ) ),
11390 furntype.name() );
11391 return true;
11392
11393 ///\EFFECT_STR determines ability to drag furniture
11394 } else if( str_req > str &&
11395 one_in( std::max( 20 - str_req - str, 2 ) ) ) {
11396 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You strain yourself trying to move the heavy %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You strain yourself trying to move the heavy %s!"
) ) ),
11397 furntype.name() );
11398 u.mod_pain( 1 ); // Hurt ourselves.
11399 return true; // furniture and or obstacle wins.
11400 } else if( !src_item_ok && !only_liquid_items && dst_items > 0 ) {
11401 add_msg( _( "There's stuff in the way." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There's stuff in the way." )
) ) );
11402 return true;
11403 }
11404
11405 // Additional penalty if we can't comfortably move it.
11406 if( str_req > str ) {
11407 int move_penalty = std::pow( str_req, 2.0 ) + 100.0;
11408 if( move_penalty <= 1000 ) {
11409 if( str >= str_req - 3 ) {
11410 add_msg( m_bad, _( "The %s is really heavy!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s is really heavy!" ) )
), furntype.name() );
11411 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
11412 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You fail to move the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You fail to move the %s." ) )
), furntype.name() );
11413 return true;
11414 }
11415 } else {
11416 add_msg( m_bad, _( "The %s is too heavy for you to budge." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s is too heavy for you to budge."
) ) ), furntype.name() );
11417 return true;
11418 }
11419 }
11420 if( move_penalty > 500 ) {
11421 add_msg( _( "Moving the heavy %s is taking a lot of time!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Moving the heavy %s is taking a lot of time!"
) ) ),
11422 furntype.name() );
11423 } else if( move_penalty > 200 ) {
11424 if( one_in( 3 ) ) { // Nag only occasionally.
11425 add_msg( _( "It takes some time to move the heavy %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It takes some time to move the heavy %s."
) ) ),
11426 furntype.name() );
11427 }
11428 }
11429 }
11430 sounds::sound( fdest, furntype.move_str_req * 2, sounds::sound_t::movement,
11431 _( "a scraping noise." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "a scraping noise." ) ) ), true, "misc", "scraping" );
11432
11433 // Actually move the furniture.
11434 m.furn_set( fdest, m.furn( fpos ) );
11435 m.furn_set( fpos, f_null, true );
11436
11437 if( fire_intensity == 1 && !pulling_furniture ) {
11438 m.remove_field( fpos, fd_fire );
11439 m.set_field_intensity( fdest, fd_fire, fire_intensity );
11440 m.set_field_age( fdest, fd_fire, fire_age );
11441 }
11442
11443 // Is there is only liquids on the ground, remove them after moving furniture.
11444 if( dst_items > 0 && only_liquid_items ) {
11445 m.i_clear( fdest );
11446 }
11447
11448 if( src_items > 0 ) { // Move the stuff inside.
11449 if( dst_item_ok && src_item_ok ) {
11450 // Assume contents of both cells are legal, so we can just swap contents.
11451 std::list<item> temp;
11452 std::move( m.i_at( fpos ).begin(), m.i_at( fpos ).end(),
11453 std::back_inserter( temp ) );
11454 m.i_clear( fpos );
11455 for( auto item_iter = m.i_at( fdest ).begin();
11456 item_iter != m.i_at( fdest ).end(); ++item_iter ) {
11457 m.i_at( fpos ).insert( *item_iter );
11458 }
11459 m.i_clear( fdest );
11460 for( item &cur_item : temp ) {
11461 m.i_at( fdest ).insert( cur_item );
11462 }
11463 } else {
11464 add_msg( _( "Stuff spills from the %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stuff spills from the %s!" )
) ), furntype.name() );
11465 }
11466 }
11467
11468 if( !m.has_floor_or_water( fdest ) && !m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FLAT, fdest ) ) {
11469 std::string danger_tile = enumerate_as_string( get_dangerous_tile( fdest ) );
11470 add_msg( _( "You let go of the %1$s as it falls down the %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You let go of the %1$s as it falls down the %2$s."
) ) ), furntype.name(), danger_tile );
11471 u.grab( object_type::NONE );
11472 m.drop_furniture( fdest );
11473 return true;
11474 }
11475
11476 u.grab_point.z += ramp_offset;
11477
11478 if( shifting_furniture ) {
11479 // We didn't move
11480 tripoint d_sum = u.grab_point + dp;
11481 if( std::abs( d_sum.x ) < 2 && std::abs( d_sum.y ) < 2 ) {
11482 u.grab_point = d_sum; // furniture moved relative to us
11483 } else { // we pushed furniture out of reach
11484 add_msg( _( "You let go of the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You let go of the %s." ) ) ), furntype.name() );
11485 u.grab( object_type::NONE );
11486 }
11487 return true; // We moved furniture but stayed still.
11488 }
11489
11490 if( pushing_furniture && m.impassable( fpos ) ) {
11491 // Not sure how that chair got into a wall, but don't let player follow.
11492 add_msg( _( "You let go of the %1$s as it slides past %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You let go of the %1$s as it slides past %2$s."
) ) ),
11493 furntype.name(), m.tername( fdest ) );
11494 u.grab( object_type::NONE );
11495 return true;
11496 }
11497
11498 return false;
11499}
11500
11501bool game::grabbed_move( const tripoint &dp, const bool via_ramp )
11502{
11503 if( u.get_grab_type() == object_type::NONE ) {
11504 return false;
11505 }
11506
11507 // vehicle: pulling, pushing, or moving around the grabbed object.
11508 if( u.get_grab_type() == object_type::VEHICLE ) {
11509 return grabbed_veh_move( dp );
11510 }
11511
11512 if( u.get_grab_type() == object_type::FURNITURE ) {
11513 u.assign_activity( move_furniture_activity_actor( dp, via_ramp ) );
11514 return true;
11515 }
11516
11517 add_msg( m_info, _( "Nothing at grabbed point %d,%d,%d or bad grabbed object type." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Nothing at grabbed point %d,%d,%d or bad grabbed object type."
) ) ),
11518 u.grab_point.x, u.grab_point.y, u.grab_point.z );
11519 u.grab( object_type::NONE );
11520 return false;
11521}
11522
11523void game::on_move_effects()
11524{
11525 // TODO: Move this to a character method
11526 if( !u.is_mounted() ) {
11527 const item muscle( "muscle" );
11528 for( const bionic_id &bid : u.get_bionic_fueled_with_muscle() ) {
11529 if( u.has_active_bionic( bid ) ) {// active power gen
11530 u.mod_power_level( muscle.fuel_energy() * bid->fuel_efficiency );
11531 } else {// passive power gen
11532 u.mod_power_level( muscle.fuel_energy() * bid->passive_fuel_efficiency );
11533 }
11534 }
11535 if( u.has_active_bionic( bio_jointservo ) ) {
11536 if( u.is_running() ) {
11537 u.mod_power_level( -bio_jointservo->power_trigger * 1.55 );
11538 } else {
11539 u.mod_power_level( -bio_jointservo->power_trigger );
11540 }
11541
11542 // If there's not enough power to run Joint Servo, forcefully turn it off
11543 if( u.get_power_level() <= 0_mJ ) {
11544 u.force_bionic_deactivation( **u.find_bionic_by_type( bio_jointservo ) );
11545 u.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your Joint Servo bionic powers down." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your Joint Servo bionic powers down."
) ) ) );
11546 }
11547 }
11548 }
11549
11550 if( u.is_running() ) {
11551 if( !u.can_run() ) {
11552 u.toggle_run_mode();
11553 }
11554 if( u.get_stamina() <= 0 ) {
11555 u.add_effect( effect_winded, 10_turns );
11556 }
11557 }
11558
11559 // apply martial art move bonuses
11560 u.martial_arts_data->ma_onmove_effects( u );
11561
11562 sfx::do_ambient();
11563}
11564
11565void game::on_options_changed()
11566{
11567#if defined(TILES)
11568 tilecontext->on_options_changed();
11569#endif
11570}
11571
11572void game::water_affect_items( Character &ch ) const
11573{
11574 std::vector<item_location> dissolved;
11575 std::vector<item_location> destroyed;
11576 std::vector<item_location> wet;
11577
11578 for( item_location &loc : ch.all_items_loc() ) {
11579 // check flag first because its cheaper
11580 if( loc->has_flag( flag_WATER_DISSOLVE ) && !loc.protected_from_liquids() ) {
11581 dissolved.emplace_back( loc );
11582 } else if( loc->has_flag( flag_WATER_BREAK ) && !loc->is_broken()
11583 && !loc.protected_from_liquids() ) {
11584 destroyed.emplace_back( loc );
11585 } else if( loc->has_flag( flag_WATER_BREAK_ACTIVE ) && !loc->is_broken()
11586 && !loc.protected_from_liquids() ) {
11587 wet.emplace_back( loc );
11588 } else if( loc->typeId() == itype_towel && !loc.protected_from_liquids() ) {
11589 loc->convert( itype_towel_wet, &ch ).active = true;
11590 }
11591 }
11592
11593 if( dissolved.empty() && destroyed.empty() && wet.empty() ) {
11594 return;
11595 }
11596
11597 for( item_location &it : dissolved ) {
11598 add_msg_if_player_sees( ch.pos(), m_bad, _( "%1$s %2$s dissolved in the water!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s %2$s dissolved in the water!"
) ) ),
11599 ch.disp_name( true, true ), it->display_name() );
11600 it.remove_item();
11601 }
11602
11603 for( item_location &it : destroyed ) {
11604 add_msg_if_player_sees( ch.pos(), m_bad, _( "The water destroyed %1$s %2$s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The water destroyed %1$s %2$s!"
) ) ),
11605 ch.disp_name( true ), it->display_name() );
11606 it->deactivate();
11607 it->set_flag( flag_ITEM_BROKEN );
11608 }
11609
11610 for( item_location &it : wet ) {
11611 const int wetness_add = 5100 * std::log10( units::to_milliliter( it->volume() ) );
11612 it->wetness += wetness_add;
11613 it->wetness = std::min( it->wetness, 5 * wetness_add );
11614 }
11615}
11616
11617bool game::fling_creature( Creature *c, const units::angle &dir, float flvel, bool controlled,
11618 bool intentional )
11619{
11620 if( c == nullptr ) {
11621 debugmsg( "game::fling_creature invoked on null target" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "11621", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "game::fling_creature invoked on null target"
);
11622 return false;
11623 }
11624
11625 if( c->is_dead_state() ) {
11626 // Flinging a corpse causes problems, don't enable without testing
11627 return false;
11628 }
11629
11630 if( c->is_hallucination() ) {
11631 // Don't fling hallucinations
11632 return false;
11633 }
11634
11635 // Target creature shouldn't be grabbed if thrown
11636 // It should also not be thrown if the throw is weaker than the grab
11637 for( const effect &eff : c->get_effects_with_flag( json_flag_GRAB ) ) {
11638 if( !x_in_y( flvel / 2, eff.get_intensity() ) ) {
11639 c->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_warning,
11640 _( "You're almost sent flying, but something holds you in place!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You're almost sent flying, but something holds you in place!"
) ) ),
11641 _( "<npcname> is almost sent flying, but something holds them in place!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> is almost sent flying, but something holds them in place!"
) ) ) );
11642 return false;
11643 } else {
11644 c->remove_effect( eff.get_id(), eff.get_bp() );
11645 }
11646 }
11647
11648 bool thru = true;
11649 const bool is_u = c == &u;
11650 // Don't animate critters getting bashed if animations are off
11651 const bool animate = is_u || get_option<bool>( "ANIMATIONS" );
11652
11653 Character *you = dynamic_cast<Character *>( c );
11654
11655 // at this point we should check if knockback immune
11656 // assuming that the shove wasn't intentional
11657 if( !intentional && you != nullptr ) {
11658
11659 double knockback_resist = 0.0;
11660 knockback_resist = you->calculate_by_enchantment( knockback_resist,
11661 enchant_vals::mod::KNOCKBACK_RESIST );
11662 if( knockback_resist >= 1 ) {
11663 // you are immune
11664 return false;
11665 }
11666
11667 // 1.0 knockback resist is immune, 0 is normal
11668 flvel *= 1 - knockback_resist;
11669 }
11670
11671 tileray tdir( dir );
11672 int range = flvel / 10;
11673 tripoint pt = c->pos();
11674 creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
11675 while( range > 0 ) {
11676 c->underwater = false;
11677 // TODO: Check whenever it is actually in the viewport
11678 // or maybe even just redraw the changed tiles
11679 bool seen = is_u || u.sees( *c ); // To avoid redrawing when not seen
11680 tdir.advance();
11681 pt.x = c->posx() + tdir.dx();
11682 pt.y = c->posy() + tdir.dy();
11683 float force = 0.0f;
11684
11685 if( monster *const mon_ptr = creatures.creature_at<monster>( pt ) ) {
11686 monster &critter = *mon_ptr;
11687 // Approximate critter's "stopping power" with its max hp
11688 force = std::min<float>( 1.5f * critter.type->hp, flvel );
11689 const int damage = rng( force, force * 2.0f ) / 6;
11690 c->impact( damage, pt );
11691 // Multiply zed damage by 6 because no body parts
11692 const int zed_damage = std::max( 0,
11693 ( damage - critter.get_armor_type( damage_bash, bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) ) * 6 );
11694 // TODO: Pass the "flinger" here - it's not the flung critter that deals damage
11695 critter.apply_damage( c, bodypart_id( "torso" ), zed_damage );
11696 critter.check_dead_state();
11697 if( !critter.is_dead() ) {
11698 thru = false;
11699 }
11700 } else if( m.impassable( pt ) ) {
11701 if( !m.veh_at( pt ).obstacle_at_part() ) {
11702 force = std::min<float>( m.bash_strength( pt ), flvel );
11703 } else {
11704 // No good way of limiting force here
11705 // Keep it 1 less than maximum to make the impact hurt
11706 // but to keep the target flying after it
11707 force = flvel - 1;
11708 }
11709 const int damage = rng( force, force * 2.0f ) / 9;
11710 c->impact( damage, pt );
11711 if( m.is_bashable( pt ) ) {
11712 // Only go through if we successfully make the tile passable
11713 m.bash( pt, flvel );
11714 thru = m.passable( pt );
11715 } else {
11716 thru = false;
11717 }
11718 }
11719
11720 // If the critter dies during flinging, moving it around causes debugmsgs
11721 if( c->is_dead_state() ) {
11722 return true;
11723 }
11724
11725 flvel -= force;
11726 if( thru ) {
11727 if( you != nullptr ) {
11728 if( you->in_vehicle ) {
11729 m.unboard_vehicle( you->pos() );
11730 }
11731 // If we're flinging the player around, make sure the map stays centered on them.
11732 if( is_u ) {
11733 update_map( pt.x, pt.y );
11734 } else {
11735 you->setpos( pt );
11736 }
11737 } else if( !creatures.creature_at( pt ) ) {
11738 // Dying monster doesn't always leave an empty tile (blob spawning etc.)
11739 // Just don't setpos if it happens - next iteration will do so
11740 // or the monster will stop a tile before the unpassable one
11741 c->setpos( pt );
11742 }
11743 } else {
11744 // Don't zero flvel - count this as slamming both the obstacle and the ground
11745 // although at lower velocity
11746 break;
11747 }
11748 range--;
11749 if( animate && ( seen || u.sees( *c ) ) ) {
11750 invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
11751 inp_mngr.pump_events();
11752 ui_manager::redraw_invalidated();
11753 refresh_display();
11754 }
11755 }
11756
11757 // Fall down to the ground - always on the last reached tile
11758 if( !m.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, c->pos() ) ) {
11759 const trap &trap_under_creature = m.tr_at( c->pos() );
11760 // Didn't smash into a wall or a floor so only take the fall damage
11761 if( thru && trap_under_creature == tr_ledge ) {
11762 m.creature_on_trap( *c, false );
11763 } else {
11764 // Fall on ground
11765 int force = rng( flvel, flvel * 2 ) / 9;
11766 if( controlled ) {
11767 force = std::max( force / 2 - 5, 0 );
11768 }
11769 if( force > 0 ) {
11770 int dmg = c->impact( force, c->pos() );
11771 // TODO: Make landing damage the floor
11772 m.bash( c->pos(), dmg / 4, false, false, false );
11773 }
11774 // Always apply traps to creature i.e. bear traps, tele traps etc.
11775 m.creature_on_trap( *c, false );
11776 }
11777 } else {
11778 c->underwater = true;
11779
11780 if( you != nullptr ) {
11781 water_affect_items( *you );
11782 }
11783
11784 if( is_u ) {
11785 if( controlled ) {
11786 add_msg( _( "You dive into water." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You dive into water." ) ) ) );
11787 } else {
11788 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You fall into water." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You fall into water." ) ) ) );
11789 }
11790 }
11791 }
11792 return true;
11793}
11794
11795std::optional<tripoint> game::point_selection_menu( const std::vector<tripoint> &pts, bool up )
11796{
11797 if( pts.empty() ) {
11798 debugmsg( "point_selection_menu called with empty point set" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "11798", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "point_selection_menu called with empty point set"
);
11799 return std::nullopt;
11800 }
11801
11802 if( pts.size() == 1 ) {
11803 return pts[0];
11804 }
11805
11806 const tripoint upos = get_player_character().pos();
11807 uilist pmenu;
11808 pmenu.title = _( "Climb where?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Climb where?" ) ) );
11809 int num = 0;
11810 for( const tripoint &pt : pts ) {
11811 // TODO: Sort the menu so that it can be used with numpad directions
11812 const std::string &dir_arrow = direction_arrow( direction_from( upos.xy(), pt.xy() ) );
11813 const std::string &dir_name = direction_name( direction_from( upos.xy(), pt.xy() ) );
11814 const std::string &up_or_down = up ? _( "Climb up %s (%s)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Climb up %s (%s)" ) ) ) : _( "Climb down %s (%s)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Climb down %s (%s)" ) ) );
11815 // TODO: Inform player what is on said tile
11816 // But don't just print terrain name (in many cases it will be "open air")
11817 pmenu.addentry( num++, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, string_format( up_or_down, dir_name, dir_arrow ) );
11818 }
11819
11820 pmenu.query();
11821 const int ret = pmenu.ret;
11822 if( ret < 0 || ret >= num ) {
11823 return std::nullopt;
11824 }
11825
11826 return pts[ret];
11827}
11828
11829static std::optional<tripoint> find_empty_spot_nearby( const tripoint &pos )
11830{
11831 map &here = get_map();
11832 creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
11833 for( const tripoint &p : here.points_in_radius( pos, 1 ) ) {
11834 if( p == pos ) {
11835 continue;
11836 }
11837 if( here.impassable( p ) ) {
11838 continue;
11839 }
11840 if( creatures.creature_at( p ) ) {
11841 continue;
11842 }
11843 return p;
11844 }
11845 return std::nullopt;
11846}
11847
11848void game::vertical_move( int movez, bool force, bool peeking )
11849{
11850 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
11851 monster *mons = u.mounted_creature.get();
11852 if( mons->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
11853 if( !mons->check_mech_powered() ) {
11854 add_msg( m_bad, _( "Your %s refuses to move as its batteries have been drained." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %s refuses to move as its batteries have been drained."
) ) ),
11855 mons->get_name() );
11856 return;
11857 }
11858 }
11859 }
11860
11861 map &here = get_map();
11862
11863 // Force means we're going down, even if there's no staircase, etc.
11864 bool climbing = false;
11865 climbing_aid_id climbing_aid = climbing_aid_default;
11866 int move_cost = 100;
11867 tripoint stairs( u.posx(), u.posy(), u.posz() + movez );
11868 bool wall_cling = u.has_flag( json_flag_WALL_CLING );
11869 bool adjacent_climb = false;
11870 if( !force && movez == 1 && !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GOES_UP, u.pos() ) &&
11871 !u.is_underwater() ) {
11872 // Climbing
11873 for( const tripoint &p : here.points_in_radius( u.pos(), 2 ) ) {
11874 if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_CLIMB_ADJACENT, p ) ) {
11875 adjacent_climb = true;
11876 }
11877 }
11878 if( here.has_floor_or_support( stairs ) ) {
11879 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't climb here - there's a ceiling above your head." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't climb here - there's a ceiling above your head."
) ) ) );
11880 return;
11881 }
11882
11883 if( u.get_working_arm_count() < 1 && !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_LADDER, u.pos() ) ) {
11884 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't climb because your arms are too damaged or encumbered." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't climb because your arms are too damaged or encumbered."
) ) ) );
11885 return;
11886 }
11887
11888 const int cost = u.climbing_cost( u.pos(), stairs );
11889 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_GAME, "Climb cost %d", cost )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Climb cost %d",
cost ) ) ); } } while( false );
11890 const bool can_climb_here = cost > 0 ||
11891 u.has_flag( json_flag_CLIMB_NO_LADDER ) || wall_cling;
11892 if( !can_climb_here && !adjacent_climb ) {
11893 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't climb here - you need walls and/or furniture to brace against." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't climb here - you need walls and/or furniture to brace against."
) ) ) );
11894 return;
11895 }
11896
11897 const item_location weapon = u.get_wielded_item();
11898 if( !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_LADDER, u.pos() ) && weapon &&
11899 weapon->is_two_handed( u ) ) {
11900 if( query_yn(
11901 _( "You can't climb because you have to wield a %s with both hands.\n\nPut it away?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't climb because you have to wield a %s with both hands.\n\nPut it away?"
) ) ),
11902 weapon->tname() ) ) {
11903 if( !u.unwield() ) {
11904 return;
11905 }
11906 } else {
11907 return;
11908 }
11909 }
11910
11911 std::vector<tripoint> pts;
11912 for( const tripoint &pt : here.points_in_radius( stairs, 1 ) ) {
11913 if( here.passable( pt ) &&
11914 here.has_floor_or_support( pt ) ) {
11915 pts.push_back( pt );
11916 }
11917 }
11918
11919 if( wall_cling && here.is_wall_adjacent( stairs ) ) {
11920 pts.push_back( stairs );
11921 }
11922
11923 if( pts.empty() ) {
11924 add_msg( m_info,
11925 _( "You can't climb here - there is no terrain above you that would support your weight." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't climb here - there is no terrain above you that would support your weight."
) ) ) );
11926 return;
11927 } else {
11928 // TODO: Make it an extended action
11929 climbing = true;
11930 climbing_aid = climbing_aid_furn_CLIMBABLE;
11931 u.set_activity_level( EXTRA_EXERCISE );
11932 move_cost = cost == 0 ? 1000 : cost + 500;
11933
11934 const std::optional<tripoint> pnt = point_selection_menu( pts );
11935 if( !pnt ) {
11936 return;
11937 }
11938 stairs = *pnt;
11939 }
11940 }
11941
11942 if( !force && movez == -1 && !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GOES_DOWN, u.pos() ) &&
11943 !u.is_underwater() && !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_NO_FLOOR_WATER, u.pos() ) &&
11944 !u.has_effect( effect_gliding ) ) {
11945 if( wall_cling && !here.has_floor_or_support( u.pos() ) ) {
11946 climbing = true;
11947 climbing_aid = climbing_aid_ability_WALL_CLING;
11948 u.set_activity_level( EXTRA_EXERCISE );
11949 u.burn_energy_all( -750 );
11950 move_cost += 500;
11951 } else {
11952 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't go down here!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't go down here!" ) )
) );
11953 return;
11954 }
11955 } else if( !climbing && !force && movez == 1 &&
11956 !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GOES_UP, u.pos() ) && !u.is_underwater() ) {
11957 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't go up here!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't go up here!" ) ) ) );
11958 return;
11959 }
11960
11961 if( force ) {
11962 // Let go of a grabbed cart.
11963 u.grab( object_type::NONE );
11964 } else if( u.grab_point != tripoint_zero ) {
11965 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't drag things up and down stairs." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't drag things up and down stairs."
) ) ) );
11966 return;
11967 }
11968
11969 // TODO: Use u.posz() instead of m.abs_sub
11970 const int z_after = m.get_abs_sub().z() + movez;
11971 if( z_after < -OVERMAP_DEPTH ) {
11972 add_msg( m_info, _( "Halfway down, the way down becomes blocked off." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Halfway down, the way down becomes blocked off."
) ) ) );
11973 return;
11974 } else if( z_after >= OVERMAP_HEIGHT ) {
11975 add_msg( m_info, _( "Halfway up, the way up becomes blocked off." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Halfway up, the way up becomes blocked off."
) ) ) );
11976 return;
11977 }
11978
11979 if( !u.move_effects( false ) && !force ) {
11980 u.moves -= 100;
11981 return;
11982 }
11983
11984 if( climbing &&
11985 slip_down( ( ( movez > 1 ) ? climb_maneuver::up : climb_maneuver::down ), climbing_aid ) ) {
11986 return;
11987 }
11988
11989 bool swimming = false;
11990 bool surfacing = false;
11991 bool submerging = false;
11992 // > and < are used for diving underwater.
11993 if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SWIMMABLE, u.pos() ) ) {
11994 swimming = true;
11995 const ter_id &target_ter = here.ter( u.pos() + tripoint( 0, 0, movez ) );
11996
11997 // If we're in a water tile that has both air above and deep enough water to submerge in...
11998 if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, u.pos() ) &&
11999 !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_WATER_CUBE, u.pos() ) ) {
12000 // ...and we're trying to swim down
12001 if( movez == -1 ) {
12002 // ...and we're already submerged
12003 if( u.is_underwater() ) {
12004 // ...and there's more water beneath us.
12005 if( target_ter->has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_WATER_CUBE ) ) {
12006 // Then go ahead and move down.
12007 add_msg( _( "You swim down." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You swim down." ) ) ) );
12008 } else {
12009 // There's no more water beneath us.
12010 add_msg( m_info,
12011 _( "You are already underwater and there is no more water beneath you to swim down!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are already underwater and there is no more water beneath you to swim down!"
) ) ) );
12012 return;
12013 }
12014 }
12015 // ...and we're not already submerged.
12016 else {
12017 // Check for a flotation device first before allowing us to submerge.
12018 if( u.worn_with_flag( flag_FLOTATION ) ) {
12019 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't dive while wearing a flotation device." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't dive while wearing a flotation device."
) ) ) );
12020 return;
12021 }
12022
12023 // Then dive under the surface.
12024 u.set_underwater( true );
12025 add_msg( _( "You dive underwater!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You dive underwater!" ) ) ) );
12026 submerging = true;
12027 }
12028 }
12029 // ...and we're trying to surface
12030 else if( movez == 1 ) {
12031 // ... and we're already submerged
12032 if( u.is_underwater() ) {
12033 if( u.swim_speed() < 500 || u.shoe_type_count( itype_swim_fins ) ) {
12034 u.set_underwater( false );
12035 add_msg( _( "You surface." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You surface." ) ) ) );
12036 surfacing = true;
12037 } else {
12038 add_msg( m_info, _( "You try to surface but can't!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You try to surface but can't!"
) ) ) );
12039 return;
12040 }
12041 }
12042 }
12043 }
12044 // If we're in a water tile that is entirely water
12045 else if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_WATER_CUBE, u.pos() ) ) {
12046 // If you're at this point, you should already be underwater, but force that to be the case.
12047 if( !u.is_underwater() ) {
12048 u.set_underwater( true );
12049 }
12050
12051 // ...and we're trying to swim down
12052 if( movez == -1 ) {
12053 // ...and there's more water beneath us.
12054 if( target_ter->has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_WATER_CUBE ) ) {
12055 // Then go ahead and move down.
12056 add_msg( _( "You swim down." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You swim down." ) ) ) );
12057 } else {
12058 add_msg( m_info,
12059 _( "You are already underwater and there is no more water beneath you to swim down!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are already underwater and there is no more water beneath you to swim down!"
) ) ) );
12060 return;
12061 }
12062 }
12063 // ...and we're trying to move up
12064 else if( movez == 1 ) {
12065 // ...and there's more water above us us.
12066 if( target_ter->has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_WATER_CUBE ) ||
12067 target_ter->has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER ) ) {
12068 // Then go ahead and move up.
12069 add_msg( _( "You swim up." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You swim up." ) ) ) );
12070 } else {
12071 add_msg( m_info, _( "You are already underwater and there is no water above you to swim up!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are already underwater and there is no water above you to swim up!"
) ) ) );
12072 return;
12073 }
12074 }
12075 }
12076 }
12077
12078 // Find the corresponding staircase
12079 bool rope_ladder = false;
12080 // TODO: Remove the stairfinding, make the mapgen gen aligned maps
12081 if( !force && !climbing && !swimming ) {
12082 const std::optional<tripoint> pnt = find_or_make_stairs( m, z_after, rope_ladder, peeking,
12083 u.pos() );
12084 if( !pnt ) {
12085 return;
12086 }
12087 stairs = *pnt;
12088 }
12089
12090 std::vector<monster *> monsters_following;
12091 if( std::abs( movez ) == 1 ) {
12092 bool ladder = here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DIFFICULT_Z, u.pos() );
12093 for( monster &critter : all_monsters() ) {
12094 if( ladder && !critter.climbs() ) {
12095 continue;
12096 }
12097 // TODO: just check if it's going for the avatar's location, it's simpler
12098 Creature *target = critter.attack_target();
12099 if( ( target && target->is_avatar() ) || ( !critter.has_effect( effect_ridden ) &&
12100 ( critter.is_pet_follow() || critter.has_effect( effect_led_by_leash ) ) &&
12101 !critter.has_effect( effect_tied ) && critter.sees( u ) ) ) {
12102 monsters_following.push_back( &critter );
12103 }
12104 }
12105 }
12106
12107 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
12108 monster *crit = u.mounted_creature.get();
12109 if( crit->has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
12110 crit->use_mech_power( u.current_movement_mode()->mech_power_use() + 1_kJ );
12111 }
12112 } else {
12113 u.moves -= move_cost;
12114 u.burn_energy_all( -move_cost );
12115 }
12116
12117 if( surfacing || submerging ) {
12118 // Surfacing and submerging don't actually move us anywhere, and just
12119 // toggle our underwater state in the same location.
12120 return;
12121 }
12122
12123 const tripoint old_pos = u.pos();
12124 const tripoint old_abs_pos = here.getabs( old_pos );
12125 point submap_shift;
12126 const bool z_level_changed = vertical_shift( z_after );
12127 if( !force ) {
12128 submap_shift = update_map( stairs.x, stairs.y, z_level_changed );
12129 }
12130
12131 // if an NPC or monster is on the stairs when player ascends/descends
12132 // they may end up merged on the same tile, do some displacement to resolve that.
12133 creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
12134 if( creatures.creature_at<npc>( u.pos(), true ) ||
12135 creatures.creature_at<monster>( u.pos(), true ) ) {
12136 std::string crit_name;
12137 bool player_displace = false;
12138 std::optional<tripoint> displace = find_empty_spot_nearby( u.pos() );
12139 if( !displace.has_value() ) {
12140 // They can always move to the previous location of the player.
12141 displace = old_pos;
12142 }
12143 npc *guy = creatures.creature_at<npc>( u.pos(), true );
12144 if( guy ) {
12145 crit_name = guy->get_name();
12146 tripoint old_pos = guy->pos();
12147 if( !guy->is_enemy() ) {
12148 guy->move_away_from( u.pos(), true );
12149 if( old_pos != guy->pos() ) {
12150 add_msg( _( "%s moves out of the way for you." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s moves out of the way for you."
) ) ), guy->get_name() );
12151 }
12152 } else {
12153 player_displace = true;
12154 }
12155 }
12156 monster *mon = creatures.creature_at<monster>( u.pos(), true );
12157 // if the monster is ridden by the player or an NPC:
12158 // Dont displace them. If they are mounted by a friendly NPC,
12159 // then the NPC will already have been displaced just above.
12160 // if they are ridden by the player, we want them to coexist on same tile
12161 if( mon && !mon->mounted_player ) {
12162 crit_name = mon->get_name();
12163 if( mon->friendly == -1 ) {
12164 mon->setpos( *displace );
12165 add_msg( _( "Your %s moves out of the way for you." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %s moves out of the way for you."
) ) ), mon->get_name() );
12166 } else {
12167 player_displace = true;
12168 }
12169 }
12170 if( player_displace ) {
12171 u.setpos( *displace );
12172 u.moves -= 20;
12173 add_msg( _( "You push past %s blocking the way." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You push past %s blocking the way."
) ) ), crit_name );
12174 }
12175 }
12176
12177 // Now that we know the player's destination position, we can move their mount as well
12178 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
12179 u.mounted_creature->setpos( u.pos() );
12180 }
12181
12182 // This ugly check is here because of stair teleport bullshit
12183 // TODO: Remove stair teleport bullshit
12184 if( rl_dist( u.pos(), old_pos ) <= 1 ) {
12185 for( monster *m : monsters_following ) {
12186 m->set_dest( u.get_location() );
12187 }
12188 }
12189
12190 if( rope_ladder ) {
12191 if( u.has_flag( json_flag_WEB_RAPPEL ) ) {
12192 here.furn_set( u.pos(), furn_f_web_up );
12193 } else {
12194 here.furn_set( u.pos(), furn_f_rope_up );
12195 }
12196 }
12197
12198 if( here.ter( stairs ) == t_manhole_cover ) {
12199 here.spawn_item( stairs + point( rng( -1, 1 ), rng( -1, 1 ) ), itype_manhole_cover );
12200 here.ter_set( stairs, t_manhole );
12201 }
12202
12203 if( u.is_hauling() ) {
12204 const tripoint adjusted_pos = old_pos - sm_to_ms_copy( submap_shift );
12205 start_hauling( adjusted_pos );
12206 }
12207
12208 here.invalidate_map_cache( here.get_abs_sub().z() );
12209 // Upon force movement, traps can not be avoided.
12210 if( !wall_cling && ( get_map().tr_at( u.pos() ) == tr_ledge &&
12211 !u.has_effect( effect_gliding ) ) ) {
12212 here.creature_on_trap( u, !force );
12213 }
12214
12215 u.recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
12216
12217 cata_event_dispatch::avatar_moves( old_abs_pos, u, m );
12218}
12219
12220void game::start_hauling( const tripoint &pos )
12221{
12222 std::vector<item_location> candidate_items = m.get_haulable_items( pos );
12223 // Find target items and quantities thereof for the new activity
12224 u.trim_haul_list( candidate_items );
12225 std::vector<item_location> target_items = u.haul_list;
12226
12227 if( u.is_autohauling() && !u.suppress_autohaul ) {
12228 for( const item_location &item : u.haul_list ) {
12229 candidate_items.erase( std::remove( candidate_items.begin(), candidate_items.end(), item ),
12230 candidate_items.end() );
12231 }
12232 if( u.hauling_filter.empty() ) {
12233 target_items.insert( target_items.end(), candidate_items.begin(), candidate_items.end() );
12234 } else {
12235 std::function<bool( const item & )> filter = item_filter_from_string( u.hauling_filter );
12236 std::copy_if( candidate_items.begin(), candidate_items.end(), std::back_inserter( target_items ),
12237 [&filter]( const item_location & item ) {
12238 return filter( *item );
12239 } );
12240 }
12241 }
12242
12243 u.suppress_autohaul = false;
12244 u.haul_list.clear();
12245
12246 // Quantity of 0 means move all
12247 const std::vector<int> quantities( target_items.size(), 0 );
12248
12249 if( target_items.empty() ) {
12250 // Nothing to haul
12251 if( !u.is_autohauling() ) {
12252 u.stop_hauling();
12253 }
12254 return;
12255 }
12256
12257 // Whether the destination is inside a vehicle (not supported)
12258 const bool to_vehicle = false;
12259 // Destination relative to the player
12260 const tripoint relative_destination{};
12261
12262 const move_items_activity_actor actor( target_items, quantities, to_vehicle, relative_destination,
12263 true );
12264 u.assign_activity( actor );
12265}
12266
12267std::optional<tripoint> game::find_or_make_stairs( map &mp, const int z_after, bool &rope_ladder,
12268 bool peeking, const tripoint &pos )
12269{
12270 const bool is_avatar = u.pos() == pos;
12271 const int omtilesz = SEEX * 2;
12272 real_coords rc( mp.getabs( pos.xy() ) );
12273 tripoint omtile_align_start( mp.getlocal( rc.begin_om_pos() ), z_after );
12274 tripoint omtile_align_end( omtile_align_start + point( -1 + omtilesz, -1 + omtilesz ) );
12275
12276 // Try to find the stairs.
12277 std::optional<tripoint> stairs;
12278 int best = INT_MAX2147483647;
12279 const int movez = z_after - pos.z;
12280 const bool going_down_1 = movez == -1;
12281 const bool going_up_1 = movez == 1;
12282 // If there are stairs on the same x and y as we currently are, use those
12283 if( going_down_1 && mp.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GOES_UP, pos + tripoint_below ) ) {
12284 stairs.emplace( pos + tripoint_below );
12285 }
12286 if( going_up_1 && mp.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GOES_DOWN, pos + tripoint_above ) ) {
12287 stairs.emplace( pos + tripoint_above );
12288 }
12289 // We did not find stairs directly above or below, so search the map for them
12290 // If there's empty space right below us, we can just go down that way.
12291 if( !stairs.has_value() && get_map().tr_at( u.pos() ) != tr_ledge ) {
12292 for( const tripoint &dest : mp.points_in_rectangle( omtile_align_start, omtile_align_end ) ) {
12293 if( rl_dist( u.pos(), dest ) <= best &&
12294 ( ( going_down_1 && mp.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GOES_UP, dest ) ) ||
12295 ( going_up_1 && ( mp.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GOES_DOWN, dest ) ||
12296 mp.ter( dest ) == t_manhole_cover ) ) ||
12297 ( ( movez == 2 || movez == -2 ) && mp.ter( dest ) == t_elevator ) ) ) {
12298 stairs.emplace( dest );
12299 best = rl_dist( u.pos(), dest );
12300 }
12301 }
12302 }
12303
12304 creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
12305 if( stairs.has_value() ) {
12306 if( !is_avatar ) {
12307 return stairs;
12308 }
12309 if( Creature *blocking_creature = creatures.creature_at( stairs.value() ) ) {
12310 npc *guy = dynamic_cast<npc *>( blocking_creature );
12311 monster *mon = dynamic_cast<monster *>( blocking_creature );
12312 bool would_move = ( guy && !guy->is_enemy() ) || ( mon && mon->friendly == -1 );
12313 std::string cr_name = blocking_creature->get_name();
12314 std::string msg;
12315 if( guy ) {
12316 //~ %s is the name of hostile NPC
12317 msg = string_format( _( "%s is in the way!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s is in the way!" ) ) ), cr_name );
12318 } else {
12319 //~ %s is some monster
12320 msg = string_format( _( "There's a %s in the way!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There's a %s in the way!" ) )
), cr_name );
12321 }
12322
12323 if( ( peeking && !would_move )
12324 || ( !would_move && !query_yn(
12325 //~ %s is a warning about monster/hostile NPC in the way, e.g. "There's a zombie in the way!"
12326 _( "%s Attempt to push past? You may have to fight your way back up." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s Attempt to push past? You may have to fight your way back up."
) ) ), msg ) ) ) {
12327 add_msg( msg );
12328 return std::nullopt;
12329 }
12330 }
12331 return stairs;
12332 }
12333
12334 if( !is_avatar || peeking ) {
12335 return std::nullopt;
12336 }
12337 // No stairs found! Try to make some
12338 rope_ladder = false;
12339 stairs.emplace( pos );
12340 stairs->z = z_after;
12341 // Check the destination area for lava.
12342 if( mp.ter( *stairs ) == t_lava ) {
12343 if( movez < 0 &&
12344 !query_yn(
12345 _( "There is a LOT of heat coming out of there, even the stairs have melted away. Jump down? You won't be able to get back up." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is a LOT of heat coming out of there, even the stairs have melted away. Jump down? You won't be able to get back up."
) ) ) ) ) {
12346 return std::nullopt;
12347 }
12348 if( movez > 0 &&
12349 !query_yn(
12350 _( "There is a LOT of heat coming out of there. Push through the half-molten rocks and ascend? You will not be able to get back down." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is a LOT of heat coming out of there. Push through the half-molten rocks and ascend? You will not be able to get back down."
) ) ) ) ) {
12351 return std::nullopt;
12352 }
12353
12354 return stairs;
12355 }
12356
12357 if( u.has_effect( effect_gliding ) && get_map().tr_at( u.pos() ) == tr_ledge ) {
12358 return stairs;
12359 }
12360
12361 if( movez > 0 ) {
12362 if( !mp.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GOES_DOWN, *stairs ) ) {
12363 if( !query_yn( _( "You may be unable to return back down these stairs. Continue up?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You may be unable to return back down these stairs. Continue up?"
) ) ) ) ) {
12364 return std::nullopt;
12365 }
12366 }
12367 // Manhole covers need this to work
12368 // Maybe require manhole cover here and fail otherwise?
12369 return stairs;
12370 }
12371
12372 if( mp.impassable( *stairs ) ) {
12373 popup( _( "Halfway down, the way down becomes blocked off." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Halfway down, the way down becomes blocked off."
) ) ) );
12374 return std::nullopt;
12375 }
12376
12377 if( u.has_flag( json_flag_WEB_RAPPEL ) ) {
12378 if( query_yn( _( "There is a sheer drop halfway down. Web-descend?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is a sheer drop halfway down. Web-descend?"
) ) ) ) ) {
12379 rope_ladder = true;
12380 if( rng( 4, 8 ) < u.get_skill_level( skill_dodge ) ) {
12381 add_msg( _( "You attach a web and dive down headfirst, flipping upright and landing on your feet." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You attach a web and dive down headfirst, flipping upright and landing on your feet."
) ) ) );
12382 } else {
12383 add_msg( _( "You securely web up and work your way down, lowering yourself safely." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You securely web up and work your way down, lowering yourself safely."
) ) ) );
12384 }
12385 } else {
12386 return std::nullopt;
12387 }
12388 } else if( u.has_trait( trait_VINES2 ) || u.has_trait( trait_VINES3 ) ) {
12389 if( query_yn( _( "There is a sheer drop halfway down. Use your vines to descend?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is a sheer drop halfway down. Use your vines to descend?"
) ) ) ) ) {
12390 if( u.has_trait( trait_VINES2 ) ) {
12391 if( query_yn( _( "Detach a vine? It'll hurt, but you'll be able to climb back up…" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Detach a vine? It'll hurt, but you'll be able to climb back up…"
) ) ) ) ) {
12392 rope_ladder = true;
12393 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You descend on your vines, though leaving a part of you behind stings." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You descend on your vines, though leaving a part of you behind stings."
) ) ) );
12394 u.mod_pain( 5 );
12395 u.apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "torso" ), 5 );
12396 u.mod_stored_kcal( -87 );
12397 u.mod_thirst( 10 );
12398 } else {
12399 add_msg( _( "You gingerly descend using your vines." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You gingerly descend using your vines."
) ) ) );
12400 }
12401 } else {
12402 add_msg( _( "You effortlessly lower yourself and leave a vine rooted for future use." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You effortlessly lower yourself and leave a vine rooted for future use."
) ) ) );
12403 rope_ladder = true;
12404 u.mod_stored_kcal( -87 );
12405 u.mod_thirst( 10 );
12406 }
12407 } else {
12408 return std::nullopt;
12409 }
12410 } else if( u.has_amount( itype_grapnel, 1 ) ) {
12411 if( query_yn( _( "There is a sheer drop halfway down. Climb your grappling hook down?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is a sheer drop halfway down. Climb your grappling hook down?"
) ) ) ) ) {
12412 rope_ladder = true;
12413 for( item &used_item : u.use_amount( itype_grapnel, 1 ) ) {
12414 used_item.spill_contents( u );
12415 }
12416 } else {
12417 return std::nullopt;
12418 }
12419 } else if( u.has_amount( itype_rope_30, 1 ) ) {
12420 if( query_yn( _( "There is a sheer drop halfway down. Climb your rope down?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is a sheer drop halfway down. Climb your rope down?"
) ) ) ) ) {
12421 rope_ladder = true;
12422 for( item &used_item : u.use_amount( itype_rope_30, 1 ) ) {
12423 used_item.spill_contents( u );
12424 }
12425 } else {
12426 return std::nullopt;
12427 }
12428 } else if( !query_yn( _( "There is a sheer drop halfway down. Jump?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is a sheer drop halfway down. Jump?"
) ) ) ) ) {
12429 return std::nullopt;
12430 }
12431
12432 return stairs;
12433}
12434
12435bool game::vertical_shift( const int z_after )
12436{
12437 if( z_after < -OVERMAP_DEPTH || z_after > OVERMAP_HEIGHT ) {
12438 debugmsg( "Tried to get z-level %d outside allowed range of %d-%d",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "12439", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to get z-level %d outside allowed range of %d-%d"
, z_after, -OVERMAP_DEPTH, OVERMAP_HEIGHT)
12439 z_after, -OVERMAP_DEPTH, OVERMAP_HEIGHT )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "12439", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Tried to get z-level %d outside allowed range of %d-%d"
, z_after, -OVERMAP_DEPTH, OVERMAP_HEIGHT);
12440 return false;
12441 }
12442
12443 scent.reset();
12444
12445 const int z_before = u.posz();
12446 u.move_to( tripoint_abs_ms( u.get_location().xy(), z_after ) );
12447
12448 // Shift the map itself
12449 m.vertical_shift( z_after );
12450
12451 vertical_notes( z_before, z_after );
12452
12453 return z_before != z_after;
12454}
12455
12456void game::vertical_notes( int z_before, int z_after )
12457{
12458 if( z_before == z_after || !get_option<bool>( "AUTO_NOTES" ) ||
12459 !get_option<bool>( "AUTO_NOTES_STAIRS" ) ) {
12460 return;
12461 }
12462
12463 if( !m.inbounds_z( z_before ) || !m.inbounds_z( z_after ) ) {
12464 debugmsg( "game::vertical_notes invalid arguments: z_before == %d, z_after == %d",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "12465", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "game::vertical_notes invalid arguments: z_before == %d, z_after == %d"
, z_before, z_after)
12465 z_before, z_after )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "12465", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "game::vertical_notes invalid arguments: z_before == %d, z_after == %d"
, z_before, z_after);
12466 return;
12467 }
12468 // Figure out where we know there are up/down connectors
12469 // Fill in all the tiles we know about (e.g. subway stations)
12470 static const int REVEAL_RADIUS = 40;
12471 for( const tripoint_abs_omt &p : points_in_radius( u.global_omt_location(), REVEAL_RADIUS ) ) {
12472 const tripoint_abs_omt cursp_before( p.xy(), z_before );
12473 const tripoint_abs_omt cursp_after( p.xy(), z_after );
12474
12475 if( !overmap_buffer.seen( cursp_before ) ) {
12476 continue;
12477 }
12478 if( overmap_buffer.has_note( cursp_after ) ) {
12479 // Already has a note -> never add an AUTO-note
12480 continue;
12481 }
12482 const oter_id &ter = overmap_buffer.ter( cursp_before );
12483 const oter_id &ter2 = overmap_buffer.ter( cursp_after );
12484 if( z_after > z_before && ter->has_flag( oter_flags::known_up ) &&
12485 !ter2->has_flag( oter_flags::known_down ) ) {
12486 overmap_buffer.set_seen( cursp_after, true );
12487 overmap_buffer.add_note( cursp_after, string_format( ">:W;%s", _( "AUTO: goes down" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "AUTO: goes down" ) ) ) ) );
12488 } else if( z_after < z_before && ter->has_flag( oter_flags::known_down ) &&
12489 !ter2->has_flag( oter_flags::known_up ) ) {
12490 overmap_buffer.set_seen( cursp_after, true );
12491 overmap_buffer.add_note( cursp_after, string_format( "<:W;%s", _( "AUTO: goes up" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "AUTO: goes up" ) ) ) ) );
12492 }
12493 }
12494}
12495
12496point game::update_map( Character &p, bool z_level_changed )
12497{
12498 point p2( p.posx(), p.posy() );
12499 return update_map( p2.x, p2.y, z_level_changed );
12500}
12501
12502point game::update_map( int &x, int &y, bool z_level_changed )
12503{
12504 point shift;
12505
12506 while( x < HALF_MAPSIZE_X ) {
12507 x += SEEX;
12508 shift.x--;
12509 }
12510 while( x >= HALF_MAPSIZE_X + SEEX ) {
12511 x -= SEEX;
12512 shift.x++;
12513 }
12514 while( y < HALF_MAPSIZE_Y ) {
12515 y += SEEY;
12516 shift.y--;
12517 }
12518 while( y >= HALF_MAPSIZE_Y + SEEY ) {
12519 y -= SEEY;
12520 shift.y++;
12521 }
12522
12523 if( shift == point_zero ) {
12524 // adjust player position
12525 u.setpos( tripoint( x, y, m.get_abs_sub().z() ) );
12526 if( z_level_changed ) {
12527 // Update what parts of the world map we can see
12528 // We may be able to see farther now that the z-level has changed.
12529 update_overmap_seen();
12530 }
12531 // Not actually shifting the submaps, all the stuff below would do nothing
12532 return point_zero;
12533 }
12534
12535 // this handles loading/unloading submaps that have scrolled on or off the viewport
12536 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-use-named-point-constants)
12537 inclusive_rectangle<point> size_1( point( -1, -1 ), point( 1, 1 ) );
12538 point remaining_shift = shift;
12539 while( remaining_shift != point_zero ) {
12540 point this_shift = clamp( remaining_shift, size_1 );
12541 m.shift( this_shift );
12542 remaining_shift -= this_shift;
12543 }
12544
12545 // Shift monsters
12546 shift_monsters( tripoint( shift, 0 ) );
12547 const point shift_ms = sm_to_ms_copy( shift );
12548 u.shift_destination( -shift_ms );
12549
12550 // Shift NPCs
12551 for( auto it = critter_tracker->active_npc.begin(); it != critter_tracker->active_npc.end(); ) {
12552 ( *it )->shift( shift );
12553 if( ( *it )->posx() < 0 || ( *it )->posx() >= MAPSIZE_X ||
12554 ( *it )->posy() < 0 || ( *it )->posy() >= MAPSIZE_Y ) {
12555 //Remove the npc from the active list. It remains in the overmap list.
12556 ( *it )->on_unload();
12557 it = critter_tracker->active_npc.erase( it );
12558 } else {
12559 it++;
12560 }
12561 }
12562
12563 scent.shift( shift_ms );
12564
12565 // Also ensure the player is on current z-level
12566 // m.get_abs_sub().z should later be removed, when there is no longer such a thing
12567 // as "current z-level"
12568 u.setpos( tripoint( x, y, m.get_abs_sub().z() ) );
12569
12570 // Only do the loading after all coordinates have been shifted.
12571
12572 // Check for overmap saved npcs that should now come into view.
12573 // Put those in the active list.
12574 load_npcs();
12575
12576 // Make sure map cache is consistent since it may have shifted.
12577 for( int zlev = -OVERMAP_DEPTH; zlev <= OVERMAP_HEIGHT; ++zlev ) {
12578 m.invalidate_map_cache( zlev );
12579 }
12580 m.build_map_cache( m.get_abs_sub().z() );
12581
12582 // Spawn monsters if appropriate
12583 // This call will generate new monsters in addition to loading, so it's placed after NPC loading
12584 m.spawn_monsters( false ); // Static monsters
12585
12586 // Update what parts of the world map we can see
12587 update_overmap_seen();
12588
12589 return shift;
12590}
12591
12592void game::update_overmap_seen()
12593{
12594 const tripoint_abs_omt ompos = u.global_omt_location();
12595 const int dist = u.overmap_sight_range( light_level( u.posz() ) );
12596 const int dist_squared = dist * dist;
12597 // We can always see where we're standing
12598 overmap_buffer.set_seen( ompos, true );
12599 for( const tripoint_abs_omt &p : points_in_radius( ompos, dist ) ) {
12600 const point_rel_omt delta = p.xy() - ompos.xy();
12601 const int h_squared = delta.x() * delta.x() + delta.y() * delta.y();
12602 if( trigdist && h_squared > dist_squared ) {
12603 continue;
12604 }
12605 if( delta == point_rel_omt() ) {
12606 // 1. This case is already handled outside of the loop
12607 // 2. Calculating multiplier would cause division by zero
12608 continue;
12609 }
12610 // If circular distances are enabled, scale overmap distances by the diagonality of the sight line.
12611 point abs_delta = delta.raw().abs();
12612 int max_delta = std::max( abs_delta.x, abs_delta.y );
12613 const float multiplier = trigdist ? std::sqrt( h_squared ) / max_delta : 1;
12614 const std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> line = line_to( ompos, p );
12615 float sight_points = dist;
12616 for( auto it = line.begin();
12617 it != line.end() && sight_points >= 0; ++it ) {
12618 const oter_id &ter = overmap_buffer.ter( *it );
12619 sight_points -= static_cast<int>( ter->get_see_cost() ) * multiplier;
12620 }
12621 if( sight_points >= 0 ) {
12622 tripoint_abs_omt seen( p );
12623 do {
12624 overmap_buffer.set_seen( seen, true );
12625 --seen.z();
12626 } while( seen.z() >= 0 );
12627 }
12628 }
12629}
12630
12631void game::despawn_monster( monster &critter )
12632{
12633 critter.on_unload();
12634 // hallucinations aren't stored, they come and go as they like
12635 if( !critter.is_hallucination() ) {
12636 // despawn_monster saves a copy of the monster in the overmap, so
12637 // this must be called after on_unload (which updates state)
12638 overmap_buffer.despawn_monster( critter );
12639 }
12640 remove_zombie( critter );
12641 // simulate it being dead so further processing of it (e.g. in monmove) will yield
12642 critter.set_hp( 0 );
12643}
12644
12645void game::despawn_nonlocal_monsters()
12646{
12647 for( monster &critter : g->all_monsters() ) {
12648 if( critter.posx() < 0 - MAPSIZE_X / 6 ||
12649 critter.posy() < 0 - MAPSIZE_Y / 6 ||
12650 critter.posx() > ( MAPSIZE_X * 7 ) / 6 ||
12651 critter.posy() > ( MAPSIZE_Y * 7 ) / 6 ) {
12652 g->despawn_monster( critter );
12653 }
12654 }
12655}
12656
12657void game::shift_monsters( const tripoint &shift )
12658{
12659 if( shift == tripoint_zero ) {
12660 return;
12661 }
12662 for( monster &critter : all_monsters() ) {
12663 if( shift.xy() != point_zero ) {
12664 critter.shift( shift.xy() );
12665 }
12666
12667 if( m.inbounds( critter.pos() ) ) {
12668 // We're inbounds, so don't despawn after all.
12669 continue;
12670 }
12671 // The critter is now outside of the reality bubble; it must be saved and removed.
12672 despawn_monster( critter );
12673 }
12674}
12675
12676void game::perhaps_add_random_npc( bool ignore_spawn_timers_and_rates )
12677{
12678 if( !ignore_spawn_timers_and_rates && !calendar::once_every( 1_hours ) ) {
12679 return;
12680 }
12681 // Create a new NPC?
12682
12683 double spawn_time = get_option<float>( "NPC_SPAWNTIME" );
12684 if( !ignore_spawn_timers_and_rates && spawn_time == 0.0 ) {
12685 return;
12686 }
12687
12688 // spawn algorithm is a chance per hour, but the config is specified in average days
12689 // actual chance per hour is (100 / 24 ) / days
12690 static constexpr double days_to_rate_factor = 100.0 / 24;
12691 double spawn_rate = days_to_rate_factor / spawn_time;
12692 static constexpr int radius_spawn_range = 90;
12693 std::vector<shared_ptr_fast<npc>> npcs = overmap_buffer.get_npcs_near_player( radius_spawn_range );
12694 size_t npc_num = npcs.size();
12695 for( auto &npc : npcs ) {
12696 if( npc->has_trait( trait_NPC_STATIC_NPC ) || npc->has_trait( trait_NPC_STARTING_NPC ) ) {
12697 npc_num--;
12698 }
12699 }
12700
12701 if( npc_num > 0 ) {
12702 // 100%, 80%, 64%, 52%, 41%, 33%...
12703 spawn_rate *= std::pow( 0.8f, npc_num );
12704 }
12705
12706 if( !ignore_spawn_timers_and_rates && !x_in_y( spawn_rate, 100 ) ) {
12707 return;
12708 }
12709 bool spawn_allowed = false;
12710 tripoint_abs_omt spawn_point;
12711 int counter = 0;
12712 while( !spawn_allowed ) {
12713 if( counter >= 10 ) {
12714 return;
12715 }
12716 const tripoint_abs_omt u_omt = u.global_omt_location();
12717 spawn_point = u_omt + point( rng( -radius_spawn_range, radius_spawn_range ),
12718 rng( -radius_spawn_range, radius_spawn_range ) );
12719 // Only spawn random NPCs on z-level 0
12720 spawn_point.z() = 0;
12721 const oter_id oter = overmap_buffer.ter( spawn_point );
12722 // shouldn't spawn on bodies of water.
12723 if( !is_water_body( oter ) ) {
12724 spawn_allowed = true;
12725 }
12726 counter += 1;
12727 }
12728 shared_ptr_fast<npc> tmp = make_shared_fast<npc>();
12729 tmp->normalize();
12730 tmp->randomize();
12731
12732 if( one_in( 100 ) ) {
12733 // Same chances and duration of flu vs. cold as for the player.
12734 if( one_in( 6 ) ) {
12735 tmp->add_effect( effect_fake_flu, rng( 3_days, 10_days ) );
12736 } else {
12737 tmp->add_effect( effect_fake_common_cold, rng( 1_days, 14_days ) );
12738 }
12739 }
12740
12741 std::string new_fac_id = "solo_";
12742 new_fac_id += tmp->name;
12743 // create a new "lone wolf" faction for this one NPC
12744 faction *new_solo_fac = faction_manager_ptr->add_new_faction( tmp->name, faction_id( new_fac_id ),
12745 faction_no_faction );
12746 tmp->set_fac( new_solo_fac ? new_solo_fac->id : faction_no_faction );
12747 // adds the npc to the correct overmap.
12748 tmp->spawn_at_omt( spawn_point );
12749 overmap_buffer.insert_npc( tmp );
12750 tmp->form_opinion( u );
12751 tmp->mission = NPC_MISSION_NULL;
12752 tmp->long_term_goal_action();
12753 tmp->add_new_mission( mission::reserve_random( ORIGIN_ANY_NPC, tmp->global_omt_location(),
12754 tmp->getID() ) );
12755 // This will make the new NPC active- if its nearby to the player
12756 load_npcs();
12757}
12758
12759// Redraw window and show spinner, so cata window doesn't look frozen while pathfinding on overmap
12760void game::display_om_pathfinding_progress( size_t /* open_set */, size_t /* known_size */ )
12761{
12762 ui_adaptor dummy( ui_adaptor::disable_uis_below {} );
12763 static_popup pop;
12764 pop.on_top( true ).wait_message( "%s", _( "Hang on a bit…" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Hang on a bit…" ) ) ) );
12765 ui_manager::redraw();
12766 refresh_display();
12767 inp_mngr.pump_events();
12768}
12769
12770bool game::display_overlay_state( const action_id action )
12771{
12772 return displaying_overlays && *displaying_overlays == action;
12773}
12774
12775void game::display_toggle_overlay( const action_id action )
12776{
12777 if( display_overlay_state( action ) ) {
12778 displaying_overlays.reset();
12779 } else {
12780 displaying_overlays = action;
12781 }
12782}
12783
12784void game::display_scent()
12785{
12786 if( use_tiles ) {
12787 display_toggle_overlay( ACTION_DISPLAY_SCENT );
12788 } else {
12789 int div;
12790 bool got_value = query_int( div, _( "Set the Scent Map sensitivity to (0 to cancel)?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Set the Scent Map sensitivity to (0 to cancel)?"
) ) ) );
12791 if( !got_value || div < 1 ) {
12792 add_msg( _( "Never mind." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Never mind." ) ) ) );
12793 return;
12794 }
12795 shared_ptr_fast<game::draw_callback_t> scent_cb = make_shared_fast<game::draw_callback_t>( [&]() {
12796 scent.draw( w_terrain, div * 2, u.pos() + u.view_offset );
12797 } );
12798 g->add_draw_callback( scent_cb );
12799
12800 ui_manager::redraw();
12801 inp_mngr.wait_for_any_key();
12802 }
12803}
12804
12805void game::display_temperature()
12806{
12807 if( use_tiles ) {
12808 display_toggle_overlay( ACTION_DISPLAY_TEMPERATURE );
12809 }
12810}
12811
12812void game::display_vehicle_ai()
12813{
12814 if( use_tiles ) {
12815 display_toggle_overlay( ACTION_DISPLAY_VEHICLE_AI );
12816 }
12817}
12818
12819void game::display_visibility()
12820{
12821 if( use_tiles ) {
12822 display_toggle_overlay( ACTION_DISPLAY_VISIBILITY );
12823 if( display_overlay_state( ACTION_DISPLAY_VISIBILITY ) ) {
12824 std::vector< tripoint > locations;
12825 uilist creature_menu;
12826 int num_creatures = 0;
12827 creature_menu.addentry( num_creatures++, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, "%s", _( "You" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You" ) ) ) );
12828 locations.emplace_back( get_player_character().pos() ); // add player first.
12829 for( const Creature &critter : g->all_creatures() ) {
12830 if( critter.is_avatar() ) {
12831 continue;
12832 }
12833 creature_menu.addentry( num_creatures++, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, critter.disp_name() );
12834 locations.emplace_back( critter.pos() );
12835 }
12836
12837 pointmenu_cb callback( locations );
12838 creature_menu.callback = &callback;
12839 creature_menu.w_y_setup = 0;
12840 creature_menu.query();
12841 if( creature_menu.ret >= 0 && static_cast<size_t>( creature_menu.ret ) < locations.size() ) {
12842 Creature *creature = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<Creature>( locations[creature_menu.ret] );
12843 displaying_visibility_creature = creature;
12844 }
12845 } else {
12846 displaying_visibility_creature = nullptr;
12847 }
12848 }
12849}
12850
12851void game::toggle_debug_hour_timer()
12852{
12853 debug_hour_timer.toggle();
12854}
12855
12856void game::debug_hour_timer::toggle()
12857{
12858 enabled = !enabled;
12859 start_time = std::nullopt;
12860 add_msg( string_format( "debug timer %s", enabled ? "enabled" : "disabled" ) );
12861}
12862
12863void game::debug_hour_timer::print_time()
12864{
12865 if( enabled ) {
12866 if( calendar::once_every( time_duration::from_hours( 1 ) ) ) {
12867 const IRLTimeMs now = std::chrono::time_point_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(
12868 std::chrono::steady_clock::now() );
12869 if( start_time ) {
12870 add_msg( "in-game hour took: %d ms", ( now - *start_time ).count() );
12871 } else {
12872 add_msg( "starting debug timer" );
12873 }
12874 start_time = now;
12875 }
12876 }
12877}
12878
12879void game::display_lighting()
12880{
12881 if( use_tiles ) {
12882 display_toggle_overlay( ACTION_DISPLAY_LIGHTING );
12883 if( !g->display_overlay_state( ACTION_DISPLAY_LIGHTING ) ) {
12884 return;
12885 }
12886 uilist lighting_menu;
12887 std::vector<std::string> lighting_menu_strings{
12888 "Global lighting conditions"
12889 };
12890
12891 int count = 0;
12892 for( const auto &menu_str : lighting_menu_strings ) {
12893 lighting_menu.addentry( count++, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, "%s", menu_str );
12894 }
12895
12896 lighting_menu.w_y_setup = 0;
12897 lighting_menu.query();
12898 if( ( lighting_menu.ret >= 0 ) &&
12899 ( static_cast<size_t>( lighting_menu.ret ) < lighting_menu_strings.size() ) ) {
12900 g->displaying_lighting_condition = lighting_menu.ret;
12901 }
12902 }
12903}
12904
12905void game::display_radiation()
12906{
12907 if( use_tiles ) {
12908 display_toggle_overlay( ACTION_DISPLAY_RADIATION );
12909 }
12910}
12911
12912void game::display_transparency()
12913{
12914 if( use_tiles ) {
12915 display_toggle_overlay( ACTION_DISPLAY_TRANSPARENCY );
12916 }
12917}
12918
12919void game::init_autosave()
12920{
12921 moves_since_last_save = 0;
12922 last_save_timestamp = std::time( nullptr );
12923}
12924
12925void game::quicksave()
12926{
12927 //Don't autosave if the player hasn't done anything since the last autosave/quicksave,
12928 if( !moves_since_last_save ) {
12929 return;
12930 }
12931 add_msg( m_info, _( "Saving game, this may take a while." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Saving game, this may take a while."
) ) ) );
12932
12933 static_popup popup;
12934 popup.message( "%s", _( "Saving game, this may take a while." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Saving game, this may take a while."
) ) ) );
12935 ui_manager::redraw();
12936 refresh_display();
12937
12938 time_t now = std::time( nullptr ); //timestamp for start of saving procedure
12939
12940 //perform save
12941 save();
12942 //Now reset counters for autosaving, so we don't immediately autosave after a quicksave or autosave.
12943 moves_since_last_save = 0;
12944 last_save_timestamp = now;
12945}
12946
12947void game::quickload()
12948{
12949 const WORLD *active_world = world_generator->active_world;
12950 if( active_world == nullptr ) {
12951 return;
12952 }
12953 std::string const world_name = active_world->world_name;
12954 std::string const &save_id = u.get_save_id();
12955
12956 if( active_world->save_exists( save_t::from_save_id( save_id ) ) ) {
12957 if( moves_since_last_save != 0 ) { // See if we need to reload anything
12958 moves_since_last_save = 0;
12959 last_save_timestamp = std::time( nullptr );
12960
12961 u.moves = 0;
12962 uquit = QUIT_NOSAVED;
12963
12964 main_menu::queued_world_to_load = world_name;
12965 main_menu::queued_save_id_to_load = save_id;
12966
12967 }
12968
12969 } else {
12970 popup_getkey( _( "No saves for current character yet." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "No saves for current character yet."
) ) ) );
12971 }
12972}
12973
12974void game::autosave()
12975{
12976 //Don't autosave if the min-autosave interval has not passed since the last autosave/quicksave.
12977 if( std::time( nullptr ) < last_save_timestamp + 60 * get_option<int>( "AUTOSAVE_MINUTES" ) ) {
12978 return;
12979 }
12980 quicksave(); //Driving checks are handled by quicksave()
12981}
12982
12983void game::start_calendar()
12984{
12985 calendar::start_of_cataclysm = scen->start_of_cataclysm();
12986 calendar::start_of_game = scen->start_of_game();
12987 calendar::turn = calendar::start_of_game;
12988 calendar::initial_season = static_cast<season_type>( ( to_days<int>( calendar::start_of_game -
12989 calendar::turn_zero ) / get_option<int>( "SEASON_LENGTH" ) ) % season_type::NUM_SEASONS );
12990}
12991
12992overmap &game::get_cur_om() const
12993{
12994 // The player is located in the middle submap of the map.
12995 const tripoint_abs_sm sm = m.get_abs_sub() + tripoint( HALF_MAPSIZE, HALF_MAPSIZE, 0 );
12996 const tripoint_abs_om pos_om = project_to<coords::om>( sm );
12997 return overmap_buffer.get( pos_om.xy() );
12998}
12999
13000std::vector<npc *> game::allies()
13001{
13002 return get_npcs_if( [&]( const npc & guy ) {
13003 if( !guy.is_hallucination() ) {
13004 return guy.is_ally( get_player_character() );
13005 } else {
13006 return false;
13007 }
13008 } );
13009}
13010
13011std::vector<Creature *> game::get_creatures_if( const std::function<bool( const Creature & )>
13012 &pred )
13013{
13014 std::vector<Creature *> result;
13015 for( Creature &critter : all_creatures() ) {
13016 if( pred( critter ) ) {
13017 result.push_back( &critter );
13018 }
13019 }
13020 return result;
13021}
13022
13023std::vector<Character *> game::get_characters_if( const std::function<bool( const Character & )>
13024 &pred )
13025{
13026 std::vector<Character *> result;
13027 avatar &a = get_avatar();
13028 if( pred( a ) ) {
13029 result.push_back( &a );
13030 }
13031 for( npc &guy : all_npcs() ) {
13032 if( pred( guy ) ) {
13033 result.push_back( &guy );
13034 }
13035 }
13036 return result;
13037}
13038
13039std::vector<npc *> game::get_npcs_if( const std::function<bool( const npc & )> &pred )
13040{
13041 std::vector<npc *> result;
13042 for( npc &guy : all_npcs() ) {
13043 if( pred( guy ) ) {
13044 result.push_back( &guy );
13045 }
13046 }
13047 return result;
13048}
13049
13050template<>
13051bool game::non_dead_range<monster>::iterator::valid()
13052{
13053 current = iter->lock();
13054 return current && !current->is_dead();
13055}
13056
13057template<>
13058bool game::non_dead_range<npc>::iterator::valid()
13059{
13060 current = iter->lock();
13061 return current && !current->is_dead();
13062}
13063
13064template<>
13065bool game::non_dead_range<Creature>::iterator::valid()
13066{
13067 current = iter->lock();
13068 // There is no Creature::is_dead function, so we can't write
13069 // return current && !current->is_dead();
13070 if( !current ) {
13071 return false;
13072 }
13073 const Creature *const critter = current.get();
13074 if( critter->is_monster() ) {
13075 return !static_cast<const monster *>( critter )->is_dead();
13076 }
13077 if( critter->is_npc() ) {
13078 return !static_cast<const npc *>( critter )->is_dead();
13079 }
13080 return true; // must be the avatar
13081}
13082
13083game::monster_range::monster_range( game &game_ref )
13084{
13085 const auto &monsters = game_ref.critter_tracker->get_monsters_list();
13086 items.insert( items.end(), monsters.begin(), monsters.end() );
13087}
13088
13089game::Creature_range::Creature_range( game &game_ref ) : u( &game_ref.u, []( Character * ) { } )
13090{
13091 const auto &monsters = game_ref.critter_tracker->get_monsters_list();
