13092 items.insert( items.end(), monsters.begin(), monsters.end() );
13093 items.insert( items.end(), game_ref.critter_tracker->active_npc.begin(),
13094 game_ref.critter_tracker->active_npc.end() );
13095 items.emplace_back( u );
13096}
13097
13098game::npc_range::npc_range( game &game_ref )
13099{
13100 items.insert( items.end(), game_ref.critter_tracker->active_npc.begin(),
13101 game_ref.critter_tracker->active_npc.end() );
13102}
13103
13104game::Creature_range game::all_creatures()
13105{
13106 return Creature_range( *this );
13107}
13108
13109game::monster_range game::all_monsters()
13110{
13111 return monster_range( *this );
13112}
13113
13114game::npc_range game::all_npcs()
13115{
13116 return npc_range( *this );
13117}
13118
13119Creature *game::get_creature_if( const std::function<bool( const Creature & )> &pred )
13120{
13121 for( Creature &critter : all_creatures() ) {
13122 if( pred( critter ) ) {
13123 return &critter;
13124 }
13125 }
13126 return nullptr;
13127}
13128
13129std::string PATH_INFO::player_base_save_path()
13130{
13131 return PATH_INFO::world_base_save_path() + "/" + base64_encode( get_avatar().get_save_id() );
13132}
13133
13134cata_path PATH_INFO::player_base_save_path_path()
13135{
13136 return PATH_INFO::world_base_save_path_path() / base64_encode( get_avatar().get_save_id() );
13137}
13138
13139std::string PATH_INFO::world_base_save_path()
13140{
13141 if( world_generator->active_world == nullptr ) {
13142 return PATH_INFO::savedir();
13143 }
13144 return world_generator->active_world->folder_path();
13145}
13146
13147cata_path PATH_INFO::world_base_save_path_path()
13148{
13149 if( world_generator->active_world == nullptr ) {
13150 return PATH_INFO::savedir_path();
13151 }
13152 return world_generator->active_world->folder_path_path();
13153}
13154
13155void game::shift_destination_preview( const point &delta )
13156{
13157 for( tripoint_bub_ms &p : destination_preview ) {
13158 p += delta;
13159 }
13160}
13161
13162int game::slip_down_chance( climb_maneuver, climbing_aid_id aid_id,
13163 bool show_chance_messages )
13164{
13165 if( aid_id.is_null() ) {
13166 // The NULL climbing aid ID may be passed as a default argument.
13167 aid_id = climbing_aid_default;
13168 }
13169
13170 const climbing_aid &aid = aid_id.obj();
13171
13172 int slip = 100;
13173
13174 const bool parkour = u.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_parkour );
13175 const bool badknees = u.has_trait( trait_BADKNEES );
13176 if( parkour && badknees ) {
13177 if( show_chance_messages ) {
13178 add_msg( m_info, _( "Your skill in parkour makes up for your bad knees while climbing." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your skill in parkour makes up for your bad knees while climbing."
) ) ) );
13179 }
13180 } else if( u.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_parkour ) ) {
13181 slip /= 2;
13182 if( show_chance_messages ) {
13183 add_msg( m_info, _( "Your skill in parkour makes it easier to climb." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your skill in parkour makes it easier to climb."
) ) ) );
13184 }
13185 } else if( u.has_trait( trait_BADKNEES ) ) {
13186 slip *= 2;
13187 if( show_chance_messages ) {
13188 add_msg( m_info, _( "Your bad knees make it difficult to climb." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your bad knees make it difficult to climb."
) ) ) );
13189 }
13190 }
13191
13192 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_GAME, "Slip chance after proficiency/trait modifiers %d%%", slip )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Slip chance after proficiency/trait modifiers %d%%"
, slip ) ) ); } } while( false );
13193
13194 // Climbing is difficult with wet hands and feet.
13195 float wet_penalty = 1.0f;
13196 bool wet_feet = false;
13197 bool wet_hands = false;
13198
13199 for( const bodypart_id &bp : u.get_all_body_parts_of_type( body_part_type::type::foot,
13200 get_body_part_flags::primary_type ) ) {
13201 if( u.get_part_wetness( bp ) > 0 ) {
13202 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_GAME, "Foot %s %.1f wet", body_part_name( bp ),do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Foot %s %.1f wet"
, body_part_name( bp ), u.get_part( bp )->get_wetness_percentage
() ) ) ); } } while( false )
13203 u.get_part( bp )->get_wetness_percentage() )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Foot %s %.1f wet"
, body_part_name( bp ), u.get_part( bp )->get_wetness_percentage
() ) ) ); } } while( false );
13204 wet_feet = true;
13205 wet_penalty += u.get_part( bp )->get_wetness_percentage() / 2;
13206 }
13207 }
13208
13209 for( const bodypart_id &bp : u.get_all_body_parts_of_type( body_part_type::type::hand,
13210 get_body_part_flags::primary_type ) ) {
13211 if( u.get_part_wetness( bp ) > 0 ) {
13212 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_GAME, "Hand %s %.1f wet", body_part_name( bp ),do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Hand %s %.1f wet"
, body_part_name( bp ), u.get_part( bp )->get_wetness_percentage
() ) ) ); } } while( false )
13213 u.get_part( bp )->get_wetness_percentage() )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Hand %s %.1f wet"
, body_part_name( bp ), u.get_part( bp )->get_wetness_percentage
() ) ) ); } } while( false );
13214 wet_hands = true;
13215 wet_penalty += u.get_part( bp )->get_wetness_percentage() / 2;
13216 }
13217 }
13218 if( show_chance_messages ) {
13219 if( wet_feet && wet_hands ) {
13220 add_msg( m_info, _( "Your wet hands and feet make it harder to climb." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your wet hands and feet make it harder to climb."
) ) ) );
13221 } else if( wet_feet ) {
13222 add_msg( m_info, _( "Your wet feet make it harder to climb." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your wet feet make it harder to climb."
) ) ) );
13223 } else if( wet_hands ) {
13224 add_msg( m_info, _( "Your wet hands make it harder to climb." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your wet hands make it harder to climb."
) ) ) );
13225 }
13226 }
13227
13228 // Apply wetness penalty
13229 slip *= wet_penalty;
13230
13231 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_GAME, "Slip chance after wetness penalty %d%%", slip )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Slip chance after wetness penalty %d%%"
, slip ) ) ); } } while( false );
13232
13233 ///\EFFECT_DEX decreases chances of slipping while climbing
13234 ///\EFFECT_STR decreases chances of slipping while climbing
13235 /// Not using arm strength since lifting score comes into play later
13236 slip /= std::max( 1, u.dex_cur + u.str_cur );
13237
13238 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_GAME, "Slip chance after stat modifiers %d%%", slip )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Slip chance after stat modifiers %d%%"
, slip ) ) ); } } while( false );
13239
13240 // Apply limb score penalties - grip, arm strength and footing are all relevant
13241 slip /= u.get_modifier( character_modifier_slip_prevent_mod );
13242 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_GAME, "Slipping chance after limb scores %d%%", slip )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Slipping chance after limb scores %d%%"
, slip ) ) ); } } while( false );
13243
13244 // Being weighed down makes it easier for you to slip.
13245 double weight_ratio = static_cast<double>( units::to_gram( u.weight_carried() ) ) / units::to_gram(
13246 u.weight_capacity() );
13247 slip += roll_remainder( 8.0 * weight_ratio );
13248 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_GAME, "Weight ratio %.2f, slip chance %d%%", weight_ratio,do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Weight ratio %.2f, slip chance %d%%"
, weight_ratio, slip ) ) ); } } while( false )
13249 slip )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Weight ratio %.2f, slip chance %d%%"
, weight_ratio, slip ) ) ); } } while( false );
13250
13251 // Decreasing stamina makes you slip up more often
13252 const float stamina_ratio = static_cast<float>( u.get_stamina() ) / u.get_stamina_max();
13253 if( stamina_ratio < 0.8 ) {
13254 slip /= std::max( stamina_ratio, .1f );
13255
13256 if( show_chance_messages ) {
13257 if( stamina_ratio > 0.6 ) {
13258 add_msg( m_info, _( "You are winded, which makes climbing harder." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are winded, which makes climbing harder."
) ) ) );
13259 } else if( stamina_ratio > 0.4 ) {
13260 add_msg( m_info, _( "You are out of breath, which makes climbing much harder." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are out of breath, which makes climbing much harder."
) ) ) );
13261 } else if( stamina_ratio > 0.2 ) {
13262 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't catch your breath, which makes it much more difficult to climb." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't catch your breath, which makes it much more difficult to climb."
) ) ) );
13263 } else {
13264 add_msg( m_info, _( "You feel faint and can't keep your balance." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You feel faint and can't keep your balance."
) ) ) );
13265 }
13266 }
13267 }
13268 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_GAME, "Stamina ratio %.2f, slip chance %d%%",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Stamina ratio %.2f, slip chance %d%%"
, stamina_ratio, slip ) ) ); } } while( false )
13269 stamina_ratio, slip )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Stamina ratio %.2f, slip chance %d%%"
, stamina_ratio, slip ) ) ); } } while( false );
13270
13271 if( show_chance_messages ) {
13272 if( weight_ratio >= 1 ) {
13273 add_msg( m_info, _( "Your carried weight tries to drag you down." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your carried weight tries to drag you down."
) ) ) );
13274 } else if( weight_ratio > .75 ) {
13275 add_msg( m_info, _( "You strain to climb with the weight of your possessions." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You strain to climb with the weight of your possessions."
) ) ) );
13276 } else if( weight_ratio > .5 ) {
13277 add_msg( m_info, _( "You feel the weight of your luggage makes it more difficult to climb." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You feel the weight of your luggage makes it more difficult to climb."
) ) ) );
13278 } else if( weight_ratio > .25 ) {
13279 add_msg( m_info, _( "Your carried weight makes it a little harder to climb." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your carried weight makes it a little harder to climb."
) ) ) );
13280 }
13281 }
13282
13283 // Affordances (other than ledge) may reduce slip chance, even below zero.
13284 slip += aid.slip_chance_mod;
13285 if( show_chance_messages ) {
13286 if( aid.slip_chance_mod >= 0 ) {
13287 // TODO allow for a message specific to the climbing aid?
13288 add_msg( m_info, _( "There's nothing here to help you climb." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There's nothing here to help you climb."
) ) ) );
13289 }
13290 }
13291
13292 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_GAME, "After affordance modifier, final slip chance %d%%",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "After affordance modifier, final slip chance %d%%"
, slip ) ) ); } } while( false )
13293 slip )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "After affordance modifier, final slip chance %d%%"
, slip ) ) ); } } while( false );
13294
13295 return slip;
13296}
13297
13298bool game::slip_down( climb_maneuver maneuver, climbing_aid_id aid_id,
13299 bool show_chance_messages )
13300{
13301 int slip = slip_down_chance( maneuver, aid_id, show_chance_messages );
13302
13303 if( x_in_y( slip, 100 ) ) {
13304 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You slip while climbing and fall down." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You slip while climbing and fall down."
) ) ) );
13305 if( slip >= 100 ) {
13306 add_msg( m_bad, _( "Climbing is impossible in your current state." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Climbing is impossible in your current state."
) ) ) );
13307 }
13308 // Check for traps if climbing UP or DOWN. Note that ledges (open air) count as traps.
13309 if( maneuver != climb_maneuver::over_obstacle ) {
13310 m.creature_on_trap( u );
13311 }
13312 return true;
13313 }
13314 return false;
13315}
13316
13317// These helpers map climbing aid IDs to/from integers for use as return values in uilist.
13318// The integers are offset by 4096 to avoid collision with other options (see iexamine::ledge)
13319static int climb_affordance_menu_encode( const climbing_aid_id &aid_id )
13320{
13321 return 0x1000 + int_id<climbing_aid>( aid_id ).to_i();
13322}
13323static bool climb_affordance_menu_decode( int retval, climbing_aid_id &aid_id )
13324{
13325 int_id< climbing_aid > as_int_id( retval - 0x1000 );
13326 if( as_int_id.is_valid() ) {
13327 aid_id = as_int_id.id();
13328 return true;
13329 }
13330 return false;
13331}
13332
13333void game::climb_down_menu_gen( const tripoint &examp, uilist &cmenu )
13334{
13335 // NOTE this menu may be merged with the iexamine::ledge menu, manage keys carefully!
13336
13337 map &here = get_map();
13338 Character &you = get_player_character();
13339
13340 if( !here.valid_move( you.pos(), examp, false, true ) ) {
13341 // Can't move horizontally to the ledge
13342 return;
13343 }
13344
13345 // Scan the height of the drop and what's in the way.
13346 const climbing_aid::fall_scan fall( examp );
13347
13348 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_IEXAMINE, "Ledge height %d", fall.height )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_IEXAMINE ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Ledge height %d"
, fall.height ) ) ); } } while( false );
13349 if( fall.height == 0 ) {
13350 you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't climb down there." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't climb down there."
) ) ) );
13351 return;
13352 }
13353
13354 // This is used to mention object names. TODO make this more flexible.
13355 std::string target_disp_name = m.disp_name( fall.pos_furniture_or_floor() );
13356
13357 climbing_aid::condition_list conditions = climbing_aid::detect_conditions( you, examp );
13358
13359 climbing_aid::aid_list aids = climbing_aid::list( conditions );
13360
13361 // Debug:
13362 {
13363 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_IEXAMINE, "Climbing aid conditions: %d", conditions.size() )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_IEXAMINE ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Climbing aid conditions: %d"
, conditions.size() ) ) ); } } while( false );
13364 for( climbing_aid::condition &cond : conditions ) {
13365 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_IEXAMINE, cond.category_string() + ": " + cond.flag )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_IEXAMINE ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( cond.category_string
() + ": " + cond.flag ) ) ); } } while( false );
13366 }
13367 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_IEXAMINE, "Climbing aids available: %d", aids.size() )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_IEXAMINE ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Climbing aids available: %d"
, aids.size() ) ) ); } } while( false );
13368 for( const climbing_aid *aid : climbing_aid::list_all( conditions ) ) {
13369 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_IEXAMINE, "#%d %s: %s (%s)",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_IEXAMINE ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "#%d %s: %s (%s)"
, climb_affordance_menu_encode( aid->id ), aid->id.str(
), aid->down.menu_text.translated(), target_disp_name ) ) )
; } } while( false )
13370 climb_affordance_menu_encode( aid->id ), aid->id.str(),do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_IEXAMINE ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "#%d %s: %s (%s)"
, climb_affordance_menu_encode( aid->id ), aid->id.str(
), aid->down.menu_text.translated(), target_disp_name ) ) )
; } } while( false )
13371 aid->down.menu_text.translated(), target_disp_name )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_IEXAMINE ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "#%d %s: %s (%s)"
, climb_affordance_menu_encode( aid->id ), aid->id.str(
), aid->down.menu_text.translated(), target_disp_name ) ) )
; } } while( false );
13372 }
13373 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_IEXAMINE, "%d-level drop; %d until furniture; %d until creature.",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_IEXAMINE ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "%d-level drop; %d until furniture; %d until creature."
, fall.height, fall.height_until_furniture, fall.height_until_creature
) ) ); } } while( false )
13374 fall.height, fall.height_until_furniture, fall.height_until_creature )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_IEXAMINE ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "%d-level drop; %d until furniture; %d until creature."
, fall.height, fall.height_until_furniture, fall.height_until_creature
) ) ); } } while( false );
13375 }
13376
13377 for( const climbing_aid *aid : aids ) {
13378 // Enable climbing aid unless it would deploy furniture in occupied tiles.
13379 bool enable_aid = true;
13380 if( aid->down.deploys_furniture() &&
13381 fall.height_until_furniture < std::min( fall.height, aid->down.max_height ) ) {
13382 // Can't deploy because it would overwrite existing furniture.
13383 enable_aid = false;
13384 }
13385
13386 // Certain climbing aids can't be used for partial descent.
13387 if( !aid->down.allow_remaining_height && aid->down.max_height < fall.height ) {
13388 // TODO this check could block the safest non-deploying aid!
13389 enable_aid = false;
13390 }
13391
13392 int hotkey = aid->down.menu_hotkey;
13393 if( hotkey == 0 ) {
13394 // Deployables require a hotkey def and we only show one non-deployable; use 'c' for it.
13395 hotkey = 'c';
13396 }
13397
13398 std::string text_translated = enable_aid ?
13399 aid->down.menu_text.translated() : aid->down.menu_cant.translated();
13400 cmenu.addentry( climb_affordance_menu_encode( aid->id ), enable_aid, hotkey,
13401 string_format( text_translated, target_disp_name ) );
13402 }
13403}
13404
13405bool game::climb_down_menu_pick( const tripoint &examp, int retval )
13406{
13407 climbing_aid_id aid_id = climbing_aid_default;
13408
13409 if( climb_affordance_menu_decode( retval, aid_id ) ) {
13410 climb_down_using( examp, aid_id );
13411 return true;
13412 } else {
13413 return false;
13414 }
13415}
13416
13417void game::climb_down( const tripoint &examp )
13418{
13419 uilist cmenu;
13420 cmenu.text = _( "How would you prefer to climb down?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "How would you prefer to climb down?"
) ) );
13421
13422 climb_down_menu_gen( examp, cmenu );
13423
13424 // If there would only be one choice, skip the menu.
13425 if( cmenu.entries.size() == 1 ) {
13426 climb_down_menu_pick( examp, cmenu.entries[0].retval );
13427 } else {
13428 cmenu.query();
13429 climb_down_menu_pick( examp, cmenu.ret );
13430 }
13431}
13432
13433void game::climb_down_using( const tripoint &examp, climbing_aid_id aid_id, bool deploy_affordance )
13434{
13435 const climbing_aid &aid = aid_id.obj();
13436
13437 map &here = get_map();
13438 Character &you = get_player_character();
13439
13440 // If player is grabbed, trapped, or somehow otherwise movement-impeded, first try to break free
13441 if( !you.move_effects( false ) ) {
13442 you.moves -= 100;
13443 return;
13444 }
13445
13446 if( !here.valid_move( you.pos(), examp, false, true ) ) {
13447 // Can't move horizontally to the ledge
13448 return;
13449 }
13450
13451 // Scan the height of the drop and what's in the way.
13452 const climbing_aid::fall_scan fall( examp );
13453
13454 int estimated_climb_cost = you.climbing_cost( fall.pos_bottom(), examp );
13455 const float fall_mod = you.fall_damage_mod();
13456 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_IEXAMINE, "Climb cost %d", estimated_climb_cost )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_IEXAMINE ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Climb cost %d",
estimated_climb_cost ) ) ); } } while( false );
13457 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_IEXAMINE, "Fall damage modifier %.2f", fall_mod )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_IEXAMINE ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Fall damage modifier %.2f"
, fall_mod ) ) ); } } while( false );
13458
13459 std::string query;
13460
13461 // The most common query reads as follows:
13462 // It [seems somewhat risky] to climb down like this.
13463 // Falling [would hurt].
13464 // You [probably won't be able to climb back up].
13465 // Climb down the rope?
13466
13467 // Calculate chance of slipping. Prints possible causes to log.
13468 int slip_chance = slip_down_chance( climb_maneuver::down, aid_id, true );
13469
13470 // Roughly estimate damage if we should fall.
13471 int damage_estimate = 10 * fall.height;
13472 if( damage_estimate <= 30 ) {
13473 damage_estimate *= fall_mod;
13474 } else {
13475 damage_estimate *= std::pow( fall_mod, 30.f / damage_estimate );
13476 }
13477
13478 // Rough messaging about safety. "seems safe" can leave a 1-2% chance unlike "perfectly safe".
13479 bool seems_perfectly_safe = slip_chance < -5 && aid.down.max_height >= fall.height;
13480 if( seems_perfectly_safe ) {
13481 query = _( "It <color_green>seems perfectly safe</color> to climb down like this." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It <color_green>seems perfectly safe</color> to climb down like this."
) ) );
13482 } else if( slip_chance < 3 ) {
13483 query = _( "It <color_green>seems safe</color> to climb down like this." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It <color_green>seems safe</color> to climb down like this."
) ) );
13484 } else if( slip_chance < 8 ) {
13485 query = _( "It <color_yellow>seems a bit tricky</color> to climb down like this." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It <color_yellow>seems a bit tricky</color> to climb down like this."
) ) );
13486 } else if( slip_chance < 20 ) {
13487 query = _( "It <color_yellow>seems somewhat risky</color> to climb down like this." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It <color_yellow>seems somewhat risky</color> to climb down like this."
) ) );
13488 } else if( slip_chance < 50 ) {
13489 query = _( "It <color_red>seems very risky</color> to climb down like this." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It <color_red>seems very risky</color> to climb down like this."
) ) );
13490 } else if( slip_chance < 80 ) {
13491 query = _( "It <color_pink>looks like you'll slip</color> if you climb down like this." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It <color_pink>looks like you'll slip</color> if you climb down like this."
) ) );
13492 } else {
13493 query = _( "It <color_pink>doesn't seem possible to climb down safely</color>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It <color_pink>doesn't seem possible to climb down safely</color>."
) ) );
13494 }
13495
13496 if( !seems_perfectly_safe ) {
13497 std::string hint_fall_damage;
13498 if( damage_estimate >= 100 ) {
13499 hint_fall_damage = _( "Falling <color_pink>would kill you</color>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Falling <color_pink>would kill you</color>."
) ) );
13500 } else if( damage_estimate >= 60 ) {
13501 hint_fall_damage = _( "Falling <color_pink>could cripple or kill you</color>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Falling <color_pink>could cripple or kill you</color>."
) ) );
13502 } else if( damage_estimate >= 30 ) {
13503 hint_fall_damage = _( "Falling <color_pink>would break bones.</color>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Falling <color_pink>would break bones.</color>."
) ) );
13504 } else if( damage_estimate >= 15 ) {
13505 hint_fall_damage = _( "Falling <color_red>would hurt badly</color>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Falling <color_red>would hurt badly</color>."
) ) );
13506 } else if( damage_estimate >= 5 ) {
13507 hint_fall_damage = _( "Falling <color_red>would hurt</color>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Falling <color_red>would hurt</color>."
) ) );
13508 } else {
13509 hint_fall_damage = _( "Falling <color_green>wouldn't hurt much</color>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Falling <color_green>wouldn't hurt much</color>."
) ) );
13510 }
13511 query += "\n";
13512 query += hint_fall_damage;
13513 }
13514
13515 if( fall.height > aid.down.max_height ) {
13516 // Warn the player that they will fall even after a successful climb
13517 int remaining_height = fall.height - aid.down.max_height;
13518 query += "\n";
13519 query += string_format( n_gettext(
13520 "Even if you climb down safely, you will fall <color_yellow>at least %d story</color>.",
13521 "Even if you climb down safely, you will fall <color_red>at least %d stories</color>.",
13522 remaining_height ), remaining_height );
13523 }
13524
13525 // Certain climbing aids make it easy to climb back up, usually by making furniture.
13526 if( aid.down.easy_climb_back_up >= fall.height ) {
13527 estimated_climb_cost = 50;
13528 }
13529
13530 // Note, this easy_climb_back_up can be set by factors other than the climbing aid.
13531 bool easy_climb_back_up = false;
13532 std::string hint_climb_back;
13533 if( estimated_climb_cost <= 0 ) {
13534 hint_climb_back = _( "You <color_red>probably won't be able to climb back up</color>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You <color_red>probably won't be able to climb back up</color>."
) ) );
13535 } else if( estimated_climb_cost < 200 ) {
13536 hint_climb_back = _( "You <color_green>should be easily able to climb back up</color>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You <color_green>should be easily able to climb back up</color>."
) ) );
13537 easy_climb_back_up = true;
13538 } else {
13539 hint_climb_back = _( "You <color_yellow>may have problems trying to climb back up</color>." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You <color_yellow>may have problems trying to climb back up</color>."
) ) );
13540 }
13541 query += "\n";
13542 query += hint_climb_back;
13543
13544 std::string query_prompt = _( "Climb down?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Climb down?" ) ) );
13545 if( !aid.down.confirm_text.empty() ) {
13546 query_prompt = aid.down.confirm_text.translated();
13547 }
13548 query += "\n\n";
13549 query += query_prompt;
13550
13551 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_GAME, "Generated climb_down prompt for the player." )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Generated climb_down prompt for the player."
) ) ); } } while( false );
13552 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_GAME, "Climbing aid: %s / deploy furniture %d", std::string( aid_id ),do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Climbing aid: %s / deploy furniture %d"
, std::string( aid_id ), int( deploy_affordance ) ) ) ); } } while
( false )
13553 int( deploy_affordance ) )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Climbing aid: %s / deploy furniture %d"
, std::string( aid_id ), int( deploy_affordance ) ) ) ); } } while
( false );
13554 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_GAME, "Slip chance %d / est damage %d", slip_chance, damage_estimate )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Slip chance %d / est damage %d"
, slip_chance, damage_estimate ) ) ); } } while( false );
13555 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_GAME, "We can descend %d / total height %d", aid.down.max_height,do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "We can descend %d / total height %d"
, aid.down.max_height, fall.height ) ) ); } } while( false )
13556 fall.height )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_GAME ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "We can descend %d / total height %d"
, aid.down.max_height, fall.height ) ) ); } } while( false );
13557
13558 if( !seems_perfectly_safe || !easy_climb_back_up ) {
13559
13560 // This is used to mention object names. TODO make this more flexible.
13561 std::string target_disp_name = m.disp_name( fall.pos_furniture_or_floor() );
13562
13563 // Show the risk prompt.
13564 if( !query_yn( query.c_str(), target_disp_name ) ) {
13565 return;
13566 }
13567 }
13568
13569 you.set_activity_level( ACTIVE_EXERCISE );
13570 float weary_mult = 1.0f / you.exertion_adjusted_move_multiplier( ACTIVE_EXERCISE );
13571
13572 you.moves -= to_moves<int>( 1_seconds + 1_seconds * fall_mod ) * weary_mult;
13573 you.setpos( examp );
13574
13575 // Pre-descent message.
13576 if( !aid.down.msg_before.empty() ) {
13577 you.add_msg_if_player( aid.down.msg_before.translated() );
13578 }
13579
13580 // Descent: perform one slip check per level
13581 tripoint descent_pos = examp;
13582 for( int i = 0; i < fall.height && i < aid.down.max_height; ++i ) {
13583 if( g->slip_down( climb_maneuver::down, aid_id, false ) ) {
13584 // The player has slipped and probably fallen.
13585 return;
13586 } else {
13587 descent_pos.z--;
13588 if( aid.down.deploys_furniture() ) {
13589 here.furn_set( descent_pos, aid.down.deploy_furn );
13590 }
13591 }
13592 }
13593
13594 int descended_levels = examp.z - descent_pos.z;
13595 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_IEXAMINE, "Safe movement down %d Z-levels", descended_levels )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_IEXAMINE ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Safe movement down %d Z-levels"
, descended_levels ) ) ); } } while( false );
13596
13597 // Post-descent logic...
13598
13599 // Use up items after successful climb
13600 if( aid.base_condition.cat == climbing_aid::category::item && aid.base_condition.uses_item > 0 ) {
13601 for( item &used_item : you.use_amount( itype_id( aid.base_condition.flag ),
13602 aid.base_condition.uses_item ) ) {
13603 used_item.spill_contents( you );
13604 }
13605 }
13606
13607 // Pre-descent message.
13608 if( !aid.down.msg_after.empty() ) {
13609 you.add_msg_if_player( aid.down.msg_after.translated() );
13610 }
13611
13612 // You ride the ride, you pay the tithe.
13613 if( aid.down.cost.damage > 0 ) {
13614 you.apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "torso" ), aid.down.cost.damage );
13615 }
13616 if( aid.down.cost.pain > 0 ) {
13617 you.mod_pain( aid.down.cost.pain );
13618 }
13619 if( aid.down.cost.kcal > 0 ) {
13620 you.mod_stored_kcal( -aid.down.cost.kcal );
13621 }
13622 if( aid.down.cost.thirst > 0 ) {
13623 you.mod_thirst( aid.down.cost.thirst );
13624 }
13625
13626 // vertical_move with force=true triggers traps (ie, fall) at the end of the move.
13627 g->vertical_move( -descended_levels, true );
13628
13629 if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, you.pos() ) ) {
13630 you.set_underwater( true );
13631 g->water_affect_items( you );
13632 you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You climb down and dive underwater." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You climb down and dive underwater."
) ) ) );
13633 }
13634}
13635
13636namespace cata_event_dispatch
13637{
13638void avatar_moves( const tripoint &old_abs_pos, const avatar &u, const map &m )
13639{
13640 const tripoint new_pos = u.pos();
13641 const tripoint new_abs_pos = m.getabs( new_pos );
13642 mtype_id mount_type;
13643 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
13644 mount_type = u.mounted_creature->type->id;
13645 }
13646 get_event_bus().send<event_type::avatar_moves>( mount_type, m.ter( new_pos ).id(),
13647 u.current_movement_mode(), u.is_underwater(), new_pos.z );
13648
13649 // TODO: fix point types
13650 const tripoint_abs_omt old_abs_omt( ms_to_omt_copy( old_abs_pos ) );
13651 const tripoint_abs_omt new_abs_omt( ms_to_omt_copy( new_abs_pos ) );
13652 if( old_abs_omt != new_abs_omt ) {
13653 const oter_id &cur_ter = overmap_buffer.ter( new_abs_omt );
13654 const oter_id &past_ter = overmap_buffer.ter( old_abs_omt );
13655 get_event_bus().send<event_type::avatar_enters_omt>( new_abs_omt.raw(), cur_ter );
13656 // if the player has moved omt then might trigger an EOC for that OMT
13657 effect_on_conditions::om_move();
13658 if( !past_ter->get_exit_EOC().is_null() ) {
13659 dialogue d( get_talker_for( get_avatar() ), nullptr );
13660 effect_on_condition_id eoc = cur_ter->get_exit_EOC();
13661 if( eoc->type == eoc_type::ACTIVATION ) {
13662 eoc->activate( d );
13663 } else {
13664 debugmsg( "Must use an activation eoc for OMT movement. Otherwise, create a non-recurring effect_on_condition for this with its condition and effects, then have a recurring one queue it." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "13664", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Must use an activation eoc for OMT movement. Otherwise, create a non-recurring effect_on_condition for this with its condition and effects, then have a recurring one queue it."
);
13665 }
13666 }
13667
13668 if( !cur_ter->get_entry_EOC().is_null() ) {
13669 dialogue d( get_talker_for( get_avatar() ), nullptr );
13670 effect_on_condition_id eoc = cur_ter->get_exit_EOC();
13671 if( eoc->type == eoc_type::ACTIVATION ) {
13672 eoc->activate( d );
13673 } else {
13674 debugmsg( "Must use an activation eoc for OMT movement. Otherwise, create a non-recurring effect_on_condition for this with its condition and effects, then have a recurring one queue it." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/game.cpp"
, "13674", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Must use an activation eoc for OMT movement. Otherwise, create a non-recurring effect_on_condition for this with its condition and effects, then have a recurring one queue it."
);
13675 }
13676 }
13677
13678 }
13679}
13680} // namespace cata_event_dispatch

13682achievements_tracker &get_achievements()
13683{
13684 return g->achievements();
13685}

13687Character &get_player_character()
13688{
13689 return g->u;
13690}

13693{
13694 return g->u;
13695}
13696
13697avatar &get_avatar()
13698{
13699 return g->u;
13700}
13701
13702map &get_map()
13703{
13704 return g->m;
13705}
13706
13707creature_tracker &get_creature_tracker()
13708{
13709 return *g->critter_tracker;
13710}
13711
13712event_bus &get_event_bus()
13713{
13714 return g->events();
13715}

13718{

13720}

13723{

13725}

13727{
13728 g->scen = new_scenario;
13729}

13744}

13749}

13751global_variables &get_globals()
13752{
